tls:text.tls:line: Ch. 1. 1. The summary of the Rules of Propriety says:

sense.def: trifling

tls:text.tls:line: Always and in everything let there be reverence;

sense.def: show respectful diligence in action

tls:text.tls:line: with the deportment grave as when one is thinking (deeply),

sense.def: be serious

tls:text.tls:line: with the deportment grave as when one is thinking (deeply),

sense.def: like

tls:text.tls:line: with the deportment grave as when one is thinking (deeply),

sense.def: engage in reflection

tls:text.tls:line: and with speech composed and definite.

sense.def: pacify so as to fix/settle down; be calmly determinate in relation to

tls:text.tls:line: This will make the people tranquil.

sense.def: put physically at ease; provide comfort for, provide well for

tls:text.tls:line: This will make the people tranquil.

sense.def: the people

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.02; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.7a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 2. Pride should not be allowed to grow;

sense.def: arrogance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.02; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.7a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 2. Pride should not be allowed to grow;

sense.def: be caused or allowed to grow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.02; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.7a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: the desires should not be indulged;

sense.def: be followed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.02; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.7a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: the will should not be gratified to the full;

sense.def: ambition; wishes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.02; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.7a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: the will should not be gratified to the full;

sense.def: be completely fulfilled

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.02; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.7a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: pleasure should not be carried to excess.

sense.def: be caused to be excessive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 3. Men of talents and virtue can be familiar with others and yet respect them;

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 3. Men of talents and virtue can be familiar with others and yet respect them;

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 3. Men of talents and virtue can be familiar with others and yet respect them;

sense.def: have improperly intimate relations with; show improper intimacy in interacting with a superior

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 3. Men of talents and virtue can be familiar with others and yet respect them;

sense.def: become intimate with; be on intimate terms with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 3. Men of talents and virtue can be familiar with others and yet respect them;

sense.def: but on the other hand; but on the contrary; and yet; but; whereas;樂而不淫"is joyful without being extravagant" between subject and predicate the word indicates that the predication is unexpected

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: They love others and yet acknowledge the evil that is in them.

sense.def: incompetence

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

sense.def: excellence, special strong features (always stable or permanent features)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: They accumulate (wealth) and yet are able to part with it (to help the needy);

sense.def: engage in the accumulation of things

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.03; Couvreur 1.2; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.8b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: They accumulate (wealth) and yet are able to part with it (to help the needy);

sense.def: distribute the contextually determinate things

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 4. When you find wealth within your reach, do not (try to) get it by improper means;

sense.def: meet, be exposed to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 4. When you find wealth within your reach, do not (try to) get it by improper means;

sense.def: avoid to; be sure not to [This can also be taken more traditionally as a padV.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 4. When you find wealth within your reach, do not (try to) get it by improper means;

sense.def: irresponsibly, in an unregimented manner, arbitrarily; irregular THERE IS A MESS-UP WITH THE GRAPHS, READ gǒu:

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: When you meet with calamity, do not (try to) escape from it by improper means.

sense.def: meet, be exposed to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: When you meet with calamity, do not (try to) escape from it by improper means.

sense.def: avoid to; be sure not to [This can also be taken more traditionally as a padV.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: When you meet with calamity, do not (try to) escape from it by improper means.

sense.def: irresponsibly, in an unregimented manner, arbitrarily; irregular THERE IS A MESS-UP WITH THE GRAPHS, READ gǒu:

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: Do not seek for victory in small contentions;

sense.def: minor conflict

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: Do not seek for victory in small contentions;

sense.def: seek to, make every effort to V 求仙 "try to become an immortal" 求及

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: Do not seek for victory in small contentions;

sense.def: win the day, win victory; gain the upper hand; keep the upper hand; prevail; be victorious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: do not seek for more than your proper share.

sense.def: the apportioning, distribution; allotment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.04; Couvreur 1.2f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2; Yishu 2:1.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 5. Do not positively affirm what you have doubts about;

sense.def: consider something doubtful, be in doubt about a fact

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.05; Couvreur 1.3; Su1n Xïda4n 1.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3; Yishu 2:1.14a-15a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 7. In (observing) the rules of propriety, what is right (for the time and the circumstances) should be followed.

sense.def: what is appropriate and helpful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.05; Couvreur 1.3; Su1n Xïda4n 1.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3; Yishu 2:1.14a-15a; tr. Legge 1.62;

tls:text.tls:line: In discharging a mission (to another state), its customs are to be observed.

sense.def: serve on an official mission

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.06; Couvreur 1.3f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.16b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: that furnish the means of determining (the observances towards) relatives, as near and remote;

sense.def: fix, define, determine; give something its fixed definite form, establish firmly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.06; Couvreur 1.3f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.16b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: of settling points which may cause suspicion or doubt;

sense.def: reach a conclusion on, reach a legal decision on[decide on; determine]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.06; Couvreur 1.3f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.16b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: of settling points which may cause suspicion or doubt;

sense.def: doubt of any kind; doubtful cases of any kind MO, Xiaoqu: 決嫌疑

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.06; Couvreur 1.3f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.16b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: of distinguishing where there should be agreement, and where difference;

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.06; Couvreur 1.3f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.16b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: of distinguishing where there should be agreement, and where difference;

sense.def: identity and difference

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.07; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.19a-20a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: one does not go beyond the definite measure,

sense.def: modesty, (female) virtue; probity; proper constraint, proper moderation; rules of decent behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.07; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.19a-20a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: one does not go beyond the definite measure,

sense.def: go against (one's ruler etc); go beyond (one's duties)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.07; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.19a-20a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: or encroach on or despise others,

sense.def: encroach upon superior's privileges; infringe on the rights of others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.07; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.19a-20a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: or encroach on or despise others,

sense.def: be impolite

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.07; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.19a-20a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: nor is fond of (presuming) familiarities.

sense.def: like to, be fond of VERBING [often impossible to distinguish from vt+Nab[act]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.07; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.19a-20a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: nor is fond of (presuming) familiarities.

sense.def: be impertinent; be unduly familiar with superiors or with other persons who deserve respect

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.08; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.21a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 11. To cultivate one's person and fulfil one's words

sense.def: cultivate (one's person, the ancients etc); apply oneself to; train and exercise (troops); occasionally also with negative objects: LH 2 修詐 "cultivate fraudulence"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.08; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.21a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 11. To cultivate one's person and fulfil one's words

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.08; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.21a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 11. To cultivate one's person and fulfil one's words

sense.def: act on (one's words)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.08; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.21a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: When the conduct is (thus) ordered, and the words are accordant with the right course,

sense.def: be well cultivated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.08; Couvreur 1.4; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.21a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: When the conduct is (thus) ordered, and the words are accordant with the right course,

sense.def: be according to the way; be good and proper

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.09; Couvreur 1.4f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4; Yishu 2:1.22a; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: I have not heard of (the master) going to teach.

sense.def: go to a contextually determinate place and V, set out to V; be on one's way to (with a verbal (or subjectless sentential, if one prefers) object) 往拜之

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 13. The course (of duty), virtue, benevolence and righteous ness

sense.def: moral or psychological qualities; the proper way and its inherent moral integrity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 13. The course (of duty), virtue, benevolence and righteous ness

sense.def: morality as such; the concept of moral principles

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 14. nor are training and oral lessons

sense.def: instruction

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: for the rectification of manners complete;

sense.def: without

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: and discriminating in disputes be accomplished;

sense.def: without

tls:text.tls:srcline:
君臣上下，
父子兄弟，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 16. nor can (the duties between) ruler and minister, high and low, father and son, elder brother and younger, be determined;

sense.def: relationship between ruler and subject

tls:text.tls:srcline:
君臣上下，
父子兄弟，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 16. nor can (the duties between) ruler and minister, high and low, father and son, elder brother and younger, be determined;

sense.def: relationship between superior and inferior

tls:text.tls:srcline:
君臣上下，
父子兄弟，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 16. nor can (the duties between) ruler and minister, high and low, father and son, elder brother and younger, be determined;

sense.def: relationship between father and son

tls:text.tls:srcline:
君臣上下，
父子兄弟，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 16. nor can (the duties between) ruler and minister, high and low, father and son, elder brother and younger, be determined;

sense.def: the relationship between eldest and younger brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.10; Couvreur 1.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5; Yishu 2:1.24a-26b; tr. Legge 1.63;

sense.def: without

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.13; Couvreur 1.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6; Yishu 2:1.32a; tr. Legge 1.64;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 21. The parrot can speak

sense.def: parrot

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.13; Couvreur 1.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6; Yishu 2:1.32a; tr. Legge 1.64;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 21. The parrot can speak

sense.def: parrot

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.13; Couvreur 1.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6; Yishu 2:1.32a; tr. Legge 1.64;

tls:text.tls:line: and yet is nothing more than a bird;

sense.def: birds in general; birds of any kind; a bird

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.13; Couvreur 1.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6; Yishu 2:1.32a; tr. Legge 1.64;

tls:text.tls:line: the ape can speak,

sense.def: a kind of monkey

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.13; Couvreur 1.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6; Yishu 2:1.32a; tr. Legge 1.64;

tls:text.tls:line: and yet is nothing more than a beast.

sense.def: birds and beasts; a mere animal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.13; Couvreur 1.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6; Yishu 2:1.32a; tr. Legge 1.64;

tls:text.tls:line: Here now is a man who observes no rules of propriety;

sense.def: if (often indistinguishable from AND - relative clause) GY: 王而飾之

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.17; Couvreur 1.8; Su1n Xïda4n 1.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.37a-38a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: in humbling oneself and giving honour to others.

sense.def: treat (oneself) as (if) being of low status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.17; Couvreur 1.8; Su1n Xïda4n 1.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.37a-38a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 26. when the rich and noble know to love propriety,

sense.def: be especially fond of; find especially attractive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.17; Couvreur 1.8; Su1n Xïda4n 1.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.37a-38a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When the poor and mean know to love propriety,

sense.def: be intellectually capable to V; understand how to, know how to V; have the good sense to; know the importance of Ving

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.17; Couvreur 1.8; Su1n Xïda4n 1.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.37a-38a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When the poor and mean know to love propriety,

sense.def: be especially fond of; find especially attractive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.18; Couvreur 1.8f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.39a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When he is twenty, we call him a youth;

sense.def: be an infant; be young, be of an age where one is still very much dependent on others; be too young

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.18; Couvreur 1.8f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.39a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When he is thirty, we say, 'He is at his maturity;'

sense.def: LIJI: 30 years of age; be adult

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.18; Couvreur 1.8f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.39a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When he is forty, we say, 'He is in his vigour;'

sense.def: LIJI: 40 years of age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.18; Couvreur 1.8f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.39a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When he is fifty, we say, 'He is getting grey;'

sense.def: LIJI: be 50 years of age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.19; Couvreur 1.8f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.39a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When he is sixty, we say, 'He is getting old;'

sense.def: LIJI: 60 years of age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.19; Couvreur 1.8f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.39a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: When he is seventy, we say, 'He is old;'

sense.def: LIJI: be 70 years of age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.19; Couvreur 1.8f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7; Yishu 2:1.39a; tr. Legge 1.65;

tls:text.tls:line: At eighty or ninety, we say of him, 'He is very old.'

sense.def: be very old; LIJI: 80/90 years of age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.01.21; Couvreur 1.9f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.14f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 8; Yishu 2:1.45b-49a; tr. Legge 1.66;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 30. (In another state) he will style himself 'the old man;'

sense.def: I, the old fellow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.03; Couvreur 1.11; Su1n Xïda4n 1.16f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 9; Yishu 2:2.3b; tr. Legge 1.67;

tls:text.tls:line: brothers and relatives, both by consanguinity and affinity, will proclaim him loving;

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.06; Couvreur 1.12f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.18f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 10; Yishu 2:2.13a; tr. Legge 1.68;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 7. He should serve one twice as old as himself as he serves his father,

sense.def: like a father

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.06; Couvreur 1.12f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.18f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 10; Yishu 2:2.13a; tr. Legge 1.68;

tls:text.tls:line: one ten years older than himself as an elder brother;

sense.def: like an eldest brother

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.08; Couvreur 1.13f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 11; Yishu 2:2.19a; tr. Legge 1.68;

tls:text.tls:line: or derisive laughing.

sense.def: show laughing behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.09; Couvreur 1.14; Su1n Xïda4n 1.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 11; Yishu 2:2.19a-21a; tr. Legge 1.69;

tls:text.tls:line: he will not promise a friend to die (with or for him),

sense.def: friend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.11; Couvreur 1.15; Su1n Xïda4n 1.22f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 12; Yishu 2:2.24a-27a; tr. Legge 1.69;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 17. A boy should never be allowed to see an instance of deceit.

sense.def: mere child (younger than the adolescent boy/child 童子)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.11; Couvreur 1.15; Su1n Xïda4n 1.22f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 12; Yishu 2:2.24a-27a; tr. Legge 1.69;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 18. A lad should not wear a jacket of fur nor the skirt

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.11; Couvreur 1.15; Su1n Xïda4n 1.22f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 12; Yishu 2:2.24a-27a; tr. Legge 1.69;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 18. A lad should not wear a jacket of fur nor the skirt

sense.def: wear as one's clothes, use for clothing; dress up in (someone's clothes)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.11; Couvreur 1.15; Su1n Xïda4n 1.22f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 12; Yishu 2:2.24a-27a; tr. Legge 1.69;

tls:text.tls:line: he should hold the elder's hand with both his hands.

sense.def: the pair of, the two, both 兩手，兩目，兩耳

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.12; Couvreur 1.15f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.29b-30a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: When he meets his teacher on the road,

sense.def: run into a person, come to meet a person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.12; Couvreur 1.15f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.29b-30a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: When he meets his teacher on the road,

sense.def: my elder master, our master, the master, our elder masters etc.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.12; Couvreur 1.15f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.29b-30a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: and stand with his hands joined across his breast.

sense.def: join one's hands in front of one's chest so as to be politely inactive; bow politely without doing anything

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.13; Couvreur 1.16; Su1n Xïda4n 1.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.31b-32a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 22. When one has ascended the wall of a city, he should not point,

sense.def: climb up, go up; also by flying: 豋天 "rise to Heaven".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.13; Couvreur 1.16; Su1n Xïda4n 1.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.31b-32a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 22. When one has ascended the wall of a city, he should not point,

sense.def: point with the finger

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.14; Couvreur 1.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.24f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.32b-35a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: When outside the door there are two (pairs of) shoes,

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.14; Couvreur 1.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.24f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.32b-35a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 25. When about to enter the door,

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.15; Couvreur 1.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.25f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: In looking down or up, he should not turn (his head).

sense.def: look at things; be on the look-out

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.15; Couvreur 1.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.25f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: In looking down or up, he should not turn (his head).

sense.def: look up; look into the distance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.15; Couvreur 1.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.25f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: if it were shut, he should shut it again.

sense.def: shut the door; keep the door closed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.15; Couvreur 1.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.25f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: while he (turns to) shut the door, let him not do so hastily.

sense.def: shut the door; keep the door closed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.15; Couvreur 1.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.25f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 13; Yishu 2:2.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.70;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 26. Let him not tread on the shoes (left outside the door),

sense.def: pleated straw shoe or sandal; generally: footwear

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.17; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.41b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 28. Whenever (a host has recieved and) is entering with a guest,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.17; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.41b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: at every door he should give place to him.

sense.def: yield to, pass on the privilege to; yield precedence to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.17; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.41b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: When the guest arives at the inermost door (or that leading to the feast-room),

sense.def: arrive at, turn up; get to (a place);

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.17; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.41b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: When the guest arives at the inermost door (or that leading to the feast-room),

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.17; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.41b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: the host will ask to be allowed to enter first and arange the mats.

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.17; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.41b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: The host having made a low bow to him, they will enter (together).

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.18; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.43b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 29. When they have entered the door, the host moves to the right,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.18; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.43b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 29. When they have entered the door, the host moves to the right,

sense.def: steer towards the right, move towards the right

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.18; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.43b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: and the guest to the left,

sense.def: steer left; turn left; keep to the left

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.18; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.43b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: the former going to the steps on the east,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.18; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.43b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: The host firmly declines this,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.18; Couvreur 1.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.43b; tr. Legge 1.71;

tls:text.tls:line: and he returns to the other steps on the west.

sense.def: and then, afterwards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.19; Couvreur 1.19; Su1n Xïda4n 1.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.72;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 30. They then offer to each other the preceedence in going up,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.19; Couvreur 1.19; Su1n Xïda4n 1.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.72;

tls:text.tls:line: but the host commences first,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.19; Couvreur 1.19; Su1n Xïda4n 1.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.72;

tls:text.tls:line: thus ascending by successive paces.

sense.def: ancient Chinese pace equivalent to two paces in our calculations, step; particularly: dignified steps or regular steps

tls:text.tls:srcline:
上於東階，
則先右足；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.19; Couvreur 1.19; Su1n Xïda4n 1.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 14; Yishu 2:2.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.72;

tls:text.tls:line: He who ascends by the steps on the east should move his right foot first,

sense.def: right

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.02.20; Couvreur 1.21; Su1n Xïda4n 1.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 15; Yishu 2:2.46b-48a; tr. Legge 1.72;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 32. When two (equals) are sitting side by side, they do not have their elbows extended crosswise.

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.01; Couvreur 1.22; Su1n Xïda4n 1.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 15; Yishu 3:3.1a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: it is the rule that he (place) the brush on the basket,

sense.def: broom

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.01; Couvreur 1.22; Su1n Xïda4n 1.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 15; Yishu 3:3.1a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: it is the rule that he (place) the brush on the basket,

sense.def: dustpan

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.02; Couvreur 1.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.3a-5a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: if it be to sleep on, in what direction he is going to turn his feet.

sense.def: lie down and sleep; spend the night

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.02; Couvreur 1.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.3a-5a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: face the south or the north,

sense.def: face in the direction of; go in the direction of (the direction is placed in adverbial position)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.03; Couvreur 1.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.6a-7a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: 2.6. When the host kneels to adjust the mats(of a visitor),

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.03; Couvreur 1.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.6a-7a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: When the visitor (wishes to) remove one or more,

sense.def: guest; guest of honour, principal guest; specifically: invited permanent outside member of the entourage, retainer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.04; Couvreur 1.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.8a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 7. If the host have not put some question,

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.04; Couvreur 1.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.8a; tr. Legge 1.73;

tls:text.tls:line: the visitor should not begin the conversation. [bring a matter up]

sense.def: guest; guest of honour, principal guest; specifically: invited permanent outside member of the entourage, retainer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.05; Couvreur 1.24; Su1n Xïda4n 1.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.8b-9b; tr. Legge 1.74;

tls:text.tls:line: he should not look discomposed.

sense.def: on one's face

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.05; Couvreur 1.24; Su1n Xïda4n 1.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.8b-9b; tr. Legge 1.74;

tls:text.tls:line: he should not look discomposed.

sense.def: show a sense of shame; to blush; change the color of face; show shyness, be shy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.05; Couvreur 1.24; Su1n Xïda4n 1.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.8b-9b; tr. Legge 1.74;

tls:text.tls:line: With his two hands he should hold up his lower garment, so that the bottom of it may be a cubit from the ground.

sense.def: the pair of, the two, both 兩手，兩目，兩耳

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.05; Couvreur 1.24; Su1n Xïda4n 1.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 16; Yishu 3:3.8b-9b; tr. Legge 1.74;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 9. If any writing or tablets of his master, or his lute or citern be in the way,

sense.def: documents, books

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.06; Couvreur 1.24; Su1n Xïda4n 1.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 17; Yishu 3:3.10b; tr. Legge 1.74;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 10. When sitting and doing nothing, he should keep quite at the back (of his mat);

sense.def: always, without fail, completely on all occasions

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.06; Couvreur 1.24; Su1n Xïda4n 1.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 17; Yishu 3:3.10b; tr. Legge 1.74;

tls:text.tls:line: when eating, quite at the front of it.

sense.def: always, without fail, completely on all occasions

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.06; Couvreur 1.24; Su1n Xïda4n 1.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 17; Yishu 3:3.10b; tr. Legge 1.74;

tls:text.tls:line: and keep a watch on his countenance.

sense.def: upper part of the face; countenance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.11; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 18; Yishu 3:3.17b-18a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 20. When one is sitting on attendance on another of superior character or rank,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.11; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 18; Yishu 3:3.17b-18a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: and that other yawns or streches himself,

sense.def: the person of high rank mentioned above; the person in charge>the ruler> my ruler侍坐於君子，君子問更端 often works like a NP[post-N]@soc.si.def "my (one and only) lord

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.11; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 18; Yishu 3:3.17b-18a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: or lays hold of his staff or shoes,

sense.def: lay hold of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.11; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 18; Yishu 3:3.17b-18a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 21. In the same position,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.11; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 18; Yishu 3:3.17b-18a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: if the superior man put a question on a new subject,

sense.def: the person of high rank mentioned above; the person in charge>the ruler> my ruler侍坐於君子，君子問更端 often works like a NP[post-N]@soc.si.def "my (one and only) lord

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.11; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 18; Yishu 3:3.17b-18a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: if the superior man put a question on a new subject,

sense.def: another (day); another (object)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.11; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 18; Yishu 3:3.17b-18a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: if the superior man put a question on a new subject,

sense.def: subject matter, issue????

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.12; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 19; Yishu 3:3.18b-19a; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 22. Similarly,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.13; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 19; Yishu 3:3.20a-20b; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 24. Do not saunter about with a haughty gait,

sense.def: be arrogantly nonchalant in behaviour, be impolitely informal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.13; Couvreur 1.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 19; Yishu 3:3.20a-20b; tr. Legge 1.76;

tls:text.tls:line: nor sleep on your face.

sense.def: lie in bed; stay in bed; keep in bed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.15; Couvreur 1.28f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20; Yishu 3:3.25b-26b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: do not join them as a third.

sense.def: go to a contextually determinate place and V, set out to V; be on one's way to (with a verbal (or subjectless sentential, if one prefers) object) 往拜之

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.15; Couvreur 1.28f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20; Yishu 3:3.25b-26b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 31. Male and female should not sit together (in the same apartment),

sense.def: mixed; all kinds of; unsorted, unclassified 雜佩 "all kinds of ornaments worn on the belt"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.15; Couvreur 1.28f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20; Yishu 3:3.25b-26b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: nor use the same towel or comb,

sense.def: towel

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.15; Couvreur 1.28f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20; Yishu 3:3.25b-26b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: nor use the same towel or comb,

sense.def: SHI: comb

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.17; Couvreur 1.29f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20f; Yishu 3:3.28a-28b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 35. When a married aunt, or sister, or daughter

sense.def: mother-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.17; Couvreur 1.29f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20f; Yishu 3:3.28a-28b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 35. When a married aunt, or sister, or daughter

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.17; Couvreur 1.29f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20f; Yishu 3:3.28a-28b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 35. When a married aunt, or sister, or daughter

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.17; Couvreur 1.29f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 20f; Yishu 3:3.28a-28b; tr. Legge 1.77;

tls:text.tls:line: no brother (of the family) should sit with her on the same mat

sense.def: one's brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.18; Couvreur 1.30f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 21; Yishu 3:3.31a-32a; tr. Legge 1.78;

tls:text.tls:line: and (the bridegroom) should make a feast, and invite (his friends) in the district and neighbourhood, and his fellow officers:

sense.def: colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.19; Couvreur 1.31; Su1n Xïda4n 1.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 22; Yishu 3:3.34a-35b; tr. Legge 1.78;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, in buying a concubine, if he does not know her surname,

sense.def: buy, acquire (official positions) for money; go out to buy; try to buy; buy (a person from his employer)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.21; Couvreur 1.32f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.44f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.39a-41b; tr. Legge 1.78;

tls:text.tls:line: 9.44. A son at twenty

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.22; Couvreur 1.32f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.41b-42b; tr. Legge 1.78;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 46. When daughter is promised in marriage,

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: - The meat cooked on the bones is set on the left, and the sliced meat on the right;

sense.def: put on the left; place on the left-hand side

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: - The meat cooked on the bones is set on the left, and the sliced meat on the right;

sense.def: meat on the bone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: - The meat cooked on the bones is set on the left, and the sliced meat on the right;

sense.def: put on the right

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: - The meat cooked on the bones is set on the left, and the sliced meat on the right;

sense.def: sliced meat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: the rice is placed on the left of the parties on the mat,

sense.def: Note that Lù Démíng reads this meaning as sì in several places of 經典釋文: provisions; food supply; staple food; food for general sustenance while at home; (e.g. beg for) something to eat; food supplies; fodder (e.g. for horses)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: the rice is placed on the left of the parties on the mat,

sense.def: the left side

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: and the soup on their right;

sense.def: thick spiced broth with rice, typically with meat, but the poor would eat what in modern Chinese is 菜羹 which at the time was also called gēng 羹

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: and the soup on their right;

sense.def: to the right of N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: the minced and roasted meat are put outside (the chops and sliced meat),

sense.def: minced meat, either raw or cooked

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: and the pickles and sauces inside;

sense.def: minced food in vinegar (LIJI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: and the pickles and sauces inside;

sense.def: some kind of pickled sauce with meat on the bone; (also: pickles, spices)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: the onions and steamed onions succeed to these,

sense.def: onion; scallion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.23; Couvreur 1.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 23; Yishu 3:3.43b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: When slices of dried and spiced meat are put down,

sense.def: hung long piece of dried meat produced with a range of condiments (hence the derived meaning xiū 脩 "long")

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.24; Couvreur 1.34f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.47f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 24; Yishu 3:3.47a-48a; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 49. When the host leads on the guests

sense.def: invite (someone) (to do something)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.24; Couvreur 1.34f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.47f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 24; Yishu 3:3.47a-48a; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: Going on from the meat cooked on the bones

sense.def: meat on the bone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.25; Couvreur 1.34f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 24; Yishu 3:3.49b-50b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: the host will lead on the guests to take of the sliced meat

sense.def: invite (someone) (to do something)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.25; Couvreur 1.34f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 24; Yishu 3:3.49b-50b; tr. Legge 1.79;

tls:text.tls:line: from which they will go on to all the other dishes.

sense.def: cooked delicacies; cooked meats

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.27; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.54a-55b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. 55. Do not make a noise in eating;

sense.def: noisily

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.27; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.54a-55b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: do not crunch the bones with the teeth;

sense.def: bite, to crunch with the teeth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.28; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.56a-56b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. 57. Do not (try to) gulp down soup with vegetables in it,

sense.def: to drink; gulp down

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.28; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.56a-56b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: do not keep picking the teeth,

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.28; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.56a-56b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: nor swill down the sauces.

sense.def: to drink; swill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.28; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.56a-56b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: nor swill down the sauces.

sense.def: brine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.28; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.56a-56b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: the host will apologize for not having had the soup prepared better.

sense.def: apologise for Ving.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.28; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.56a-56b; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: the host will apologize for his poverty.

sense.def: state of poverty, feature of poverty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.29; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.57a; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. 58. Meat that is wet (and soft) may be divided with the teeth,

sense.def: wet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.29; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.57a; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. 58. Meat that is wet (and soft) may be divided with the teeth,

sense.def: with the teeth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.29; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.57a; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: but dried flesh cannot be so dealth with.

sense.def: dried up; parched

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.29; Couvreur 1.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 25; Yishu 3:3.57a; tr. Legge 1.80;

tls:text.tls:line: Do not bolt roast meat in large pieces.

sense.def: eat greedily from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.31; Couvreur 1.38; Su1n Xïda4n 1.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 26; Yishu 3:3.58a; tr. Legge 1.i1;

tls:text.tls:line: bows and (goes to) receive it at the place where the spirit-vase is kept.

sense.def: sometimes almost adverbially: with a bow; bowingly 拜送, 拜送，拜曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.34; Couvreur 1.39; Su1n Xïda4n 1.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 27; Yishu 3:3.62b-63b; tr. Legge 1.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: If he take his seat (only) as the companion of another (for whom it has been prepared), he should not decline them.

sense.def: juxtaposed, together 偶坐

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.35; Couvreur 1.39f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 3:3.63b; tr. Legge 1.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. 67. He who pares a melon for the son of Heaven should divide it into four parts and then into eight,

sense.def: cleave, divide (SHI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.35; Couvreur 1.39f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 3:3.63b; tr. Legge 1.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: and cover them with a napkin of fine linen.

sense.def: cover; keep wrapped in

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.35; Couvreur 1.39f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 3:3.63b; tr. Legge 1.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: and cover them with a napkin of fine linen.

sense.def: using the preceding N to V

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.35; Couvreur 1.39f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 3:3.63b; tr. Legge 1.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: and cover them with a napkin of fine linen.

sense.def: [OC Reconstruction surely qhlvl] SHI: fine linen or hemp cloth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.35; Couvreur 1.39f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 3:3.63b; tr. Legge 1.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: and cover them with a coarse napkin.

sense.def: using the preceding N to V

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.03.35; Couvreur 1.39f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 3:3.63b; tr. Legge 1.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: and cover them with a coarse napkin.

sense.def: coarse dolichos cloth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.01; Couvreur 1.40; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 4:4.1a; tr. Legge 1.i3;

tls:text.tls:line: (a young man) who has been capped should not use his comb,

sense.def: to comb

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.01; Couvreur 1.40; Su1n Xïda4n 1.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 28; Yishu 4:4.1a; tr. Legge 1.i3;

tls:text.tls:line: He should not laugh s0 as to show his teeth,

sense.def: smile/laugh (typically disdainfully)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: one should not present fish or tortoises (to a superior).

sense.def: river turtle; sea turtle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 5. He who is presenting a carriage and horses should carry in his hand (to the hall) the whip, and strap for mounting by.

sense.def: hold and carry (any object) with one or with two hands; wield

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 5. He who is presenting a carriage and horses should carry in his hand (to the hall) the whip, and strap for mounting by.

sense.def: whipping cane

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 5. He who is presenting a carriage and horses should carry in his hand (to the hall) the whip, and strap for mounting by.

sense.def: carriage harness; strap on carriage for help in mounting

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 6. He who is presenting a suit of mail should carry the helmet (to the hall).

sense.def: armour made of leather [often lacquered Jakob Marsalek]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 6. He who is presenting a suit of mail should carry the helmet (to the hall).

sense.def: helmet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 7. He who is presenting a captive should hold him by the right sleeve.

sense.def: captive, someone who is utterly dependent from or in the hand of someone else

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.03; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.4a-5b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 7. He who is presenting a captive should hold him by the right sleeve.

sense.def: hold in one's hands and be in charge of; hold and carry along (objects with or without a handle)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.04; Couvreur 1.41f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 29; Yishu 4:4.6a-7b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 8. He who is presenting grain unhulled should carry with him the left side of the account (of the quantity);

sense.def: tally of contract 左契

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.05; Couvreur 1.42f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 30; Yishu 4:4.8b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: if it be bent, the (string of) sinew should be kept upwards;

sense.def: bend (a bow); string (a bow)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.05; Couvreur 1.42f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 30; Yishu 4:4.8b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: (The giver) should with his right hand grasp the end of the bow,

sense.def: right

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.05; Couvreur 1.42f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 30; Yishu 4:4.8b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: and keep his left under the middle of the back.

sense.def: left

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.05; Couvreur 1.42f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 30; Yishu 4:4.8b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: If the host (wish to) bow (still lower),

sense.def: bow respectfully; bow as a sign of gratitude, admiration, congratulation, polite apology etc; makeobeisance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.06; Couvreur 1.42f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 30; Yishu 4:4.8b; tr. Legge 1.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: having his face in the same direction as the other;

sense.def: go along, conform (with someone) 與客並

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.08; Couvreur 1.44f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.62f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 31; Yishu 4:4.13b-16a; tr. Legge 1.85;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 16. He who is presenting a horse or a sheep should lead it with his right hand.

sense.def: offer up; deliver; hand up and give away, surrender, hand over (to the opponent or to an authority); deliver (results, in service of a ruler)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.08; Couvreur 1.44f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.62f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 31; Yishu 4:4.13b-16a; tr. Legge 1.85;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 17. He who is presenting a dog should lead it with his left hand.

sense.def: offer up; deliver; hand up and give away, surrender, hand over (to the opponent or to an authority); deliver (results, in service of a ruler)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.08; Couvreur 1.44f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.62f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 31; Yishu 4:4.13b-16a; tr. Legge 1.85;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 18. He who is carrying a bird (as his present of introduction) should do so with the head to the left.

sense.def: hold and carry (any object) with one or with two hands; wield

tls:text.tls:srcline:
凡以弓劍、
苞苴、
簞笥問人者，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.09; Couvreur 1.44f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 31; Yishu 4:4.16b; tr. Legge 1.85;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 23. Whenever friendly messages are about to be sent, with the present of a sword or bow, or of (fruit, flesh, and other things, wrapped in) matting or rushes, with grass mats, and in baskets, round or square,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
凡以弓劍、
苞苴、
簞笥問人者，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.09; Couvreur 1.44f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 31; Yishu 4:4.16b; tr. Legge 1.85;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 23. Whenever friendly messages are about to be sent, with the present of a sword or bow, or of (fruit, flesh, and other things, wrapped in) matting or rushes, with grass mats, and in baskets, round or square,

sense.def: round bamboo food basket with cover

tls:text.tls:srcline:
凡以弓劍、
苞苴、
簞笥問人者，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.09; Couvreur 1.44f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 31; Yishu 4:4.16b; tr. Legge 1.85;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 23. Whenever friendly messages are about to be sent, with the present of a sword or bow, or of (fruit, flesh, and other things, wrapped in) matting or rushes, with grass mats, and in baskets, round or square,

sense.def: ZZ 631: four-cornered oblong bamboo basket with cover for the carrying of clothes (examples found in Mawangdui)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.10; Couvreur 1.45f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 31; Yishu 4:4.18b-19b; tr. Legge 1.86;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 24. Whenever one is charged with a mission by his ruler,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.12; Couvreur 1.46; Su1n Xïda4n 1.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 32; Yishu 4:4.21a-22a; tr. Legge 1.86;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 27. T accuire extensive information and remember retentively, whild (at the same time) he is modest;

sense.def: remember things

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.13; Couvreur 1.47; Su1n Xïda4n 1.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 32; Yishu 4:4.22b; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: This tells us that a grandson may be the personator of his deceased granfather (at sacrifices)

sense.def: this (aforementioned utterance, or quotation)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.15; Couvreur 1.48; Su1n Xïda4n 1.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 33; Yishu 4:4.27b-28a; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 31. One who is fasting (in preparation for a sacrifice) should neither listen to music nor condole with mourners.

sense.def: to fast

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.15; Couvreur 1.48; Su1n Xïda4n 1.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 33; Yishu 4:4.27b-28a; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 31. One who is fasting (in preparation for a sacrifice) should neither listen to music nor condole with mourners.

sense.def: offer one's condolences

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.15; Couvreur 1.48; Su1n Xïda4n 1.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 33; Yishu 4:4.27b-28a; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: He should not go up to, nor descend from, the hall by the steps on the east (which his father used),

sense.def: east-side staircase; staircase used by the emperor at his succession or to perform a sacrifice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.15; Couvreur 1.48; Su1n Xïda4n 1.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 33; Yishu 4:4.27b-28a; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: He should not go up to, nor descend from, the hall by the steps on the east (which his father used),

sense.def: stairs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.16; Couvreur 1.48f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 33; Yishu 4:4.29b; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: if he have a scab on his head, he should wash it;

sense.def: head (also of birds etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.16; Couvreur 1.48f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 33; Yishu 4:4.29b; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: if he have a scab on his head, he should wash it;

sense.def: wound, laceration; dent (caused by an axe in a tree)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.16; Couvreur 1.48f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 33; Yishu 4:4.29b; tr. Legge 1.87;

tls:text.tls:line: if he have a sore on his body, he should bathe it.

sense.def: sore

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.18; Couvreur 1.49f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.69f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 34; Yishu 4:4.30b-33a; tr. Legge 1.88;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 35. Intercourse with the living (will be continued) in the future;

sense.def: OBI: coming, forthcoming; future

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.18; Couvreur 1.49f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.69f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 34; Yishu 4:4.30b-33a; tr. Legge 1.88;

tls:text.tls:line: intercourse with the dead (friend) was a thing of the past.

sense.def: past, previous, preceding, last

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.20; Couvreur 1.51; Su1n Xïda4n 1.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 39. When one goes to a burying-ground, he should not get up on any of the graves.

sense.def: dialect: mound with trees planted on it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.20; Couvreur 1.51; Su1n Xïda4n 1.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 40. In a house of mourning, one should not laugh.

sense.def: go through the motions of a smile, cut a smiling face

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.20; Couvreur 1.51; Su1n Xïda4n 1.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.35a-36a; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 42. When one sees ata distance a coffin with the corpse in it, he should not sing.

sense.def: coffin with the dead body in it; bier

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.22; Couvreur 1.51f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: When presenting himself at any mourning rite, one should have a sad countenance.

sense.def: grief-stricken 哀色

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.22; Couvreur 1.51f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: When presenting himself at any mourning rite, one should have a sad countenance.

sense.def: outer facial expression as expressive of an inner mental state or psychological disposition; spirit displayed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.22; Couvreur 1.51f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: When holding the rope, one should not laugh.

sense.def: go through the motions of a smile, cut a smiling face

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.22; Couvreur 1.51f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 47. When wearing his coat of mail and helmet,

sense.def: wear armour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.22; Couvreur 1.51f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 47. When wearing his coat of mail and helmet,

sense.def: wear a helmet; put on a helmet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.04.22; Couvreur 1.51f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 35; Yishu 4:4.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.89;

tls:text.tls:line: one's countenance should say, 'who dares meddle with me?'

sense.def: outer facial expression as expressive of an inner mental state or psychological disposition; spirit displayed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.02; Couvreur 1.54f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 36; Yishu 4:5.2b-5b; tr. Legge 1.91;

tls:text.tls:line: 1.2. A recorder should carry with him his implements for writhing;

sense.def: writing brush

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.05; Couvreur 1.56; Su1n Xïda4n 1.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 37; Yishu 4:5.9b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 10. With the enemy who has slayn his father,

sense.def: arch enemy, foe

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.06; Couvreur 1.56; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 37; Yishu 4:5.13b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 11. Many ramparts in the country round and near (a capital)

sense.def: battlements; defensive walls; ramparts; fortifications; entrenchments

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 13. When sacrificial robes are worn out, they should be burnt:

sense.def: get tattered, get worn out

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 13. When sacrificial robes are worn out, they should be burnt:

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: sacrificial vessels in the same condition should be buried,

sense.def: vessel of any kind; also: eating utensils, the plates and pots food is served or kept in

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: sacrificial vessels in the same condition should be buried,

sense.def: get tattered, get worn out

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: sacrificial vessels in the same condition should be buried,

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: as should the tortoise-shells and divining stalks,

sense.def: get tattered, get worn out

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: as should the tortoise-shells and divining stalks,

sense.def: bury by simply digging (someone) into the ground; dig (objects) into the ground

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: as should the tortoise-shells and divining stalks,

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: and a victim that has died.

sense.def: whole buffalo used in sacrifices

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: and a victim that has died.

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.07; Couvreur 1.57; Su1n Xïda4n 1.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.14b-15b; tr. Legge 1.92;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 14. All who take part with the ruler in a sacrifice

sense.def: OBI 5: (Periods I-II) conduct a meat sacrifice to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.08; Couvreur 1.57f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.i1f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.16b-18b; tr. Legge 1.93;

tls:text.tls:line: when he can no longer serve his plarents (through their death),

sense.def: [CATCHING UP WITH THE TIME OF>] while there still was, while there still is 逮日 "while there still is the sun> towards the evening", 逮闇 "while it is still dark"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.09; Couvreur 1.57f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.19b-20b; tr. Legge 1.93;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 18. In (reading) the books of poetry and history, there need be no avoiding of names,

sense.def: the Book of Songs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.09; Couvreur 1.57f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 38; Yishu 4:5.19b-20b; tr. Legge 1.93;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 18. In (reading) the books of poetry and history, there need be no avoiding of names,

sense.def: the Book of Documents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.11; Couvreur 1.60f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.i3f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 39; Yishu 4:5.22b-24b; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 22. External undertakings should be commenced on the odd days,

sense.def: odd-numbered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.11; Couvreur 1.60f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.i3f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 39; Yishu 4:5.22b-24b; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: and internal on the even.

sense.def: even-numbered

tls:text.tls:srcline: 先聖王之所以使民信時日，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.13; Couvreur 1.61; Su1n Xïda4n 1.85f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 39f; Yishu 4:5.29a-31b; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: The two were the models by which the ancient sage-kings made the people believe in seasons nd days,

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.13; Couvreur 1.61; Su1n Xïda4n 1.85f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 39f; Yishu 4:5.29a-31b; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: revere spiritual beings,

sense.def: the ghosts and spirits (always in the plural, occasionally generic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.13; Couvreur 1.61; Su1n Xïda4n 1.85f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 39f; Yishu 4:5.29a-31b; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: the methods (also) by which they made them determine their perplexities

sense.def: doubt of any kind; doubtful cases of any kind MO, Xiaoqu: 決嫌疑

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.15; Couvreur 1.62f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.87f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 40; Yishu 4:5.33b-36a; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. 28. When the ruler's carriage is about to have the horses put to it,

sense.def: be yoked (of carriage)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.16; Couvreur 1.62f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 40f; Yishu 4:5.36b-37a; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: In passing through the gates (of a city) or village, and crossing the water channels,

sense.def: gates

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.16; Couvreur 1.62f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 40f; Yishu 4:5.36b-37a; tr. Legge 1.94;

tls:text.tls:line: In passing through the gates (of a city) or village, and crossing the water channels,

sense.def: canals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.17; Couvreur 1.64f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 41; Yishu 4:5.38a-38b; tr. Legge 1.95;

tls:text.tls:line: for the diriver to hand the strap (to the person about to mount the carriage).

sense.def: hand over (something N2) to (someone N1); confer (something N2) upon (someone N1)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.19; Couvreur 1.65f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.44a-45a; tr. Legge 1.96;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 39. A man in armour does not bow,

sense.def: wear armour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.19; Couvreur 1.65f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.44a-45a; tr. Legge 1.96;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 39. A man in armour does not bow,

sense.def: a polite bow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.19; Couvreur 1.65f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.44a-45a; tr. Legge 1.96;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 40. When the carriage of a deceased ruler is following at his interment, the place on the left sould be vacant.

sense.def: SHI 236: lucky (day); auspicious (hearth, carriage for a deceased person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.20; Couvreur 1.65f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.47a-47b; tr. Legge 1.96;

tls:text.tls:line: with the left kept behind and the head bent down.

sense.def: stoop down; bow down; bow the head 俯而泣, but also ZUO Zhao 7 一命而僂，再命而傴，三命而俯

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.21; Couvreur 1.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.92f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.47b-50a; tr. Legge 1.97;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 43. In his carriage one should not cough loudly,

sense.def: ZUO: cough (quietly), clear one's throat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.21; Couvreur 1.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.92f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.47b-50a; tr. Legge 1.97;

tls:text.tls:line: nor point with his hand in an iregular way.

sense.def: point with the finger

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.21; Couvreur 1.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.92f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.47b-50a; tr. Legge 1.97;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 44. Standing (in his carriage) one should look (forward only) to the distance of five revolutions of the wheels.

sense.def: revolution of a wheel

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.21; Couvreur 1.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.92f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.47b-50a; tr. Legge 1.97;

tls:text.tls:line: Bending forward, he should (do so only till he) sees the tails of the horses.

sense.def: tail (of beasts or birds)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.21; Couvreur 1.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.92f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 42; Yishu 4:5.47b-50a; tr. Legge 1.97;

tls:text.tls:line: He should not urge the to their speed.

sense.def: gallop; hasten along (ZUO); hurry

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.23; Couvreur 1.67f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 43; Yishu 4:5.52a; tr. Legge 1.97;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 48. (An officer) walking the ruler's horses

sense.def: cause to walk, make pace along (a horse etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 01.05.23; Couvreur 1.67f; Su1n Xïda4n 1.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 43; Yishu 4:5.52a; tr. Legge 1.97;

tls:text.tls:line: If he trample on their forage,

sense.def: press > step on; trample on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.01; Couvreur 1.69; Su1n Xïda4n 2.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 45; Yishu 5:6.1a-2a; tr. Legge 1.99;

tls:text.tls:line: when with one hand, on a level with the girdle.

sense.def: specifically: inner belt; any belt or sash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.01; Couvreur 1.69; Su1n Xïda4n 2.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 45; Yishu 5:6.1a-2a; tr. Legge 1.99;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. 2. An article belonging to the son of Heaven should be held higher than the heart;

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.03; Couvreur 1.70f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 46; Yishu 5:6.4a-5a; tr. Legge 1.100;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. 4. (A minister) should stand (with his back) curved in the manner of a sounding-stone, and his girdle-pendants hanging down.

sense.def: like a music stone, in the shape of a music stone, so as to make the shape of a music stone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.03; Couvreur 1.70f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 46; Yishu 5:6.4a-5a; tr. Legge 1.100;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. 4. (A minister) should stand (with his back) curved in the manner of a sounding-stone, and his girdle-pendants hanging down.

sense.def: bow down to form the shape of a musical stone (as practised in Japan today...)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.03; Couvreur 1.70f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 46; Yishu 5:6.4a-5a; tr. Legge 1.100;

tls:text.tls:line: where his lord has them hanging in front,

sense.def: what is worn on the belt; pendant worn on the belt SHI: 青青子佩 "all green are your (jade) ornaments worn on the belt"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.03; Couvreur 1.70f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 46; Yishu 5:6.4a-5a; tr. Legge 1.100;

tls:text.tls:line: his should descend to the ground.

sense.def: what is worn on the belt; pendant worn on the belt SHI: 青青子佩 "all green are your (jade) ornaments worn on the belt"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.04; Couvreur 1.71f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 47; Yishu 5:6.9a-11a; tr. Legge 1.100;

tls:text.tls:line: should not presume to spea of himself as 'I, the little son.'

sense.def: 自稱曰老夫 (sometimes with preceding 於﹣phrase)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.04; Couvreur 1.71f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 47; Yishu 5:6.9a-11a; tr. Legge 1.100;

tls:text.tls:line: should not presume to speak of himself as 'I, the inheriting son, so-and-so.'

sense.def: 自稱曰老夫 (sometimes with preceding 於﹣phrase)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.04; Couvreur 1.71f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 47; Yishu 5:6.9a-11a; tr. Legge 1.100;

tls:text.tls:line: should not presume to speak of himself as 'I, the inheriting son, so-and-so.'

sense.def: continue> following; succeeding

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.05; Couvreur 1.73; Su1n Xïda4n 2.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 47; Yishu 5:6.12b-13b; tr. Legge 1.101;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 9. When one, in attendance on a superior man,

sense.def: serve 侍於

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.05; Couvreur 1.73; Su1n Xïda4n 2.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 47; Yishu 5:6.12b-13b; tr. Legge 1.101;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 9. When one, in attendance on a superior man,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.06; Couvreur 1.73f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 48; Yishu 5:6.14a; tr. Legge 1.101;

tls:text.tls:line: He will carefully study its rules,

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.07; Couvreur 1.73f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.8f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 48; Yishu 5:6.15b; tr. Legge 1.101;

tls:text.tls:line: he should (continue to) send back word about himself to the representative of his ancestor.

sense.def: honoured early ancestor of the clan; early ancestor, ancestry; common pre-Buddhist: ancestral, pertaining to ancestral worship or clan worship

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.08; Couvreur 1.74f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 48f; Yishu 5:6.18a-19b; tr. Legge 1.102;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 12. A superior man, when left an orphan, will not change his name.
