sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.09; Couvreur 1.74f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 49; Yishu 5:6.20b; tr. Legge 1.102;

tls:text.tls:line: When sacrificing, one should not speak of what is inauspicious.

sense.def: what is inauspicious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.10; Couvreur 1.76f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 49; Yishu 5:6.21a-21b; tr. Legge 1.103;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. 15. For one to have to dust his (collection of) written tablets, or adjust them before the ruler,

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.10; Couvreur 1.76f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 49; Yishu 5:6.21a-21b; tr. Legge 1.103;

tls:text.tls:line: and also is it

sense.def: turn upside down; pervert

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.11; Couvreur 1.76f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.11f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 49; Yishu 5:6.21b-24a; tr. Legge 1.103;

tls:text.tls:line: Nor, unless announcement of it has been made (and permission given), 衰， can one take in

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.12; Couvreur 1.77f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 50; Yishu 5:6.24a; tr. Legge 1.103;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 18. When a superior man, (high in rank), is about to engage in building,

sense.def: to plan and lay out; to build

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.12; Couvreur 1.77f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 50; Yishu 5:6.24a; tr. Legge 1.103;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 18. When a superior man, (high in rank), is about to engage in building,

sense.def: any building

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.13; Couvreur 1.77f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 50; Yishu 5:6.24b-25a; tr. Legge 1.103;

tls:text.tls:line: in building a house,

sense.def: any building

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.15; Couvreur 1.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 51; Yishu 5:6.28b; tr. Legge 1.104;

tls:text.tls:line: on crossing the boundary,

sense.def: leap across (a wall etc), get across

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.15; Couvreur 1.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 51; Yishu 5:6.28b; tr. Legge 1.104;

tls:text.tls:line: should prepare for an altar, and wail there, looking in the direction of the state.

sense.def: altar, sacrificial mound; high ground round a building used for ritual or sacrificial purposes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.15; Couvreur 1.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 51; Yishu 5:6.28b; tr. Legge 1.104;

tls:text.tls:line: remove his ornamental collar,

sense.def: remove; send away; pull down

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.15; Couvreur 1.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 51; Yishu 5:6.28b; tr. Legge 1.104;

tls:text.tls:line: have a covering of white (dog's-fur) for his cross-board,

sense.def: covering; cover

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.16; Couvreur 1.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 51; Yishu 5:6.28b; tr. Legge 1.104;

tls:text.tls:line: He should not trim his nails or beard,

sense.def: cut the hair

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.18; Couvreur 1.79f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 51; Yishu 5:6.32b-33a; tr. Legge 1.104;

tls:text.tls:line: he should first bow to him;

sense.def: bow to someone 相拜 "bow to each other"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.19; Couvreur 1.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 51; Yishu 5:6.33b-34a; tr. Legge 1.105;

tls:text.tls:line: the parties should be sure to return the bow, each of the other.

sense.def: a polite bow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.20; Couvreur 1.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.34a; tr. Legge 1.105;

tls:text.tls:line: A ruler does not bow

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.20; Couvreur 1.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.34a; tr. Legge 1.105;

tls:text.tls:line: to a (simple) officer;

sense.def: in immediate response to a similar action 答拜 "bow in response to a bow"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.20; Couvreur 1.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.34a; tr. Legge 1.105;

tls:text.tls:line: he should bow to his bow.

sense.def: in immediate response to a similar action 答拜 "bow in response to a bow"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.20; Couvreur 1.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.34a; tr. Legge 1.105;

tls:text.tls:line: A Great officer

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.20; Couvreur 1.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.34a; tr. Legge 1.105;

tls:text.tls:line: however mean may be his rank.

sense.def: in immediate response to a similar action 答拜 "bow in response to a bow"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.22; Couvreur 1.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.37a; tr. Legge 1.106;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. 25. In bad years,

sense.def: be ominous, baleful, ill-omened, inauspicious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.22; Couvreur 1.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.37a; tr. Legge 1.106;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler at his meals will not make the (usual) offering of the lungs,

sense.def: lung

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.22; Couvreur 1.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 52; Yishu 5:6.37a; tr. Legge 1.106;

tls:text.tls:line: His special road will not be kept clean and swept,

sense.def: remove dirt> keep clean; clear away obstacles from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.24; Couvreur 1.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.19f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 53; Yishu 5:6.41a-42a; tr. Legge 1.106;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. 28. When a Great officer wishes to g beyond the boundaries (of the state) on private business,

sense.def: general: border between any type of territory; border territory [the result of a systematic division of a large tract of land into fields (mǔ 畝)] [Jens]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.25; Couvreur 1.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 53; Yishu 5:6.42a; tr. Legge 1.106;

tls:text.tls:line: An (inferior) officer in similar circumstances,

sense.def: (a) state boundary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.26; Couvreur 1.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 53; Yishu 5:6.43a; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Why are you leaving the altars of the spirits of the land and grain?'

sense.def: our altars of the land and grain; the altars of the land and grain of the subject of the sentence

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.26; Couvreur 1.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 53; Yishu 5:6.43a; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Why are you leaving your acestral temple?'

sense.def: ancestral temples, temples for the ancestors (symbols of the nation, see this word under NATION)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.26; Couvreur 1.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 53; Yishu 5:6.43a; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Why are you leaving the graves (of your ancestors)?'

sense.def: tombs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.27; Couvreur 1.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 53; Yishu 5:6.43a-43b; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: A ruler should die for his altars;

sense.def: our (one's) nation, national ancestral and moral heritage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.28; Couvreur 1.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 54; Yishu 5:6.45b; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: assigning (to all) their diffierent offices, giving out (the laws and ordinances of) the government, and employing the services of the able,

sense.def: meritorious [effort]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.28; Couvreur 1.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 54; Yishu 5:6.45b; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: he styles himself, 'I, the one man.'

sense.def: I, the one person (the king)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.29; Couvreur 1.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 54; Yishu 5:6.48b; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: it is said, 'Here is he, so-and-so, who is king by (the grace of) Heaven.'

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.30; Couvreur 1.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.22f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 54; Yishu 5:6.50b; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The king by (the grace of Heaven) has fallen.'

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.01.30; Couvreur 1.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.22f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 54; Yishu 5:6.50b; tr. Legge 1.107;

tls:text.tls:line: it is said, 'The king by (the grace of) Heaven has gone far on high.'

sense.def: go far on high> die (surely for 登遐 dēng xiá)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.02; Couvreur 1.86f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 55; Yishu 5:7.3a-3b; tr. Legge 1.109;

tls:text.tls:line: the Grand-minister of prayers;

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.06; Couvreur 1.89f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 55; Yishu 5:7.10a; tr. Legge 1.110;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 6. When the five officers give in their contributions,

sense.def: office-holder, officer, official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.06; Couvreur 1.89f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 55; Yishu 5:7.10a; tr. Legge 1.110;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 6. When the five officers give in their contributions,

sense.def: tribute, offering

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.08; Couvreur 1.89f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 56; Yishu 5:7.11b; tr. Legge 1.110;

tls:text.tls:line: To the feudal princes, they designate themselves,

sense.def: call (oneself) N2 自稱於諸侯曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.10; Couvreur 1.90f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.30f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 56; Yishu 5:7.17a-18b; tr. Legge 1.111;

tls:text.tls:line: In his own territories each one calls himself, 'the unworthy one;'

sense.def: 自稱曰老夫 (sometimes with preceding 於﹣phrase)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.10; Couvreur 1.90f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.30f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 56; Yishu 5:7.17a-18b; tr. Legge 1.111;

tls:text.tls:line: outside them, 'the king's ancient.'

sense.def: 自稱曰老夫 (sometimes with preceding 於﹣phrase)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.12; Couvreur 1.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 57; Yishu 5:7.35a; tr. Legge 1.111;

tls:text.tls:line: When there is a binding to mutual faith, it is called 'a solemn declaration.'

sense.def: from late Warring States times onwards: undertake as a promise on; enter an agreement on; enter into (a contract 盟)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.12; Couvreur 1.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 57; Yishu 5:7.35a; tr. Legge 1.111;

tls:text.tls:line: When there is a binding to mutual faith, it is called 'a solemn declaration.'

sense.def: oath; the swearing of oaths;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.12; Couvreur 1.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 57; Yishu 5:7.35a; tr. Legge 1.111;

tls:text.tls:line: When they use a victim, it is called 'a covenant.'

sense.def: formal diplomatic written and ritual agreement, oath of allegiance covenant; pact

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.13; Couvreur 1.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 57; Yishu 5:7.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: as 'the man of little virtue.'

sense.def: 自稱曰老夫 (sometimes with preceding 於﹣phrase)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.13; Couvreur 1.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 57; Yishu 5:7.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 14. If he be in mourning (for his father),

sense.def: pertaining to mourning 凶服，凶事"case of death"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.13; Couvreur 1.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 57; Yishu 5:7.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: If it be another sacrifice elsewhere, the style is, 'so-and-so, prince of such-and-such a state, the distant descendant.'

sense.def: removed by one generation, great-(grandson)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.14; Couvreur 1.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.35f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 57; Yishu 5:7.32b-34a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 16. When one prince sends a message to another,

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.16; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.36a-38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 18. The partner of the son of Heaven is called 'the queen;'

sense.def: queen; later: empress

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.16; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.36a-38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: of a feudal prince, 'the helpmate;'

sense.def: a wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.16; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.36a-38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: of a Great officer, 'the attendant;'

sense.def: wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.16; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.36a-38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: and of a common man, 'the mate.'

sense.def: main wife of a contextually determinate person; someone's main wife; one's main wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.16; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.36a-38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 19. A duke and (one of) the feudal princes had their helpmate,

sense.def: a wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.16; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.36a-38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: and concubines.

sense.def: concubine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.17; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: The helpmate called herself, before the son of Heaven,

sense.def: call (oneself) N2 自稱於諸侯曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.17; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: and before the prince (of another state),

sense.def: call (oneself) N2 自稱於諸侯曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.17; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: and before the prince (of another state),

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.17; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: To her own ruler she called herself

sense.def: call (oneself) N2 自稱於諸侯曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.17; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: 'the small maid.'

sense.def: child (a woman calls herself 小童 in front of the emperor)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.17; Couvreur 1.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 58; Yishu 5:7.38a; tr. Legge 1.112;

tls:text.tls:line: (each member of the harem) called herself 'your handmaid.'

sense.def: 自稱曰老夫 (sometimes with preceding 於﹣phrase)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.18; Couvreur 1.95f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 59; Yishu 5:7.40b; tr. Legge 1.113;

tls:text.tls:line: and styled himself 'your subsidiary minister.'

sense.def: 自稱曰老夫 (sometimes with preceding 於﹣phrase)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.02.18; Couvreur 1.95f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 59; Yishu 5:7.40b; tr. Legge 1.113;

tls:text.tls:line: and styled himself 'your subsidiary minister.'

sense.def: accompanying; supporting [see péi chén 陪臣 "accompanying minister, humble minister]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.01; Couvreur 1.96f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 60; Yishu 6:8.1a; tr. Legge 1.114;

tls:text.tls:line: he should leave (his service).

sense.def: escape from; avoid by running away from; run away from, abscond from (difficulties, contracts etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.02; Couvreur 1.97; Su1n Xïda4n 2.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 60; Yishu 6:8.3a; tr. Legge 1.114;

tls:text.tls:line: the physic of a doctor, in whose family medicine has not been practiced for three generations at least,

sense.def: medically specialised shaman; medical doctor8

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.03; Couvreur 1.97f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 61; Yishu 6:8.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.114;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 3. In comparing (different) men, we can only do so when their (circumstances and conditions) are of the same class.

sense.def: be (abstractly) in> depend on; be based on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.10; Couvreur 1.101f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.28b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: the pig, 'the hard bristles;'

sense.def: bristles of a pig

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.10; Couvreur 1.101f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.28b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: a cock, 'the loud voice;'

sense.def: cock

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.10; Couvreur 1.101f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.28b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: a pheasant, 'the wide toes;'

sense.def: foot

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.11; Couvreur 1.101f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.28b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: dried fish, 'the well-considered oblarion;'

sense.def: withered, dried (of wood, earth, fish, skull)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.11; Couvreur 1.101f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.28b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: fresh fish, 'the sraight oblation.'

sense.def: fresh

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.11; Couvreur 1.101f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.28b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: spirits, 'the clear cup;'

sense.def: general derived meaning: wine cup or wine ladle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 11. The death of the son of Heaven is expresed by pa(ng (has fallen);)

sense.def: of emperor or king: die

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: of a feudal prince, by hung (has crashed);

sense.def: of senior officials: die [occasionally also used to refer to the death of an emperor]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: of a Great officer, by Z (has ended);

sense.def: come to an end> die

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: of an (ordinary) officer, by p lu (is now unsalaried);

sense.def: be unsalaried > to die (when referring to the death of ordinary officials)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: (The corpse) one the couch is called shih, (the laid out);

sense.def: corpse 屍 is a variant character created to refer unambiguously to the corpse rather than the impersonator of the dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: when it is put in the coffin, that is called ki (being on the long home).

sense.def: coffin; inner coffin

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: when it is put in the coffin, that is called ki (being on the long home).

sense.def: coffin with the dead body in it; bier

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.13; Couvreur 1.102f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 63; Yishu 6:8.32a-34b; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. 12. (The death of) a winged fowl is expressed by hsiang (has fallen down);

sense.def: birds; a bird (in general)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.14; Couvreur 1.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 64; Yishu 6:8.35b-36a; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 13. In sacrificing to them, a grandfather is called 'the souvereign grandfather;'

sense.def: LIJI: highest ancestors in the father's lineage; lineage of ancestors; sometimes also referring specifically to the father of the king

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.14; Couvreur 1.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 64; Yishu 6:8.35b-36a; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: a grandmother, 'the souvereign granmother;'

sense.def: LIJI: 'souvereign grandmother'; mother of the king

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.14; Couvreur 1.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 64; Yishu 6:8.35b-36a; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: a father, 'the souvereign father;'

sense.def: honorific and poetic term for one's father [also sometimes: great-grandfather][CA]

tls:text.tls:srcline:
生曰父，
曰母，
曰妻；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.14; Couvreur 1.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 64; Yishu 6:8.35b-36a; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 14. While (they are) alive, the names of father (fu), mother (mu) and wife (khi) are used;

sense.def: the mother of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:srcline:
生曰父，
曰母，
曰妻；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.14; Couvreur 1.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 64; Yishu 6:8.35b-36a; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. 14. While (they are) alive, the names of father (fu), mother (mu) and wife (khi) are used;

sense.def: main wife of a contextually determinate person; someone's main wife; one's main wife

tls:text.tls:srcline:
死曰考，
曰妣，
曰嬪。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.14; Couvreur 1.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 64; Yishu 6:8.35b-36a; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: when they are dead, those of 'the completed one (khao),' 'the corresponding one (pi),' and 'the honoured one (pin).'

sense.def: deceased father

tls:text.tls:srcline:
死曰考，
曰妣，
曰嬪。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.14; Couvreur 1.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 64; Yishu 6:8.35b-36a; tr. Legge 1.117;

tls:text.tls:line: when they are dead, those of 'the completed one (khao),' 'the corresponding one (pi),' and 'the honoured one (pin).'

sense.def: deceased wife (LIJI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.15; Couvreur 1.104; Su1n Xïda4n 2.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 65; Yishu 6:8.37b; tr. Legge 1.118;

tls:text.tls:line: or below his girdle;

sense.def: specifically: inner belt; any belt or sash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.16; Couvreur 1.104; Su1n Xïda4n 2.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 65; Yishu 6:8.37b; tr. Legge 1.118;

tls:text.tls:line: and below the girdle grief;

sense.def: specifically: inner belt; any belt or sash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 02.03.20; Couvreur 1.105f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 66; Yishu 6:8.48a; tr. Legge 1.119;

tls:text.tls:line: Lads should bring their article, and withdraw.

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.03; Couvreur 1.107f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 69; Yishu 7:9.1b; tr. Legge 1.120;

tls:text.tls:line: Tze-yu asked Confucius (about the matter),

sense.def: ask (someone N2) about (something N1) 問孝於我

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.06; Couvreur 1.109f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 71; Yishu 7:9.6b; tr. Legge 1.121;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. Ki Wu-(?)ze had built a house,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.07; Couvreur 1.109f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 71; Yishu 7:9.6b; tr. Legge 1.121;

tls:text.tls:line: and has not been changed since.

sense.def: has never been V-ed ??

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.08; Couvreur 1.111f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 71; Yishu 7:9.8b; tr. Legge 1.122;

tls:text.tls:line: the disciples of (his father) Tze-sze asked him, saying,

sense.def: 問N1於N2曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.08; Couvreur 1.111f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 71; Yishu 7:9.8b; tr. Legge 1.122;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Did your predescessor, the superior man,

sense.def: gentleman 吾先君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.09; Couvreur 1.111f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 71f; Yishu 7:9.8b-9a; tr. Legge 1.122;

tls:text.tls:line: 'My progneitor, a superior man, never failed in pursuing the right path.

sense.def: gentleman 吾先君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.11; Couvreur 1.112f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 72; Yishu 7:9.11a; tr. Legge 1.122;

tls:text.tls:line: When he lays his forehead to the ground, and then bows (to his visitor),

sense.def: forehead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.12; Couvreur 1.113f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: that the ancients made graves (only), and raised no mound over them.

sense.def: make tombs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.12; Couvreur 1.113f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: that the ancients made graves (only), and raised no mound over them.

sense.def: to raise a tomb; to raise a mound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.12; Couvreur 1.113f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: I cannot do without something by which I can remember (the place).'

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.12; Couvreur 1.113f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: On this, he (resolved to) raise a mound (over the grave)

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.12; Couvreur 1.113f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: four feet high.

sense.def: have a hight of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.14; Couvreur 1.113f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.14a; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: He then wept freely, and said,

sense.def: shed tears

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.15; Couvreur 1.115; Su1n Xïda4n 2.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.15b; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: when any came to condole with him,

sense.def: there was an N which V-ed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.15; Couvreur 1.115; Su1n Xïda4n 2.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 73; Yishu 7:9.15b; tr. Legge 1.123;

tls:text.tls:line: when any came to condole with him,

sense.def: (an N) which (V-s) 葉實可啄食者 SW: 凡物無乳者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.16; Couvreur 1.115f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 74; Yishu 7:9.18a; tr. Legge 1.124;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When the grass is old on the grave of a friend,

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.22; Couvreur 1.118; Su1n Xïda4n 2.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 76; Yishu 7:9.23b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. (In the time of Shun) of Yi they used earthenware coffins;

sense.def: made of earthenware; earthenware

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.22; Couvreur 1.118; Su1n Xïda4n 2.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 76; Yishu 7:9.23b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. (In the time of Shun) of Yi they used earthenware coffins;

sense.def: coffin; inner coffin

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.22; Couvreur 1.118; Su1n Xïda4n 2.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 76; Yishu 7:9.23b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: The people of Yin used wooden coffins, the outer and inner.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.23; Couvreur 1.118f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 76; Yishu 7:9.24a; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. The people of Kau buried those who died between 16 and 19

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.24; Couvreur 1.119; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.25b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. Under the souvereigns of Hsia they preferred what was black.

sense.def: admire and venerate as the best of alternatives; prefer, treasure most

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.24; Couvreur 1.119; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.25b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. Under the souvereigns of Hsia they preferred what was black.

sense.def: what is black> black things

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.24; Couvreur 1.119; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.25b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: and the victims they used were black.

sense.def: be reddish dark; generally: dark

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.24; Couvreur 1.119; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.25b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin dynasty they preferred what was white.

sense.def: admire and venerate as the best of alternatives; prefer, treasure most

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.24; Couvreur 1.119; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.25b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin dynasty they preferred what was white.

sense.def: what is white; the contextually determinate white thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.24; Couvreur 1.119; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.25b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: On occasions of mourning, for coffining the body, they used the midday;

sense.def: on midday, at noon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.25; Couvreur 1.119; Su1n Xïda4n 2.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.25b; tr. Legge 1.125;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Kau dynasty they preferred what was red.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.27; Couvreur 1.119f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.28b; tr. Legge 1.126;

tls:text.tls:line: that the sorrow declared in the weeping and wailing,

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.27; Couvreur 1.119f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 77; Yishu 7:9.28b; tr. Legge 1.126;

tls:text.tls:line: the feelings expressed in the robe of sackloth with even or frayed edges,

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.30; Couvreur 1.120f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 78; Yishu 7:9.31a; tr. Legge 1.126;

tls:text.tls:line: Though I do not presume to grudge dying,

sense.def: be chary with; begrudge, be stingy with; be possessive about; be loath to lose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.30; Couvreur 1.120f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 78; Yishu 7:9.31a; tr. Legge 1.126;

tls:text.tls:line: Though I do not presume to grudge dying,

sense.def: death, also abstract: the fact of dying; mode of dying

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.30; Couvreur 1.120f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 78; Yishu 7:9.31a; tr. Legge 1.126;

tls:text.tls:line: our ruler is old,

sense.def: be of great age; be old and frail; be senior

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.31; Couvreur 1.120f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 78; Yishu 7:9.31a; tr. Legge 1.126;

tls:text.tls:line: Many difficulties are threatening the state,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.32; Couvreur 1.122f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 79; Yishu 7:9.34a; tr. Legge 1.127;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. There was a man of Lu, who after performing in the morning the ceremony which introduced the 25th month of his mourning, began to sing in the evening.

sense.def: auspicious memorial sacrifice; auspiciousness sacrifice in which one seeks (but does not necessarily get) a favourable response for a project

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.32; Couvreur 1.122f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 79; Yishu 7:9.34a; tr. Legge 1.127;

tls:text.tls:line: Tze-lu laughed at him,

sense.def: normally: find ridiculous and laugh at, sneer at

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.34; Couvreur 1.123f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 79; Yishu 7:9.35b; tr. Legge 1.127;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. Duke Kwang of Lu fought a battle with the men of Sung at Shaeng-khiu.

sense.def: 齊桓公 His Excellency

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.34; Couvreur 1.123f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 79; Yishu 7:9.35b; tr. Legge 1.127;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. Duke Kwang of Lu fought a battle with the men of Sung at Shaeng-khiu.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.34; Couvreur 1.123f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 79; Yishu 7:9.35b; tr. Legge 1.127;

tls:text.tls:line: so that the duke fell down.

sense.def: SW: 從高墜也。 (of dew) drop; CC136 hail down (arrows); CC446: fall from the sky (stars)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.36; Couvreur 1.123f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 80; Yishu 7:9.35b; tr. Legge 1.127;

tls:text.tls:line: When the groom was bathing the horses,

sense.def: groom

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.37; Couvreur 1.125f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 80; Yishu 7:9.38a; tr. Legge 1.128;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. Tseng-Tze was lying in his chamber

sense.def: be in bed because of N; keep in bed with (a flue)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.39; Couvreur 1.125f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 80; Yishu 7:9.38b; tr. Legge 1.128;

tls:text.tls:line: 'it was the gift of Ki-sun,

sense.def: this stuff, this thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.39; Couvreur 1.125f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 80; Yishu 7:9.38b; tr. Legge 1.128;

tls:text.tls:line: 'it was the gift of Ki-sun,

sense.def: what is given to inferiors, gifts; benefits accruing to inferiors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.40; Couvreur 1.125f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 80; Yishu 7:9.38b; tr. Legge 1.128;

tls:text.tls:line: I will ask your leave and reverently change it.'

sense.def: may I ask (for myself ) to V> please let me [short and idiomatic for 臣請]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.41; Couvreur 1.125f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.67f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 80f; Yishu 7:9.38b; tr. Legge 1.128;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Your love for me is not equal to his.

sense.def: be especially fond of; appreciate more; like, show an emotional preference for; be psychologically more attached to (something, compared to others); sometimes specifically: have as a protegé

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.41; Couvreur 1.125f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.67f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 80f; Yishu 7:9.38b; tr. Legge 1.128;

tls:text.tls:line: I want for nothing but to die in the correct way.'

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.42; Couvreur 1.127; Su1n Xïda4n 2.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i1; Yishu 7:9.41a; tr. Legge 1.129;

tls:text.tls:line: (the son) should appear quite overcome, (and as if he were at his wit's end);

sense.def: show great distress

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.42; Couvreur 1.127; Su1n Xïda4n 2.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i1; Yishu 7:9.41a; tr. Legge 1.129;

tls:text.tls:line: when the corpse has been put into the coffin,

sense.def: put the contextually determinate person into a coffin for burial

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.44; Couvreur 1.128; Su1n Xïda4n 2.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i2f; Yishu 7:9.43b; tr. Legge 1.129;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. At the mourning for her mother-in-law,

sense.def: mother-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.44; Couvreur 1.128; Su1n Xïda4n 2.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i2f; Yishu 7:9.43b; tr. Legge 1.129;

tls:text.tls:line: the Master instructed (his niece), the wife of Nan-kung Thao, about the way in which she should tie up her hair with sackcloth, saying,

sense.def: teach someone to do something 誨之琴

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.44; Couvreur 1.128; Su1n Xïda4n 2.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i2f; Yishu 7:9.43b; tr. Legge 1.129;

tls:text.tls:line: the Master instructed (his niece), the wife of Nan-kung Thao, about the way in which she should tie up her hair with sackcloth, saying,

sense.def: wear mourning hat (of women); cincture

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.44; Couvreur 1.128; Su1n Xïda4n 2.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i2f; Yishu 7:9.43b; tr. Legge 1.129;

tls:text.tls:line: Have the hairpin of hazel-wood,

sense.def: hazel tree; wood of the hazel tree

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.44; Couvreur 1.128; Su1n Xïda4n 2.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i2f; Yishu 7:9.43b; tr. Legge 1.129;

tls:text.tls:line: Have the hairpin of hazel-wood,

sense.def: hairpin which holds headgear

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.46; Couvreur 1.129; Su1n Xïda4n 2.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i3; Yishu 7:9.48b; tr. Legge 1.130;

tls:text.tls:line: 23. Confucius, after the service at the close of the one year's mourning,

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.47; Couvreur 1.130; Su1n Xïda4n 2.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i3; Yishu 7:9.49a; tr. Legge 1.130;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. Yu-Tze, it appears, after the service of the same period of mourning,

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.49; Couvreur 1.130; Su1n Xïda4n 2.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i4; Yishu 7:9.51b; tr. Legge 1.131;

tls:text.tls:line: 26. When Tze-lu might have ended

sense.def: elder sister; eldest sister 其姊

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.49; Couvreur 1.130; Su1n Xïda4n 2.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i4; Yishu 7:9.51b; tr. Legge 1.131;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have but few brothers, and I cannot bear to do so.'

sense.def: bear to V, endure V-ing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.50; Couvreur 1.130; Su1n Xïda4n 2.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i4; Yishu 7:9.51b; tr. Legge 1.131;

tls:text.tls:line: (to cease mourning) even for (ordinary) men on the roads.'

sense.def: be able to endure or sustain (pain, adversity); put up with (objectionable persons)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.51; Couvreur 1.131; Su1n Xïda4n 2.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 85; Yishu 7:9.52b; tr. Legge 1.131;

tls:text.tls:line: 27. Th'ai-kung was invested with his state, (and had his capital) in Ying-khiu;

sense.def: be enfeoffed at

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.51; Couvreur 1.131; Su1n Xïda4n 2.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 85; Yishu 7:9.52b; tr. Legge 1.131;

tls:text.tls:line: 'For music, we use that of him from whom we sprang;

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that where...

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.51; Couvreur 1.131; Su1n Xïda4n 2.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 85; Yishu 7:9.52b; tr. Legge 1.131;

tls:text.tls:line: The ancients had a saying,

sense.def: saying, memorable saying; sometimes: proverbial saying, popular saying; bon-mot, dict-on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.01.52; Couvreur 1.131f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 85; Yishu 7:9.54b-55a; tr. Legge 1.131;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Ah!

sense.def: ah! exclamatory particle expressing surprise, sometimes mixed with delight

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.03; Couvreur 1.133; Su1n Xïda4n 2.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 87; Yishu 8:10.3a; tr. Legge 1.132;

tls:text.tls:line: 'We speak of the end of a superior man,

sense.def: die

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.03; Couvreur 1.133; Su1n Xïda4n 2.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 87; Yishu 8:10.3a; tr. Legge 1.132;

tls:text.tls:line: and of the death of a small man.

sense.def: person of inferior social status or merely ordinary quality

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.05; Couvreur 1.133f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 87f; Yishu 8:10.5a; tr. Legge 1.133;

tls:text.tls:line: and his wife took the lead in the stamping.

sense.def: take the lead in VERBING

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.05; Couvreur 1.133f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 87f; Yishu 8:10.5a; tr. Legge 1.133;

tls:text.tls:line: and his wife took the lead in the stamping.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.08; Couvreur 1.135; Su1n Xïda4n 2.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 88f; Yishu 8:10.8a; tr. Legge 1.133;

tls:text.tls:line: those who would go beyond them should stop down to them,

sense.def: stoop down; bow down; bow the head 俯而泣, but also ZUO Zhao 7 一命而僂，再命而傴，三命而俯

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.08; Couvreur 1.135; Su1n Xïda4n 2.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 88f; Yishu 8:10.8a; tr. Legge 1.133;

tls:text.tls:line: should stand tip-toe to do so.

sense.def: CC: stand on tip-toe in order to see far; LAO 24: stand on tip-top

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.09; Couvreur 1.135f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 89; Yishu 8:10.9a; tr. Legge 1.134;

tls:text.tls:line: then when the brethren are far apart there will be no wearing of mourning for them at all;

sense.def: then [I collect here the cases where I have so far not found it plausible or easy to attribute to shì a clear anaphoric reference.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.11; Couvreur 1.136f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 90; Yishu 8:10.12b; tr. Legge 1.134;

tls:text.tls:line: and news of the event was sent to Confucius.

sense.def: report a case of death to (a person or a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.11; Couvreur 1.136f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 90; Yishu 8:10.12b; tr. Legge 1.134;

tls:text.tls:line: for a friend of my father,

sense.def: friend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.12; Couvreur 1.136f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 90; Yishu 8:10.12b; tr. Legge 1.134;

tls:text.tls:line: for a friend,

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.12; Couvreur 1.136f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 90; Yishu 8:10.12b; tr. Legge 1.134;

tls:text.tls:line: and to do so in the bed-chamber

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.14; Couvreur 1.137f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 91; Yishu 8:10.14b; tr. Legge 1.135;

tls:text.tls:line: ere must be added the strenthening flavours from vegetables and trees;'

sense.def: become more and more; increase GUOYU: 民乃藩滋"then the population increased"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.15; Couvreur 1.138f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 91; Yishu 8:10.15b; tr. Legge 1.135;

tls:text.tls:line: that when a friend looses his eyesight, we should wail for him.'

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.15; Couvreur 1.138f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 91; Yishu 8:10.15b; tr. Legge 1.135;

tls:text.tls:line: and I have no guilt!'

sense.def: be innocent; be blameless

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.19; Couvreur 1.139f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 92; Yishu 8:10.17a-17b; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: he does not day and night stop inside.

sense.def: during the daytime

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.19; Couvreur 1.139f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 92; Yishu 8:10.17a-17b; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: he does not day and night stop inside.

sense.def: during day and night > all day and night

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.19; Couvreur 1.139f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 92; Yishu 8:10.17a-17b; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: he does not day and night stop inside.

sense.def: late in the evening, late at night; by night

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.20; Couvreur 1.140; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 93; Yishu 8:10.18b; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: and he never (laughed) so as to show his teeth.

sense.def: laugh, showing one's teeth in the process

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.20; Couvreur 1.140; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 93; Yishu 8:10.18b; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: and he never (laughed) so as to show his teeth.

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.22; Couvreur 1.141f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 93f; Yishu 8:10.21a; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: Entering the house, he wailed for him bitterly;

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.23; Couvreur 1.141f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 94; Yishu 8:10.21a; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: and I found (the mourner) so dissolved with grief that my tears flowed (with his).

sense.def: person in mourning 一哀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.23; Couvreur 1.141f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 94; Yishu 8:10.21a; tr. Legge 1.136;

tls:text.tls:line: and I found (the mourner) so dissolved with grief that my tears flowed (with his).

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.24; Couvreur 1.142f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 94; Yishu 8:10.22b; tr. Legge 1.137;

tls:text.tls:line: Remember it, my little children.'

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.25; Couvreur 1.142f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 94; Yishu 8:10.22b; tr. Legge 1.137;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Rember it, my children.

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.26; Couvreur 1.143; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 95; Yishu 8:10.23b; tr. Legge 1.137;

tls:text.tls:line: some of the flesh of the sacrifice at the end of (?two) years

sense.def: auspicious memorial sacrifice; auspiciousness sacrifice in which one seeks (but does not necessarily get) a favourable response for a project

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.27; Couvreur 1.143; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 95; Yishu 8:10.24b; tr. Legge 1.137;

tls:text.tls:line: having his hands joined across his breast, and the right hand uppermost.

sense.def: fold hands respectfully in the Chinese fashion as a sign of respect; fold hands (and do nothing)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.27; Couvreur 1.143; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 95; Yishu 8:10.24b; tr. Legge 1.137;

tls:text.tls:line: but I place my hands so, because I am in mourning for an elder sister.'

sense.def: elder sister; eldest sister 其姊

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.28; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25a-25b; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: singing -

sense.def: to V as follows: S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.28; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25a-25b; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: The wise man must wither away like a plant.'

sense.def: (of persons) be "withered, dissicated"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.28; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25a-25b; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: and sat down opposite the door.

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.29; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: If the strong beam break, (On what shall I lean)?

sense.def: (of persons) be "withered, dissicated"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.30; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: The people of Yin performed the same ceremony between the two pillars,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.30; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: The people of Yin performed the same ceremony between the two pillars,

sense.def: the pair of, the two, both 兩手，兩目，兩耳

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.30; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: The people of Kau perform it a tt he top of the western steps,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.31; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: dreamt that I was sitting with the offerings to the dead by my side between the two pillars.

sense.def: the pair of, the two, both 兩手，兩目，兩耳

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.31; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: and what one under heaven is able to take me as his Master?

sense.def: who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.31; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: and what one under heaven is able to take me as his Master?

sense.def: pay one's high and religious respects to (someone) as one's ancestor or as a revered spirit

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.31; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: With this he took to his bed, was ill for several days, and died.

sense.def: lie in bed; stay in bed; keep in bed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.31; Couvreur 1.144f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 96; Yishu 8:10.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.138;

tls:text.tls:line: With this he took to his bed, was ill for several days, and died.

sense.def: die; have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.35; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: 'He should sleep on straw, with his shiled for a pillow; he should not take office;

sense.def: rest onself on when going to sleep; to sleep on, sleep in (a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.35; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: If he meet with him in the market-place or the court,

sense.def: (in the) market place and at the court, in the central parts of the city

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.35; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: said (the other), 'how one should do with reference to the man who has slain his brother?'

sense.def: may I ask

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.35; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: said (the other), 'how one should do with reference to the man who has slain his brother?'

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.35; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: said (the other), 'how one should do with reference to the man who has slain his brother?'

sense.def: enemy, mortal enemy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.36; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: continued Tze-hsia, 'in the case of a man who has slain one of his paternal cousins?'

sense.def: may I ask

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.36; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: continued Tze-hsia, 'in the case of a man who has slain one of his paternal cousins?'

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.36; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: continued Tze-hsia, 'in the case of a man who has slain one of his paternal cousins?'

sense.def: enemy, mortal enemy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.36; Couvreur 1.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 98; Yishu 8:10.33b; tr. Legge 1.140;

tls:text.tls:line: 'He should not take the lead (in the avenging).

sense.def: chieftain, leader

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.37; Couvreur 1.148f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 99; Yishu 8:10.35b; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: is disciples all wore their head-bands of sackcloth, when they went out.

sense.def: wear hempen or sackcloth belt of mourning

tls:text.tls:srcline: 與其哀不足而禮有餘也，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.39; Couvreur 1.149f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.37b; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: exceeding grief with deficient rites

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不若禮不足而哀有餘也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.39; Couvreur 1.149f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.37b; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: is better than littel demonstration of grief with superabounding rites;

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.40; Couvreur 1.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.38a; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: 28. Tseng-Tze having gone on a visit of condolence to Fu-hsia,

sense.def: condole for a contextually determinate person at N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.40; Couvreur 1.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.38a; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: He caused the bier, however, to be pushed back to its former place,

sense.def: coffin with the dead body in it; bier

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.40; Couvreur 1.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.38a; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: and made the women come down (again), after which (the visitor) went through his ceremony.

sense.def: cause to descend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.40; Couvreur 1.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.38a; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: and made the women come down (again), after which (the visitor) went through his ceremony.

sense.def: enact; implement as an official; carry out as a morally responsible agent; put into practice, practise, carry out; operate according to; implement (a law) and apply it to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.42; Couvreur 1.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.38a; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: The disciples further asked

sense.def: 問N1於N2曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.42; Couvreur 1.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 100; Yishu 8:10.38a; tr. Legge 1.141;

tls:text.tls:line: the slighter dressing is done inside the door,

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.45; Couvreur 1.152f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 101; Yishu 8:10.41b-42a; tr. Legge 1.142;

tls:text.tls:line: and (soon) came back, wearing his fur robe over the silk, and a girle of sackcloth.

sense.def: hempen or sackcloth belt worn in mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.46; Couvreur 1.153f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 102; Yishu 8:10.43a; tr. Legge 1.142;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have not yet forgotten my grief.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:text.tls:srcline:
子游為之麻衰，
牡麻絰，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.48; Couvreur 1.154f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 102; Yishu 8:10.44b; tr. Legge 1.143;

tls:text.tls:line: Tze-yu (went to condole), wearing for him a robe of sackcloth, and a headband made of the product of the male plant.

sense.def: made of hemp, made of sackcloth 麻冕 "hemp caps"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.51; Couvreur 1.156; Su1n Xïda4n 2.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 103; Yishu 8:10.46a; tr. Legge 1.144;

tls:text.tls:line: with the tears urunning from his eyes and the rheum from his nose.

sense.def: shed (tears)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.51; Couvreur 1.156; Su1n Xïda4n 2.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 103; Yishu 8:10.46a; tr. Legge 1.144;

tls:text.tls:line: with the tears urunning from his eyes and the rheum from his nose.

sense.def: tears

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.51; Couvreur 1.156; Su1n Xïda4n 2.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 103; Yishu 8:10.46a; tr. Legge 1.144;

tls:text.tls:line: with the tears urunning from his eyes and the rheum from his nose.

sense.def: tears

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.51; Couvreur 1.156; Su1n Xïda4n 2.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 103; Yishu 8:10.46a; tr. Legge 1.144;

tls:text.tls:line: with the tears urunning from his eyes and the rheum from his nose.

sense.def: snivel, mucus from the nose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.53; Couvreur 1.157; Su1n Xïda4n 2.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 104; Yishu 8:10.47b; tr. Legge 1.144;

tls:text.tls:line: 33... The wearing of the sackcloth headbands and girdles, to express the real (feeling of the heart);

sense.def: the wearing of sackcloth belts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.57; Couvreur 1.158; Su1n Xïda4n 2.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 106; Yishu 8:10.52a; tr. Legge 1.145;

tls:text.tls:line: 'He who has given counsel to another about his army

sense.def: army

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.58; Couvreur 1.159; Su1n Xïda4n 2.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 106; Yishu 8:10.53a; tr. Legge 1.145;

tls:text.tls:line: 'How pleasant is this mound!

sense.def: this (concrete N) 斯子"this son"; often collective: 斯民 "these people", and never identifying: "this people"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.59; Couvreur 1.159f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 107; Yishu 8:10.53b; tr. Legge 1.145;

tls:text.tls:line: who wept like a child on the death of his mother.

sense.def: like a small child

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.59; Couvreur 1.159f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 107; Yishu 8:10.53b; tr. Legge 1.145;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence the wailing and leaping are subject to fixed regulations.'

sense.def: lamentation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.59; Couvreur 1.159f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 107; Yishu 8:10.53b; tr. Legge 1.145;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence the wailing and leaping are subject to fixed regulations.'

sense.def: jumping up and down; stamping the ground jumping up and down

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.62; Couvreur 1.161; Su1n Xïda4n 2.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 108; Yishu 8:10.59a; tr. Legge 1.146;

tls:text.tls:line: they should not go beyond the prescribed rules;

sense.def: offend against, presumtuously act against

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.63; Couvreur 1.161; Su1n Xïda4n 2.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 108; Yishu 8:10.59a; tr. Legge 1.146;

tls:text.tls:line: and to much ease (in the latter) shows a small man.

sense.def: be a despicable petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.63; Couvreur 1.161; Su1n Xïda4n 2.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 108; Yishu 8:10.59a; tr. Legge 1.146;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man will conduct himself in them as they severally require.

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.02.64; Couvreur 1.161f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.101; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 109; Yishu 8:10.60a; tr. Legge 1.147;

tls:text.tls:line: all that he may require in discharging his mourning rites.

sense.def: find it publicly unacceptable to V; find it a public disgrace to V, feel it to be a public disgrace that one Vs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the lutes are strung, but not evenly;

sense.def: lute

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the lutes are strung, but not evenly;

sense.def: zither with a large number of strings, typically 25.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the pandean pipes are complete, but not in tune;

sense.def: reed organ with upto 36 pipes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the pandean pipes are complete, but not in tune;

sense.def: a kind of reed organ made of a gourd into which are inserted bamboo pipes.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the bells and musical stones are there, but they have no stands.

sense.def: large suspended bell without a clapper; bell without a clapper

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the bells and musical stones are there, but they have no stands.

sense.def: music stone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the bells and musical stones are there, but they have no stands.

sense.def: cross-beam in a bell-frame; bell-stand

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: the bells and musical stones are there, but they have no stands.

sense.def: drum or bell frame

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.05; Couvreur 1.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 110f; Yishu 8:11.2a; tr. Legge 1.148;

tls:text.tls:line: that is, (the dead) are thus treated as if they were spiritual intelligences.'

sense.def: regard as invested with higher spiritual power

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.08; Couvreur 1.164f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: Tseng-tze reported Yu-tze's words to Tze-yu,

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.08; Couvreur 1.164f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: he saw that Hwan, the minister of war, had been for three years having a stone coffin made for himself

sense.def: made of stone; made up of rock

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.08; Couvreur 1.164f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: he saw that Hwan, the minister of war, had been for three years having a stone coffin made for himself

sense.def: outer coffin

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.09; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: "What extravagance!

sense.def: like this, as V as this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.09; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: "What extravagance!

sense.def: be extravagant, conduct oneself in an arrogant manner

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.09; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: he made it a point to carry his treasures with him in his carriage when he went to court,

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.09; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: "Such an amount of property!

sense.def: like this, as V as this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.09; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 111; Yishu 8:11.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: "Such an amount of property!

sense.def: be rich

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.11; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 112; Yishu 8:11.5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: that the inner coffin should be four inches thick,

sense.def: coffin; inner coffin

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.11; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 112; Yishu 8:11.5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: and the outer five.

sense.def: outer coffin

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.11; Couvreur 1.165f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 112; Yishu 8:11.5a; tr. Legge 1.149;

tls:text.tls:line: By this I knew that he did not wish that the dead should decay away quickly.

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.12; Couvreur 1.167f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 113; Yishu 8:11.7b; tr. Legge 1.150;

tls:text.tls:line: announcement of the event was sent to Lu.

sense.def: report a case of death to (a person or a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.12; Couvreur 1.167f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 113; Yishu 8:11.7b; tr. Legge 1.150;

tls:text.tls:line: how could it have been done?

sense.def: how? (idiomatic in 安得 "how can one get to?", 安敢"how would I dare to?")

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.13; Couvreur 1.167f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 113; Yishu 8:11.7b-8a; tr. Legge 1.150;

tls:text.tls:line: that there are two grounds for the wailing;

sense.def: methods, basic orientations

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.13; Couvreur 1.167f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 113; Yishu 8:11.7b-8a; tr. Legge 1.150;

tls:text.tls:line: one from love,

sense.def: have loving feelings towards and take loving care of (superiors)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.14; Couvreur 1.167f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 113; Yishu 8:11.8a; tr. Legge 1.150;

tls:text.tls:line: and hereon the duke and he wailed for Kwang-(?)ze in (the temple of) the Hsien family.

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.15; Couvreur 1.168f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 114; Yishu 8:11.9a; tr. Legge 1.151;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. Kung Hsien said to (?)ang-(?)ze,

sense.def: speaking to 言於王曰 said to the king ZUO, ZGC, SHIJI, XINLUN

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.15; Couvreur 1.168f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 114; Yishu 8:11.9a; tr. Legge 1.151;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin they used the (ordinary) sacrificial vessels,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.15; Couvreur 1.168f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 114; Yishu 8:11.9a; tr. Legge 1.151;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Kau we use both,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 3.73公叔木有同母異父之昆弟死，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.17; Couvreur 1.169f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 114; Yishu 8:11.11a; tr. Legge 1.151;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. An elder brother of Kung-shu Mu, by the same mother but a different father, having died,

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:text.tls:srcline: 狄儀有同母異父之昆弟死，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.17; Couvreur 1.169f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 114; Yishu 8:11.11a; tr. Legge 1.151;

tls:text.tls:line: A brother, similarly related to Ti Yi having died,

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.23; Couvreur 1.172; Su1n Xïda4n 2.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 116; Yishu 8:11.16a; tr. Legge 1.152;

tls:text.tls:line: and that (for instance) in buying the coffin he should see that, inside and outside, it be (equally) well completed.

sense.def: buy, acquire (official positions) for money; go out to buy; try to buy; buy (a person from his employer)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.25; Couvreur 1.173; Su1n Xïda4n 2.109; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 117; Yishu 8:11.18a; tr. Legge 1.153;

tls:text.tls:line: on the mat there at the time of the dressing.'

sense.def: this (concrete N) 斯子"this son"; often collective: 斯民 "these people", and never identifying: "this people"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.28; Couvreur 1.174; Su1n Xïda4n 2.109; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 118; Yishu 8:11.20a; tr. Legge 1.153;

tls:text.tls:line: which was accounted a careless omission.

sense.def: be careless; negligent

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.28; Couvreur 1.174; Su1n Xïda4n 2.109; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 118; Yishu 8:11.20a; tr. Legge 1.153;

tls:text.tls:line: which was accounted a careless omission.

sense.def: negligence

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.35; Couvreur 1.176f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.112; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 121; Yishu 8:11.26b; tr. Legge 1.154;

tls:text.tls:line: it is a second announcement (to the departed)!'

sense.def: the second 再世 "after the second generation"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.36; Couvreur 1.177; Su1n Xïda4n 2.112; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 121; Yishu 8:11.27b; tr. Legge 1.155;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. When Khaeng-(?)ze Kao was lying ill,

sense.def: be in bed because of N; keep in bed with (a flue)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則擇不食之地而葬我焉。」

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.37; Couvreur 1.177; Su1n Xïda4n 2.112; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 121; Yishu 8:11.27b; tr. Legge 1.155;

tls:text.tls:line: choose a piece of barren ground, and bury me there.'

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.38; Couvreur 1.177f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.112f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 122; Yishu 8:11.28b-29a; tr. Legge 1.155;

tls:text.tls:line: 23. (?)ze-hsia asked the Master

sense.def: 問N1於N2曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.38; Couvreur 1.177f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.112f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 122; Yishu 8:11.28b-29a; tr. Legge 1.155;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In sitting and stopping with others, in his conversation, and when eating and drinking, he should appear to be at ease.'

sense.def: speech; way of talking

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.38; Couvreur 1.177f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.112f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 122; Yishu 8:11.28b-29a; tr. Legge 1.155;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. When a stranger-visitor arrived,

sense.def: a guest of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.42; Couvreur 1.178f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.113f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 123; Yishu 8:11.31a; tr. Legge 1.156;

tls:text.tls:line: others like a dyke on a river's bank;

sense.def: dike

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.42; Couvreur 1.178f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.113f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 123; Yishu 8:11.31a; tr. Legge 1.156;

tls:text.tls:line: making what is called the horse-mane mound.

sense.def: horse's mane

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.44; Couvreur 1.180; Su1n Xïda4n 2.115; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 124; Yishu 8:11.34a-35a; tr. Legge 1.156;

tls:text.tls:line: 28. When new offerings (of grain or fruits) are presented (beside the body in the coffin),

sense.def: fresh things (offerings); fresh fruit, fresh crop

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.46; Couvreur 1.180; Su1n Xïda4n 2.115; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 125; Yishu 8:11.36b; tr. Legge 1.156;

tls:text.tls:line: 31. When a ruler succeeds to his state, he makes his coffin,

sense.def: LIJI: ritual coffin made for the ruler on his accession to the throne and lacquered afresh every year; also used as a dignified general term for a coffin.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.47; Couvreur 1.1i1; Su1n Xïda4n 2.116; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 125; Yishu 8:11.37b; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: plugging the teeth open;

sense.def: to insert a wedge between (the teeth of a corpse)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.47; Couvreur 1.1i1; Su1n Xïda4n 2.116; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 125; Yishu 8:11.37b; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: plugging the teeth open;

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.48; Couvreur 1.1i1; Su1n Xïda4n 2.116; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 125; Yishu 8:11.37b; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: 32... The uncles and elder cousins give their charges to those who are to communicate the death (to friends).

sense.def: make a formal announcement (often, but not always) of a case of death

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.49; Couvreur 1.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.116; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 126; Yishu 8:11.38b; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: in his smaller chambers, and the large chamber;

sense.def: back room behind the formal main hall in which the spirits were venerated (in private homes in the north-western corner). At the back of the miào 廟, the qǐn 寢 was a luxuriously appointed bedroom for the use of the ancestors, where these could sleep and where they were also served as if alive, according to later accounts. 漢書，馮奉世傳, 注；漢書，韋玄成傳，注 CHECK [HJG]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.49; Couvreur 1.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.116; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 126; Yishu 8:11.38b; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: in his smaller chambers, and the large chamber;

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.49; Couvreur 1.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.116; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 126; Yishu 8:11.38b; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: in his smaller chambers, and the large chamber;

sense.def: Grand Chamber (in the ancestral temple, as opposed to the side chamber, the xiǎo qǐn 小寢)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.49; Couvreur 1.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.116; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 126; Yishu 8:11.38b; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: in the smaller ancestral temples and in the great one;

sense.def: ancestral temple

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.53; Couvreur 1.1i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.118; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 127; Yishu 8:11.42a; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: and having the collar and the edges of the cuffs a light purple.

sense.def: light red; purple; orange

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.53; Couvreur 1.1i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.118; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 127; Yishu 8:11.42a; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: The waist-band should be of dolochos cloth;

sense.def: waist

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.53; Couvreur 1.1i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.118; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 127; Yishu 8:11.42a; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: The waist-band should be of dolochos cloth;

sense.def: waist belt worn in mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.53; Couvreur 1.1i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.118; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 127; Yishu 8:11.42a; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: and the ear-plugs of horn.

sense.def: jade pendant covering the ear; ear-plugs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
