tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.53; Couvreur 1.1i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.118; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 127; Yishu 8:11.42a; tr. Legge 1.157;

tls:text.tls:line: (the lining of the deer's-fur 8for winter) should be made broader and with longer cuffs,

sense.def: opening of the sleeve, front part of the sleeve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.54; Couvreur 1.1i4; Su1n Xïda4n 2.119; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 128; Yishu 8:11.45a; tr. Legge 1.158;

tls:text.tls:line: 39... At (the mourning) for an acquaintance, he must pay visits of condolence to all his brethren, though they may not have lived with him.

sense.def: recognise, be familiar with, know (a person); be acquainted with; recognize the identity of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.56; Couvreur 1.185f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.121; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 129; Yishu 8:11.48b; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: 41. When the son of Heaven is wailing for a feudal prince,

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.56; Couvreur 1.185f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.121; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 129; Yishu 8:11.48b; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: 'He employs an officer [officials CH] to wail for him.'

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.56; Couvreur 1.185f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.121; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 129; Yishu 8:11.48b; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: while so engaged, he has no music at his meals.

sense.def: eat food, eat a meal; have a meal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.57; Couvreur 1.186; Su1n Xïda4n 2.122; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 129; Yishu 8:11.50a; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: This being done, it forms a plastered house.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.57; Couvreur 1.186; Su1n Xïda4n 2.122; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 129; Yishu 8:11.50a; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: This being done, it forms a plastered house.

sense.def: to smear, to plaster; apply (a substance) by smearing it on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.57; Couvreur 1.186; Su1n Xïda4n 2.122; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 129; Yishu 8:11.50a; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: This being done, it forms a plastered house.

sense.def: ordinary non-main house for non-leading members of the clan; generally: house (occasionally even refers to many-storeyed 樓)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.58; Couvreur 1.186; Su1n Xïda4n 2.123; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 130; Yishu 8:11.51b; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: that the feudal princes area rranged for the wailing according to their different surnames.

sense.def: alternative, different 別名

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.59; Couvreur 1.186f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.124; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 130; Yishu 8:11.52a; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: Oh! Alas!

sense.def: alas

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.59; Couvreur 1.186f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.124; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 130; Yishu 8:11.52a; tr. Legge 1.159;

tls:text.tls:line: Oh! Alas!

sense.def: (always with understood and unexpressed subject:) what a pity!; how grievous!

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.63; Couvreur 1.187f; Su1n Xïda4n 2.125; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 132; Yishu 8:11.55a; tr. Legge 1.160;

tls:text.tls:line: 48. When the (ordinary) officers are all entered, then t(he chief mourner and all the others) fall to their leaping, morning and evening.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.64; Couvreur 1.188; Su1n Xïda4n 2.125f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 132; Yishu 8:11.55b-56a; tr. Legge 1.160;

tls:text.tls:line: 49. After the service on the conclusion of the twenty-fourth month of mourning, the plain white cap is assumed.

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.64; Couvreur 1.188; Su1n Xïda4n 2.125f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 132; Yishu 8:11.55b-56a; tr. Legge 1.160;

tls:text.tls:line: In that month the service on leaving off mourning is performed,

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.64; Couvreur 1.188; Su1n Xïda4n 2.125f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 132; Yishu 8:11.55b-56a; tr. Legge 1.160;

tls:text.tls:line: In that month the service on leaving off mourning is performed,

sense.def: to sacrifice at the end of mourning period (LI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.64; Couvreur 1.188; Su1n Xïda4n 2.125f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 132; Yishu 8:11.55b-56a; tr. Legge 1.160;

tls:text.tls:line: and after another month (the mourners) may take to their music.

sense.def: after 徙月 "after the month is over"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.64; Couvreur 1.188; Su1n Xïda4n 2.125f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 132; Yishu 8:11.55b-56a; tr. Legge 1.160;

tls:text.tls:line: 50. The ruler may confer on any officer the small curtain (as a pall for his father's coffin).

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 03.03.64; Couvreur 1.188; Su1n Xïda4n 2.125f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 132; Yishu 8:11.55b-56a; tr. Legge 1.160;

tls:text.tls:line: 50. The ruler may confer on any officer the small curtain (as a pall for his father's coffin).

sense.def: ZHOULI: baldachin

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.01; Couvreur 1.189; Su1n Xïda4n 3.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 135; Yishu 9:12.1a; tr. Legge 1.161;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. (At the funeral of) a ruler's eldest son by his acknowledged wife, who has died under age,

sense.def: meet a tragic early death before the age of maturity (20); die early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.01; Couvreur 1.189; Su1n Xïda4n 3.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 135; Yishu 9:12.1a; tr. Legge 1.161;

tls:text.tls:line: At that of an eldest son by his concubines, dying under age,

sense.def: meet a tragic early death before the age of maturity (20); die early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.01; Couvreur 1.189; Su1n Xïda4n 3.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 135; Yishu 9:12.1a; tr. Legge 1.161;

tls:text.tls:line: as

sense.def: meet a tragic early death before the age of maturity (20); die early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.03; Couvreur 1.190; Su1n Xïda4n 3.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 136; Yishu 9:12.4a; tr. Legge 1.161;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. When a Great officer of a state

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.04; Couvreur 1.190; Su1n Xïda4n 3.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 136; Yishu 9:12.5a; tr. Legge 1.162;

tls:text.tls:line: did not make visits of condolence beyond the boundaries (of their states).

sense.def: (a) state boundary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.04; Couvreur 1.190; Su1n Xïda4n 3.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 136; Yishu 9:12.5a; tr. Legge 1.162;

tls:text.tls:line: did not make visits of condolence beyond the boundaries (of their states).

sense.def: general: border between any type of territory; border territory [the result of a systematic division of a large tract of land into fields (mǔ 畝)] [Jens]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.05; Couvreur 1.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 136; Yishu 9:12.5b; tr. Legge 1.162;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. When Ki Wu-(?)ze was lying ill in his chamber,

sense.def: be in bed because of N; keep in bed with (a flue)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.05; Couvreur 1.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 136; Yishu 9:12.5b; tr. Legge 1.162;

tls:text.tls:line: Kiao Ku entered and appeared before him without taking off the mourning with its even edges (which he happened to wear).

sense.def: go in to have an audience with N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.05; Couvreur 1.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 136; Yishu 9:12.5b; tr. Legge 1.162;

tls:text.tls:line: said he,

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.06; Couvreur 1.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 136; Yishu 9:12.5b; tr. Legge 1.162;

tls:text.tls:line: (?)ang Tien leant against his gate and sang.

sense.def: sing a melody, sing a song, sing along (should this be vt[oN]???) often to accompaniment on the lute

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.08; Couvreur 1.191f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 137; Yishu 9:12.8b-9a; tr. Legge 1.163;

tls:text.tls:line: he should not on the same day show manifestations of joy.

sense.def: the same (year); that self-same (day etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.08; Couvreur 1.191f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 137; Yishu 9:12.8b-9a; tr. Legge 1.163;

tls:text.tls:line: he should not on the same day show manifestations of joy.

sense.def: enjoy oneself, take one's pleasure

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.08; Couvreur 1.191f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 137; Yishu 9:12.8b-9a; tr. Legge 1.163;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. A wife should not go beyond the boundaries of the state on a visit of condolence.

sense.def: leap over, leap across (an obstacle); generally: cross (a road etc.; a border); go beyond

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.08; Couvreur 1.191f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 137; Yishu 9:12.8b-9a; tr. Legge 1.163;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. A wife should not go beyond the boundaries of the state on a visit of condolence.

sense.def: (a) state boundary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.08; Couvreur 1.191f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 137; Yishu 9:12.8b-9a; tr. Legge 1.163;

tls:text.tls:line: Those who follow to the grave

sense.def: coffin with the dead body in it; bier

tls:text.tls:srcline:
雖朋友、
州里、
舍人可也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.09; Couvreur 1.192f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 138; Yishu 9:12.10a-11a; tr. Legge 1.163;

tls:text.tls:line: A friend, a neighbour, or even a temporary resident of the house, may perform the duty.

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.09; Couvreur 1.192f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 138; Yishu 9:12.10a-11a; tr. Legge 1.163;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. When a ruler meets a bier on the way,

sense.def: coffin with the dead body in it; bier

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.11; Couvreur 1.193f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 138f; Yishu 9:12.12a; tr. Legge 1.164;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. On the death of his wife's brother who was the successor of their father,

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.11; Couvreur 1.193f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 138f; Yishu 9:12.12a; tr. Legge 1.164;

tls:text.tls:line: (the husband) should wail for him in (the court of) the principal chamber.

sense.def: lament, wail about; conduct ritual wailing on the occasion of the funeral of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.11; Couvreur 1.193f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 138f; Yishu 9:12.12a; tr. Legge 1.164;

tls:text.tls:line: With breast unbared and wearing the cincture instead of the cap, he wails and leaps.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.11; Couvreur 1.193f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 138f; Yishu 9:12.12a; tr. Legge 1.164;

tls:text.tls:line: and those who were intimate (with the deceased) will enter and wail.

sense.def: be on intimate terms with; often: be on inappropriately close terms with some contextually derminate person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.16; Couvreur 1.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 140; Yishu 9:12.16a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: therefore he wore the same mourning for her as for a sister of his own.'

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.16; Couvreur 1.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 140; Yishu 9:12.16a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore he wore it.'

sense.def: wear mourning robes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.17; Couvreur 1.196f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.16b-17a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: that a time like this is specially adapted to the losing of a state,

sense.def: this time

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.17; Couvreur 1.196f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.16b-17a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: or the gaining of a state.

sense.def: this time

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.18; Couvreur 1.196f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.17a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: An exile as you are, nothing precious remains to you;

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.18; Couvreur 1.196f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.17a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: but a loving regard for your father is to be considered precious.

sense.def: most important thing, objectively most valuable thing 諸侯之寶三

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.18; Couvreur 1.196f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.17a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: who unde heaven will be able to give a good account of your conduct?

sense.def: who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.18; Couvreur 1.196f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.17a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: Decline the proffer, my son.'

sense.def: you, my child; you, young man!

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.19; Couvreur 1.196f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.17a; tr. Legge 1.165;

tls:text.tls:line: so I cannot take any share in the sad service of wailing and weeping for him;

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.21; Couvreur 1.198f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 141; Yishu 9:12.17a-17b; tr. Legge 1.166;

tls:text.tls:line: he showed how he loved his father.

sense.def: have loving feelings towards and take loving care of (superiors)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.23; Couvreur 1.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142; Yishu 9:12.20a; tr. Legge 1.167;

tls:text.tls:line: are the extreme expression of grief and sorrow.

sense.def: grief in general, all kinds of grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.23; Couvreur 1.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142; Yishu 9:12.20a; tr. Legge 1.167;

tls:text.tls:line: The graduated reduction of that expression

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.24; Couvreur 1.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142; Yishu 9:12.21a; tr. Legge 1.167;

tls:text.tls:line: The looking for it to return from the dark region

sense.def: dark place, secluded place

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.25; Couvreur 1.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142; Yishu 9:12.21b-22a; tr. Legge 1.167;

tls:text.tls:line: are the most painful demonstrations of grief and sorrow.

sense.def: grief in general, all kinds of grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.25; Couvreur 1.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142; Yishu 9:12.21b-22a; tr. Legge 1.167;

tls:text.tls:line: are the most painful demonstrations of grief and sorrow.

sense.def: N [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-76be1df4-3d73-4e5f-bbc2-729542645bc8][nab]] {[[tls:sem-feat::#uuid-47f1ba84-c93d-40ed-8418-3b97745c6a1d][psychological]]} /

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.25; Couvreur 1.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142; Yishu 9:12.21b-22a; tr. Legge 1.167;

tls:text.tls:line: is the greatest expression of the pain (from the bereavement).

sense.def: N [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-76be1df4-3d73-4e5f-bbc2-729542645bc8][nab]] {[[tls:sem-feat::#uuid-47f1ba84-c93d-40ed-8418-3b97745c6a1d][psychological]]} /

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.25; Couvreur 1.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142; Yishu 9:12.21b-22a; tr. Legge 1.167;

tls:text.tls:line: arises from a feeling which cannot bear that it should be empty.

sense.def: be able to endure or sustain (pain, adversity); put up with (objectionable persons)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.26; Couvreur 1.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142f; Yishu 9:12.23b; tr. Legge 1.168;

tls:text.tls:line: Because (the person of) the deceased can no longer be distinguished,

sense.def: to be distinguished; be held apart intellectually

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.26; Couvreur 1.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142f; Yishu 9:12.23b; tr. Legge 1.168;

tls:text.tls:line: therefore (the son) by this flag maintains the remembrance of him.

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.26; Couvreur 1.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142f; Yishu 9:12.23b; tr. Legge 1.168;

tls:text.tls:line: he makes this record.

sense.def: that is why

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.26; Couvreur 1.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 142f; Yishu 9:12.23b; tr. Legge 1.168;

tls:text.tls:line: finds in this its outmost expression.

sense.def: that is why

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.28; Couvreur 1.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.27a; tr. Legge 1.168;

tls:text.tls:line: 28. Beating the breast (by women), and leaping (by the men)

sense.def: jump up and down in extreme grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.28; Couvreur 1.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.27a; tr. Legge 1.168;

tls:text.tls:line: are extreme expressions of grief.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.28; Couvreur 1.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.27a; tr. Legge 1.168;

tls:text.tls:line: are extreme expressions of grief.

sense.def: the ultimate point; the perfect state

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.29; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.28b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: 29. Baring the shoulders and binding up the hair (with the band of sackcloth)

sense.def: the baring of one's shoulders

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.29; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.28b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: 29. Baring the shoulders and binding up the hair (with the band of sackcloth)

sense.def: tie; bind; tie up; bring together

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.29; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.28b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: (showing) the exited feeling

sense.def: indignation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.29; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.28b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: (showing) the exited feeling

sense.def: feel resentment or indignation; feel offended; show lingering anger and resentment; show indignation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.29; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.28b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: which is a change in the grief.

sense.def: mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.30; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.29b-31b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: The people of Kau use the pien cap at interments;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.30; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.29b-31b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: those of Yin used the hsu.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.32; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.32b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: at which time his grief is at its height.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.32; Couvreur 1.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.32b; tr. Legge 1.169;

tls:text.tls:line: (His grief is) then the most intense.

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.33; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.34a; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: because the dead go to the dark region.

sense.def: dark place, secluded place

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.33; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.34a; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: and the officer of prayer (returns beforehand) to give notice of the sacrifice of repose to him who is to personate the departed.

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline: 有司以几筵舍奠於墓左，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.34; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.35a-36b; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: (In the meantime other) officers have set out a stool and mat with the necessary offerings on the left of the grave.

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.34; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.35a-36b; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: and at midday the sacrifice of repose is offered.

sense.def: on midday, at noon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.34; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.17f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.35a-36b; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: they cannot bear that the departed should be left a single day (without a place to rest in).

sense.def: bear to V, endure V-ing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.35; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.37a-39a; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: 38. On that day [month?!]

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.35; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.37a-39a; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: 39. On that day

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.35; Couvreur 1.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.37a-39a; tr. Legge 1.170;

tls:text.tls:line: the service of placing the spirit-tablet of the departed next to that of his grandfather was performed.

sense.def: place the spirit tablet of the deceased next to (that of his ancestor, or person of higher status, or indeed of any person with whom a relation is to be ritually asserted)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.36; Couvreur 1.207f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.19f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.40b-42b; tr. Legge 1.171;

tls:text.tls:line: and the placing of the tablet in its place

sense.def: the placing of the spirit tablet of the deceased next to that of his ancestor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.36; Couvreur 1.207f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.19f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.40b-42b; tr. Legge 1.171;

tls:text.tls:line: on the day succeeding: [[Check this with Chen Huan]]

sense.def: be at (a time N)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.36; Couvreur 1.207f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.19f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 143; Yishu 9:12.40b-42b; tr. Legge 1.171;

tls:text.tls:line: on the day succeeding: [[Check this with Chen Huan]]

sense.def: the same (year); that self-same (day etc)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
以巫、
祝、桃、
茢、執戈，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.37; Couvreur 1.207f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 145f; Yishu 9:12.46a; tr. Legge 1.171;

tls:text.tls:line: he took with him a sorcerer with a peach-wand, an officer of prayer with his reed-(bush), and a lance-bearer,

sense.def: shamaness; (but note GUAN 女巫 ); generally: shaman; exorcist GY: 如是則明神降之〔六〕，在男曰覡，在女曰巫〔七〕。

tls:text.tls:srcline:
以巫、
祝、桃、
茢、執戈，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.37; Couvreur 1.207f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 145f; Yishu 9:12.46a; tr. Legge 1.171;

tls:text.tls:line: he took with him a sorcerer with a peach-wand, an officer of prayer with his reed-(bush), and a lance-bearer,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline:
故至於祖、
考之廟而后行。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.38; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 146; Yishu 9:12.48a; tr. Legge 1.172;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore he is brought to the temple of his fathers, and then (the coffin) goes on its way.

sense.def: LIJI: highest ancestors in the father's lineage; lineage of ancestors; sometimes also referring specifically to the father of the king

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.38; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 146; Yishu 9:12.48a; tr. Legge 1.172;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin, the body was thus presented and then coffined in the temple;

sense.def: ancestral temple

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.39; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 9:12.48b; tr. Legge 1.172;

tls:text.tls:line: 44. Confucius said,

sense.def: say S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.39; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 9:12.48b; tr. Legge 1.172;

tls:text.tls:line: Alas!

sense.def: alas for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.40; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 9:12.49b; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: (the dead) being thus treated as spiritual intelligences.

sense.def: regard as invested with higher spiritual power

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.40; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 9:12.49b; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: From of old

sense.def: straw puppet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.40; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 9:12.49b; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius said that the making of the straw figures was good,

sense.def: straw puppet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.01.40; Couvreur 1.208f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 9:12.49b; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: and that the making of the (wooden) automaton was not benevolent.

sense.def: wooden figurine buried with the dead; wooden grave figures

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.01; Couvreur 1.210; Su1n Xïda4n 3.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 10:13.1a; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: whether it was the way of antiquity

sense.def: former; sometimes pejorative: of non-recent origin; past-and-gone; outdated; deposed previous (incumbent of office)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.01; Couvreur 1.210; Su1n Xïda4n 3.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 10:13.1a; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: was the reply,

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.02; Couvreur 1.210; Su1n Xïda4n 3.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 10:13.1a; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: But nowadays princes

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.02; Couvreur 1.210; Su1n Xïda4n 3.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 10:13.1a; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: and dismiss them as if they were going to push them into an abyss.

sense.def: [CAUSE TO FALL>] push (someone N1) down into (a place N2)隊諸淵

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.02; Couvreur 1.210; Su1n Xïda4n 3.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 147; Yishu 10:13.1a; tr. Legge 1.173;

tls:text.tls:line: and dismiss them as if they were going to push them into an abyss.

sense.def: deep abyss

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.04; Couvreur 1.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 148; Yishu 10:13.3a-3b; tr. Legge 1.174;

tls:text.tls:line: I could by an effort make myself emaciated;

sense.def: make an intense effort; do one's best

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.04; Couvreur 1.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 148; Yishu 10:13.3a-3b; tr. Legge 1.174;

tls:text.tls:line: I could by an effort make myself emaciated;

sense.def: (naturally, constitutionally, or as a result of malnutrition etc) thin, physically weak; of land: infertile

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.09; Couvreur 1.212f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 149; Yishu 10:13.5b; tr. Legge 1.174;

tls:text.tls:line: the superior man is ashamed to observe all ceremonies to the full.

sense.def: find it publicly unacceptable to V; find it a public disgrace to V, feel it to be a public disgrace that one Vs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.12; Couvreur 1.214f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 150; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: King Kiang wailed for him in the daytime,

sense.def: during the daytime

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.12; Couvreur 1.214f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 150; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: she wailed for him both in the daytime and the night.

sense.def: during the daytime

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.12; Couvreur 1.214f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 150; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: she wailed for him both in the daytime and the night.

sense.def: late in the evening, late at night; by night

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.13; Couvreur 1.215; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 151; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: King Kiang (once) put her hand on the couch (where his body lay), and without wailing

sense.def: lean against

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.13; Couvreur 1.215; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 151; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Formerly, when I had this son,

sense.def: this (concrete N) 斯子"this son"; often collective: 斯民 "these people", and never identifying: "this people"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.13; Couvreur 1.215; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 151; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: I thought he would be a man of worth.

sense.def: be a worthy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.14; Couvreur 1.215; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 151; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: of all his friends, the other ministers, there is no one that has shed tears for him,

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.14; Couvreur 1.215; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 151; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: of all his friends, the other ministers, there is no one that has shed tears for him,

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.14; Couvreur 1.215; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 151; Yishu 10:13.9b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: This son

sense.def: this (concrete N) 斯子"this son"; often collective: 斯民 "these people", and never identifying: "this people"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.15; Couvreur 1.215f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 151; Yishu 10:13.10b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: - why are her under-clothes displayed here?'

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.16; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11a-11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: when they saw (a mourner) giving all a child's demonstrations of affection.

sense.def: young lady, young girl

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.16; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11a-11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have never understood this leaping in mourning,

sense.def: jumping up and down; stamping the ground jumping up and down

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.16; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11a-11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: The sincere feeling (of sorrow) which appears here

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.16; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11a-11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: is right, (and should be sufficient).'

sense.def: (of persons) be in the right, have it right; be of the right sort; be morally right

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.17; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: there are some intended to lessen the (display of) feeling,

sense.def: subtle, having a light touch, subtle and profound; BUDDH: of subtle significance for salvation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.17; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: there are some intended to lessen the (display of) feeling,

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: When a man rejoices, he looks pleased;

sense.def: look pleased; be happy 《禮記‧檀弓下》：『人喜則斯陶，陶斯詠。』

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: when pleased, he will intone poetry;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: when intoning poetry, he sways himself about;

sense.def: intone poetry without using a definite tune, sing about something without a definite tune but with long-drawn-out intonation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: when intoning poetry, he sways himself about;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: swaying himself about, he proceeds to dancing;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: from dancing, he gets into a display of mild distress;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: from dancing, he gets into a display of mild distress;

sense.def: feel resentment or indignation; feel offended; show lingering anger and resentment; show indignation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: intense distress expresses itself in sighing;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: sighing is followed by beating the breast;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 4, Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.27f; Legge 1.176; mod. CH

tls:text.tls:line: sighing is followed by beating the breast;

sense.def: beat one's breast (check pronunciation: pǐ?)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.19; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.28f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: The observvances to regulate all this

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.19; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.28f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: are what are called the rules of propriety.

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.19; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.28f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: there arises a feeling of disgust (at the corpse).

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.19; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.28f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: goes on to make us revolt from it.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.20; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: he dried flesh and pickled meats are set out (by the side of the corpse).

sense.def: (relatively simple) sacrifice of wine and meat to a person who has just died

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.20; Couvreur 1.216f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 152; Yishu 10:13.11b; tr. Legge 1.176;

tls:text.tls:line: they have never been neglected;

sense.def: has never been V-ed ??

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.22; Couvreur 1.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 153; Yishu 10:13.16a; tr. Legge 1.178;

tls:text.tls:line: What name do men give to this expedition?'

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.23; Couvreur 1.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 153; Yishu 10:13.16a-17a; tr. Legge 1.178;

tls:text.tls:line: did not make captives of those whose hair was turning.

sense.def: person of a certain age with greying hair

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.23; Couvreur 1.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 153; Yishu 10:13.16a-17a; tr. Legge 1.178;

tls:text.tls:line: But now,

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.24; Couvreur 1.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 154; Yishu 10:13.17a; tr. Legge 1.178;

tls:text.tls:line: 'O ruler and king, you came and punished the offences of our poor state.

sense.def: punish 討罪

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.24; Couvreur 1.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 154; Yishu 10:13.17a; tr. Legge 1.178;

tls:text.tls:line: If the result of the campaign be that you now compassionate and forgive it,

sense.def: feel empathy for, sympathise with; feel pity for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.24; Couvreur 1.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 154; Yishu 10:13.17a; tr. Legge 1.178;

tls:text.tls:line: If the result of the campaign be that you now compassionate and forgive it,

sense.def: forgive (a person or a crime)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.26; Couvreur 1.220; Su1n Xïda4n 3.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.20a-20b; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The book of History says,

sense.def: the Book of Documents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.28; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: that it was in the principal apartment,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.28; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: he entered it;

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.28; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: he poured out a cup of spirits,

sense.def: engage in ladling wine; ladle wine; ladle water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.28; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Kwang, drink this.'

sense.def: this stuff, this thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.29; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: He poured out a third cup;

sense.def: engage in ladling wine; ladle wine; ladle water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.30; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: just now I thought you had something in mind to enlighten me about,

sense.def: some time ago; just now

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.30; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: just now I thought you had something in mind to enlighten me about,

sense.def: me (personally, as an experiencer?)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
斯其為子、
卯也大矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.31; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21a; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: and this should be a great (?)ze of mao day.

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.32; Couvreur 1.221f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 155; Yishu 10:13.21b; tr. Legge 1.179;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Thiao is your lordship's favourite officer,

sense.def: favoured; intimate; private (dress; 褻衣 underwear); informal (dress 褻服 informal dress)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.34; Couvreur 1.223; Su1n Xïda4n 3.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 156; Yishu 10:13.21b; tr. Legge 1.180;

tls:text.tls:line: Pour out a cup and give it to me.'

sense.def: engage in ladling wine; ladle wine; ladle water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.34; Couvreur 1.223; Su1n Xïda4n 3.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 156; Yishu 10:13.21b; tr. Legge 1.180;

tls:text.tls:line: Tu Khwai then rinsed the cup, and presented it.

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.34; Couvreur 1.223; Su1n Xïda4n 3.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 156; Yishu 10:13.21b; tr. Legge 1.180;

tls:text.tls:line: you must take care that this cup is ot lost.'

sense.def: this (concrete N) 斯子"this son"; often collective: 斯民 "these people", and never identifying: "this people"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.35; Couvreur 1.223; Su1n Xïda4n 3.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 156; Yishu 10:13.21b; tr. Legge 1.180;

tls:text.tls:line: when the cups have been presented all round,

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.35; Couvreur 1.223; Su1n Xïda4n 3.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 156; Yishu 10:13.21b; tr. Legge 1.180;

tls:text.tls:line: they then raise up this cup,

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.36; Couvreur 1.224f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.32f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 156f; Yishu 10:13.24a; tr. Legge 1.180;

tls:text.tls:line: 'formerly when our state of Wei was suffering from a severe famine,

sense.def: calamitious (of years) 凶年，凶器

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.37; Couvreur 1.224f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 157; Yishu 10:13.24a-24b; tr. Legge 1.180;

tls:text.tls:line: and conducted its intercourse with the states all round,

sense.def: all the neighbours

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.40; Couvreur 1.226f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 158; Yishu 10:13.27b; tr. Legge 1.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: let us bury some persons alive (to supply it).'

sense.def: bury victims alive (to honour a distinguished person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.41; Couvreur 1.226f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 158; Yishu 10:13.27b; tr. Legge 1.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: 'To bury living persons (for the sake of the dead)

sense.def: bury victims alive (to honour a distinguished person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.42; Couvreur 1.226f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 158; Yishu 10:13.27b; tr. Legge 1.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: On this the proposal was not carried into effect.

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.44; Couvreur 1.227; Su1n Xïda4n 3.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 158; Yishu 10:13.28b; tr. Legge 1.1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Bean soup, and water to drink, while the parents are made happy,

sense.def: slurp, sip unceremoniously; MENG 4A25: have something (not necessarily anything distinguished) to drink to quell one's thirst

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.44; Couvreur 1.227; Su1n Xïda4n 3.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 158; Yishu 10:13.28b; tr. Legge 1.1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Bean soup, and water to drink, while the parents are made happy,

sense.def: happiness; joyfulness; cheerfulness; cheer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.44; Couvreur 1.227; Su1n Xïda4n 3.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 158; Yishu 10:13.28b; tr. Legge 1.1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: he may be said to discharge (all) the rites of mourning.'

sense.def: such a person; such things 斯之功

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.46; Couvreur 1.227f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 159; Yishu 10:13.29a; tr. Legge 1.1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: who would have beena ble to follow you with halter and bridle?

sense.def: reins made of leather straps

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.46; Couvreur 1.227f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 159; Yishu 10:13.29a; tr. Legge 1.1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: who would have beena ble to follow you with halter and bridle?

sense.def: horse reins

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.47; Couvreur 1.228f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 159; Yishu 10:13.30a; tr. Legge 1.1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: lying ill.

sense.def: be in bed because of N; keep in bed with (a flue)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.49; Couvreur 1.228f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 160; Yishu 10:13.30a; tr. Legge 1.1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: He also gave the deceased the towns of Khiu-shih and Hsien-fan-shih

sense.def: and 衛侯逐公叔戍與其黨，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.49; Couvreur 1.228f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 160; Yishu 10:13.30a; tr. Legge 1.1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: by a writing of assignment which was put into the coffin,

sense.def: write the contextually determinate thing down; make a written record of a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.49; Couvreur 1.228f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 160; Yishu 10:13.30a; tr. Legge 1.1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: - 'For the myriads of his descendants, [The linkt between all the generations and all their offspring.]

sense.def: linkage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.50; Couvreur 1.229f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 160; Yishu 10:13.31b-32a; tr. Legge 1.183;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. When Kha(n Kan-hsǐ was lying ill,)

sense.def: be in bed because of N; keep in bed with (a flue)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.51; Couvreur 1.229f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 160; Yishu 10:13.32a; tr. Legge 1.1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 'To bury the living with the dead

sense.def: bury victims alive (to honour a distinguished person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.52; Couvreur 1.230; Su1n Xïda4n 3.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 161; Yishu 10:13.32b; tr. Legge 1.1i4;

tls:text.tls:line: When the pantomimes entered, however, they put away their flutes.

sense.def: primitive short bamboo flute with three holes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.53; Couvreur 1.231f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 161; Yishu 10:13.34a-34b; tr. Legge 1.1i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Pan asked leave to let the coffin down into the grave by a mechanical contrivance.

sense.def: contraption, mechanical device; triggering contraption; mechanical device

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.53; Couvreur 1.231f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 161; Yishu 10:13.34a-34b; tr. Legge 1.1i4;

tls:text.tls:line: the ducal house used (for this purpose) the arrangement looking like large stone pillars,

sense.def: (sometimes inscribed?) pillar; post

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.55; Couvreur 1.232f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 162; Yishu 10:13.37a; tr. Legge 1.185;

tls:text.tls:line: and the burdens laid on them are heavy, (they ought to fight);

sense.def: responsibilities, official assignments; responsibility. See also BURDEN.fig

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.55; Couvreur 1.232f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 162; Yishu 10:13.37a; tr. Legge 1.185;

tls:text.tls:line: but though our superiors do not form good plans,

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.56; Couvreur 1.232f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 162; Yishu 10:13.37a-37b; tr. Legge 1.185;

tls:text.tls:line: On this along with Wang I a youth, (the son) of a neighbour, he went forward,

sense.def: neighbouring (person) 鄰童

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.56; Couvreur 1.232f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 162; Yishu 10:13.37a-37b; tr. Legge 1.185;

tls:text.tls:line: On this along with Wang I a youth, (the son) of a neighbour, he went forward,

sense.def: adolescent, youth from the age fifteen to about the age of twenty 十五成童

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.59; Couvreur 1.234f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 163; Yishu 10:13.40b-41a; tr. Legge 1.185;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. Shang Yang, director of works (in Khu), and Khaen Khi-ki were pursuing the army of Wu,

sense.def: go after, pursue, try to catch up with (and perhaps catch)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.59; Couvreur 1.234f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 163; Yishu 10:13.40b-41a; tr. Legge 1.185;

tls:text.tls:line: killing a man,

sense.def: kill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.60; Couvreur 1.234f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 163; Yishu 10:13.41a; tr. Legge 1.185;

tls:text.tls:line: he killed other two men;

sense.def: kill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.63; Couvreur 1.235f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 164; Yishu 10:13.43a; tr. Legge 1.186;

tls:text.tls:line: and he first employed a sorcerer with his reed-brush to brush (and purify) the bier.

sense.def: shamaness; (but note GUAN 女巫 ); generally: shaman; exorcist GY: 如是則明神降之〔六〕，在男曰覡，在女曰巫〔七〕。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.02.64; Couvreur 1.236f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165; Yishu 10:13.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.187;

tls:text.tls:line: and to present a letter (from duke U),

sense.def: letter

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其妻迎其柩於路而哭之哀。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.02; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188;

tls:text.tls:line: His wife met his bier on the way, and wailed for him bitterly.

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Zhuāng sent a person to convey his condolences to her;

sense.def: ensure that someone does something> order someone to do something; dispatch someone to do something

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Zhuāng sent a person to convey his condolences to her;

sense.def: a person, someone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: 'If your lordship's officer had failed to keep clear of criminal responsibility,

sense.def: avoid; escape from (something); keep away from (somebody)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: 'If your lordship's officer had failed to keep clear of criminal responsibility,

sense.def: criminal guilt; criminal responsibility; 獄決罪定

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: then his body should have been exposed in the court or the market-place,

sense.def: then

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: then his body should have been exposed in the court or the market-place,

sense.def: expose the dead body (in the market place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: then his body should have been exposed in the court or the market-place,

sense.def: (in the) market place and at the court, in the central parts of the city

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and his wife and concubines apprehended.

sense.def: wives and concubines

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and his wife and concubines apprehended.

sense.def: be arrested, be apprehended

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.03; Couvreur 1.237f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 165f; Yishu 10:14.1a; tr. Legge 1.188; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: then there (still) is the humble cottage of his deceased father that exists.

sense.def: hut; simple hut (often built next to a tomb to house the mourner during the mourning period)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.05; Couvreur 1.238f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 166; Yishu 10:14.2b; tr. Legge 1.188;

tls:text.tls:line: thus appropriate a ceremony which is not suitable for them;

sense.def: get (a position etc) by inappropriate or illegal means

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.07; Couvreur 1.240; Su1n Xïda4n 3.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 167; Yishu 10:14.5b; tr. Legge 1.189;

tls:text.tls:line: and my friends have not cast me off.

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.07; Couvreur 1.240; Su1n Xïda4n 3.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 167; Yishu 10:14.5b; tr. Legge 1.189;

tls:text.tls:line: I am here the commandant of the city.

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.07; Couvreur 1.240; Su1n Xïda4n 3.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 167; Yishu 10:14.5b; tr. Legge 1.189;

tls:text.tls:line: To buy (in this manner a right of) way in order to bury (my dead)

sense.def: buy, acquire (official positions) for money; go out to buy; try to buy; buy (a person from his employer)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.09; Couvreur 1.241f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.44f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 168; Yishu 10:14.8a; tr. Legge 1.189;

tls:text.tls:line: and a stool, with a mat and viands on it, is placed (for him).

sense.def: SHI: long rough mat put directly on the floor to sit on on festive occasions, mostly with an additional mat on top, larger than xí 席. Also small tables were put on this mat.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.09; Couvreur 1.241f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.44f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 168; Yishu 10:14.8a; tr. Legge 1.189;

tls:text.tls:line: The service of him as living is over, and that for him in his ghostly state has begun.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:text.tls:srcline: 宰夫執木鐸以命于宮曰：

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.09; Couvreur 1.241f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.44f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 168; Yishu 10:14.8a; tr. Legge 1.189;

tls:text.tls:line: the cook, with a bell having a wooden clapper, issues an order throughout the palace, saying,

sense.def: bell with a tongue, often used in warfare to declare war ritually. The tongue can be of timber (for ritual purposes) or of metal (for open air use in warfare with zhēng 鉦)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.09; Couvreur 1.241f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.44f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 168; Yishu 10:14.8a; tr. Legge 1.189;

tls:text.tls:line: This was done from the door leading from the chambers to the outer gate.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.11; Couvreur 1.242; Su1n Xïda4n 3.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.10a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: A carriage conveying the news of such disaster carried no cover for buff-coats nor case for bows.

sense.def: conveying the announcement of death

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.12; Couvreur 1.242f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.11a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. When the (shrine-)apartment of his father was burned,

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.12; Couvreur 1.242f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.11a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. When the (shrine-)apartment of his father was burned,

sense.def: ancestor; deceased father

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.12; Couvreur 1.242f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.11a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. When the (shrine-)apartment of his father was burned,

sense.def: general term for a house or living space (of a commoner, an aristocrat or even the emperor); one's living space within a house; private quarters; home

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.12; Couvreur 1.242f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.11a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: (the ruler) wailed for three days.

sense.def: wail; lament

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.12; Couvreur 1.242f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.11a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The new temple took fire;' and also,

sense.def: new; unused; newly established (ruler)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.12; Couvreur 1.242f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.11a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The new temple took fire;' and also,

sense.def: ancestral temple

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.12; Couvreur 1.242f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 169; Yishu 10:14.11a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The new temple took fire;' and also,

sense.def: to burn; to catch fire [also: keep up the fire; have on fire][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.13; Couvreur 1.243; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 170; Yishu 10:14.12a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius came on a woman who was wailing bitterly by a grave.

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.13; Couvreur 1.243; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 170; Yishu 10:14.12a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Is altogether like that of one who has suffered sorrow upon sorrow.'

sense.def: completely, wholly; (before negatives) not at all 壹不知 "do not at all understand"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.15; Couvreur 1.243; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 170; Yishu 10:14.12a; tr. Legge 1.190;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Remember this, my little children.

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「有虞氏未施信於民而民信之，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.16; Couvreur 1.244f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 170; Yishu 10:14.12b-13a; tr. Legge 1.191;

tls:text.tls:line: I (Shun), the lord of Yi, had not showed his good faith to the people, and yet they put confidence in him.

sense.def: credibility; trustworthiness, good faith, dependability, reliability

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.17; Couvreur 1.244f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 171; Yishu 10:14.13a; tr. Legge 1.191;

tls:text.tls:line: "Ruins and graves

sense.def: in ruins

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.17; Couvreur 1.244f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 171; Yishu 10:14.13a; tr. Legge 1.191;

tls:text.tls:line: "Ruins and graves

sense.def: grave; specifically: subterranean part of the tomb (on top of which trees may grow)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.17; Couvreur 1.244f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 171; Yishu 10:14.13a; tr. Legge 1.191;

tls:text.tls:line: The kings of Yin made their solemn proclamations, and yet the people began to rebel;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.17; Couvreur 1.244f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 171; Yishu 10:14.13a; tr. Legge 1.191;

tls:text.tls:line: those of Kau made their covenants, and the people began to distrust them.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.19; Couvreur 1.245; Su1n Xïda4n 3.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 171; Yishu 10:14.15b; tr. Legge 1.192;

tls:text.tls:line: nor in emaciating himself, should he do so to the endangering of his life.

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.20; Couvreur 1.245f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 172; Yishu 10:14.16a; tr. Legge 1.192;

tls:text.tls:line: on the way back (to Wu),

sense.def: eldest 長子 "eldest son"; most senior

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.21; Couvreur 1.245f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 172; Yishu 10:14.16a; tr. Legge 1.192;

tls:text.tls:line: he bared his left arm;

sense.def: with the left hand; on the left side

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.21; Couvreur 1.245f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 172; Yishu 10:14.16a; tr. Legge 1.192;

tls:text.tls:line: he bared his left arm;

sense.def: to bare upper arm showing either one's underwear or one's bare shoulders; also: bare the upper part of one's body

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.22; Couvreur 1.245f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 172; Yishu 10:14.16a-16b; tr. Legge 1.192;

tls:text.tls:line: But the soul and its energy can go everywhere;

sense.def: all objects =無所不

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.23; Couvreur 1.247f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 172f; Yishu 10:14.19a; tr. Legge 1.193;

tls:text.tls:line: The officers [exactly: plural!! CH] of Ku replied,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.23; Couvreur 1.247f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 172f; Yishu 10:14.19a; tr. Legge 1.193;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When any of the princes has deigned to send or come to our poor city,

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔我先君駒王西討濟於河，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.24; Couvreur 1.247f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 173; Yishu 10:14.19a; tr. Legge 1.193;

tls:text.tls:line: Formerly, our ruler, King Ku, in his warlike operations towards the west, in which he crossed the Ho,

sense.def: launch a punitive expedition

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.24; Couvreur 1.247f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 173; Yishu 10:14.19a; tr. Legge 1.193;

tls:text.tls:line: everywhere used this style of speech.

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.25; Couvreur 1.248f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 173; Yishu 10:14.21a-21b; tr. Legge 1.194;

tls:text.tls:line: and news of the event was brought to him,

sense.def: report a case of death to (a person or a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.26; Couvreur 1.249f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.50f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 174; Yishu 10:14.22a; tr. Legge 1.194;

tls:text.tls:line: three days afterwards, the officers of prayer were the first to assume mourning.

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.27; Couvreur 1.250f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 174; Yishu 10:14.24b; tr. Legge 1.194;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. During a great dearth in Khi,

sense.def: OBI: on a large scale; to a large audience

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.27; Couvreur 1.250f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 174; Yishu 10:14.24b; tr. Legge 1.194;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. During a great dearth in Khi,

sense.def: there is famine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.28; Couvreur 1.250f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 174; Yishu 10:14.24b; tr. Legge 1.194;

tls:text.tls:line: that I am come to this state.'

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.29; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 175; Yishu 10:14.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.195;

tls:text.tls:line: The officers reported it;

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.30; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 175; Yishu 10:14.26a; tr. Legge 1.195;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have learned how to decide on such a charge.

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.30; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 175; Yishu 10:14.26a; tr. Legge 1.195;

tls:text.tls:line: his house should be destroyed;

sense.def: destroy, smash; inflict serious damage on (physical objects), destroy (a state); ruin (the legal system); to do in (a person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.31; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.27b; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: Here you will have your songs!

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.31; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.27b; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: Here you wil have your wailings!

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.31; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.27b; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: Here will you assemble the representatives of the great families of the state!'

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.32; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.27b; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: and my wailings,

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.32; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.27b; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: and assemble here the representatives of the great families of the state, (it will be enough).

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是全要領以從先大夫於九京也。」

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.32; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.27b; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: I will then (only) seek to preserve my waist and neck to follow the former Great officers of may family to the Nine Plains.'

sense.def: waist

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是全要領以從先大夫於九京也。」

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.32; Couvreur 1.251f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.27b; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: I will then (only) seek to preserve my waist and neck to follow the former Great officers of may family to the Nine Plains.'

sense.def: waist and neck; body (as something which may be cut at the waist or the neck)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.33; Couvreur 1.253; Su1n Xïda4n 3.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.29a; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: he employed (?)ze-kung to bury it,

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.34; Couvreur 1.253; Su1n Xïda4n 3.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 176; Yishu 10:14.29a; tr. Legge 1.196;

tls:text.tls:line: it is buried in a curtain (in god condition).'

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.36; Couvreur 1.254; Su1n Xïda4n 3.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 177; Yishu 10:14.30a; tr. Legge 1.197;

tls:text.tls:line: and the duke descending a step and bowing to them.

sense.def: descend (e. g. by such and such a number of steps)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.36; Couvreur 1.254; Su1n Xïda4n 3.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 177; Yishu 10:14.30a; tr. Legge 1.197;

tls:text.tls:line: Immediately its influence extends far.'

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.37; Couvreur 1.255; Su1n Xïda4n 3.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 177f; Yishu 10:14.31b; tr. Legge 1.197;

tls:text.tls:line: (?)ze-han, the superintendent of Works, went (to his house), and wailed for him bitterly.

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.38; Couvreur 1.255; Su1n Xïda4n 3.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 178; Yishu 10:14.31b-32a; tr. Legge 1.197;

tls:text.tls:line: Though there had been other enemies beside (?)in,

sense.def: except for N GY: 雖微楚國諸侯莫不譽。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.38; Couvreur 1.255; Su1n Xïda4n 3.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 178; Yishu 10:14.31b-32a; tr. Legge 1.197;

tls:text.tls:line: what state could have withstood one (in the condition of Sung)?'

sense.def: who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.40; Couvreur 1.256f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 179; Yishu 10:14.34b-35a; tr. Legge 1.198;

tls:text.tls:line: and (with this he struck the wood), singing: -

sense.def: sing as follows

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.40; Couvreur 1.256f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 179; Yishu 10:14.34b-35a; tr. Legge 1.198;

tls:text.tls:line: and (with this he struck the wood), singing: -

sense.def: to V as follows: S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.43; Couvreur 1.257f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 179; Yishu 10:14.37a; tr. Legge 1.199;

tls:text.tls:line: and while consulting for his own advantage, he was not forgetful of his friends.'

sense.def: [my] friend, person of similar ideals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.46; Couvreur 1.259; Su1n Xïda4n 3.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 180; Yishu 10:14.40b; tr. Legge 1.200;

tls:text.tls:line: and requested that she should wear the three month's mourning and the simple headband;

sense.def: (simple) mourning headband

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.46; Couvreur 1.259; Su1n Xïda4n 3.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 180; Yishu 10:14.40b; tr. Legge 1.200;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Formerly, when I was mourning for my aunts and sisters, I wore this mourning,

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.46; Couvreur 1.259; Su1n Xïda4n 3.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 180; Yishu 10:14.40b; tr. Legge 1.200;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Formerly, when I was mourning for my aunts and sisters, I wore this mourning,

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.46; Couvreur 1.259; Su1n Xïda4n 3.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 180; Yishu 10:14.40b; tr. Legge 1.200;

tls:text.tls:line: and no one forbade it.'

sense.def: preposed object [relevant object cases must be moved here]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.46; Couvreur 1.259; Su1n Xïda4n 3.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 180; Yishu 10:14.40b; tr. Legge 1.200;

tls:text.tls:line: ((?)ze-liu) made his wife bear the three month's mourning and the simple headband.

sense.def: (simple) mourning headband

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.49; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44a; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: 29. In a year of drought

sense.def: be stricken by drought; be characterised by drought 歲旱

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.49; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44a; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: I wish to expose a deformed person in the sun (to move its pity), what do you have to say to my doing so?'

sense.def: LIJI: hunchback who is bent backwards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.49; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44a; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: but would it not be an improper act of cruelty,

sense.def: reckless, cruel and violent

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.49; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44a; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: on that account

sense.def: be cruel

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.51; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44b; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: 'What do you say then to my moving the market-place elsewhere?'

sense.def: move away; displace; dislocate; transplant (trees); transfer to different places

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.51; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44b; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When the son of Heaven dies,

sense.def: of emperor or king: die

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.51; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44b; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: and it is held in them for three days,

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.51; Couvreur 1.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.44b; tr. Legge 1.201;

tls:text.tls:line: and it is held in them for three days,

sense.def: of senior officials: die [occasionally also used to refer to the death of an emperor]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.52; Couvreur 1.262; Su1n Xïda4n 3.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.46b; tr. Legge 1.202;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The people of Wei, in burying husband and wife together (in the same grave and shell),

sense.def: bury husband and wife together

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 04.03.52; Couvreur 1.262; Su1n Xïda4n 3.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 1i2; Yishu 10:14.46b; tr. Legge 1.202;

tls:text.tls:line: The people of Lu, in doing the same,

sense.def: bury husband and wife together

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.01.01; Couvreur 1.263f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 186; Yishu 11:15.5b-6a; tr. Legge 1.209;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. According to the regulations of emoulment and rank framed by the kings,

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.01.05; Couvreur 1.266f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 187; Yishu 11:15.25b; tr. Legge 1.210;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. The officers of the lowest grade in the feudal states had an emolment equal to that of the husbandmen whose fields were of the highest quality;

sense.def: farmer; peasant

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
