tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.01.08; Couvreur 1.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 188; Yishu 11:15.32a-32b; tr. Legge 1.211;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. Of the nine provinces embracing all within the four seas,

sense.def: the Nine Provinces (of China) [This is pervasively difficult to distinguish from the more universal and almost cosmographic notion of the Nine Continents.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.01.11; Couvreur 1.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 188; Yishu 11:15.41a; tr. Legge 1.212;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In all, in the nine provinces,

sense.def: the Nine Provinces (of China) [This is pervasively difficult to distinguish from the more universal and almost cosmographic notion of the Nine Continents.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.01; Couvreur 1.269f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.69f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 189; Yishu 11:16.1a-3a; tr. Legge 1.212;

tls:text.tls:line: which had a Leader.

sense.def: leader; person in charge;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.14; Couvreur 1.275f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.29a; tr. Legge 1.216;

tls:text.tls:line: he visited those on the East, going to the honoured mountain of Tai.

sense.def: OBI: ancestral temple; SHI: ancestral temple of the clan

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.14; Couvreur 1.275f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.29a; tr. Legge 1.216;

tls:text.tls:line: there he burnt a (great) pile of wood, and annouced his arrival to Heaven; and with looks directed at them, sacrificed to the hills and rivers.

sense.def: make an offering by burning firewood; rear a burning pile of wood

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.14; Couvreur 1.275f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.29a; tr. Legge 1.216;

tls:text.tls:line: that he might see what the people liked and disliked,

sense.def: be especially fond of; find especially attractive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.14; Couvreur 1.275f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.29a; tr. Legge 1.216;

tls:text.tls:line: that he might see what the people liked and disliked,

sense.def: like (something); be fond of (something); LY 4.6: be truly fond of (goodness)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.17; Couvreur 1.276f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.32b; tr. Legge 1.217;

tls:text.tls:line: and the rebellious ruler taken off.

sense.def: be punished, have a punitive expedition carried out against one

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.18; Couvreur 1.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.34a; tr. Legge 1.217;

tls:text.tls:line: going tot he south, to the mountain of that quarter,

sense.def: great mountain, also written 嶽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.18; Couvreur 1.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.34a; tr. Legge 1.217;

tls:text.tls:line: he went on to the west, to the mountain of that quarter,

sense.def: great mountain, also written 嶽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.18; Couvreur 1.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.34a; tr. Legge 1.217;

tls:text.tls:line: he went on to the north, to the moountain of that quarter,

sense.def: great mountain, also written 嶽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.19; Couvreur 1.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.34a; tr. Legge 1.217;

tls:text.tls:line: repaired (the ancestral temple) and offered a bull in each of the fanes,

sense.def: ZUO Zhao 22: original first ancestor of the clan; the highest ancestor (BUDDH: patriarch (the founder or transmitter of a Buddhist lineage))

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.19; Couvreur 1.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.34a; tr. Legge 1.217;

tls:text.tls:line: repaired (the ancestral temple) and offered a bull in each of the fanes,

sense.def: deceased father (as represented in the temple); (dead father's tablet and temple); deceased father-in-law (Legge on Liji)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.19; Couvreur 1.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 192; Yishu 11:16.34a; tr. Legge 1.217;

tls:text.tls:line: from that of his high ancestor to that of his father.

sense.def: ox

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.22; Couvreur 1.280f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 194; Yishu 11:16.40b; tr. Legge 1.219;

tls:text.tls:line: When the hatchet and battle-axe were conferred,

sense.def: axe for cutting undergrowth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.22; Couvreur 1.280f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 194; Yishu 11:16.40b; tr. Legge 1.219;

tls:text.tls:line: When the hatchet and battle-axe were conferred,

sense.def: (often symbolic and ceremonial) battle axe

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.22; Couvreur 1.280f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 194; Yishu 11:16.40b; tr. Legge 1.219;

tls:text.tls:line: When a large libation-cup was conferred,

sense.def: SHU: libation ladle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.25; Couvreur 1.2i1; Su1n Xïda4n 3.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 195; Yishu 11:16.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.220;

tls:text.tls:line: He had recieved his charge from his ancestors,

sense.def: ZUO Zhao 22: original first ancestor of the clan; the highest ancestor (BUDDH: patriarch (the founder or transmitter of a Buddhist lineage))

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.26; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.47a-48b; tr. Legge 1.220;

tls:text.tls:line: The first object in them was to supply the sacrificial dishes with dried flesh;

sense.def: dried meat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.26; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.47a-48b; tr. Legge 1.220;

tls:text.tls:line: the second, to provide for guests and visitors;

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.27; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.49a; tr. Legge 1.220;

tls:text.tls:line: the common people fell a hunting (for themselves).

sense.def: go on hunting parties (officially organised or not); engage in pleasure hunting, hunt for pleasure; go on some kind of hunt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.28; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.51a; tr. Legge 1.221;

tls:text.tls:line: the hunting commenced.

sense.def: go on hunting parties (officially organised or not); engage in pleasure hunting, hunt for pleasure; go on some kind of hunt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.28; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.51a; tr. Legge 1.221;

tls:text.tls:line: When the dove changed into a hawk,

sense.def: turtledove; name of various kinds of birds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.28; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.51a; tr. Legge 1.221;

tls:text.tls:line: When the dove changed into a hawk,

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.29; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.51a; tr. Legge 1.221;

tls:text.tls:line: Until the insects had all withdrawn into their burrows,

sense.def: insects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.29; Couvreur 1.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 3.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 196; Yishu 11:16.51a; tr. Legge 1.221;

tls:text.tls:line: They did not kill pregnant animals,

sense.def: animal with a foetus inside; pregnant animal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.30; Couvreur 1.2i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 197; Yishu 11:16.53b; tr. Legge 1.221;

tls:text.tls:line: and it was the rule that he should do so at the close of the year.

sense.def: be at (a time N)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.33; Couvreur 1.2i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 197; Yishu 11:16.58b; tr. Legge 1.222;

tls:text.tls:line: though there might be bad years, drought, and inundations,

sense.def: calamitious (of years) 凶年，凶器

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.33; Couvreur 1.2i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 197; Yishu 11:16.58b; tr. Legge 1.222;

tls:text.tls:line: though there might be bad years, drought, and inundations,

sense.def: a drought; short period of famine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.02.33; Couvreur 1.2i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 197; Yishu 11:16.58b; tr. Legge 1.222;

tls:text.tls:line: though there might be bad years, drought, and inundations,

sense.def: flood

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.02; Couvreur 1.286; Su1n Xïda4n 4.5f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 198; Yishu 12:17.1a-4b; tr. Legge 1.223;

tls:text.tls:line: They raised no mound, nor planted trees over the grave.

sense.def: accumulate earth> make a heap

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.04; Couvreur 1.287f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.6a; tr. Legge 1.223;

tls:text.tls:line: The common people presented their offerings in their (principal) apartment.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. The son of Heaven sacrificed to Heaven and Earth;

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. The son of Heaven sacrificed to Heaven and Earth;

sense.def: sacrifice to (specifically to the spirits of the Earth) with wine, grain, and meat[also: sacrifice (something)][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. The son of Heaven sacrificed to Heaven and Earth;

sense.def: the deities of Heaven and Earth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: the princes of the states, to the (spirits of the) land and grain;

sense.def: our altars of the land and grain; the altars of the land and grain of the subject of the sentence

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: Great officers offered the five sacrifices (of the house).

sense.def: sacrifice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: Great officers offered the five sacrifices (of the house).

sense.def: sacrifice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven sacrificed to all the famous hills and great streams under the sky,

sense.def: famous, renouned名師 "famous army"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: the five mountains recieving (sacrificial) honours like the honours paid (at court) to the three ducal ministres,

sense.def: great mountain, also written 嶽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.06; Couvreur 1.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 199; Yishu 12:17.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.225;

tls:text.tls:line: and the four rivers honours like those paid to the princes of states;

sense.def: large stream that runs not into another stream but into the sea, refers to Yellow River, Yangzi, Huai and River Ji;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.11; Couvreur 1.292; Su1n Xïda4n 4.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 201; Yishu 12:17.29a; tr. Legge 1.227;

tls:text.tls:line: those of the ox used for (feasting) guests

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.12; Couvreur 1.292; Su1n Xïda4n 4.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 201; Yishu 12:17.29a; tr. Legge 1.227;

tls:text.tls:line: the house and its apartments did not surpass the ancestral temple.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.15; Couvreur 1.294; Su1n Xïda4n 4.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 202; Yishu 12:17.36a; tr. Legge 1.228;

tls:text.tls:line: and gave (to the old) the food-allowance of the able-bodied.

sense.def: be in strong basic shape, be going strong; be stout, be robust, be able-bodied, be in one's prime; be constitutionally strong; be fit and strong enough to work; thrive particularly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.16; Couvreur 1.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.38a; tr. Legge 1.228;

tls:text.tls:line: as cold or hot, dry or moist.

sense.def: be cold (of persons), go cold; fresh and chilly; be cold (as winter)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.16; Couvreur 1.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.38a; tr. Legge 1.228;

tls:text.tls:line: as cold or hot, dry or moist.

sense.def: XUN 1: be comparatively dry (of firewood), be not wet enough; be dry

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.16; Couvreur 1.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.38a; tr. Legge 1.228;

tls:text.tls:line: as cold or hot, dry or moist.

sense.def: be damp; moist; wet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.16; Couvreur 1.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.38a; tr. Legge 1.228;

tls:text.tls:line: as cold or hot, dry or moist.

sense.def: be warm; feel warm; designed to keep one warm

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.18; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The people of those five regions

sense.def: central states (sometimes, but not always excluding states like Chu and Qin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.18; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: They had their hair unbound, and tatooed their bodies.

sense.def: read pī: let down (hair)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.18; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: They had their hair unbound, and tatooed their bodies.

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.18; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: They tatooed their foreheads, and had their feet turned towards each other.

sense.def: HF: forehead (of a buffalo)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.18; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: They tatooed their foreheads, and had their feet turned towards each other.

sense.def: foot

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.19; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: they had their hair unbound, and wore skins.

sense.def: read pī: let down (hair)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.19; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: they had their hair unbound, and wore skins.

sense.def: wear as one's clothes, use for clothing; dress up in (someone's clothes)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.19; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: they had their hair unbound, and wore skins.

sense.def: garments made of skin or hide> skin garments

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.19; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them did not eat grain-food.

sense.def: feed on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.19; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: They wore skins of animals and birds, and dwelt in caves.

sense.def: in a cave; in caves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.20; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.22f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: the languages of the people were not mutually intelligible,

sense.def: language

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.21; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: (there were officers), - in the east called transmitters;

sense.def: those who transmit a message in another language > interpreter (in the Eastern regions)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.21; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: in the south, representationists;

sense.def: those who imitate > interpreter (in the South)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.21; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: in the west, Ti-ti's;

sense.def: ?? official responsible for communicating a message in another language (in the Western regions) > interpreter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.03.21; Couvreur 1.295f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 203; Yishu 12:17.41a; tr. Legge 1.229;

tls:text.tls:line: and in the north, interpreters.

sense.def: those who interprete/translate > interpreter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.01; Couvreur 1.297f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 204f; Yishu 12:18.1a; tr. Legge 1.230;

tls:text.tls:line: showed pity to orphans and solitaires, to teach those who had been bereaved;

sense.def: show caring sympathy for N in action

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.01; Couvreur 1.297f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 204f; Yishu 12:18.1a; tr. Legge 1.230;

tls:text.tls:line: showed pity to orphans and solitaires, to teach those who had been bereaved;

sense.def: those in any way bereaved

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.01; Couvreur 1.297f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 204f; Yishu 12:18.1a; tr. Legge 1.230;

tls:text.tls:line: showed pity to orphans and solitaires, to teach those who had been bereaved;

sense.def: [CAUSE TO REACH>] push forward, cause to catch up, cause to get on; encourage (those lagging behind or those in some trouble)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.02; Couvreur 1.298f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 205; Yishu 12:18.5a; tr. Legge 1.231;

tls:text.tls:line: (At the same time) there was a feast, when places were given according to age.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.04; Couvreur 1.298f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 205; Yishu 12:18.5b; tr. Legge 1.231;

tls:text.tls:line: to the more distant territory.

sense.def: administrative region, district beyond the suburbs

tls:text.tls:srcline: 司徒論選士之秀者而升之學，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.05; Couvreur 1.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 206; Yishu 12:18.8a-8b; tr. Legge 1.232;

tls:text.tls:line: He then decided which of them gave still greater promise, and promoted them to the (great) college.

sense.def: be scintillating, brilliant; be exquisite, fine

tls:text.tls:srcline:
順先王《詩》、
《書》、
《禮》、
《樂》以造士。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.06; Couvreur 1.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 206; Yishu 12:18.8b-11b; tr. Legge 1.232;

tls:text.tls:line: following closely the poems, hístories, ceremonies, and music of the former kings, in order to complete its scholars.

sense.def: the Book of Documents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.07; Couvreur 1.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 206; Yishu 12:18.12a; tr. Legge 1.232;

tls:text.tls:line: the winter and summer to the poems and histories.

sense.def: the Book of Documents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.07; Couvreur 1.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 206; Yishu 12:18.12a; tr. Legge 1.232;

tls:text.tls:line: entering the schools according to their years.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.09; Couvreur 1.301f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 207; Yishu 12:18.15b; tr. Legge 1.233;

tls:text.tls:line: But all their lives they were excluded from distinction.

sense.def: get employed, gain employment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.10; Couvreur 1.302; Su1n Xïda4n 4.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 207; Yishu 12:18.16b; tr. Legge 1.234;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. The Grand director of Music, having fully considered who were the most promising of the 'completed scholars,'

sense.def: be scintillating, brilliant; be exquisite, fine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.11; Couvreur 1.302; Su1n Xïda4n 4.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 207; Yishu 12:18.20b-21a; tr. Legge 1.234;

tls:text.tls:line: He then reported his decisions concerning the best and ablest of them

sense.def: be the worthiest in N; be a worthy on the scale of N, be a worthy of N-class (but contrast 古之賢者)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.12; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.24b-26b; tr. Legge 1.234;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In the case of all who professed any particular art, respect was had to their strength.

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: All who professed particular arts for the service of their superiors,

sense.def: entertaining trick, attractive skill [also general: skill in any field][CA]

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: such as prayer-makers, writers, archers, carriage-drivers, doctors, diviners, and artisans,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:text.tls:line: such as prayer-makers, writers, archers, carriage-drivers, doctors, diviners, and artisans,

sense.def: invocator. prayer-maker; communicator with the spirits; ritual recorder; ritual officer

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: such as prayer-makers, writers, archers, carriage-drivers, doctors, diviners, and artisans,

sense.def: scribe; astronomer; archivist; literary: scribal hack

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: such as prayer-makers, writers, archers, carriage-drivers, doctors, diviners, and artisans,

sense.def: driver of a carriage or cart, charioteer

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: such as prayer-makers, writers, archers, carriage-drivers, doctors, diviners, and artisans,

sense.def: medically specialised shaman; medical doctor8

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: such as prayer-makers, writers, archers, carriage-drivers, doctors, diviners, and artisans,

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、史、
射、御、
醫、卜及百工。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: such as prayer-makers, writers, archers, carriage-drivers, doctors, diviners, and artisans,

sense.def: specialised worker; craftsman, artisan; sometimes specifically: musician

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: - all who professed particular arts for the service of their superiors,

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: and when they left their cdistricts, they did not rank with officers.

sense.def: be of equal status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.13; Couvreur 1.303f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 208; Yishu 12:18.26b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: (also), when they left their districts, did not rank with officers.

sense.def: be of equal status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.14; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.31f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.235;

tls:text.tls:line: and made the laws clear in order to deal with criminal charges and litigations.

sense.def: litigation of all kinds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.15; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. When hearing a case requiring the application of any of the five punisments,

sense.def: civil law case; legal proposals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.15; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: He must consider the gravity or lightness (of the offence),

sense.def: assess professionally (somebody); adjudicate; classify

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.15; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: and carefully try to fathom the capacity (of the offender) as shallow or deep, to determine the exact character (of his guilt).

sense.def: fathom, assess depth or height of (physical objects)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.15; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: and carefully try to fathom the capacity (of the offender) as shallow or deep, to determine the exact character (of his guilt).

sense.def: depth or otherwise, relative depth (of guilt)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.15; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: and carefully try to fathom the capacity (of the offender) as shallow or deep, to determine the exact character (of his guilt).

sense.def: decide (a matter); pass judgment on (a case)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.16; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: He must exert his intelligence to the outmost,

sense.def: use up, exhaust

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.16; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: If the criminal charge appeared to him doubtful,

sense.def: litigation; criminal law case; trial; criminal procedure 獄決罪定

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.16; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: he was to take the multitude into consultation with him;

sense.def: all objects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.16; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: he was to pardon the defendant.

sense.def: HF 4.2.95: to pardon (someone condemned to a severe form of punishment)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.16; Couvreur 1.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 209; Yishu 12:18.33a; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: At the same time he was to examine analogous cases, great and small, and then give his decision.

sense.def: be sure to V

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.17; Couvreur 1.306f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 210; Yishu 12:18.35a-35b; tr. Legge 1.236;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The evidence in a criminal case having thus been all taken and judgement given,

sense.def: litigation; criminal law case; trial; criminal procedure 獄決罪定

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.18; Couvreur 1.306f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.33f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 210; Yishu 12:18.37a-37b; tr. Legge 1.237;

tls:text.tls:line: even light offenders (that were not doubtful) were not forgiven.

sense.def: forgive (a person or a crime)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
作淫聲、
異服、
奇技、

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.19; Couvreur 1.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 210; Yishu 12:18.38a; tr. Legge 1.237;

tls:text.tls:line: Using licentious music; strange garments; wonderful contrivances

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.21; Couvreur 1.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 210; Yishu 12:18.39b; tr. Legge 1.238;

tls:text.tls:line: did not forgive transgressions of them.

sense.def: forgive (a person or a crime)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.23; Couvreur 1.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 211; Yishu 12:18.40a; tr. Legge 1.238;

tls:text.tls:line: or

sense.def: relative size (of territory or cloth)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.25; Couvreur 1.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 211; Yishu 12:18.40a; tr. Legge 1.238;

tls:text.tls:line: At the frontier gates, those in charge of the prohibitions, examined travellers,

sense.def: to carry out an inspection

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.25; Couvreur 1.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 211; Yishu 12:18.40a; tr. Legge 1.238;

tls:text.tls:line: and taking note of such as spoke strange language.

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.04.29; Couvreur 1.311f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 212; Yishu 12:18.45b; tr. Legge 1.239;

tls:text.tls:line: the aged were feasted and the royal sympathy shown to the husbandmen.

sense.def: peasant; agricultural worker, agriculturalist

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.01; Couvreur 1.312f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 213; Yishu 13:19.1a-6a; tr. Legge 1.240;

tls:text.tls:line: the men of Yin, those of a (substantial) feast;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.01; Couvreur 1.312f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 213; Yishu 13:19.1a-6a; tr. Legge 1.240;

tls:text.tls:line: and the men of Kau cultivated and used all the three.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.02; Couvreur 1.313f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.6a; tr. Legge 1.240;

tls:text.tls:line: The blind did the same.

sense.def: the blind (often regarded as distinguished for their ability as musicians)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.03; Couvreur 1.313f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.7b; tr. Legge 1.240;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. For those of fifty the grain was (fine and) different (from that used by younger men).

sense.def: provisions of food

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.03; Couvreur 1.313f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.7b; tr. Legge 1.240;

tls:text.tls:line: For those of seventy, there was a second service of savoury meat.

sense.def: exquisite delicacy; exquisite meal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.03; Couvreur 1.313f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.7b; tr. Legge 1.240;

tls:text.tls:line: For those of eighty, there was a constant supply of delicacies.

sense.def: exquisite delicacies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.03; Couvreur 1.313f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.7b; tr. Legge 1.240;

tls:text.tls:line: food and drink were never out of their chambers.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.04; Couvreur 1.313f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.8b; tr. Legge 1.241;

tls:text.tls:line: But the bandages, sheet, and coverlets and cases (for the corpse)

sense.def: garment or blanket used to dress corpses, shroud

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.06; Couvreur 1.315f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.9b-10a; tr. Legge 1.241;

tls:text.tls:line: and had rich food carried after him.

sense.def: exquisite delicacies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.07; Couvreur 1.315f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 214; Yishu 13:19.10b-11b; tr. Legge 1.241;

tls:text.tls:line: at seventy, he was excempted from the business of recieving guests and visitors;

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.09; Couvreur 1.316f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 215; Yishu 13:19.14b; tr. Legge 1.242;

tls:text.tls:line: The men of Yin nourished the former in the school of the right,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.09; Couvreur 1.316f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 215; Yishu 13:19.14b; tr. Legge 1.242;

tls:text.tls:line: The men of Kau entertained the former in (the school called) the eastern kiao,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.10; Couvreur 1.316f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 215; Yishu 13:19.19b-21b; tr. Legge 1.242;

tls:text.tls:line: During the Yin,m they used the hsu cap in sacrificing,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.10; Couvreur 1.316f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 215; Yishu 13:19.19b-21b; tr. Legge 1.242;

tls:text.tls:line: During th Kau dynasty, they used the mien cap in sacrificing,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.12; Couvreur 1.317f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 216; Yishu 13:19.21b; tr. Legge 1.243;

tls:text.tls:line: Where an officer was about to move to another state,

sense.def: move to, migrate to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.13; Couvreur 1.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.23b-24a; tr. Legge 1.243;

tls:text.tls:line: an old man who had lost his sons was called a solitary.

sense.def: be alone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.13; Couvreur 1.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.23b-24a; tr. Legge 1.243;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The dumb, the deaf, the lame,

sense.def: the dumb; those who are dumb

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.13; Couvreur 1.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.23b-24a; tr. Legge 1.243;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The dumb, the deaf, the lame,

sense.def: the deaf

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.13; Couvreur 1.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.23b-24a; tr. Legge 1.243;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The dumb, the deaf, the lame,

sense.def: the lame; those who are lame

tls:text.tls:srcline:
躃、斷者、
侏儒、
百工，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.13; Couvreur 1.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.23b-24a; tr. Legge 1.243;

tls:text.tls:line: such as had lost a mamber, pigmies, and mechanics,

sense.def: the lame; those who are lame

tls:text.tls:srcline:
躃、斷者、
侏儒、
百工，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.13; Couvreur 1.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.23b-24a; tr. Legge 1.243;

tls:text.tls:line: such as had lost a mamber, pigmies, and mechanics,

sense.def: HF: dwarf

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.14; Couvreur 1.319f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.25b; tr. Legge 1.244;

tls:text.tls:line: 15, On the roads,

sense.def: the roads, all kinds of roads

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.14; Couvreur 1.319f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.25b; tr. Legge 1.244;

tls:text.tls:line: A man kept behind another who had a father's years;

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.14; Couvreur 1.319f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.25b; tr. Legge 1.244;

tls:text.tls:line: Friends did not pass by one another, when going the same way.

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.14; Couvreur 1.319f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.25b; tr. Legge 1.244;

tls:text.tls:line: (In the case of an old and a young man, carrying burdens,) both were borne by the younger;

sense.def: burden

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.14; Couvreur 1.319f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217; Yishu 13:19.25b; tr. Legge 1.244;

tls:text.tls:line: and if the two were too heavy for one, he took the heavier.

sense.def: burden

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.15; Couvreur 1.319f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 217f; Yishu 13:19.26a-26b; tr. Legge 1.244;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. An officer of superior rank, of the age ofsixty or seventy, did not walk on foot.

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.17; Couvreur 1.320f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 218; Yishu 13:19.29a; tr. Legge 1.245;

tls:text.tls:line: was nore than 1000 li.

sense.def: be distant; far away; be further away

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.18; Couvreur 1.320f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 218; Yishu 13:19.29a; tr. Legge 1.245;

tls:text.tls:line: was nore than 1000 li.

sense.def: be distant; far away; be further away

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.19; Couvreur 1.320f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 218; Yishu 13:19.35b; tr. Legge 1.245;

tls:text.tls:line: rivers and marshes, ditches and canals,

sense.def: ditches and canals, small waterways

tls:text.tls:srcline: 皆有湯沐之邑於天子之縣內，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.28; Couvreur 1.327f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 222; Yishu 13:19.48b-49b; tr. Legge 1.247;

tls:text.tls:line: had cities assigned for them for purification within his domain

sense.def: bathe and wash > for bathing and washing, for resting 湯沐之邑

tls:text.tls:srcline:
長幼、
朋友、
賓客。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.30; Couvreur 1.328f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.56f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 222; Yishu 13:19.52b; tr. Legge 1.248;

tls:text.tls:line: old and young; friend and friend; host and guest.

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:text.tls:srcline:
長幼、
朋友、
賓客。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.30; Couvreur 1.328f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.56f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 222; Yishu 13:19.52b; tr. Legge 1.248;

tls:text.tls:line: old and young; friend and friend; host and guest.

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.30; Couvreur 1.328f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.56f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 222; Yishu 13:19.52b; tr. Legge 1.248;

tls:text.tls:line: - food and drink; clothes;

sense.def: food in general; nutrition; mealtime

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.30; Couvreur 1.328f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.56f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 222; Yishu 13:19.52b; tr. Legge 1.248;

tls:text.tls:line: - food and drink; clothes;

sense.def: clothes; garment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.30; Couvreur 1.328f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.56f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 222; Yishu 13:19.52b; tr. Legge 1.248;

tls:text.tls:line: business (or, the profession); maintenance of distinctions;

sense.def: action

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 05.05.30; Couvreur 1.328f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.56f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 222; Yishu 13:19.52b; tr. Legge 1.248;

tls:text.tls:line: business (or, the profession); maintenance of distinctions;

sense.def: the making of appropriate distinctions in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.02; Couvreur 1.330f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.63f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 226; Yishu 14:20.12b-17b; tr. Legge 1.250;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. Its number is eight;

sense.def: quantity; Anzahl; (magical) number e.g. 用六數 "uses the number six; use sextuplets of things".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.02; Couvreur 1.330f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.63f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 226; Yishu 14:20.12b-17b; tr. Legge 1.250;

tls:text.tls:line: its smell is rank.

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.02; Couvreur 1.330f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.63f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 226; Yishu 14:20.12b-17b; tr. Legge 1.250;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. Its sacrifice is that at the door,

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.04; Couvreur 1.332f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 227; Yishu 14:20.23b; tr. Legge 1.251;

tls:text.tls:line: rides in thecarriage with the phoenix (bells),

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.05; Couvreur 1.333f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.27a-27b; tr. Legge 1.253;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.06; Couvreur 1.333f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.27b; tr. Legge 1.253;

tls:text.tls:line: and on the day

sense.def: first two weeks of spring

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子親帥三公九卿諸侯大夫

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.06; Couvreur 1.333f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.27b; tr. Legge 1.253;

tls:text.tls:line: he leads in person the three ducal ministers, his nine high ministers, the feudal princes (who are at court), and his great officers,

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子親帥三公九卿諸侯大夫

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.06; Couvreur 1.333f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.27b; tr. Legge 1.253;

tls:text.tls:line: he leads in person the three ducal ministers, his nine high ministers, the feudal princes (who are at court), and his great officers,

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.06; Couvreur 1.333f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.27b; tr. Legge 1.253;

tls:text.tls:line: and on their return,

sense.def: return

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.08; Couvreur 1.334; Su1n Xïda4n 4.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.31b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: and (especially) to observe the motions in the ehavens of the sun and moon, and of the zodiacal stars in which the conjunctions of these bodies take place,

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.09; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.33b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.09; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.33b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: and afterwards, the day of the first conjunction of the sun and moon having been chosen,

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.09; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.33b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: with the handle and share of the plough in the carriage,

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.09; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.33b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: with the handle and share of the plough in the carriage,

sense.def: load into a vehicle; load up; transport, bring along; take along in a vehicle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.09; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.33b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: with the handle and share of the plough in the carriage,

sense.def: a plough

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.09; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.33b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: he conducts his three ducal ministers, his nine high ministers, the feudal princes and his Great officers,

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.09; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228; Yishu 14:20.33b; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: all with their own hands to plough the field of God.

sense.def: personally; in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.10; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228f; Yishu 14:20.33b-34a; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: When they return,

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.10; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228f; Yishu 14:20.33b-34a; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: he takes in his hand a cup in the great chamber,

sense.def: Grand Chamber (in the ancestral temple, as opposed to the side chamber, the xiǎo qǐn 小寢)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.10; Couvreur 1.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 228f; Yishu 14:20.33b-34a; tr. Legge 1.254;

tls:text.tls:line: he takes in his hand a cup in the great chamber,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.11; Couvreur 1.336f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 229; Yishu 14:20.37a-38a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.11; Couvreur 1.336f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 229; Yishu 14:20.37a-38a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: and (see that) all repair the marches and divisions (of the ground),

sense.def: boundaries (of a state, or between fields)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.12; Couvreur 1.336f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 229; Yishu 14:20.38a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: They must skilfully survey the mounds and rising grounds,

sense.def: mounds, small hills; artificial mountains

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.12; Couvreur 1.336f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 229; Yishu 14:20.38a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: themselves also engaging in the tasks.

sense.def: attend to personally

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.12; Couvreur 1.336f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 229; Yishu 14:20.38a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: The business of the fields being thus ordered,

sense.def: (of human relationships) be (not) in good order

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.13; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.40a-42a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.13; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.40a-42a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: care being taken not to use any female victims.

sense.def: sacrificial water buffalo with 厜ure colour� fur, specifically an ox that has been used in sacrifice; LIJI: figure of a sacrificial victim bull

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.13; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.40a-42a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: care being taken not to use any female victims.

sense.def: whole buffalo used in sacrifices

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.13; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.40a-42a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: care being taken not to use any female victims.

sense.def: the female (horse; cow; victim, etc.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.13; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.40a-42a; tr. Legge 1.255;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. Prohibitions are issued against cutting down trees.

sense.def: cut down (trees), hew off (branches)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. Nests should not be thrown down;

sense.def: nest on tree

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: unformed insects should not be killed,

sense.def: worm; insect; maggot

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: nor creatures in the womb, nor birds just taking to the wing,

sense.def: foetus, embryo

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: nor creatures in the womb, nor birds just taking to the wing,

sense.def: newborn bird or animal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: nor creatures in the womb, nor birds just taking to the wing,

sense.def: birds in general; birds of any kind; a bird

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. Skeletons should be covered up, and bones with the flesh attached on them buried.

sense.def: cover (e.g. ears, so as to make unable to interact with the outside); hide; retrace (their own traces); block up;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. Skeletons should be covered up, and bones with the flesh attached on them buried.

sense.def: dried bones, skeleton

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. Skeletons should be covered up, and bones with the flesh attached on them buried.

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.14; Couvreur 1.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.42b-43a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. Skeletons should be covered up, and bones with the flesh attached on them buried.

sense.def: bones with flesh on them

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.15; Couvreur 1.338; Su1n Xïda4n 4.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 230; Yishu 14:20.43b-44a; tr. Legge 1.256;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: plants and trees would decay prematurely,

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: and the states would be kept in continual fear.

sense.def: fear, fright; an atmosphere of fear

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: boisterous winds would work their violence; rain would descend in torrents;

sense.def: violent wind; storm （=飆）

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: orach, fesque, darnel, and southernwood would grow up together.

sense.def: pigweed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: orach, fesque, darnel, and southernwood would grow up together.

sense.def: wild millet; weed; Setaria viridis

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: orach, fesque, darnel, and southernwood would grow up together.

sense.def: bitter fleabane, Erigeron acer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: orach, fesque, darnel, and southernwood would grow up together.

sense.def: wormwood

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.01.16; Couvreur 1.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:20.44b-45a; tr. Legge 1.257;

tls:text.tls:line: orach, fesque, darnel, and southernwood would grow up together.

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.02; Couvreur 1.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:21.3a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. Its number is eight;

sense.def: quantity; Anzahl; (magical) number e.g. 用六數 "uses the number six; use sextuplets of things".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.02; Couvreur 1.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:21.3a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: its taste is sour;

sense.def: taste, flavour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.02; Couvreur 1.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:21.3a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: its smell is rank.

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.02; Couvreur 1.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:21.3a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: its smell is rank.

sense.def: be rancid; have the smell of rich meaty food

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.02; Couvreur 1.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:21.3a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: The peach tree begins to blossom.

sense.def: to blossom, to be in bloom

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.02; Couvreur 1.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:21.3a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: Hawks are transformed into doves.

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.02; Couvreur 1.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231; Yishu 14:21.3a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: Hawks are transformed into doves.

sense.def: turtledove; name of various kinds of birds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.03; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 231f; Yishu 14:21.4a; tr. Legge 1.258;

tls:text.tls:line: rides in the carriage with the phoenix bells,

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.04; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 232; Yishu 14:21.5a-8b; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. In this month,

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.04; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 232; Yishu 14:21.5a-8b; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: they keep both the young buds and those more advanced from being disturbed;

sense.def: new twigs with sprouts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.04; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 232; Yishu 14:21.5a-8b; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: they keep both the young buds and those more advanced from being disturbed;

sense.def: LS 1.3: sprout

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.04; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 232; Yishu 14:21.5a-8b; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: they keep both the young buds and those more advanced from being disturbed;

sense.def: sprout

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.04; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 232; Yishu 14:21.5a-8b; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. The fortunate day is chosen,

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.04; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 232; Yishu 14:21.5a-8b; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. Orders are given to the (proper) officers to examine the prisons;

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.04; Couvreur 1.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.80f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 232; Yishu 14:21.5a-8b; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. Orders are given to the (proper) officers to examine the prisons;

sense.def: early classical term for a prison; prison population, prisoners

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.05; Couvreur 1.341f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.9a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.05; Couvreur 1.341f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.9a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: He goes to do so in person,

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.05; Couvreur 1.341f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.9a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: with his queen and help-mates, attended by his nine ladies of honour.

sense.def: lead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.05; Couvreur 1.341f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.9a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: with his queen and help-mates, attended by his nine ladies of honour.

sense.def: court lady; concubine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.06; Couvreur 1.342f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.11a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.06; Couvreur 1.342f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.11a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: and the lightning begins to be seen.

sense.def: there was lightning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.06; Couvreur 1.342f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.11a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: opening their doors and beginning to come forth.

sense.def: open (so that it will be permanently unlocked or visible) YILI: 啟會"open the lid"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.06; Couvreur 1.342f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.11a; tr. Legge 1.259;

tls:text.tls:line: opening their doors and beginning to come forth.

sense.def: openings (of the burrows of insects etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.07; Couvreur 1.342f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.12b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: a bell with a wooden tounge is sounded, to give notice to all the people.

sense.def: bell with a tongue, often used in warfare to declare war ritually. The tongue can be of timber (for ritual purposes) or of metal (for open air use in warfare with zhēng 鉦)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.07; Couvreur 1.342f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 233; Yishu 14:21.12b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: a bell with a wooden tounge is sounded, to give notice to all the people.

sense.def: archaic, SHU/LIJI: the infinitely many people

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.09; Couvreur 1.343; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.16b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.09; Couvreur 1.343; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.16b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: few of the husbandmen remain in their houses in the towns.

sense.def: active farmers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.09; Couvreur 1.343; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.16b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: They repair, however, their gates and doors, both of wood and of wattles;

sense.def: leaf of an interior door

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.09; Couvreur 1.343; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.16b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: They repair, however, their gates and doors, both of wood and of wattles;

sense.def: leaf of interior door made of any material

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.09; Couvreur 1.343; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.16b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: and put their sleeping quarters and temples all in good repair.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.09; Couvreur 1.343; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.16b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: and put their sleeping quarters and temples all in good repair.

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.09; Couvreur 1.343; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.16b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: and put their sleeping quarters and temples all in good repair.

sense.def: be completely provided

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: (the fishermen) should not let the streams and meres run dry,

sense.def: rivers; streams

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: (the fishermen) should not let the streams and meres run dry,

sense.def: marshland; bog around lakes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: nor drain off all the water from the dams and ponds, (in order to catch all the fish),

sense.def: draw water from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: nor drain off all the water from the dams and ponds, (in order to catch all the fish),

sense.def: ponds and lakes with dikes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: nor should (the hunters) fire the hills and forests.

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: nor should (the hunters) fire the hills and forests.

sense.def: mountain forest; mountains and forests;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.10; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.260;

tls:text.tls:line: Before (using it generally), they offer some in their principal apartment or in the ancestral temple.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:text.tls:srcline:
天子乃帥三公、
九卿、
諸侯、
大夫親往視之。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.11; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.21b-24a; tr. Legge 1.261;

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven at the head of the three ducal ministers, his nine high ministers, he feudal princes (at court), and his Great officers, goes in person to see the ceremony.

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:text.tls:srcline:
天子乃帥三公、
九卿、
諸侯、
大夫親往視之。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.11; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.21b-24a; tr. Legge 1.261;

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven at the head of the three ducal ministers, his nine high ministers, he feudal princes (at court), and his Great officers, goes in person to see the ceremony.

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.11; Couvreur 1.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 234; Yishu 14:21.21b-24a; tr. Legge 1.261;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

tls:text.tls:line: cold airs would be constantly coming;

sense.def: cold

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.12; Couvreur 1.345; Su1n Xïda4n 4.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 235; Yishu 14:21.25b; tr. Legge 1.261;

tls:text.tls:line: cold airs would be constantly coming;

sense.def: air, atmosphere; ether

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.13; Couvreur 1.345; Su1n Xïda4n 4.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 235; Yishu 14:21.25b; tr. Legge 1.261;

tls:text.tls:line: there would be great droughts among the people;

sense.def: be stricken by drought; be characterised by drought 歲旱

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.13; Couvreur 1.345; Su1n Xïda4n 4.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 235; Yishu 14:21.25b; tr. Legge 1.261;

tls:text.tls:line: the hot airs would come too early;

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.02.13; Couvreur 1.345; Su1n Xïda4n 4.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 235; Yishu 14:21.25b; tr. Legge 1.261;

tls:text.tls:line: and caterpillars and other insects would harm the grain.

sense.def: damaging insects of all kinds (particularly catarpillars??)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.01; Couvreur 1.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 235; Yishu 14:21.26b-28a; tr. Legge 1.262;

tls:text.tls:line: the constellation culminating at dusk being Khih-hsing,

sense.def: at dusk

tls:text.tls:line: Its taste is sour.

sense.def: taste, flavour

tls:text.tls:line: Its smell is rank.

sense.def: be rancid; have the smell of rich meaty food

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.02; Couvreur 1.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 235f; Yishu 14:21.28b; tr. Legge 1.262;

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
