tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.04; Couvreur 1.347f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 236; Yishu 14:21.30b-32a; tr. Legge 1.263;

tls:text.tls:line: He offers a snouted sturgeon (which he has caught) in the rear apartment of the ancestral temple,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.05; Couvreur 1.348; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.33b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.05; Couvreur 1.348; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.33b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: The crooked shoots are all put forth,

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.05; Couvreur 1.348; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.33b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: and the buds are unfolded.

sense.def: new twigs with sprouts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.06; Couvreur 1.348; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.34a-34b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. The son of Heaven spreads his goodness abroad, and carries out his kindly promptings.

sense.def: to spread; spread and give away

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.06; Couvreur 1.348; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.34a-34b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: He gives orders to the proper officers to distribute from his granaries and vaults,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.06; Couvreur 1.348; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.34a-34b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: thus stimulating the princes of states

sense.def: encourage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.07; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.36b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In this month,

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.07; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.36b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The rains of the season will be coming down,

sense.def: seasonable, seasonal 時雨 "seasonal rain"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.07; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.36b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The rains of the season will be coming down,

sense.def: fall (as rain)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.07; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.36b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: Put the dykes and dams in good repair,

sense.def: the dikes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.07; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.36b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: clear the ditches and larger channels,

sense.def: ditches and canals, small waterways

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.07; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.36b; tr. Legge 1.264;

tls:text.tls:line: and open all paths,

sense.def: the roads, all kinds of roads

tls:text.tls:srcline:
田獵，
罝罘、
羅罔、

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.08; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.37b; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. The nets used in hunting animals and birds,

sense.def: ZZ 362: net for catching rabbits, and by extension other animals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.08; Couvreur 1.349; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 237; Yishu 14:21.37b; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: hand nets, archer's disguises, and injurious baits

sense.def: small hand net with long handle to catch hares or birds with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.09; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.09; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: orders are given to the foresters throughout the country not to allow the cutting down of the mulberry trees and silk-worm oaks.

sense.def: kind of tree suitable for use in silk-worm cultivation, like a mulberry tree, but also useful in the production of yellow pigment as a symbol of imperial authority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.09; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: About these the the cooing doves clap their wings,

sense.def: turtledove; name of various kinds of birds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.09; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: and the crested birds light on them.

sense.def: descend on, alight on (a tree etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.09; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: The trays and baskets with the stands (for the worms and cocoons) are got ready.

sense.def: all-purpose square basket (for example used to pick up horse dung with)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.09; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: The queen, after vigil and fasting,

sense.def: queen; later: empress

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.09; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: The queen, after vigil and fasting,

sense.def: imperial female companion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.10; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: She orders the wives and younger women (of the palace) not to wear their ornamental dresses,

sense.def: LIJI: use make-up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.10; Couvreur 1.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 238; Yishu 14:21.39a; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: she apportions out the cocoons, weighs o ut the silk, on which they go to work,

sense.def: achieve (public and visible success) in the service of someone or something; realise; put into practice through commendable effort in some service

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.11; Couvreur 1.351; Su1n Xïda4n 4.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.41a-41b; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.11; Couvreur 1.351; Su1n Xïda4n 4.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.41a-41b; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: of skins and hides and sinews;

sense.def: leather of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.11; Couvreur 1.351; Su1n Xïda4n 4.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.41a-41b; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: of horn and ivory;

sense.def: ivory

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.11; Couvreur 1.351; Su1n Xïda4n 4.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.41a-41b; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: and of grease, glue, cinnabar, and varnish.

sense.def: cinnabar

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.11; Couvreur 1.351; Su1n Xïda4n 4.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.41a-41b; tr. Legge 1.265;

tls:text.tls:line: (They also are to see) that all these things be good.

sense.def: be bad

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.13; Couvreur 1.351f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.43b; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. In the end of this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.13; Couvreur 1.351f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.43b; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: a fortunate day is chosen

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.14; Couvreur 1.351f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.44a-45b; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.14; Couvreur 1.351f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.44a-45b; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: of the animals fit for victims, with the foals and claves.

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.14; Couvreur 1.351f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 239; Yishu 14:21.44a-45b; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: of the animals fit for victims, with the foals and claves.

sense.def: quantity; Anzahl; (magical) number e.g. 用六數 "uses the number six; use sextuplets of things".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.15; Couvreur 1.352f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 14:21.47a; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: cold airs would constantly be prevailing;

sense.def: cold

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.15; Couvreur 1.352f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 14:21.47a; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: cold airs would constantly be prevailing;

sense.def: air, atmosphere; ether

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.03.16; Couvreur 1.352f; Su1n Xïda4n 4.93f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 14:21.47a; tr. Legge 1.266;

tls:text.tls:line: and warlike movements would be everywhere arising.

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.01; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.1f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.1a-3b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. Its divine ruler is Yen Ti,

sense.def: flame, fire

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.01; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.1f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.1a-3b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: and the (attending) spirit is Ku-yung.

sense.def: shaman X

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.02; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.5a-6b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: Its taste is acrid.

sense.def: taste, flavour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.02; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.5a-6b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: Its smell is that of things burning.

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.02; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.5a-6b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: Its smell is that of things burning.

sense.def: be burning; be scorched

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.02; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.5a-6b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: and of the parts of the victim the lungs have the foremost place.

sense.def: lung

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.02; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.5a-6b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. The green frogs croak.

sense.def: frogs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.02; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.5a-6b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: Earth-worms come forth.

sense.def: insects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.02; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.5a-6b; tr. Legge 1.268;

tls:text.tls:line: The sow-thistle is in seed.

sense.def: flower and set ears, be in flower

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.03; Couvreur 1.353f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 240; Yishu 15:22.7b; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: The vessels which he uses are tall, (to resemble) the large growth (of things).

sense.def: be large and unsubtle; (of a vessel) crude and large;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.04; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.8a-8b; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
天子親帥三公、
九卿、
大夫

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.05; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.8b; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: at the head of the three ducal ministers, the nine high ministers, and his Great officers,

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:text.tls:srcline:
天子親帥三公、
九卿、
大夫

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.05; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.8b; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: at the head of the three ducal ministers, the nine high ministers, and his Great officers,

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.05; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.8b; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: On their return,

sense.def: return

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.05; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.8b; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: and all are joyful and pleased.

sense.def: all of the subjects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.05; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.8b; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: and all are joyful and pleased.

sense.def: be delighted

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.06; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.9b-10a; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. Orders are given to the chief master of music

sense.def: specialist of N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.06; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.9b-10a; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: to recomend men of eminence,

sense.def: LIJI 5.4f: appraise positively and recommend LSCQ 贊能

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.06; Couvreur 1.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 241; Yishu 15:22.9b-10a; tr. Legge 1.269;

tls:text.tls:line: allow the worty and good to have free course

sense.def: promote; recommend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.07; Couvreur 1.356f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.5f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242; Yishu 15:22.11a-12b; tr. Legge 1.270;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.08; Couvreur 1.356f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242; Yishu 15:22.12b; tr. Legge 1.270;

tls:text.tls:line: Orders are (also) given tothe minister of Instruction to travel in order through the districts to the borders,

sense.def: administrative area covering 500 families

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.08; Couvreur 1.356f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242; Yishu 15:22.12b; tr. Legge 1.270;

tls:text.tls:line: charging the husbandmen to work vigorously,

sense.def: strain oneself in VERBING, do one's best to VERB

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.09; Couvreur 1.357f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242; Yishu 15:22.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.270;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.09; Couvreur 1.357f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242; Yishu 15:22.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.270;

tls:text.tls:line: but they should not have a great hunting.

sense.def: go on hunting parties (officially organised or not); engage in pleasure hunting, hunt for pleasure; go on some kind of hunt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.09; Couvreur 1.357f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242; Yishu 15:22.13b-14a; tr. Legge 1.270;

tls:text.tls:line: first offering a portion in the apartment behind (the hall of the) ancestral temple.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.10; Couvreur 1.357f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242f; Yishu 15:22.14b; tr. Legge 1.271;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.10; Couvreur 1.357f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 242f; Yishu 15:22.14b; tr. Legge 1.271;

tls:text.tls:line: and liberate those who are in prison for slight offences.

sense.def: one who is tied up and arrested> a prisoner

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.11; Couvreur 1.357f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 243; Yishu 15:22.16b-18b; tr. Legge 1.271;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. when the work with the silk-worms is over,

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.04.11; Couvreur 1.357f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 243; Yishu 15:22.16b-18b; tr. Legge 1.271;

tls:text.tls:line: the queen presents her cocoons;

sense.def: silkworm cocoon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

tls:text.tls:line: 20. In this month

tls:text.tls:line: (They are to see) that the white and black, the black and green, the green and carnation, the carnation and white

sense.def: patterns of all styles; decorated brocade of all sorts

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.06.05; Couvreur 1.368; Su1n Xïda4n 5.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 249; Yishu 15:23.6b; tr. Legge 1.278;

sense.def: decorous manifestations; decorations; elaborate embellishments

tls:text.tls:line: for flags and their ornaments;

sense.def: official banner, flag (especially with pictures of bears or tigers)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.06.06; Couvreur 1.368; Su1n Xïda4n 5.18f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 249; Yishu 15:23.6b; tr. Legge 1.278;

tls:text.tls:line: for flags and their ornaments;

tls:text.tls:line: and for marking the different degrees of rank as high or low.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

tls:text.tls:line: the trees are luxuriant;

sense.def: trees; trees of all kinds

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: and the grass thus serves to manure the fields of grain and hemp,

sense.def: dung; to dung, to fertilise with dung

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.06.09; Couvreur 1.369f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 250; Yishu 15:23.12a; tr. Legge 1.280;

tls:text.tls:line: and the grass thus serves to manure the fields of grain and hemp,

sense.def: regularly demarkated field, particularly a good and productive field, according to LIJI commentators specifically a field on which hemp is grown; field

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.06.09; Couvreur 1.369f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 250; Yishu 15:23.12a; tr. Legge 1.280;

tls:text.tls:line: and t fatten the ground which has been but just marked out for cultivation.

sense.def: general: border between any type of territory; border territory [the result of a systematic division of a large tract of land into fields (mǔ 畝)] [Jens]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.06.10; Couvreur 1.370f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 250; Yishu 15:23.13a; tr. Legge 1.280;

tls:text.tls:line: the produce of grain would be scanty and fail;

sense.def: elevated style?: be few and far between; be sparse, be scarce, be few; be a rare case 不鮮 "be not so few"; 天下鮮矣 "there are few under the sun".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.06.10; Couvreur 1.370f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 250; Yishu 15:23.13a; tr. Legge 1.280;

tls:text.tls:line: in the states there would be many colds and coughs;

天子親帥三公、
九卿、
諸侯、
大夫

sense.def: (both of humans and of things) assemble SHIJI 百鬼集矣"all the ghosts and spirits had already assembled"

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.09.13; Couvreur 1.3i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 258; Yishu 16:24.18a; tr. Legge 1.289;

tls:text.tls:line: then the resources (of the government) do not fail.

sense.def: be deficient, be in short supply 財匱

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.09.15; Couvreur 1.3i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 258; Yishu 16:24.21a; tr. Legge 1.290;

tls:text.tls:line: plants and trees would blossom;

sense.def: blossom

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.09.15; Couvreur 1.3i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 258; Yishu 16:24.21a; tr. Legge 1.290;

tls:text.tls:line: and in the states there would be alarms.

sense.def: fear, fright; an atmosphere of fear

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.09.16; Couvreur 1.3i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 258; Yishu 16:24.21a; tr. Legge 1.290;

tls:text.tls:line: There would be drought in the states;

sense.def: be stricken by drought; be characterised by drought 歲旱

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.02; Couvreur 1.3i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 259; Yishu 16:24.24b; tr. Legge 1.291;

tls:text.tls:line: Its taste is bitter.

sense.def: peppery pungent

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.02; Couvreur 1.3i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 259; Yishu 16:24.24b; tr. Legge 1.291;

tls:text.tls:line: Its smell is rank.

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.02; Couvreur 1.3i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 259; Yishu 16:24.24b; tr. Legge 1.291;

tls:text.tls:line: Its smell is rank.

sense.def: be putrid

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.02; Couvreur 1.3i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 259; Yishu 16:24.24b; tr. Legge 1.291;

tls:text.tls:line: the khai sacrifice larger animals, and kill (and devour) the smaller.

sense.def: four-legged animal that is hunted, smaller than shòu 獸

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: charging the various officers (to see) that noble and mean all exert themselves in the work of ingathering,

sense.def: all of the subjects

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.05; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.293;

tls:text.tls:line: he hoar-frost begins to fall;

sense.def: frozen dew or vapour, frost

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.05; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.293;

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.05; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.293;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The cold airs are all coming,

sense.def: caused by coldness; originating from coldness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.05; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.293;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The cold airs are all coming,

sense.def: air, atmosphere; ether

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.05; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.293;

tls:text.tls:line: and the people will not be able to endure them.

sense.def: be able to sustain (hardship and trouble); endure bear with, put up with

tls:text.tls:line: orders are given to the chief Director of music to enter the college, and to practise (with his pupils) on the wind instruments.

sense.def: play an instrument by blowing into it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.06; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.32a; tr. Legge 1.293;

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.07; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.33b; tr. Legge 1.294;

tls:text.tls:line: and the amount of the regular contribution to the government,

sense.def: tribute, offering

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.07; Couvreur 1.386f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 260; Yishu 16:24.33b; tr. Legge 1.294;

tls:text.tls:line: and the amount of the regular contribution to the government,

sense.def: tribute; offerings required by ritual

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: the son of Heaven, by means of hunting,

sense.def: go on hunting parties (officially organised or not); engage in pleasure hunting, hunt for pleasure; go on some kind of hunt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.08; Couvreur 1.388f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 261; Yishu 16:24.36a-37b; tr. Legge 1.294;

sense.def: insert

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.08; Couvreur 1.388f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 261; Yishu 16:24.36a-37b; tr. Legge 1.294;

tls:text.tls:line: The minister of Instruction, with his baton stuck in his girdle,

sense.def: rod, stick (often written 撲)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.08; Couvreur 1.388f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 261; Yishu 16:24.36a-37b; tr. Legge 1.294;

tls:text.tls:line: adresses all before him with his face to the north.

sense.def: swear an oath of allegiance to

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: 17. Insects in their burrows all try to push deeper,

sense.def: all, each of the subjects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.11; Couvreur 1.389; Su1n Xïda4n 5.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 262; Yishu 16:24.41b-43a; tr. Legge 1.295;

sense.def: stoop down; bow down; bow the head 俯而泣, but also ZUO Zhao 7 一命而僂，再命而傴，三命而俯

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.11; Couvreur 1.389; Su1n Xïda4n 5.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 262; Yishu 16:24.41b-43a; tr. Legge 1.295;

tls:text.tls:line: the winter stores would be injured and damaged;

sense.def: be destroyed; be damaged

tls:text.tls:line: the winter stores would be injured and damaged;

sense.def: be physically ruined, be wrecked, be destroyed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.12; Couvreur 1.389f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 262; Yishu 16:24.43a; tr. Legge 1.295;

tls:text.tls:line: there would be many colds and catarrhs among the people.

sense.def: to have a cold; sneeze

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.12; Couvreur 1.389f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 262; Yishu 16:24.43a; tr. Legge 1.295;

tls:text.tls:line: there would be many colds and catarrhs among the people.

sense.def: to sneeze; to have a catarrh

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.13; Couvreur 1.389f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 262; Yishu 16:24.43a; tr. Legge 1.295;

sense.def: bandits

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.10.13; Couvreur 1.389f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 262; Yishu 16:24.43a; tr. Legge 1.295;

tls:text.tls:line: the warm airs would come;

sense.def: come here; come to one

sense.def: taste, flavour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.02; Couvreur 1.390f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 263; Yishu 16:25.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.296;

tls:text.tls:line: Its smell is that of things that are rotten.

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:text.tls:line: Its smell is that of things that are rotten.

天子親帥三公、
九卿、
大夫

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.06; Couvreur 1.391f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.8b; tr. Legge 1.297;

tls:text.tls:line: On his return

sense.def: return

tls:text.tls:line: (In this way) all flattery and partizanship in the interpretaion of them (will become clear),

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.07; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.9b-11b; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: (In this way) all flattery and partizanship in the interpretaion of them (will become clear),

sense.def: factionalism

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.08; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.12b-13b; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. Orders are issued to the proper officers in the words;

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.08; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.12b-13b; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: All is shut up and winter is completely formed.'

sense.def: winter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.08; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.12b-13b; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. Orders are given to all the officers to cover up carefully the stores (of their departments).

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.08; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.12b-13b; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. Orders are given to all the officers to cover up carefully the stores (of their departments).

sense.def: put the lid on, cover, put a lock on (in order to prevent outside things to get in)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.09; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.14a; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. The city and suburban walls are put in good repair;

sense.def: patch up with mud

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.09; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.14a; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: bolts and nuts are put to rights;

sense.def: repair; put in order; keep in good repair

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.09; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.14a; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: bolts and nuts are put to rights;

sense.def: locks to gates

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.09; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.14a; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: locks and keys are carefully attended to;

sense.def: keys

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.09; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.14a; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: the field-boundaries are strengthened;

sense.def: boundaries (of a state, or between fields)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.09; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.14a; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: passes and bridges are carefully seen after;

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.09; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.14a; tr. Legge 1.298;

tls:text.tls:line: passes and bridges are carefully seen after;

sense.def: literary: wooden bridge; beam dam

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.10; Couvreur 1.393f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 264; Yishu 16:25.15b; tr. Legge 1.299;

tls:text.tls:srcline:
塋、丘壟之小大、
高卑、

sense.def: base oneself on

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: 19. The son of Heaven prays for (a blessing on) the coming year to the Honoured ones of heaven;

sense.def: ancestry; ancestors

tls:text.tls:line: 20. The son of Heaven orders his leaders and commanders to give instruction on military operations,

sense.def: give instruction to; give instruction in something

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.15; Couvreur 1.396f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 266; Yishu 16:25.22a; tr. Legge 1.301;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.15; Couvreur 1.396f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 266; Yishu 16:25.22a; tr. Legge 1.301;

tls:text.tls:line: they shall be punished for their guilt without forgiveness.

sense.def: be forgiven, be pardoned; also: be aquited because not guilty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.11.17; Couvreur 1.397; Su1n Xïda4n 5.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 266; Yishu 16:25.23b-24a; tr. Legge 1.301;

tls:text.tls:line: snow and hoarfrost woud come unseasonably;

sense.def: The process of snowing, it snowing, snow as an event/process

tls:text.tls:line: snow and hoarfrost woud come unseasonably;

sense.def: be timely, come in due time (as seasonal rain), come in season; SHI 193: be in season

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.02; Couvreur 1.397f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 267; Yishu 16:25.28b; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: Its taste is salt.

sense.def: taste, flavour

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.02; Couvreur 1.397f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 267; Yishu 16:25.28b; tr. Legge 1.302;

sense.def: be salty

tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.02; Couvreur 1.397f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 267; Yishu 16:25.28b; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. The ice becomes more strong.

sense.def: ice; layer of ice; iced water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.02; Couvreur 1.397f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 267; Yishu 16:25.28b; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. The ice becomes more strong.

sense.def: be in strong basic shape, be going strong; be stout, be robust, be able-bodied, be in one's prime; be constitutionally strong; be fit and strong enough to work; thrive particularly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.02; Couvreur 1.397f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 267; Yishu 16:25.28b; tr. Legge 1.302;

sense.def: to crack; to split

tls:text.tls:line: The night bird ceases to sing.

sense.def: kind of bird; pheasant?

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.02; Couvreur 1.397f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 267; Yishu 16:25.28b; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: The night bird ceases to sing.

sense.def: of non-humans and even inanimate objects, primarily of birds: sing; crow; make a sound; also of bovines: moo

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.02; Couvreur 1.397f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 267; Yishu 16:25.28b; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: Tigers begin to pair.

sense.def: have sexual intercourse; to pair

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

tls:text.tls:line: 6. All things relating to the dead are revised and regulated.

sense.def: LIJI 5.10: put (bells) in good order; GY: improve (a person) through instruction�

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.04; Couvreur 1.399f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.51f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 268; Yishu 16:25.29b; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. Orders are given to the proper pfficer to the following effect:

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.05; Couvreur 1.399f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 268; Yishu 16:25.29b-30a; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: which might be called a throwing open of the house of heaven and earth.

sense.def: house; building

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.05; Couvreur 1.399f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 268; Yishu 16:25.29b-30a; tr. Legge 1.302;

tls:text.tls:line: and the people be sure to fall ill from pestilence,

sense.def: plague, pest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.06; Couvreur 1.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 268; Yishu 16:25.31b; tr. Legge 1.303;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.06; Couvreur 1.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 268; Yishu 16:25.31b; tr. Legge 1.303;

tls:text.tls:line: orders are given to the Director of the eunuchs

sense.def: eunuch; inner palace door-keeper

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.06; Couvreur 1.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 268; Yishu 16:25.31b; tr. Legge 1.303;

tls:text.tls:line: and look carefully after all the apartments.

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.12.06; Couvreur 1.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 268; Yishu 16:25.31b; tr. Legge 1.303;

tls:text.tls:line: All women's-work must be diminished, and none of an extravagant nature permitted.

sense.def: woman-like, for women (NB: in "the ritual practice of a woman" "woman" would not be nadN.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

sense.def: leaven; yeast

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

sense.def: play an instrument by blowing into it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.06; Couvreur 1.405f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 272; Yishu 16:25.51a-53a; tr. Legge 1.308;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. Orders are given to the four Inspectors to collect and arrange the faggots

sense.def: QIMINYAOSHU: small pieces of wood

tls:text.tls:srcline: 以共郊廟及百祀之薪燎。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.06; Couvreur 1.405f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 272; Yishu 16:25.51a-53a; tr. Legge 1.308;

tls:text.tls:line: to supply the wood and torches for the suburban sacrifices, those in the ancestral temple, and all others.

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 31: lamp/torch that stands on the floor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.07; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 272; Yishu 16:25.54a; tr. Legge 1.308;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.07; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 272; Yishu 16:25.54a; tr. Legge 1.308;

tls:text.tls:line: and the year will soon begin again.

sense.def: another time, yet again; once more; also plural: more times in the future

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.08; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 272f; Yishu 16:25.56a; tr. Legge 1.308;

tls:text.tls:line: revises the statutes for the states,

sense.def: LIJI 5.10: put (bells) in good order; GY: improve (a person) through instruction�

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.08; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 272f; Yishu 16:25.56a; tr. Legge 1.308;

tls:text.tls:line: to be prepared with what is suitable for the ensuing year.

sense.def: provide

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.09; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.57b; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: to supply the fodder and grain for (the victims used in the worship of the) ancestral temple. [the hey- and grain-eating victims CH]

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.09; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.57b; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: to supply the fodder and grain for (the victims used in the worship of the) ancestral temple. [the hey- and grain-eating victims CH]

sense.def: hey and grain-eating domestic animals, particularly goats, cows; pigs and dogs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.10; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.57b-58a; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: All the people under the sky, within the nine provinces,

sense.def: the Nine Provinces (of China) [This is pervasively difficult to distinguish from the more universal and almost cosmographic notion of the Nine Continents.)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
以共皇天、
上帝、
社稷、
寢廟、
山林、
名川之祀。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.10; Couvreur 1.407f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.57b-58a; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: to god dwelling in the great heaven; at the altars of the (spirits of the) land and grain; in the ancestral temple and the apartment at the back of it; and of the hills, forests, and famous streams.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.11; Couvreur 1.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.60a; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: the white dews would descend too early;

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.12; Couvreur 1.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.60a; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: the seasonable snow would not fall,

sense.def: seasonable, seasonal 時雨 "seasonal rain"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.12; Couvreur 1.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.60a; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: the seasonable snow would not fall,

sense.def: snow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 06.13.12; Couvreur 1.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 273; Yishu 16:25.60a; tr. Legge 1.309;

tls:text.tls:line: he ice would melt, and the cold disappear.

sense.def: melt; dissolve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.01; Couvreur 1.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 275; Yishu 17:26.1b-2a; tr. Legge 1.311;

tls:text.tls:line: 'If a ruler dies and a son and heir is born (immediately after),

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.02; Couvreur 1.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 275; Yishu 17:26.2a; tr. Legge 1.311;

tls:text.tls:line: (Then) the Grand officer of prayer, in his court robes and cap,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.02; Couvreur 1.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 275; Yishu 17:26.2a; tr. Legge 1.311;

tls:text.tls:line: "The son of such and such a lady has been born.

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.03; Couvreur 1.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 275; Yishu 17:26.2a; tr. Legge 1.311;

tls:text.tls:line: all will wail, but without the leaping.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.04; Couvreur 1.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 275; Yishu 17:26.2a; tr. Legge 1.311;

tls:text.tls:line: When this burst of sorow is over,

sense.def: bout of grief 一哀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.05; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 275f; Yishu 17:26.4b; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The officer of prayer will precede,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.05; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 275f; Yishu 17:26.4b; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The officer of prayer will precede,

sense.def: precede all others, go first; come first, be first; take precedence over all others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.06; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: while the officer of prayer stands at the south-east corner of it.

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.06; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.4b-5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: Mournfully clearing his voice three times,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.07; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The boy is (then made) to do obeissance, with his forehead to the ground, and wail.

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.07; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The boy is (then made) to do obeissance, with his forehead to the ground, and wail.

sense.def: forehead

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、
宰、宗人、
眾主人、

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.07; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The officer of prayer, the minister, the officer of the temple, all the relatives,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、
宰、宗人、
眾主人、

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.07; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The officer of prayer, the minister, the officer of the temple, all the relatives,

sense.def: ZHOULI: person in charge, steward (a person of considerable substance)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.07; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: and (the women) in the apartments also leap.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.08; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The Grand minister will charge the officer of prayer and the recorder

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.08; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The Grand minister will charge the officer of prayer and the recorder

sense.def: invocator. prayer-maker; communicator with the spirits; ritual recorder; ritual officer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.08; Couvreur 1.412f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 276; Yishu 17:26.5a; tr. Legge 1.312;

tls:text.tls:line: The Grand minister will charge the officer of prayer and the recorder

sense.def: scribe; astronomer; archivist; literary: scribal hack

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.09; Couvreur 1.414f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 277; Yishu 17:26.6b; tr. Legge 1.313;

tls:text.tls:line: 'If the son and heir have been born after the burial (of the) ruler,

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:text.tls:srcline:
「大宰、
大宗從大祝而告于禰。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.09; Couvreur 1.414f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 277; Yishu 17:26.6b; tr. Legge 1.313;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The Grand minister and the Grand master of the ancestral temple will follow the Grand officer of prayer, and announce the fact before the spirit tablet (of the deceased ruler).

sense.def: deceased father (as represented in the temple); (dead father's tablet and temple); deceased father-in-law (Legge on Liji)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.10; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 277f; Yishu 17:26.8a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: and lay their offerings in that of their father.

sense.def: deceased father (as represented in the temple); (dead father's tablet and temple); deceased father-in-law (Legge on Liji)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.10; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 277f; Yishu 17:26.8a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: They then put on the court cap, and go forth to hold their own court.

sense.def: wear an official hat

tls:text.tls:srcline:
命祝、
史告于、
宗廟、
山川。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.10; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 277f; Yishu 17:26.8a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: (At this) they charge the officer of prayer and the recorder to announce (their departure) to the (spirits of the) land and grain, in the ancestral temple, and at the (altars of the) hills and rivers.

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline:
命祝、
史告于、
宗廟、
山川。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.10; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 277f; Yishu 17:26.8a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: (At this) they charge the officer of prayer and the recorder to announce (their departure) to the (spirits of the) land and grain, in the ancestral temple, and at the (altars of the) hills and rivers.

sense.def: invocator. prayer-maker; communicator with the spirits; ritual recorder; ritual officer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.11; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 278; Yishu 17:26.8a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: They then give (the business of) the state in charge of the five (subordinate) officers, and take their journey,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.11; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 278; Yishu 17:26.8a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: They then give (the business of) the state in charge of the five (subordinate) officers, and take their journey,

sense.def: office-holder, officer, official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.12; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 278; Yishu 17:26.10b; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: (At this) they charge the officer of prayer and the recorder to announce (their departure) at the five shrines in the ancestral temple,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.12; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 278; Yishu 17:26.10b; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: (At this) they charge the officer of prayer and the recorder to announce (their departure) at the five shrines in the ancestral temple,

sense.def: invocator. prayer-maker; communicator with the spirits; ritual recorder; ritual officer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.13; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 278; Yishu 17:26.10b-11a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: They then give (the business of) the state in charge to the five officers,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.13; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 278; Yishu 17:26.10b-11a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: They then give (the business of) the state in charge to the five officers,

sense.def: office-holder, officer, official

tls:text.tls:srcline:
乃命祝、
史告至于前所告者，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.13; Couvreur 1.415f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 278; Yishu 17:26.10b-11a; tr. Legge 1.314;

tls:text.tls:line: and will charge the officer of prayer and the recorder to make announcement of it at the altars where they announced (their departure).

sense.def: invocator. prayer-maker; communicator with the spirits; ritual recorder; ritual officer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.16; Couvreur 1.418; Su1n Xïda4n 5.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 279; Yishu 17:26.13b; tr. Legge 1.316;

tls:text.tls:line: If there be no such eldest son,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.18; Couvreur 1.418f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 279f; Yishu 17:26.14b; tr. Legge 1.316;

tls:text.tls:line: The viands will be removed and the place swept,

sense.def: to sweep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.20; Couvreur 1.420f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 280; Yishu 17:26.16b; tr. Legge 1.317;

tls:text.tls:line: and here he will drink the cup of capping (as if) offered by his father,

sense.def: here, this place (also non-referential: 有人於斯) idiom 於斯乎

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.21; Couvreur 1.420f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 280; Yishu 17:26.18b; tr. Legge 1.317;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. 'When a son is (thus) capped after his father's death,

sense.def: die; have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.21; Couvreur 1.420f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 280; Yishu 17:26.18b; tr. Legge 1.317;

tls:text.tls:line: he will sweep the ground,

sense.def: to clean by sweeping

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.22; Couvreur 1.421f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i1; Yishu 17:26.18b-19a; tr. Legge 1.317;

tls:text.tls:line: that at hte close of tha one year's mourning,

sense.def: auspicious memorial sacrifice; auspiciousness sacrifice in which one seeks (but does not necessarily get) a favourable response for a project

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.23; Couvreur 1.421f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i1; Yishu 17:26.19a; tr. Legge 1.317;

tls:text.tls:line: and duke Hao, at the end of the second year's mourning,

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.24; Couvreur 1.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i1f; Yishu 17:26.20a; tr. Legge 1.318;

tls:text.tls:line: In all cases from (the mourning for) three years downwards, it may be done.

sense.def: those who wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.25; Couvreur 1.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.20a; tr. Legge 1.318;

tls:text.tls:line: When there is mourning for the son of Heaven or the prince of a state,

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.25; Couvreur 1.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.20a; tr. Legge 1.318;

tls:text.tls:line: (all) who wear sackcloth with the jaggted edges (will contribute to) the offerings.

sense.def: wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.25; Couvreur 1.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.20a; tr. Legge 1.318;

tls:text.tls:line: (all) who wear tha sackcloth with the even edges will do so.

sense.def: read zī zuī: respectfully wear mourning garments with hemmed sleeves LY 9.10

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.26; Couvreur 1.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.20a; tr. Legge 1.318;

tls:text.tls:line: his associates and friends will do so.

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.27; Couvreur 1.424f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.22a; tr. Legge 1.319;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Why speak only of the mourning for five months?

sense.def: why does it have to be an N? what need is there for N?

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.27; Couvreur 1.424f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.22a; tr. Legge 1.319;

tls:text.tls:line: In all cases from the m ourning for three years downwards, (the principals) take part in those sacrifices.'

sense.def: those who wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.28; Couvreur 1.424f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.22a; tr. Legge 1.319;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In the mourning sacrifices for the son of Heaven and the prince of a state,

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.28; Couvreur 1.424f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.22a; tr. Legge 1.319;

tls:text.tls:line: none but those who wear he sackcloth with the jagged edges take part in them.

sense.def: wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.29; Couvreur 1.424f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i2; Yishu 17:26.22b; tr. Legge 1.319;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When aquaintainces are in mourning,

sense.def: recognise, be familiar with, know (a person); be acquainted with; recognize the identity of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.33; Couvreur 1.426f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 2i3; Yishu 17:26.25b; tr. Legge 1.320;

tls:text.tls:line: (In this case) it is the rule

sense.def: express one's agreement (to something contextually determinate) [omission of that object idiomatically obligatory, it might seem, in Warring States Chinese]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.39; Couvreur 1.429f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 285; Yishu 17:26.30b; tr. Legge 1.322;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The family that has married a daughter away,

sense.def: marry off one's daughter to; marry off one's concubine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.39; Couvreur 1.429f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 285; Yishu 17:26.30b; tr. Legge 1.322;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The family that has married a daughter away,

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.39; Couvreur 1.429f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 285; Yishu 17:26.30b; tr. Legge 1.322;

tls:text.tls:line: does not extinguish its candles for three nights,

sense.def: hand-held lamp or candle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.40; Couvreur 1.429f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.76f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 285; Yishu 17:26.30b-33a; tr. Legge 1.322;

tls:text.tls:line: A day is chosen for her to sacrifice at the shrine of her father-in-law;

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.40; Couvreur 1.429f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.76f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 285; Yishu 17:26.30b-33a; tr. Legge 1.322;

tls:text.tls:line: A day is chosen for her to sacrifice at the shrine of her father-in-law;

sense.def: deceased father (as represented in the temple); (dead father's tablet and temple); deceased father-in-law (Legge on Liji)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.41; Couvreur 1.429f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 285; Yishu 17:26.33a; tr. Legge 1.322;

tls:text.tls:line: nor should (her tablet) be placed next to that of her mother-in-law.

sense.def: place the spirit tablet of the deceased next to (that of his ancestor, or person of higher status, or indeed of any person with whom a relation is to be ritually asserted)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.41; Couvreur 1.429f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 285; Yishu 17:26.33a; tr. Legge 1.322;

tls:text.tls:line: nor should (her tablet) be placed next to that of her mother-in-law.

sense.def: mother-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.43; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In heaven there are not two suns,

sense.def: the sky

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.43; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In heaven there are not two suns,

sense.def: sun 十日

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.43; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: in a country there are not two kings;

sense.def: territory; the place where one is living

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.43; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: in a country there are not two kings;

sense.def: archaic: land; place

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.43; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: there are not two who occupy the highest place of honour.

sense.def: leading position, highest leading position; or: person of highest status 無二上

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.44; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: made fictitious tablets and took them with him on his expeditions,

sense.def: artificial; pretended; fake, faked; pretending; faking

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.45; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a-36b; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: the mourning rites of Ki Hwan-(?)ze were in progress.

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.45; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36a-36b; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: He therefore acted as the principal (mourner),

sense.def: a host, person ritually in charge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.46; Couvreur 1.431f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 286; Yishu 17:26.36b; tr. Legge 1.323;

tls:text.tls:line: The superintending officers made no attempt to put the things to rights.

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.48; Couvreur 1.433f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.78f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 287; Yishu 17:26.38a; tr. Legge 1.324;

tls:text.tls:line: or the prince of a state deceased, or left his state,

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則祝取群廟之主而藏諸祖廟，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.49; Couvreur 1.433f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 287; Yishu 17:26.38a; tr. Legge 1.324;

tls:text.tls:line: it is the rule that the officer of prayer should take the tablets from all the other shrines

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.50; Couvreur 1.433f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 287; Yishu 17:26.38a; tr. Legge 1.324;

tls:text.tls:line: the officer of prayer met (and recieved) the tablets from the other shrines.

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.53; Couvreur 1.435f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 288; Yishu 17:26.39b; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: and bury them between the steps (leading) up to the fane of the high ancestor;

sense.def: the pair of, the two, both 兩手，兩目，兩耳

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.54; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.40b; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: outside the palace, a boy had his master,

sense.def: grand tutor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.54; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.40b; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: they were those whom the ruler employed to teach his son;

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.55; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.40b; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: he could not bear (not) to mourn for her,

sense.def: be callous and unfeeling with respect to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.56; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.40b-41a; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: The proper officer on hearing of it,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則有司將書之以遺後世。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.56; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.40b-41a; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: then we will put it on record, and transmit the act to the future;

sense.def: we, the officials in charge

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則有司將書之以遺後世。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.56; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.40b-41a; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: then we will put it on record, and transmit the act to the future;

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.56; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.40b-41a; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: - will not that be undesirable?"

sense.def: rhetorical question marker

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.01.57; Couvreur 1.436f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 289; Yishu 17:26.41a; tr. Legge 1.326;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke could not bear not to wear mourning,

sense.def: be callous and unfeeling with respect to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.01; Couvreur 1.438f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 290; Yishu 17:27.1a; tr. Legge 1.328;

tls:text.tls:line: 'May I ask what they are?'

sense.def: may I ask about N

tls:text.tls:srcline:
「天子嘗、
禘、郊、
社、五祀之祭，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.06; Couvreur 1.440f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 291; Yishu 17:27.3a; tr. Legge 1.329;

tls:text.tls:line: 'At the seasonal sacrifices of the son of Heaven, at those to Heaven and Earth, and at (any of) the five sacrifices of the house,

sense.def: suburban sacrifice held in the southern suburbs in summer and in the northern suburbs in winter. GY: 凡禘郊祖宗報此五者國之典祀也

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.08; Couvreur 1.440f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 291; Yishu 17:27.4b; tr. Legge 1.329;

tls:text.tls:line: and is not yet coffined,

sense.def: be encoffined; be put into a coffin

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.09; Couvreur 1.440f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 291; Yishu 17:27.4b; tr. Legge 1.329;

tls:text.tls:line: but when the officer of prayer has finished the cup presented to him, they stop.'

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.11; Couvreur 1.442f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 292; Yishu 17:27.7a; tr. Legge 1.329;

tls:text.tls:line: and from the removal of the coffin to the return (from the burial) and the (subsequent) wailing,

sense.def: return

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.11; Couvreur 1.442f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 292; Yishu 17:27.7a; tr. Legge 1.329;

tls:text.tls:line: they will follow the example of the son of Heaven.'

sense.def: treat as one's leader, follow as one's leader

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.12; Couvreur 1.443f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 292; Yishu 17:27.8a; tr. Legge 1.330;

tls:text.tls:line: but they are not able to go through with the rites,

sense.def: act out completely

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.12; Couvreur 1.443f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 292; Yishu 17:27.8a; tr. Legge 1.330;

tls:text.tls:line: and when asked what they were,

sense.def: may I ask about N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 於是乎有過時而弗除也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.19; Couvreur 1.445f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 294; Yishu 17:27.11a; tr. Legge 1.331;

tls:text.tls:line: In this case, even if the time be passed (for any observances which the private mourning woulc require), he will not put it off.

sense.def: then, thereupon; at that moment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.27; Couvreur 1.449f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 296; Yishu 17:27.18a; tr. Legge 1.334;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When a ruler goes across the boundary of his own state,

sense.def: general: border between any type of territory; border territory [the result of a systematic division of a large tract of land into fields (mǔ 畝)] [Jens]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.27; Couvreur 1.449f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 296; Yishu 17:27.18a; tr. Legge 1.334;

tls:text.tls:line: for the preparations against the three years' (mourning rites) for him.

sense.def: LIJI: ritual coffin made for the ruler on his accession to the throne and lacquered afresh every year; also used as a dignified general term for a coffin.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.28; Couvreur 1.449f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 296; Yishu 17:27.18a; tr. Legge 1.334;

tls:text.tls:line: will enter by the opening made in the wall of the apartment for the coffin,

sense.def: hole (in the wall)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.32; Couvreur 1.451f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 297; Yishu 17:27.22a; tr. Legge 1.335;

tls:text.tls:line: 'If the eldest son by the proper wife be (only) an officer,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.32; Couvreur 1.451f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 297; Yishu 17:27.22a; tr. Legge 1.335;

tls:text.tls:line: The officer of prayer will say,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.33; Couvreur 1.451f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 297f; Yishu 17:27.24a; tr. Legge 1.335;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. 'If the eldest son, now the head of the family, be residing,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.33; Couvreur 1.451f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 297f; Yishu 17:27.24a; tr. Legge 1.335;

tls:text.tls:line: the officer of prayer will say,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline:
『宗兄、
宗弟、
宗子在他國，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.35; Couvreur 1.451f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 298; Yishu 17:27.24a; tr. Legge 1.335;

tls:text.tls:line: "My honoured brother, the honoured son (of our father), being in another state,

sense.def: respected

tls:text.tls:srcline:
『宗兄、
宗弟、
宗子在他國，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.35; Couvreur 1.451f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 298; Yishu 17:27.24a; tr. Legge 1.335;

tls:text.tls:line: "My honoured brother, the honoured son (of our father), being in another state,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.36; Couvreur 1.453f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 299; Yishu 17:27.29a; tr. Legge 1.336;

tls:text.tls:line: 'If the eldest son have gone and is in another state,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.36; Couvreur 1.453f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 299; Yishu 17:27.29a; tr. Legge 1.336;

sense.def: may I ask

tls:text.tls:srcline:
若宗子死，
告於墓而后祭於家。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.37; Couvreur 1.453f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 299; Yishu 17:27.29a; tr. Legge 1.336;

tls:text.tls:line: he will announce the event at the grave, and after wards sacrifice in the house,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.37; Couvreur 1.453f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 299; Yishu 17:27.29a; tr. Legge 1.336;

tls:text.tls:line: This abstinence will cease after his death.'

sense.def: die; have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.40; Couvreur 1.454f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 299f; Yishu 17:27.31b; tr. Legge 1.337;

tls:text.tls:line: If there be no grandson,

sense.def: son's son; grandson

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.40; Couvreur 1.454f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 299f; Yishu 17:27.31b; tr. Legge 1.337;

tls:text.tls:line: In sacrificing to one who has died prematurely, there are only the satisfying offerings,

sense.def: somebody who died prematurely

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.40; Couvreur 1.454f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 299f; Yishu 17:27.31b; tr. Legge 1.337;

tls:text.tls:line: would be to treat him as if he had died prematurely.'

sense.def: to treat somebody (in the funeral rites) as if he had died prematurely

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.41; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: 'But to one who has died prematurely there is not made a complete sacrifice;

sense.def: sacrifice associating a deceased to his ancestor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.42; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When the oldest son, who would take his father's place, dies prematurely,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.42; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: there is a single bullock;

sense.def: single, not member of a whole set; isolated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.42; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: no stand with the heart and tounge,

sense.def: K: small sacrificial table on which heart and tongue of the victim were placed (LIJI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.42; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: no stand with the heart and tounge,

sense.def: small sacrificial table

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.43; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: In regard to all others who have died prematurely

sense.def: meet a tragic early death before the age of maturity (20); die early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.43; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: the sacrifice is offered to them in the house of the oldest son,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.43; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: the sacrifice is offered to them in the house of the oldest son,

sense.def: family home (of one family within a clan) 歸家 "return home" [standard gloss: 門之內]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.43; Couvreur 1.455f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 300; Yishu 17:27.32b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: with the vases in the chamber on the east.

sense.def: wing of a dwelling

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.44; Couvreur 1.457f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 301; Yishu 17:27.37b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: 'At a burial, when the bier has been drawn to the path (leading tot he place),

sense.def: path; way; road

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.44; Couvreur 1.457f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 301; Yishu 17:27.37b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: or not?'

sense.def: or ZGC: 尊秦乎，且尊齊乎？

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.44; Couvreur 1.457f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 301; Yishu 17:27.37b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: or not?'

sense.def: it is not so

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.45; Couvreur 1.457f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 301; Yishu 17:27.37b; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: and when we had got to the path,

sense.def: path; way; road

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.47; Couvreur 1.457f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 301; Yishu 17:27.37b-38a; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: At sundown he halts,

sense.def: sundown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.47; Couvreur 1.457f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 301; Yishu 17:27.37b-38a; tr. Legge 1.338;

tls:text.tls:line: At sundown he halts,

sense.def: set up one's army camp; stop for the night

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.51; Couvreur 1.460f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 303; Yishu 17:27.40b; tr. Legge 1.340;

tls:text.tls:line: should be buried in the garden in a brick grave,

sense.def: get buried NB: 而葬此

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.51; Couvreur 1.460f; Su1n Xïda4n 5.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 303; Yishu 17:27.40b; tr. Legge 1.340;

tls:text.tls:line: and carried thither on a contrivance serving the purpose of a carriage,

sense.def: contraption, mechanical device; triggering contraption; mechanical device

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.56; Couvreur 1.462; Su1n Xïda4n 5.101; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 304; Yishu 17:27.46a; tr. Legge 1.341;

tls:text.tls:line: or was it at first required by the officers (of the state)?'

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 07.02.58; Couvreur 1.462; Su1n Xïda4n 5.101; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 304; Yishu 17:27.47a; tr. Legge 1.342;

tls:text.tls:line: that duke Po-khin engaged once in such service, when there was occasion for it;

sense.def: 虢公鼓，祭公敦 Duke

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.01; Couvreur 1.464f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 307; Yishu 18:28.2a; tr. Legge 1.343;

tls:text.tls:line: When the cock first crowed he dressed himself,

sense.def: cock

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.01; Couvreur 1.464f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 307; Yishu 18:28.2a; tr. Legge 1.343;

tls:text.tls:line: and going to the outside of the bedroom,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.01; Couvreur 1.464f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 307; Yishu 18:28.2a; tr. Legge 1.343;

tls:text.tls:line: how the king was and if he were well.

sense.def: be in good form, be in good health

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.01; Couvreur 1.464f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 307; Yishu 18:28.2a; tr. Legge 1.343;

tls:text.tls:line: that he was well,

sense.def: be in good form, be in good health

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.02; Couvreur 1.464f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 307; Yishu 18:28.2a; tr. Legge 1.343;

tls:text.tls:line: At midday

sense.def: when it came to (a certain point in time) 及期"When it came to the appointed time"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.02; Couvreur 1.464f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 307; Yishu 18:28.2a; tr. Legge 1.343;

tls:text.tls:line: At midday

sense.def: on midday, at noon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.04; Couvreur 1.464f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 307; Yishu 18:28.2a-2b; tr. Legge 1.343;

tls:text.tls:line: on recieving the cook's assurance

sense.def: (Said by superior) [I hereby] approve [this]. All right! (Said by inferior) Yes!

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.05; Couvreur 1.465f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308; Yishu 18:28.4a; tr. Legge 1.344;
