tls:text.tls:line: 2. King Wu acted according to the example (of Wa(n)),

sense.def: treat the determinate object as a leader, follow the example of the determinate object

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.05; Couvreur 1.465f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308; Yishu 18:28.4a; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: When king Wa(n) took a meal,

sense.def: eat a meal; eat one's meals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.05; Couvreur 1.465f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308; Yishu 18:28.4a; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: and when king Wa(n) took a second,

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.05; Couvreur 1.465f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308; Yishu 18:28.4a; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: and when king Wa(n) took a second,

sense.def: eat a meal; eat one's meals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.07; Couvreur 1.466f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308f; Yishu 18:28.4b; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: Anciently they called a year ling.

sense.def: year of age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.07; Couvreur 1.466f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308f; Yishu 18:28.4b; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: The age is also called ling.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.07; Couvreur 1.466f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308f; Yishu 18:28.4b; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: King Wa(n) was 97 when he died,

sense.def: die

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.07; Couvreur 1.466f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 308f; Yishu 18:28.4b; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: and king Wu was 93.

sense.def: die

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.08; Couvreur 1.467f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.3f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 309; Yishu 18:28.7b-9b; tr. Legge 1.344;

tls:text.tls:line: He illustrated the rules for the behaviour of a young heir in his treatment of Po-khin,

sense.def: show; illustrate; set forth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.09; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: in autumn and winter that of the feather and flute:

sense.def: primitive short bamboo flute with three holes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.09; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: aided by the great assistants.

sense.def: (post-Han???) minor official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.09; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: aided by the great assistants.

sense.def: give generous support; (often said of Heaven) give succour to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.09; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: aided by the subdirectors,

sense.def: assistant official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.10; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a-10b; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: In spring they recited (the pieces), and in summer they played on the guitar,

sense.def: be given to regurgitating; given to the recital to texts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.10; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a-10b; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: In spring they recited (the pieces), and in summer they played on the guitar,

sense.def: play string instruments

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.10; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a-10b; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: In winter they read the book of History,

sense.def: read out, recite or at least mumble (usually prose); pronounce cf. even Jin Yong: 讀給他聽。 聽清客讀了，很感興味。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.10; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a-10b; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: Ceremonies were taught in the Hall of the Blind;

sense.def: OBI: ancestral temple; SHI: ancestral temple of the clan

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.10; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a-10b; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: the book in the upper school.

sense.def: the Book of Documents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.10; Couvreur 1.468f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.10a-10b; tr. Legge 1.345;

tls:text.tls:line: the book in the upper school.

sense.def: n: MENG: Zhou dynasty name for school

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.11; Couvreur 1.469f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.347;

tls:text.tls:line: begging them to speak (their wise councels)

sense.def: beg to be permitted to do something

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.11; Couvreur 1.469f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.18b-20a; tr. Legge 1.347;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. The Grand director of Music taught how to brandish tthe shield and axe.

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.12; Couvreur 1.469f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 310; Yishu 18:28.22a; tr. Legge 1.347;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. Whenever a pupil was sitting with the grand completer (of Instruction),

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.13; Couvreur 1.470f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311; Yishu 18:28.22b-24a; tr. Legge 1.347;

tls:text.tls:line: the offerings must be set forth to the earlier sages and the earlier teachers.

sense.def: the former sages

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.15; Couvreur 1.471f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311; Yishu 18:28.28a; tr. Legge 1.348;

tls:text.tls:line: The pupils might be advanced for their virtue,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.15; Couvreur 1.471f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311; Yishu 18:28.28a; tr. Legge 1.348;

tls:text.tls:line: or commende for something they had accomplished,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.15; Couvreur 1.471f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311; Yishu 18:28.28a; tr. Legge 1.348;

tls:text.tls:line: or distinguished for their eloquence.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.15; Couvreur 1.471f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311; Yishu 18:28.28a; tr. Legge 1.348;

tls:text.tls:line: Those who had studied minor arts were encouraged

sense.def: minor; detailed 曲禮 "detailed ritual rules"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.15; Couvreur 1.471f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311; Yishu 18:28.28a; tr. Legge 1.348;

tls:text.tls:line: Those who had studied minor arts were encouraged

sense.def: the fine arts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.17; Couvreur 1.471f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311; Yishu 18:28.31a; tr. Legge 1.348;

tls:text.tls:line: But there was no dancing and (consequently) no giving out of the spears and other things used in it.

sense.def: OBI 4: dance (for rain); generally: dance (also occasionally said of animals like cranes)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.18; Couvreur 1.472f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 311f; Yishu 18:28.33b; tr. Legge 1.349;

tls:text.tls:line: and the result was a peaceful serenity,

sense.def: be happy, pleased; causing pleasure 不懌 "be displeased"

tls:text.tls:srcline:
立大傅、
少傅以養之，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.19; Couvreur 1.472f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 312; Yishu 18:28.35a; tr. Legge 1.349;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. The Grand tutor and the assistant tutor were appointed for their training,

sense.def: grand tutor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.20; Couvreur 1.472f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 312; Yishu 18:28.35a-35b; tr. Legge 1.349;

tls:text.tls:line: The Grand tutor went before them,

sense.def: senior tutor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.20; Couvreur 1.472f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 312; Yishu 18:28.35a-35b; tr. Legge 1.349;

tls:text.tls:line: The Grand tutor went before them,

sense.def: grand tutor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.20; Couvreur 1.472f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 312; Yishu 18:28.35a-35b; tr. Legge 1.349;

tls:text.tls:line: and the assistant came after them.

sense.def: junior tutor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.21; Couvreur 1.472f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 312; Yishu 18:28.35b; tr. Legge 1.349;

tls:text.tls:line: and there were appointed the four aides and the three ducal ministers.

sense.def: assistant; helper; senior aide; most important minister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.22; Couvreur 1.474f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 312; Yishu 18:28.38a; tr. Legge 1.350;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. When we speak of 'a superior man' we intend chiefly his virtue.

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.22; Couvreur 1.474f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 312; Yishu 18:28.38a; tr. Legge 1.350;

tls:text.tls:line: the officers correct and order maintained in the state:

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.23; Couvreur 1.475f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.13f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 313; Yishu 18:28.39b; tr. Legge 1.351;

tls:text.tls:line: He (also) set forth the rules for a crown prince in (his dealing with) Po-khin,

sense.def: show; illustrate; set forth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.25; Couvreur 1.475f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 314; Yishu 18:28.40b; tr. Legge 1.351;

tls:text.tls:line: On this account the rules for a crown prince were exhibited in (the treatment of ) Po-khin,

sense.def: show; illustrate; set forth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.26; Couvreur 1.476f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 314; Yishu 18:28.42a; tr. Legge 1.352;

tls:text.tls:line: hereafter he will (be fit to) be the lord of all under the sky.

sense.def: unite under one's unified control; annex;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.29; Couvreur 1.478f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 314; Yishu 18:28.43a-43b; tr. Legge 1.353;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, while his father is alive, he is but a son;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.29; Couvreur 1.478f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 314; Yishu 18:28.43a-43b; tr. Legge 1.353;

tls:text.tls:line: and, while his ruler is alive, he may be called merely a mainister.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.29; Couvreur 1.478f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 314; Yishu 18:28.43a-43b; tr. Legge 1.353;

tls:text.tls:line: the state will be well governed.

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.01.30; Couvreur 1.478f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.14f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 314; Yishu 18:28.43b-44b; tr. Legge 1.353;

tls:text.tls:line: The saying,

sense.def: proverb; sometimes also attributed to a place 宋人語曰

tls:text.tls:srcline:
教之以孝弟、
睦友、
子愛，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.01; Couvreur 1.479f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 315; Yishu 18:29.1a; tr. Legge 1.353;

tls:text.tls:line: inculated on them filial piety and fraternal duty, harmony and friendship, and kindly consideration;

sense.def: harmonious friendship

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.02; Couvreur 1.479f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.15f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 315; Yishu 18:29.2b; tr. Legge 1.354;

tls:text.tls:line: but they were aranged accoridng to their age.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.06; Couvreur 1.4i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.8a; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: The cook acted as master of ceremonies.

sense.def: senior cook

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.06; Couvreur 1.4i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.8a; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: The cook acted as master of ceremonies.

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.06; Couvreur 1.4i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.8a; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler took place among his uncles and cousins according to age.

sense.def: be ranked

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.06; Couvreur 1.4i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.8a; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler took place among his uncles and cousins according to age.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.06; Couvreur 1.4i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.8a; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: Each generation of kindred took a lower palce as it was a degree removed from the parent-stem.

sense.def: from generation to generation; for generations on end

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.06; Couvreur 1.4i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.8a; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: Each generation of kindred took a lower palce as it was a degree removed from the parent-stem.

sense.def: descend>decline by the extent N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.08; Couvreur 1.4i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.14a-14b; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: had to be announced;

sense.def: make an announcement of a determinate case of death

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.08; Couvreur 1.4i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.14a-14b; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: and also their sacrifices during the period of mourning.

sense.def: conduct mourning sacrifice during the period of mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.08; Couvreur 1.4i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.14a-14b; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: and also their sacrifices during the period of mourning.

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥)).

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.09; Couvreur 1.4i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 316; Yishu 18:29.14b; tr. Legge 1.355;

tls:text.tls:line: leaving off and not leaving off the cap (in mourning).

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.10; Couvreur 1.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 318; Yishu 18:29.16a-16b; tr. Legge 1.356;

tls:text.tls:line: When the trial was concluded,

sense.def: litigation; criminal law case; trial; criminal procedure 獄決罪定

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.11; Couvreur 1.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 318; Yishu 18:29.16b; tr. Legge 1.356;

tls:text.tls:line: and the officer would say,

sense.def: the official in charge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.11; Couvreur 1.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 318; Yishu 18:29.16b; tr. Legge 1.356;

sense.def: the official in charge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.12; Couvreur 1.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 318; Yishu 18:29.16b; tr. Legge 1.356;

tls:text.tls:line: Still the ruler would send some one after him, and say

sense.def: pursue with friendly or at least peacefully competitive intentions

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.12; Couvreur 1.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 318; Yishu 18:29.16b; tr. Legge 1.356;

tls:text.tls:line: but grant forgiveness,'

sense.def: HF 4.2.95: to pardon (someone condemned to a severe form of punishment)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.12; Couvreur 1.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 318; Yishu 18:29.16b; tr. Legge 1.356;

tls:text.tls:line: to which there would be the reply,

sense.def: the official in charge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.14; Couvreur 1.486f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 319; Yishu 18:29.21a; tr. Legge 1.357;

tls:text.tls:line: That they took palces according to their age, even those amongthem of high rank,

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.16; Couvreur 1.486f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 319; Yishu 18:29.23b; tr. Legge 1.357;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. The ruler, when feasting with his kindred, took his place among them according to age,

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.18; Couvreur 1.486f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 319; Yishu 18:29.25a; tr. Legge 1.358;

tls:text.tls:line: and their death was also required to be announced,

sense.def: make an announcement of a determinate case of death

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.19; Couvreur 1.486f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 319; Yishu 18:29.25a; tr. Legge 1.358;

tls:text.tls:line: was the way taken to maintain harmony and friendliness.

sense.def: harmonious friendship

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.20; Couvreur 1.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 319; Yishu 18:29.25a; tr. Legge 1.358;

tls:text.tls:line: there was a constant model for the regions and states;

sense.def: the states of the empire

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.20; Couvreur 1.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 319; Yishu 18:29.25a; tr. Legge 1.358;

tls:text.tls:line: and when this model was maintained,

sense.def: the states of the empire

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.21; Couvreur 1.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 319; Yishu 18:29.26a; tr. Legge 1.359;

tls:text.tls:line: notwithstanding their kinship, they were not allowed to transgress with impunity, but the proper officers

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.23; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 320f; Yishu 18:29.27a; tr. Legge 1.359;

tls:text.tls:line: and ordered the proper officers to discharge their business,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.23; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 320f; Yishu 18:29.27a; tr. Legge 1.359;

tls:text.tls:line: and sacrificing to the former masters and former sages.

sense.def: lineage of earlier teachers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.23; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 320f; Yishu 18:29.27a; tr. Legge 1.359;

tls:text.tls:line: and sacrificing to the former masters and former sages.

sense.def: the former sages

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.24; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 320f; Yishu 18:29.27a; tr. Legge 1.359;

tls:text.tls:line: When they reported to him

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.25; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.360;

tls:text.tls:line: and immediately afterwards arranged the mats and places for the three (classes of the) old, and the five (classes of the) experienced, for all the aged (indeed who were present).

sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.25; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.360;

tls:text.tls:line: When the delicacies for the nourishment of the aged

sense.def: the elderly, the aged; an old man

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.25; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.360;

tls:text.tls:line: When the delicacies for the nourishment of the aged

sense.def: nurture, nourish, bring up, rear, take good care of, provide for; provide for the needs of; maintain, provide a maintenance allowance for, patronise; provide a mainenance allowance (of such-and-such an amount to non-children and children) (LY 2.7)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.25; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.360;

tls:text.tls:line: When the delicacies for the nourishment of the aged

sense.def: exquisite delicacies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.25; Couvreur 1.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.30a-31b; tr. Legge 1.360;

tls:text.tls:line: he caused the song to be raised (as a signal for the aged to come.)

sense.def: recitation of songs; drawn out emotional performance of songs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.28; Couvreur 1.492f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.35b; tr. Legge 1.361;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. The officers having announced that the music was over,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.30; Couvreur 1.492f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.36a-36b; tr. Legge 1.361;

tls:text.tls:line: Among them,

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.30; Couvreur 1.492f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 321; Yishu 18:29.36a-36b; tr. Legge 1.361;

tls:text.tls:line: so that it was impossible for any not to understand them.

sense.def: how? (idiomatic in 安得 "how can one get to?", 安敢"how would I dare to?")

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.31; Couvreur 1.494f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 322; Yishu 18:29.40a; tr. Legge 1.362;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Morning and evening he went to the outside of the door of the great chamber,

sense.def: Grand Chamber (in the ancestral temple, as opposed to the side chamber, the xiǎo qǐn 小寢)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.31; Couvreur 1.494f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 322; Yishu 18:29.40a; tr. Legge 1.362;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Morning and evening he went to the outside of the door of the great chamber,

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.31; Couvreur 1.494f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 322; Yishu 18:29.40a; tr. Legge 1.362;

tls:text.tls:line: wether his father was well, and how he was.

sense.def: be in good form, be in good health

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.31; Couvreur 1.494f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 322; Yishu 18:29.40a; tr. Legge 1.362;

tls:text.tls:line: that he was well,

sense.def: be in good form, be in good health

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 08.02.34; Couvreur 1.494f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 323; Yishu 18:29.40b; tr. Legge 1.362;

tls:text.tls:line: then he could not take a full meal.

sense.def: eat to one's heart's content; eat enough

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.01; Couvreur 1.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.2b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: and when i was over,

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.01; Couvreur 1.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.2b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: looking sad and sighing.

sense.def: with a deep sigh; mournfully

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.02; Couvreur 1.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.2b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: YenYen was by his side, and said to him,

sense.def: beside the contextually determinate N, =其側

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.02; Couvreur 1.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.2b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Master, what areyou sighing about?'

sense.def: you, sir, of noble character

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.02; Couvreur 1.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.2b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: the practice of the Grand course,

sense.def: HUAINAN: hero of the first order; hero

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.02; Couvreur 1.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.2b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: and the eminent men of the three dynasties; [I do not reach up to these/match these]

sense.def: reach up to, get to the level of; match

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.03; Couvreur 1.497f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.4b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: they chose men of talents, virtue and ability;

sense.def: pick out according to quality, select and appoint

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.03; Couvreur 1.497f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.4b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: their words were sincere, and what they cultivated was harmony.

sense.def: cultivate (one's person, the ancients etc); apply oneself to; train and exercise (troops); occasionally also with negative objects: LH 2 修詐 "cultivate fraudulence"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.03; Couvreur 1.497f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.4b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: their words were sincere, and what they cultivated was harmony.

sense.def: mutual respect and harmonious spirit

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.03; Couvreur 1.497f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.4b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: thus men did not love their parents only,

sense.def: treat as one's parents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.03; Couvreur 1.497f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.4b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: nor treat as children only their own sons.

sense.def: treat like a son; treat like one's children

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.04; Couvreur 1.497f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.4b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: but not wishing to keep them for their own gratification.

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.04; Couvreur 1.497f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325; Yishu 19:30.4b; tr. Legge 1.364;

tls:text.tls:line: but not exerting it (only) with a view to their own advantage.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.06; Couvreur 1.498f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 325f; Yishu 19:30.7a; tr. Legge 1.366;

tls:text.tls:line: People accumulate articles and exert their strength for their own advantage.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.08; Couvreur 1.498f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 326; Yishu 19:30.7b; tr. Legge 1.366;

tls:text.tls:line: Of these six great men

sense.def: distinguished man of superior character 此六君子者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.08; Couvreur 1.498f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 326; Yishu 19:30.7b; tr. Legge 1.366;

tls:text.tls:line: every one was very attentive to the rules of propriety,

sense.def: be diligent about, pay painstaking attention to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.09; Couvreur 1.498f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 326; Yishu 19:30.7b; tr. Legge 1.366;

tls:text.tls:line: and all regareded them as pests.

sense.def: major disaster; hardship; misfortune; calamity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.11; Couvreur 1.500f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 327; Yishu 19:30.11b; tr. Legge 1.367;

tls:text.tls:line: Propriety's neglect may well provoke

sense.def: if (often indistinguishable from AND - relative clause) GY: 王而飾之

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.18; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: In winter they lived in caves which they had excavated,

sense.def: caves as temporary dwellings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.18; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: but ate the fruits of plats and trees,

sense.def: eat; eat some of; eat up; feed on; live on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.18; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: drinking their blood,

sense.def: drink; drink from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.18; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: and swallowing (also) the hair and feathers.

sense.def: SHI 260: take in, eat (typically something undistinguished)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.19; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b-23b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: They toasted, grilled,

sense.def: SHI: roast whole without removing the fur, having wrapped the meat in mud

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.19; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b-23b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: They toasted, grilled,

sense.def: SHI: roast (animal) in the fire after removing the fur

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.19; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b-23b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: boiled, and roasted.

sense.def: boil

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.19; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b-23b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: boiled, and roasted.

sense.def: grill the contextually determinate object

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.19; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b-23b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: They produced must and sauces.

sense.def: sweet wine; must

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.19; Couvreur 1.504f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328; Yishu 19:30.22b-23b; tr. Legge 1.369;

tls:text.tls:line: They produced must and sauces.

sense.def: a kind of acid soy made of rice or millet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.21; Couvreur 1.505f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 328f; Yishu 19:30.25b; tr. Legge 1.370;

tls:text.tls:line: and the clear, in the court below.

sense.def: clear and unruffled 澄水

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.23; Couvreur 1.506f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 329; Yishu 19:30.33a; tr. Legge 1.371;

tls:text.tls:line: The bones with the flesh on them are sodden;

sense.def: meat on the bone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.01.25; Couvreur 1.506f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 329; Yishu 19:30.35a; tr. Legge 1.372;

tls:text.tls:line: This may be called the greatest omen of prosperity;

sense.def: auspicious memorial sacrifice; auspiciousness sacrifice in which one seeks (but does not necessarily get) a favourable response for a project

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.01; Couvreur 1.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331; Yishu 19:31.1a; tr. Legge 1.372;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Ah! Alas!

sense.def: alas

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.01; Couvreur 1.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331; Yishu 19:31.1a; tr. Legge 1.372;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Ah! Alas!

sense.def: alas for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.03; Couvreur 1.508f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331; Yishu 19:31.6b-8b; tr. Legge 1.373;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. For the words of prayer and blessing and those of benediction

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline:
藏於宗、
祝、巫、
史，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.03; Couvreur 1.508f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331; Yishu 19:31.6b-8b; tr. Legge 1.373;

tls:text.tls:line: to be kept hidden away by the officers of prayer of the ancestral temple, and the sorcerers and recorders,

sense.def: OBI: ancestral temple; SHI: ancestral temple of the clan

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.03; Couvreur 1.508f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331; Yishu 19:31.6b-8b; tr. Legge 1.373;

tls:text.tls:line: This may be called keeping a state in darkness.

sense.def: cause to be dark and uncivilised

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.03; Couvreur 1.508f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331; Yishu 19:31.6b-8b; tr. Legge 1.373;

tls:text.tls:line: - these things constitute 'a usurping ruler.'

sense.def: usurping

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.05; Couvreur 1.510f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331f; Yishu 19:31.11a; tr. Legge 1.374;

tls:text.tls:line: and one sustaining office under the head of a clan is called a servant.

sense.def: serve as an official; hold a public appointment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.05; Couvreur 1.510f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 331f; Yishu 19:31.11a; tr. Legge 1.374;

tls:text.tls:line: or to live promiscuously with his servants, taking place among them according to age:

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.07; Couvreur 1.510f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.14b; tr. Legge 1.375;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. Thus, when the son of Heaven goes to visit a feudal prince,

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.08; Couvreur 1.511f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.16a; tr. Legge 1.375;

tls:text.tls:line: It is by htem that he resolves what is doubtful and brings to light what is abstruse;

sense.def: decide (a matter); pass judgment on (a case)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.08; Couvreur 1.511f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.16a; tr. Legge 1.375;

tls:text.tls:line: It is by htem that he resolves what is doubtful and brings to light what is abstruse;

sense.def: what is doubtful; doubt; uncertainty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.08; Couvreur 1.511f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.16a; tr. Legge 1.375;

tls:text.tls:line: It is by htem that he resolves what is doubtful and brings to light what is abstruse;

sense.def: subtle motives; subtle beginnings of things; subtle points; what is subtle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.09; Couvreur 1.511f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.17b; tr. Legge 1.375;

tls:text.tls:line: and smaller ones begin pilfering.

sense.def: engage in stealing; start stealing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.11; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.19a; tr. Legge 1.376;

tls:text.tls:line: This uses a variety of ways in sending down the informations of Its will.

sense.def: send (figuratively) down

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.11; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.19a; tr. Legge 1.376;

tls:text.tls:line: As learned from the altars o the land, these are (receptivity and docility) imprated tothe earth.

sense.def: be sent down (do a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.11; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.19a; tr. Legge 1.376;

tls:text.tls:line: As learned from the ancestral temple, they are benevolence and righteousness.

sense.def: be sent down (do a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.11; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.19a; tr. Legge 1.376;

tls:text.tls:line: As learned from the altars of he hills and streams, they are movement and activity.

sense.def: be sent down (do a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.11; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.19a; tr. Legge 1.376;

tls:text.tls:line: as learned from the five sacrifices of the house, they are the statutes (of the various spirits).

sense.def: be sent down (do a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.12; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.23a; tr. Legge 1.377;

tls:text.tls:line: and stands side by side with spiritual beings,

sense.def: be juxtaposed with and treated as equal to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.12; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.23a; tr. Legge 1.377;

tls:text.tls:line: calling them to the happy exercise of that in which they find pleasure,

sense.def: play with and enjoy; deal flippantly with; play around with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.12; Couvreur 1.512f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.23a; tr. Legge 1.377;

tls:text.tls:line: he secured the success of the government of the people.

sense.def: the government of N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.15; Couvreur 1.514f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.27a; tr. Legge 1.378;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the people imitate the ruler, and we have their self-government;

sense.def: govern (oneself) properly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.15; Couvreur 1.514f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.27a; tr. Legge 1.378;

tls:text.tls:line: they nourish their ruler, and they find their security in doing so;

sense.def: be at happily comfortable with oneself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.15; Couvreur 1.514f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.27a; tr. Legge 1.378;

tls:text.tls:line: they nourish their ruler, and they find their security in doing so;

sense.def: make (oneself) feel at ease

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.15; Couvreur 1.514f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.27a; tr. Legge 1.378;

tls:text.tls:line: they serve the ruler, and find their distinction on doing so.

sense.def: make (oneself) famous

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.16; Couvreur 1.514f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 332; Yishu 19:31.29a-30b; tr. Legge 1.378;

tls:text.tls:line: for the ruler to die for its altars is to be regarded as right;

sense.def: our (one's) nation, national ancestral and moral heritage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. What are the feelings of men?

sense.def: human feelings (often definite: the human feelings); real ways of thinking (of a given person or persons); (sometimes general:) public opinion, (even:) public demand

tls:text.tls:srcline:
喜、怒、
哀、懼、
愛、惡、
欲，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: They are joy, anger, sadness, fear, love, disliking, and liking.

sense.def: joy, delight; delighting openly in people

tls:text.tls:srcline:
喜、怒、
哀、懼、
愛、惡、
欲，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: They are joy, anger, sadness, fear, love, disliking, and liking.

sense.def: anger

tls:text.tls:srcline:
喜、怒、
哀、懼、
愛、惡、
欲，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: They are joy, anger, sadness, fear, love, disliking, and liking.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:text.tls:srcline:
喜、怒、
哀、懼、
愛、惡、
欲，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: They are joy, anger, sadness, fear, love, disliking, and liking.

sense.def: fear

tls:text.tls:srcline:
喜、怒、
哀、懼、
愛、惡、
欲，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: They are joy, anger, sadness, fear, love, disliking, and liking.

sense.def: loving care; love; feelings of love; sollicitousness; active affection

tls:text.tls:srcline:
喜、怒、
哀、懼、
愛、惡、
欲，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: They are joy, anger, sadness, fear, love, disliking, and liking.

sense.def: hatred; dislikes (versus likes); bad feelings; hating people

tls:text.tls:srcline:
喜、怒、
哀、懼、
愛、惡、
欲，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.18; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: They are joy, anger, sadness, fear, love, disliking, and liking.

sense.def: desires; preferences; impulse

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: What are 'the things which men consider right?'

sense.def: what is right; rectitude; duty; moral principles; moral standards (of a society, of a group, or of an indiviudal); moral ideals, moral principles; duties, objective duty; just cause

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: Kindness on the part of the father,

sense.def: a father in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: Kindness on the part of the father,

sense.def: loving fondness, loving care, loving kindness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and filial duty on that of the son;

sense.def: a child in general (the reference often probably being primarily to sons)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and filial duty on that of the son;

sense.def: loving respect for one's parents and ancestors (see also VIRTUE)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: gentleness on the part of the elder brother,

sense.def: an eldest brother in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: gentleness on the part of the elder brother,

sense.def: decency, proper behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and obedience on that of the younger;

sense.def: fraternal love, devotion to one's eldest brother

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and obedience on that of the younger;

sense.def: a younger brother in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: righteousness on the part of the husband,

sense.def: a husband in general;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: righteousness on the part of the husband,

sense.def: rectitude; moral principle; moral principles; moral duty, moral rectitude; proper moral duties

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and submissiveness on that of the wife;

sense.def: a wife in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and submissiveness on that of the wife;

sense.def: obedience; ability to listen to advice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: kindness on the part of the elders,

sense.def: a senior in general; seniors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: kindness on the part of the elders,

sense.def: act(s) of public generosity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and deference on that of the juniors;

sense.def: obedience, proper subordination, subservience

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and loyalty on that of the minister;

sense.def: the minister in general, ministers in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.19; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33a-33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: and loyalty on that of the minister;

sense.def: commitment; devoted effort, duty of loyal devotion; trustiness; the doing of one's loyal best 臣德也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故聖人之所以治人七情，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.21; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.33b; tr. Legge 1.379;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, when a sage (ruler) would regulate the seven feelings of men,

sense.def: essential tendency, natural basic inclination 人有六情

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.22; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.35a; tr. Legge 1.380;

tls:text.tls:line: those which they greatly dislike

sense.def: death

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.22; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335; Yishu 19:31.35a; tr. Legge 1.380;

tls:text.tls:line: those which they greatly dislike

sense.def: distress

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.23; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335f; Yishu 19:31.35a; tr. Legge 1.380;

tls:text.tls:line: are the great elements in men's minds.

sense.def: psychological basis (see also FEELING); basic elements; basic point made; basic orientation; point of view, approach; basic motives

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.23; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335f; Yishu 19:31.35a; tr. Legge 1.380;

tls:text.tls:line: But men keep them hidden in their minds,

sense.def: hide away, hide away from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.23; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335f; Yishu 19:31.35a; tr. Legge 1.380;

tls:text.tls:line: where they cannot be fathomed or measured.

sense.def: fathomable 不測"unfathomable"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.02.23; Couvreur 1.516f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 335f; Yishu 19:31.35a; tr. Legge 1.380;

tls:text.tls:line: where they cannot be fathomed or measured.

sense.def: be assessed; be measured

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.01; Couvreur 1.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.1a; tr. Legge 1.380;

tls:text.tls:line: and the finest subtile matter of the five elements.

sense.def: be scintillating, brilliant; be exquisite, fine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.02; Couvreur 1.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.4a; tr. Legge 1.3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: which therefore keeps waxing for fifteen days

sense.def: be full; (of moon) wax

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.02; Couvreur 1.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.4a; tr. Legge 1.3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and waning for fifteen.

sense.def: (of moon:) wane

tls:text.tls:srcline:
五聲、
六律、
十二管，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.03; Couvreur 1.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.54f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.7a-19b; tr. Legge 1.3i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. The five notes of harmony, with their six upper musical accords, and the twelve pitch-tubes,

sense.def: tone

tls:text.tls:srcline:
食味、
別聲、
被色而生者也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.04; Couvreur 1.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.21a; tr. Legge 1.3i2;

tls:text.tls:line: He lives in the enjoyment of all falvours, the discrimination of all notes (of harmony), and the enrobing of all colours.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.05; Couvreur 1.522; Su1n Xïda4n 6.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.24a; tr. Legge 1.3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. Thus it was that when the sages would make rules (for men),

sense.def: natural rule as conceived as something things follow; model to follow as a guideline

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.06; Couvreur 1.522; Su1n Xïda4n 6.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.24a; tr. Legge 1.3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: the five elements as giving substance (to things),

sense.def: metaphysical agents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.06; Couvreur 1.522; Su1n Xïda4n 6.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.24a; tr. Legge 1.3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: the feelings of men as the field (to be cultivated),

sense.def: human feelings (often definite: the human feelings); real ways of thinking (of a given person or persons); (sometimes general:) public opinion, (even:) public demand

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.06; Couvreur 1.522; Su1n Xïda4n 6.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.24a; tr. Legge 1.3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: and the four intelligent creatures as domestic animals (to be reared).

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.08; Couvreur 1.523f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.27a; tr. Legge 1.3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The five elements being considered as giving substance (to things),

sense.def: metaphysical agents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.08; Couvreur 1.523f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.27a; tr. Legge 1.3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The four intelligent creatures [forms of intelligence] being made to become domestic animals,

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.03.09; Couvreur 1.524f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 336; Yishu 20:32.29b; tr. Legge 1.3i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. What are the four intelligen creatures?

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.03; Couvreur 1.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.2b; tr. Legge 1.385;

tls:text.tls:line: For the same reason, there are the officers of prayer in the ancestral temple;

sense.def: clan, the overall clan; the leading clan; clan as united by ancestral worship and respect for the living representative of the ancestors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.03; Couvreur 1.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.2b; tr. Legge 1.385;

tls:text.tls:line: For the same reason, there are the officers of prayer in the ancestral temple;

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.08; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.14a; tr. Legge 1.388;

tls:text.tls:line: they are (like) the union of the cuticle and cutis,

sense.def: skin tissue (versus the surface of the skin itself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.08; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.14a; tr. Legge 1.388;

tls:text.tls:line: and the binding together of the muscles nad bones in strengthening (the body).

sense.def: muscle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.08; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.14a; tr. Legge 1.388;

tls:text.tls:line: and the binding together of the muscles nad bones in strengthening (the body).

sense.def: human bones in the living body or as part of a skeleton

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.09; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.17a; tr. Legge 1.389;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man by (his use of them) becomes better and greater.

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.09; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.17a; tr. Legge 1.389;

tls:text.tls:line: The small men by his neglect of them becomes meaner and worse.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.10; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.18b; tr. Legge 1.389;

tls:text.tls:line: were the field (to be cultivated by) the sage kings.

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.10; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.18b; tr. Legge 1.389;

tls:text.tls:line: They fashioned the rules of ceremony to plough it.

sense.def: to plough (fig.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.10; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.18b; tr. Legge 1.389;

tls:text.tls:line: They set forth the principles of righteousness with which to plant it.

sense.def: lay the foundations of, "plant"; BUDDH: plant the seeds of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.10; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.18b; tr. Legge 1.389;

tls:text.tls:line: They instituted the lessons of the school to weed it.

sense.def: "weed"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.10; Couvreur 1.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 339; Yishu 20:33.18b; tr. Legge 1.389;

tls:text.tls:line: They made love the fundamental subject by which to gather all its fruits,

sense.def: gather (resentful forces)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.12; Couvreur 1.531f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.24b-26b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. Humanity

sense.def: the concept of human-heartedness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.13; Couvreur 1.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.27a-27b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: would be to plough a field without a share.

sense.def: ploughshare; ploughshare-type spade; plough

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.13; Couvreur 1.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.27a-27b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: would be to plough a field without a share.

sense.def: do agricultural work; to plough the fields

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.13; Couvreur 1.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.27a-27b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: would be to plough the ground and not sow the seed.

sense.def: do agricultural work; to plough the fields

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.13; Couvreur 1.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.27a-27b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: would be to plough the ground and not sow the seed.

sense.def: do the sowing, sow the fields

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.13; Couvreur 1.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.27a-27b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: would be to weed and not reap.

sense.def: to harvest grain, reap the harvest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.14; Couvreur 1.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.27b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: would be to reap, and not eat (the product).

sense.def: to harvest grain, reap the harvest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.15; Couvreur 1.533f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.29b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: the individual is in good condition.

sense.def: sleekness > good condition; prosperous state

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.15; Couvreur 1.533f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.29b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: when there is generous affection between father and son,

sense.def: comport oneself with earnestness and seriousness, be sturdy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.15; Couvreur 1.533f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.29b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: harmony between brothers,

sense.def: show mutual respect and a harmonious spirit

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.15; Couvreur 1.533f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.29b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: and happy union between husband and wife,

sense.def: be harmonious, be in harmonious good order; be concordant; be well balanced

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.15; Couvreur 1.533f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.29b; tr. Legge 1.390;

tls:text.tls:line: the family is in good condition.

sense.def: sleekness > good condition; prosperous state

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.18; Couvreur 1.533f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.32a; tr. Legge 1.391;

tls:text.tls:line: They would move together without error,

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.20; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341; Yishu 20:33.35a; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. The sage kings showed their sense of this state of harmony in the following way:

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.21; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341f; Yishu 20:33.35a-35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus it was that there were no plagues of flood, drought, or insects,

sense.def: insects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.21; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 341f; Yishu 20:33.35a-35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: earth did not grudge its treasures;

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:text.tls:srcline:
鳳皇、
麒麟皆在郊棷，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: Phenixes and Khi-lins were among the trees of the suburbs,

sense.def: phoenix; mythological bird

tls:text.tls:srcline:
鳳皇、
麒麟皆在郊棷，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: Phenixes and Khi-lins were among the trees of the suburbs,

sense.def: unicorn; a mythological beast

tls:text.tls:srcline:
鳳皇、
麒麟皆在郊棷，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: Phenixes and Khi-lins were among the trees of the suburbs,

sense.def: LIJI: marshland

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: tortoises and dragons in the ponds of the palaces,

sense.def: amphibious land tortoise, long-lived, the meat of which is edible and the shell of which is used in medicine; tortoise shell

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: tortoises and dragons in the ponds of the palaces,

sense.def: dragon[BUDDH: in the Buddhist context dragons (SANSKRIT nāga) are regarded as one of the eight kind of beings who protect the Buddhist teachings]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: tortoises and dragons in the ponds of the palaces,

sense.def: pool; pond

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: while the other birds and beasts

sense.def: other

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: could be seen at a glance in their nests and breeding places.

sense.def: looking down; fig. in respect to the lower in position (children, wife etc.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 09.04.22; Couvreur 1.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 342; Yishu 20:33.35b; tr. Legge 1.392;

tls:text.tls:line: All this resulted from no other cause

sense.def: And then in such a way; Since S2, then/therefore S1; Thus

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.01; Couvreur 1.538f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 345; Yishu 21:34.1b; tr. Legge 1.394;

tls:text.tls:line: what their outer coating are to bamboos,

sense.def: type of bamboo (used for making arrows)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.01; Couvreur 1.538f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 345; Yishu 21:34.1b; tr. Legge 1.394;

tls:text.tls:line: what their outer coating are to bamboos,

sense.def: rind of bamboo, bamboo husk

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故貫四時而不改柯易葉。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.02; Couvreur 1.538f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 345; Yishu 21:34.1b; tr. Legge 1.394;

tls:text.tls:line: They endure through all the four seasons, without altering a branch or changing a leaf.

sense.def: small branch larger than a twig but smaller than a main branch (about the size useful for making an axe-handle...)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.02; Couvreur 1.538f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 345; Yishu 21:34.1b; tr. Legge 1.394;

tls:text.tls:line: Men acknowledge and are affected by his goodness,

sense.def: all of the subjects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.06; Couvreur 1.540f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 346; Yishu 21:34.7b; tr. Legge 1.396;

tls:text.tls:line: is the size of the territory.

sense.def: relative size (of territory or cloth)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.06; Couvreur 1.540f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 346; Yishu 21:34.7b; tr. Legge 1.396;

tls:text.tls:line: The amount of the offerings

sense.def: relative abundance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.09; Couvreur 1.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 347; Yishu 21:34.9a; tr. Legge 1.397;

tls:text.tls:line: - these are to be judged of as natural duties.

sense.def: fundamental human relations; moral standards of social behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.10; Couvreur 1.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 347; Yishu 21:34.9a-9b; tr. Legge 1.397;

tls:text.tls:line: and the reciprocities of host and guest:

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.11; Couvreur 1.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 347; Yishu 21:34.11a; tr. Legge 1.397;

tls:text.tls:line: and consider their jade-tokens as the insignia of their rank,

sense.def: SHU, yaodian 18: auspicious insignia of rank

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.14; Couvreur 1.543f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 348; Yishu 21:34.13a; tr. Legge 1.398;

tls:text.tls:line: in a twofold coffin, with 4 plumes.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.15; Couvreur 1.543f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 348; Yishu 21:34.19a-19b; tr. Legge 1.398;

tls:text.tls:line: and he sacrificed to heaven with a single victim;

sense.def: single, not member of a whole set; isolated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.15; Couvreur 1.543f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 348; Yishu 21:34.19a-19b; tr. Legge 1.398;

tls:text.tls:line: fragrant spirits were used in libations,

sense.def: aromatic millet ale/wine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.15; Couvreur 1.543f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 348; Yishu 21:34.19a-19b; tr. Legge 1.398;

tls:text.tls:line: and there were no dishes on stands, either of wood or bamboo.

sense.def: sacrifice without wine and meat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.17; Couvreur 1.545f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 348; Yishu 21:34.19b; tr. Legge 1.398;

tls:text.tls:line: In sacrificing to spirits a single mat was used;

sense.def: single; single-layered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.22; Couvreur 1.547f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.28b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: In sacrificing, the highest reverence was not shown on the raised altar,

sense.def: build an altar, establish an altar

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.22; Couvreur 1.547f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.28b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: but on the ground beneath, which had been swept.

sense.def: to clean by sweeping

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. In others, ornament formed the mark.

sense.def: pattern; meaningful or aesthetic pattern; cultural patter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven wore his upper robe with the dragons figured on it;

sense.def: wear dragon-pattern hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: princes, the lower robe with the axes embroidered on it;

sense.def: wear brocade with axe-pattern

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: Great officers, their lower robe with the symbol of distinction;

sense.def: wear brocade with blue/green-and-black ceremonial embroidery with 亞 pattern

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: and other officers, the dark- coloured upper robe, and the lower one red.

sense.def: reddish dark; generally: dark

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: and other officers, the dark- coloured upper robe, and the lower one red.

sense.def: (primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: and other officers, the dark- coloured upper robe, and the lower one red.

sense.def: purple; light red; brown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.23; Couvreur 1.548f; Su1n Xïda4n 6.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.30b; tr. Legge 1.400;

tls:text.tls:line: and other officers, the dark- coloured upper robe, and the lower one red.

sense.def: SHI: lower garment (particularly those worn below the yī 衣 "upper clothes" 毛傳：在下曰裳)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.30; Couvreur 1.552f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.37b-38b; tr. Legge 1.402;

tls:text.tls:line: when a m an of rank uses a large victim in sacrifice,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.31; Couvreur 1.552f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.39b; tr. Legge 1.402;

tls:text.tls:line: and went to court in an (old) washed robe and cap:

sense.def: wash (clothes)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.01.31; Couvreur 1.552f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 349; Yishu 21:34.39b; tr. Legge 1.402;

tls:text.tls:line: and went to court in an (old) washed robe and cap:

sense.def: wash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.05; Couvreur 1.556f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 353; Yishu 21:35.4b; tr. Legge 1.405;

tls:text.tls:line: In such matters as colour, wether it should be white or dark,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.07; Couvreur 1.558f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 354; Yishu 21:35.7a; tr. Legge 1.406;

tls:text.tls:line: the sodden flesh, where the spirits are represented thrice;

sense.def: boiled meat (LI) (also read qián)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.08; Couvreur 1.558f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 354; Yishu 21:35.10a; tr. Legge 1.406;

tls:text.tls:line: Wothout these courtesies the interview would be too hurried and abrupt.

sense.def: press > be urgent

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.09; Couvreur 1.558f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 354f; Yishu 21:35.10a; tr. Legge 1.406;

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, the keeping the victims (for the altar of Heaven) for three months (in the stable);

sense.def: keep the determinate things tied up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.11; Couvreur 1.560f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 355; Yishu 21:35.12b; tr. Legge 1.408;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence there is no (need to be) calling attention to the demonstrations expressive of grief;

sense.def: pertaining to mourning 凶服，凶事"case of death"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.12; Couvreur 1.560f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 355f; Yishu 21:35.12b; tr. Legge 1.408;

tls:text.tls:line: and the honour expressed by that furnished with (small) bells;

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.15; Couvreur 1.561f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 356; Yishu 21:35.15b; tr. Legge 1.409;

tls:text.tls:line: that in old times, when the ancient kings instituted ceremonies,

sense.def: to institute, to set up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.16; Couvreur 1.561f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 356; Yishu 21:35.17b; tr. Legge 1.409;

tls:text.tls:line: They assembled the whole of them and solemnly adressed them.

sense.def: harangue, make a solemn announcement in front of (a crowd)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.18; Couvreur 1.561f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 356; Yishu 21:35.18b; tr. Legge 1.410;

tls:text.tls:line: and the cold and heat came each in its proper time,

sense.def: period of hot weather

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.19; Couvreur 1.564f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 357; Yishu 21:35.20a; tr. Legge 1.410;

tls:text.tls:line: there was the jar, with clouds and hills represented on it on the east,

sense.def: large bronze wine pot with a "wind and thunder" pattern on the outside

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.20; Couvreur 1.564f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 357; Yishu 21:35.20b; tr. Legge 1.410;

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler fills his cup from the jar with an elephant represented of it;

sense.def: ladle from (a wine vessel)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.20; Couvreur 1.564f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 357; Yishu 21:35.20b; tr. Legge 1.410;

tls:text.tls:line: his wife fills hers from that with clouds and hills.

sense.def: ladle from (a wine vessel)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.20; Couvreur 1.564f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 357; Yishu 21:35.20b; tr. Legge 1.410;

tls:text.tls:line: his wife fills hers from that with clouds and hills.

sense.def: large bronze wine pot with a "wind and thunder" pattern on the outside

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.20; Couvreur 1.564f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 357; Yishu 21:35.20b; tr. Legge 1.410;

tls:text.tls:line: his wife fills hers from that with clouds and hills.

sense.def: bronze wine vessel

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.23; Couvreur 1.566f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 358; Yishu 21:35.25a; tr. Legge 1.411;

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler himself cut up the victim,

sense.def: kill (a sacrificial animal) by cutting up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.25; Couvreur 1.567f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 359; Yishu 21:35.25a; tr. Legge 1.412;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Are they there?

sense.def: to be in; to be at; be conducted in/at (place or time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.27; Couvreur 1.568f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 359; Yishu 21:35.30b; tr. Legge 1.412;

tls:text.tls:line: were the richest tributes for the palate from all within the four seas and the nine provinces.

sense.def: the Nine Provinces (of China) [This is pervasively difficult to distinguish from the more universal and almost cosmographic notion of the Nine Continents.)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
丹、漆、
絲、纊、
竹、箭，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.29; Couvreur 1.568f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 359; Yishu 21:35.31a; tr. Legge 1.412;

tls:text.tls:line: The vermillion, the varnish, the silk, the floss, the large bamboos and the smaller for arrows

sense.def: cinnabar

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.30; Couvreur 1.569f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 359; Yishu 21:35.32b; tr. Legge 1.413;

tls:text.tls:line: In the use of gifts and offerings between host and guest,

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.32; Couvreur 1.570f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 360; Yishu 21:35.34b; tr. Legge 1.414;

tls:text.tls:line: A man who is right in heart and sincere

sense.def: characterised by trustiness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.34; Couvreur 1.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 360f; Yishu 21:35.37a; tr. Legge 1.415;

tls:text.tls:line: to commence his sacrifices before it was light,

sense.def: [CATCHING UP WITH THE TIME OF>] while there still was, while there still is 逮日 "while there still is the sun> towards the evening", 逮闇 "while it is still dark"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.34; Couvreur 1.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 360f; Yishu 21:35.37a; tr. Legge 1.415;

tls:text.tls:line: The officers limped and leaned, wherever they could, in performing their parts,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 10.02.35; Couvreur 1.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 361; Yishu 21:35.37a; tr. Legge 1.415;

tls:text.tls:line: For the services in the chamber, he had parties communicating outside and inside the door;

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.01; Couvreur 1.573f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 363; Yishu 22:36.2a; tr. Legge 1.416;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. At the border sacrifices a single victim was used,

sense.def: single, not member of a whole set; isolated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.02; Couvreur 1.573f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 363; Yishu 22:36.10a; tr. Legge 1.417;

tls:text.tls:line: the sodden flesh where spirits are presented thrice;

sense.def: boiled meat (LI) ) (also read qián)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.02; Couvreur 1.573f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 363; Yishu 22:36.10a; tr. Legge 1.417;

tls:text.tls:line: what was held in honour was the scent of the air.

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.02; Couvreur 1.573f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 363; Yishu 22:36.10a; tr. Legge 1.417;

tls:text.tls:line: what was held in honour was the scent of the air.

sense.def: air, atmosphere; ether

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.08; Couvreur 1.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 363f; Yishu 22:36.16b; tr. Legge 1.419;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. The number of tripods and meat-stands was odd, and that of the tall dishes of wood and bamboo was even;

sense.def: be odd (of numbers)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.08; Couvreur 1.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 363f; Yishu 22:36.16b; tr. Legge 1.419;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. The number of tripods and meat-stands was odd, and that of the tall dishes of wood and bamboo was even;

sense.def: be even (of numbers)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.08; Couvreur 1.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 363f; Yishu 22:36.16b; tr. Legge 1.419;

tls:text.tls:line: and it was thus that they maintained their intercourse with spiritual intelligences.

sense.def: interact with; cultivate contacts with (superiors, spirits); cultivate good diplomatic relations with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.12; Couvreur 1.578; Su1n Xïda4n 7.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 364; Yishu 22:36.21b; tr. Legge 1.420;

tls:text.tls:line: Then there were the skins of tigers and leaopards;

sense.def: leopard

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.12; Couvreur 1.578; Su1n Xïda4n 7.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 364; Yishu 22:36.21b; tr. Legge 1.420;
