tls:text.tls:line: Then there were the skins of tigers and leaopards;

sense.def: hide, skin or hide which originally had hair on it or was furry; whole skin of an animal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.14; Couvreur 1.579f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 365; Yishu 22:36.26a-26b; tr. Legge 1.420;

tls:text.tls:line: in the court of the other prince that he should seek a private audience?

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.15; Couvreur 1.579f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 365; Yishu 22:36.27b; tr. Legge 1.421;

tls:text.tls:line: no one could presume to be his host.

sense.def: a host, person ritually in charge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.18; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.31f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: The towered gateway with the screen across the path,

sense.def: LIJI: screen at the gate of a house

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.18; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.31f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: on the inner garment with its vermillion colour:

sense.def: like cinnabar

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.18; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.31f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: on the inner garment with its vermillion colour:

sense.def: middle; innermost; inner; under-(wear); inside

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.18; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.31f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: - theese were usurpations of the Great officers.

sense.def: offend against

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.18; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.31f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: and when the Great officers were strong,

sense.def: when

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.19; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: In this state (those officers) gave honour to one another as if they had been of (high) degree;

sense.def: in this place, here; sometimes: here and now

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.19; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: had interviews with one another and made offerings;

sense.def: FAYAN 1.6 meet and have an interview with (a gentleman); go to see and have an interview with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.19; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: had interviews with one another and made offerings;

sense.def: bribe

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.19; Couvreur 1.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.30b; tr. Legge 1.422;

tls:text.tls:line: and bribed one another for individual benefit:

sense.def: bribe; bribe (e.g. yǐ 以 "with" precious objects, workers, or fine horses); give bribes to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.22; Couvreur 1.5i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.39b; tr. Legge 1.423;

tls:text.tls:line: - that the ruler might not (have the trouble of) responding to him.

sense.def: object pronoun, resumptive, non-contrastive: oneself, himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.23; Couvreur 1.5i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.40b; tr. Legge 1.423;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. When the villagers were driving away pestilential influences,

sense.def: neighbour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.25; Couvreur 1.5i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.42a; tr. Legge 1.424;

tls:text.tls:line: What are we to think of it,

sense.def: beat, knock against (typically a drum, and ceremoniously) so as to produce a sound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.26; Couvreur 1.5i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 366; Yishu 22:36.43a; tr. Legge 1.424;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The repetition of the sacrifice next day inside the Khu gate;

sense.def: continue (something) and develop it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.30; Couvreur 1.588f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 368; Yishu 22:36.50a; tr. Legge 1.425;

tls:text.tls:line: the men of the state all engaged in it.

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.31; Couvreur 1.588f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 368f; Yishu 22:36.53b-54a; tr. Legge 1.426;

tls:text.tls:line: they set fire to (the grass and brushwood).

sense.def: the action of burning (grass and weeds on fields)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.01.31; Couvreur 1.588f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 368f; Yishu 22:36.53b-54a; tr. Legge 1.426;

tls:text.tls:line: Then the ruler in person addressed them in front of the She altar,

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.01; Couvreur 1.589f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.40f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.1a-1b; tr. Legge 1.426;

tls:text.tls:line: as the first thing (of his arrival at each) reared a pile of wood (and set fire to it).

sense.def: make an offering by burning firewood; rear a burning pile of wood

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.01; Couvreur 1.589f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.40f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.1a-1b; tr. Legge 1.426;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. At the (Great) border sacrifice,

sense.def: suburban sacrifice held in the southern suburbs in summer and in the northern suburbs in winter. GY: 凡禘郊祖宗報此五者國之典祀也

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.01; Couvreur 1.589f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.40f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.1a-1b; tr. Legge 1.426;

tls:text.tls:line: The sacrifice was offered on the ground which had been swept for the purpose;

sense.def: to clean by sweeping

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.03; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.42f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.7b; tr. Legge 1.428;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. When divining about the border sacrifice,

sense.def: suburban sacrifice held in the southern suburbs in summer and in the northern suburbs in winter. GY: 凡禘郊祖宗報此五者國之典祀也

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.03; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.42f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.7b; tr. Legge 1.428;

tls:text.tls:line: and listened himself to the declarations and orders which were delivered,

sense.def: military proclamation in front of soldiers or crowds; formal solemn harangue by ruler (not general) in front of his army

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.03; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.42f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.7b; tr. Legge 1.428;

tls:text.tls:line: and listened himself to the declarations and orders which were delivered,

sense.def: public general command with legal force

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.03; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.42f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.7b; tr. Legge 1.428;

tls:text.tls:line: - showing an example of recieving lessons and reproof.

sense.def: training; drill; moral instruction; instruction

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.03; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.42f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.7b; tr. Legge 1.428;

tls:text.tls:line: - showing an example of recieving lessons and reproof.

sense.def: remonstration

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.04; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.8a-11a; tr. Legge 1.429;

tls:text.tls:line: the king in his skin cap waits for the news that all is ready,

sense.def: made of hide or fur 皮冠 "leather hat"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.04; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.8a-11a; tr. Legge 1.429;

tls:text.tls:line: the king in his skin cap waits for the news that all is ready,

sense.def: fairly distinguished cap

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.04; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.8a-11a; tr. Legge 1.429;

tls:text.tls:line: nor venture to put on their mourning dress.

sense.def: by way of mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.04; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.8a-11a; tr. Legge 1.429;

tls:text.tls:line: nor venture to put on their mourning dress.

sense.def: dress ceremoniously in robes, be ceremoniously dressed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.04; Couvreur 1.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.8a-11a; tr. Legge 1.429;

tls:text.tls:line: (The people) watered and swept the road, and turned it up afresh with the spade;

sense.def: to clean by sweeping

tls:text.tls:srcline: 所以別事天神與人鬼也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.07; Couvreur 1.592f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.17a-18a; tr. Legge 1.430;

tls:text.tls:line: This was the way in which they made a distinction between the spirits of Heaven and the manes of man.

sense.def: separately

tls:text.tls:srcline: 所以別事天神與人鬼也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.07; Couvreur 1.592f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.17a-18a; tr. Legge 1.430;

tls:text.tls:line: This was the way in which they made a distinction between the spirits of Heaven and the manes of man.

sense.def: heavenly deity/spirit

tls:text.tls:srcline: 所以別事天神與人鬼也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.07; Couvreur 1.592f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.17a-18a; tr. Legge 1.430;

tls:text.tls:line: This was the way in which they made a distinction between the spirits of Heaven and the manes of man.

sense.def: the spirits; the divine creatures; divinity, spirit (typically belonging to or stemming from Heaven)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 所以別事天神與人鬼也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.07; Couvreur 1.592f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.17a-18a; tr. Legge 1.430;

tls:text.tls:line: This was the way in which they made a distinction between the spirits of Heaven and the manes of man.

sense.def: human ghost

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.07; Couvreur 1.592f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.17a-18a; tr. Legge 1.430;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. All things originate from Heaven;

sense.def: originate from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.07; Couvreur 1.592f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 370; Yishu 23:37.17a-18a; tr. Legge 1.430;

tls:text.tls:line: man originates from his (great) ancestor.

sense.def: originate from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.09; Couvreur 1.594f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.22b; tr. Legge 1.431;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In the ka sacrifice,

sense.def: sacrifice to Heaven and Earth organised by the Son of Heaven and the feudal lords, held in october (loan for 腊)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.09; Couvreur 1.594f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.22b; tr. Legge 1.431;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. In the ka sacrifice,

sense.def: sacrifice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.09; Couvreur 1.594f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.22b; tr. Legge 1.431;

tls:text.tls:line: They presented offerings (also) to the (representatives of the ancient investors of the overseers of the) husbandmen, and of the buildings marikng out the boundaries of the fields,

sense.def: path between fields (LI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.10; Couvreur 1.594f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.23a; tr. Legge 1.431;

tls:text.tls:line: The ancient wise men

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.10; Couvreur 1.594f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.23a; tr. Legge 1.431;

tls:text.tls:line: They met the (represerntatives of the) cats,

sense.def: (wild) cat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.10; Couvreur 1.594f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.46f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.23a; tr. Legge 1.431;

tls:text.tls:line: They offered also to (the andcient Inventors of) the dykes and water-channels;

sense.def: dike

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.11; Couvreur 1.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.24a-24b; tr. Legge 1.432;

tls:text.tls:line: Water in its channels flow,

sense.def: gully, brook; (often dirty) ditch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.11; Couvreur 1.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.24a-24b; tr. Legge 1.432;

tls:text.tls:line: Insects to keep quiet know;

sense.def: insects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.11; Couvreur 1.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.24a-24b; tr. Legge 1.432;

tls:text.tls:line: They presented their oferings in skin caps and white robes;

sense.def: made of hide or fur 皮冠 "leather hat"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.11; Couvreur 1.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.24a-24b; tr. Legge 1.432;

tls:text.tls:line: They presented their oferings in skin caps and white robes;

sense.def: fairly distinguished cap

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.13; Couvreur 1.597f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.28a; tr. Legge 1.433;

tls:text.tls:line: and to his department belonged (all such creatures) sent by the princes as tribute.

sense.def: tribute, offering

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.14; Couvreur 1.597f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.28a; tr. Legge 1.433;

tls:text.tls:line: 'He who loves hunting and women, Brings his state to ruin.'

sense.def: be especially fond of; find especially attractive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.14; Couvreur 1.597f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.28a; tr. Legge 1.433;

tls:text.tls:line: not such things as might be reaped and stored.

sense.def: kind of thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.15; Couvreur 1.597f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 372; Yishu 23:37.30a; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: - out of a careful regard to the resources of the people.

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.17; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 373; Yishu 23:37.33b; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The pickled contents of the ordinary dishes

sense.def: ordinary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.17; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 373; Yishu 23:37.33b; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The pickled contents of the ordinary dishes

sense.def: footed bowl for eating meat made of wood, also used in ritual contexts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.17; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 373; Yishu 23:37.33b; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The pickled contents of the ordinary dishes

sense.def: minced pickled meat sauce

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.17; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 373; Yishu 23:37.33b; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: the brine used with them

sense.def: brine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.17; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 373; Yishu 23:37.33b; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: contained productions of the land

sense.def: (one's own) product; product (of a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.18; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 373; Yishu 23:37.36a; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: It was in this way that they sought to have communion with the spirits;

sense.def: interact with; cultivate contacts with (superiors, spirits); cultivate good diplomatic relations with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.18; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 373; Yishu 23:37.36a; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: It was in this way that they sought to have communion with the spirits;

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.19; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.36a; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: but did not awaken a fondness for their use.

sense.def: be especialy preferred

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.19; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.36a; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: but did not awaken the emotion of delight.

sense.def: be delighted in

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.20; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.36a; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: The idea which leads to intercourse with spiritual Beings

sense.def: interact with; cultivate contacts with (superiors, spirits); cultivate good diplomatic relations with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.20; Couvreur 1.598f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.36a; tr. Legge 1.434;

tls:text.tls:line: The idea which leads to intercourse with spiritual Beings

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.21; Couvreur 1.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.37a; tr. Legge 1.435;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. Admirable are the spirits and sweet spirits,

sense.def: wines of all sorts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.21; Couvreur 1.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.37a; tr. Legge 1.435;

tls:text.tls:line: Beautiful as is the elegant emboidery on robes,

sense.def: patterns of all styles; decorated brocade of all sorts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.21; Couvreur 1.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.37a; tr. Legge 1.435;

tls:text.tls:line: Beautiful as is the elegant emboidery on robes,

sense.def: patterned brocade

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.22; Couvreur 1.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.37a; tr. Legge 1.435;

tls:text.tls:line: There is the beauty of the red varnish and carved border (of a carriage),

sense.def: cinnabar

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.23; Couvreur 1.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.37a-37b; tr. Legge 1.435;

tls:text.tls:line: In maintaining the intercourse with spiritual and intelligent Beings,

sense.def: interact with; cultivate contacts with (superiors, spirits); cultivate good diplomatic relations with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.23; Couvreur 1.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.37a-37b; tr. Legge 1.435;

tls:text.tls:line: In maintaining the intercourse with spiritual and intelligent Beings,

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.02.25; Couvreur 1.601f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 374; Yishu 23:37.41b; tr. Legge 1.437;

tls:text.tls:line: but that fitted with bells is preferred,

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.01; Couvreur 1.602f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 375; Yishu 23:38.1a; tr. Legge 1.437;

tls:text.tls:line: but the colour when it was used in fasting was dyed black.

sense.def: cause to be black; make black; dye black

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.07; Couvreur 1.605f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 376; Yishu 23:38.9b; tr. Legge 1.439;

tls:text.tls:line: as that is the business of the officers of prayer and the recorders.

sense.def: invocator. prayer-maker; communicator with the spirits; ritual recorder; ritual officer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.08; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.11a; tr. Legge 1.439;

tls:text.tls:line: thus those who are distant are brought together, and the separation (to be maintained between those who are of the same surname) is emphasised.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.09; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.11a-11b; tr. Legge 1.439;

tls:text.tls:line: Once mated with her husband,

sense.def: as soon as

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.10; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.13b; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: - according to the idea that regulates the relation between the strong and the weak (in all nature).

sense.def: firmness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.10; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.13b; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: - according to the idea that regulates the relation between the strong and the weak (in all nature).

sense.def: softness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.10; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.13b; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: It is according to this same idea

sense.def: take precedence over

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.10; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.13b; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: that heaven takes preceedence of earth,

sense.def: take precedence over

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.11; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.14a; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: When this distinction (between husband and wife) is exhibitd,

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.12; Couvreur 1.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.14a; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: The absence of such distinction and righteousness

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.13; Couvreur 1.608f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.15b; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: he preceeds,

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.14; Couvreur 1.608f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.15b; tr. Legge 1.440;

tls:text.tls:line: by his wisdom should (be able to) lead others.

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.16; Couvreur 1.608f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 377; Yishu 23:38.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.442;

tls:text.tls:line: the wife, after having washed her hands,

sense.def: wash one's hands

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.20; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.22b; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. Under the Yin, sound was thought most important.

sense.def: give high priority to; prize highly; give highest priority to; admire more than other things; show admiration for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.20; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.22b; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. Under the Yin, sound was thought most important.

sense.def: music; a piece of music

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.20; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.22b; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: Before there was any smell or flavour,

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.20; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.22b; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: Before there was any smell or flavour,

sense.def: smell and flavour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.20; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.22b; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: The noise of the music

sense.def: "the sounds of music", the sound of music including instrumental and vocal sound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.21; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.24a; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. Under the Kau, a pungent odour was thought most important.

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.21; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.24a; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. Under the Kau, a pungent odour was thought most important.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 11.03.21; Couvreur 1.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 379; Yishu 23:38.24a; tr. Legge 1.443;

tls:text.tls:line: partaking of he nature of the receeding influence, penetraes tothe deep springs below.

sense.def: deep

tls:text.tls:line: the fragrance

tls:text.tls:line: penetrates through all the building.

sense.def: get through to (a place); reach (a place)

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin, they first sought for them in the bright region;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

sense.def: host (BUDDH. one of the central terms in 臨濟's teaching, referring frequently to the teacher, as opposed to 賓 the 'disciple', but more generally also to the 'objectice', as opposed to the 'subjective')

tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.07; Couvreur 1.622f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.7a; tr. Legge 1.450;

tls:text.tls:line: with dates, chestnuts, sugar and honey, to sweeten their dishes;

sense.def: honeyskr. madhu (also transcribed with módù 摩度 )

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.07; Couvreur 1.622f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.7a; tr. Legge 1.450;

tls:text.tls:line: with dates, chestnuts, sugar and honey, to sweeten their dishes;

sense.def: make sweet and good to eat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. Youths who have not yet been capped, and maidens who have not yet assumed the hair-pin,

sense.def: wear a hairpin; be given a hairpin to wear when coming of age; see also AGE

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: at the first crowing of the cock,

sense.def: cock

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: at the first crowing of the cock,

sense.def: of non-humans and even inanimate objects, primarily of birds: sing; crow; make a sound; also of bovines: moo

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: should wash their hands, rinse their mouths,

sense.def: wash one's hands

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: should wash their hands, rinse their mouths,

sense.def: rinse the mouth; wash one's mouth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: They should all hang at their girdles the ornamental (bags of) perfume:

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: and as soon as it is daybreak, they should (go to) pay their respects (to their parents)

sense.def: at dusk

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.08; Couvreur 1.624f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.9a; tr. Legge 1.451;

tls:text.tls:line: and as soon as it is daybreak, they should (go to) pay their respects (to their parents)

sense.def: be bright; shining

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.10; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: at the first crowing of the cock,

sense.def: cock

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.10; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: should wash their hands and mouths,

sense.def: wash one's hands

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.10; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: should wash their hands and mouths,

sense.def: rinse the mouth; wash one's mouth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.10; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: and spread the mats,

sense.def: to spread; spread and give away

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.11; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: The children go earlier to bed, and get up later,

sense.def: small child, infant; young man

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.11; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: The children go earlier to bed, and get up later,

sense.def: in good time, at an early stage; at an earlier stage, at a sufficiently early stage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.11; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: The children go earlier to bed, and get up later,

sense.def: take a rest; go to rest; go to sleep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.11; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: The children go earlier to bed, and get up later,

sense.def: later than acceptable, too late

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.11; Couvreur 1.625; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 3i4; Yishu 24:39.10a; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: There is no fixed time for their meals.

sense.def: act of eating, meal; time of a meal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.12; Couvreur 1.625f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.10b; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: But at the dawn, the son will pay his respects,

sense.def: at dusk

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.13; Couvreur 1.626; Su1n Xïda4n 7.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.11b; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: When they wish to lie down,

sense.def: lie down and sleep; spend the night

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

sense.def: large, typically double-layered blanket to sleep under; coverlet

tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.13; Couvreur 1.626; Su1n Xïda4n 7.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.11b; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: hang up the coverlet, put the pillow in its case,

sense.def: put in a box

tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.13; Couvreur 1.626; Su1n Xïda4n 7.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.11b; tr. Legge 1.452;

tls:text.tls:line: hang up the coverlet, put the pillow in its case,

sense.def: pillow

sense.def: gather together; [roll up][CA]

衾、簟、
席、枕、
几不傳，

sense.def: walking stick, staff; stick

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.14; Couvreur 1.626f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.12b; tr. Legge 1.453;

sense.def: pleated straw shoe or sandal; generally: footwear

tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.14; Couvreur 1.626f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.12b; tr. Legge 1.453;

tls:text.tls:line: they should not presume to use their vessels for grain liquor, and water,

sense.def: magnificently decorated very large bronze or earthenware, sometimes even wooden wine beaker with round base (is illustrated CD 10.1385);

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.14; Couvreur 1.626f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.12b; tr. Legge 1.453;

sense.def: small container for water used for washing one's hand

tls:text.tls:line: The children should have the sweet, soft and unctuous things that are left.

sense.def: small child, infant; young man

噫、嚏、

tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.16; Couvreur 1.628; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14a-14b; tr. Legge 1.453;

tls:text.tls:line: they should not presume to eructate, sneeze, or cough, tok yawn or strech themselves, to stand on one foot, or to lean against anything, or to look askance.

sense.def: lean against things

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.16; Couvreur 1.628; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14a-14b; tr. Legge 1.453;

tls:text.tls:line: They should not dare to spit or snivel,

sense.def: spit on the ground

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.16; Couvreur 1.628; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14a-14b; tr. Legge 1.453;

tls:text.tls:line: They should not dare to spit or snivel,

sense.def: snivel, mucus from the nose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.17; Couvreur 1.628; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.453;

tls:text.tls:line: Of their private dress and coverlet, they should not display the inside.

sense.def: large, typically double-layered blanket to sleep under; coverlet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.18; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: 11... They should not allow the spittle or snivel of their parents to be seen.

sense.def: snivel, mucus from the nose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.18; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: They should ask leave to rinse away

sense.def: be dirty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.18; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: any dirt on their caps or girdles,

sense.def: rinse (clothes, with one's hands)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.18; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: with lye that has been prepared for the purpose;

sense.def: wash (clothes)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.18; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: any rent.

sense.def: twist into a rope-like object, or garland; thread (a needle)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.18; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: any rent.

sense.def: short needle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.19; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: they should prepare tepid water, and ask them to take a bath,

sense.def: bathwater; hot water; boiling water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.19; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: they should prepare tepid water, and ask them to take a bath,

sense.def: wash the whole body; bathe, take a bath

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.19; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: and every three days prepare water for them to wash their heads.

sense.def: wash one's body including one's hair in the context of taking a luxurious bath, sometimes with tāng 湯 "hot water"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.19; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: If in the meantime their faces appear dirty,

sense.def: be dirty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.19; Couvreur 1.628f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i2f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 386; Yishu 24:39.14b; tr. Legge 1.454;

tls:text.tls:line: they should prepare hot water, and ask them to wash them with it.

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.22; Couvreur 1.630f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.16b; tr. Legge 1.455;

sense.def: to cover; to keep covered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)

tls:text.tls:line: On the road,

sense.def: the roads, all kinds of roads

tls:text.tls:line: although they do not like the arrangement,

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.28; Couvreur 1.632f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.19a; tr. Legge 1.456;

tls:text.tls:line: (the son) should with bated breath, and bland aspect, and gentle voice, admonish him.

sense.def: happy; expressive of happiness; benign

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.28; Couvreur 1.632f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.19a; tr. Legge 1.456;

tls:text.tls:line: rather than allow him to commit an offence against anyone inthe neighbourhood or countryside,

sense.def: fall foul of, commit a crime against

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.29; Couvreur 1.632f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.19b; tr. Legge 1.456;

tls:text.tls:line: If the parent be angry and (more) displeased,

sense.def: be dissatisfied with the contextually determinate thing, have objections to it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.29; Couvreur 1.632f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.19b; tr. Legge 1.456;

tls:text.tls:line: and beat him till the blood flows,

sense.def: flog, whip, beat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.29; Couvreur 1.632f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.19b; tr. Legge 1.456;

tls:text.tls:line: and beat him till the blood flows,

sense.def: so as to cause blood flowing.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 父母有婢子若庶子庶孫，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.30; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.20b-21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. If parents have a boy born (to the father) by a handmaid, or the son or grandson of one of his concubines,

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.30; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.20b-21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: not allow their regard for him to decay so long as they live.

sense.def: die; have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.30; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.20b-21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: not allow their regard for him to decay so long as they live.

sense.def: until Xs death

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.31; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: nor should he lessen his attentions to her after their death.

sense.def: die; have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.32; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: If he very much approves of his wife,

sense.def: be on good terms with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.32; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: and his parents do not like her,

sense.def: be dissatisfied with the contextually determinate thing, have objections to it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.32; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: If he do not aprove of his wife,

sense.def: be on good terms with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.32; Couvreur 1.633f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.21a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: - without fail even to the end of her life.

sense.def: until Xs death

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.33; Couvreur 1.634; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.22a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. Although his parents be dead,

sense.def: have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.33; Couvreur 1.634; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.22a; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: when he is inclined to do what is not good,

sense.def: wickedness, bad actions; an action that is not good

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.34; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. When her father-in-law is dead, her mother-in-law takes the place of the old lady;

sense.def: father-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.34; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. When her father-in-law is dead, her mother-in-law takes the place of the old lady;

sense.def: take the senior position

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.34; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: but the wife of the eldest son, on all occasions of sacrificing and recieving guests,

sense.def: sacrificing of all kinds; the various required sacrifices

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.34; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: but the wife of the eldest son, on all occasions of sacrificing and recieving guests,

sense.def: treat as a guest of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.34; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: must ask her directions in every-thing,

sense.def: mother-in-law

tls:text.tls:srcline:
毋怠、
不友、
無禮於介婦。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.35; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388f; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: the should not be dilatiory, unfriendly, or unpolite to the wives of his brothers (for their not helping her).

sense.def: act in a friendly way

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.35; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388f; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: walking side by side withher,

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.35; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388f; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: or giving their orders in the same way,

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.35; Couvreur 1.635; Su1n Xïda4n 7.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 388f; Yishu 24:39.22b; tr. Legge 1.457;

tls:text.tls:line: or sitting inthe same position as she.

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. No daughter-in-law,

sense.def: "young wife in the house", regularly used to refer to the daughter in law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: without being told to go to her own apartment,

sense.def: personal (preference, room), private, non-official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: without being told to go to her own apartment,

sense.def: room; living quarters

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: she should ask leave from them.

sense.def: no matter whether large or small, in any case

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: a son and his wife should have no private goods,

sense.def: personal (preference, room), private, non-official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: nor animals,

sense.def: personal (preference, room), private, non-official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: nor vessels;

sense.def: personal (preference, room), private, non-official

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.36; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: they should not presume to borrow from,

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.37; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: as if she were recieving it afresh.

sense.def: newly, recently; lately; just

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.37; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: she will take it as if it were a second gift,

sense.def: to someone else, in favour of someone else; someone else; something else

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.37; Couvreur 1.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.25a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: she will take it as if it were a second gift,

sense.def: what is given to inferiors, gifts; benefits accruing to inferiors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.39; Couvreur 1.637f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.26b; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: should do reverent service to the son, who is the representative chief of the family and his wife.

sense.def: occupying the senior position of one's generation in the clan 宗子"heir", 宗婦 "wife of the heir, senior wife in the clan"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不敢以貴富入宗子之家，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.39; Couvreur 1.637f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.87f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.26b; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: they should not presume to enter his house with (the demonstrations of) their wealth and dignity.

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則不敢以入於宗子之門，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.40; Couvreur 1.637f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.26b-27a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: he will not presume to enter with it at his gate,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.40; Couvreur 1.637f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.26b-27a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: and present the better of them to his chief.

sense.def: be the worthiest in N; be a worthy on the scale of N, be a worthy of N-class (but contrast 古之賢者)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.40; Couvreur 1.637f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.26b-27a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: and present the better of them to his chief.

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.40; Couvreur 1.637f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 389; Yishu 24:39.26b-27a; tr. Legge 1.458;

tls:text.tls:line: He and his wife should together, after self-purification, reverently assist at his sacrifice in the ancestral temple.

sense.def: pay one's high and religious respects to (someone) as one's ancestor or as a revered spirit

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. Of grain food,

sense.def: cereal; staple foodstuff; grain/rice based foodstuffsgeneral: a meal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were millet, the glutinous rice, rice, maize,

sense.def: broomcorn millet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were millet, the glutinous rice, rice, maize,

sense.def: millet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were millet, the glutinous rice, rice, maize,

sense.def: fine rice; high quality rice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were millet, the glutinous rice, rice, maize,

sense.def: fine millet, high grade millet

tls:text.tls:srcline:
白黍，
黃粱，
稰，穛。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: the white millet, and the yellow maize, cut when ripe, or when green.

sense.def: ripe grain

tls:text.tls:srcline:
白黍，
黃粱，
稰，穛。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: the white millet, and the yellow maize, cut when ripe, or when green.

sense.def: prematurely cut grain; grain which is cut when still green

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: Of prepared meats,

sense.def: exquisite delicacy; exquisite meal

tls:text.tls:srcline:
膷，
臐，膮，
醢，牛炙。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were beef soup, mutton soup, pork soup, and roast beef;

sense.def: beef soup

tls:text.tls:srcline:
膷，
臐，膮，
醢，牛炙。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were beef soup, mutton soup, pork soup, and roast beef;

sense.def: broth; mutton soup; mutton or pork stew

tls:text.tls:srcline:
膷，
臐，膮，
醢，牛炙。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were beef soup, mutton soup, pork soup, and roast beef;

sense.def: pork soup

tls:text.tls:srcline:
膷，
臐，膮，
醢，牛炙。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: there were beef soup, mutton soup, pork soup, and roast beef;

sense.def: brine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: pickle, slices of beef, pickle and minced beef;

sense.def: pickled meat without many non-meat additions

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: pickle, slices of beef, pickle and minced beef;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: pickle, slices of beef, pickle and minced beef;

sense.def: minced meat, either raw or cooked

tls:text.tls:srcline:
醢，豕胾，
芥醬，
魚膾。

tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: pickle, slices of pork, mustard sauce, and minced fish;

sense.def: some kind of pickled sauce with meat on the bone; (also: pickles, spices)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
醢，豕胾，
芥醬，
魚膾。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.41; Couvreur 1.638f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.88f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.29a; tr. Legge 1.459;

tls:text.tls:line: pickle, slices of pork, mustard sauce, and minced fish;

sense.def: minced meat, either raw or cooked

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.43; Couvreur 1.640f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.31a; tr. Legge 1.460;

tls:text.tls:line: 22... For confections,

sense.def: meats; delicacies, fine food

tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.01.43; Couvreur 1.640f; Su1n Xïda4n 7.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 391; Yishu 24:39.31a; tr. Legge 1.460;

tls:text.tls:line: there were dried cakes, and rice-flour scones.

tls:text.tls:line: there were dried cakes, and rice-flour scones.

sense.def: cakes, delicacies[can also contain meat; in LIJI described as dumplings made by mixing beed, mutton and pork with rice][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: snail-juice and a condiment of the broad-leaved water-squash

sense.def: kind of vegetable; a kind of wild rice plant (zizania latifolia, Zizania caduciflora??)

tls:text.tls:line: the men of Yin, those of a substantial feast;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:text.tls:srcline:
樂其耳目，
安其寢處，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.14; Couvreur 1.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.6a-6b; tr. Legge 1.468;

tls:text.tls:line: they placed in it a small tripod, which was filled with fragrant herbs, and the slices of the creature which was being prepared.

sense.def: fragrance of grain

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.14; Couvreur 1.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.6a-6b; tr. Legge 1.468;

tls:text.tls:line: They took care that the hot water did not cover this tripod,

sense.def: bathwater; hot water; boiling water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.14; Couvreur 1.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.6a-6b; tr. Legge 1.468;

tls:text.tls:line: but kept up the fire without imtermission for three days and nights.

sense.def: to burn; to catch fire [also: keep up the fire; have on fire][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.15; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.8a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. For the Pounded Delicacy,

sense.def: exquisite delicacies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.15; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.8a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: after that they extracted all the nerves.

sense.def: remove, do away with, get rid of; try to drive away (ants); take off

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.15; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.8a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: after that they extracted all the nerves.

sense.def: loan: nerve, sinew

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.15; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.8a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: (Next), when it was sufficiently cooked, they brought it (from the pan),

sense.def: be well cooked, be well done

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.15; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.8a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: took away the outside crust,

sense.def: scurf (of fried meat,etc.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.15; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.8a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: and softened the meat (by the addition of pickle and vinegar).

sense.def: soften up; make soft; soften

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.16; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.9b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: they took the beef, which was required to be that of a newly killed animal,

sense.def: newly, recently; lately; just

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.16; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.9b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: they took the beef, which was required to be that of a newly killed animal,

sense.def: get killed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.16; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.9b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: and cut it into small pieces,

sense.def: LIJI 8.4: cut into pieces; carve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.16; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.9b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: It was then steeped from one morning to the next

sense.def: to soak; steep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.16; Couvreur 1.657f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.9b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: when it was eaten with pickle, vinegar, or the juice of prunes.

sense.def: drink made of prune juice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.17; Couvreur 1.658; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.9b-10a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: they beat the beef

sense.def: beat with a stick (e.g. meat to make it tender)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.17; Couvreur 1.658; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397; Yishu 24:40.9b-10a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: It could be eaten thus when dried.

sense.def: get dry

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.18; Couvreur 1.658; Su1n Xïda4n 8.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 397f; Yishu 24:40.10a; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: If they wished it dry,

sense.def: dried up; parched

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.19; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.10b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. For the (Soup) Balls,

sense.def: rice gruel with meat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.19; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.10b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: they took equal quantities of beef, mutton, and pork,

sense.def: water buffalo; ox Keightley: @Foot{I translate oracle-bone @i{niu} 牛 as "bovine"; theinscriptions do not generally indicate whether the bovinesinvolved were female or male.}

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.19; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.10b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: they took equal quantities of beef, mutton, and pork,

sense.def: goat; sheep; CHECK THE CULTURAL HISTORY OF THE GOAT IN ANCIENT CHINA.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.19; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.10b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: they took equal quantities of beef, mutton, and pork,

sense.def: OBI 5: wild boar; pig

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.19; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.10b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: and cut them small.

sense.def: LIJI 8.4: cut into pieces; carve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.19; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.10b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: and formed cakes or balls, which they fried.

sense.def: cakes, delicacies[can also contain meat; in LIJI described as dumplings made by mixing beed, mutton and pork with rice][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.19; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.10b; tr. Legge 1.469;

tls:text.tls:line: and formed cakes or balls, which they fried.

sense.def: boil (water)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. For the Liver and Fat,

sense.def: liver

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. For the Liver and Fat,

sense.def: fat surrounding the intestines; fat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: and wrapped it round with its own fat.

sense.def: to cover; to wrap

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: They then wet it and roasted it,

sense.def: (cause to be wet>) wetten, moisten, make wet; soak (for cleaning)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: They then wet it and roasted it,

sense.def: grill, rost on a spear after removing the fur

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. They took the grains of rice and steeped them in prepared rice-water.

sense.def: soak, wash LIJI

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: They then cut small the fat from a wolf's breast,

sense.def: a little bit; a little; on a small scale [into small pieces][CA] maybe should be moved to LITTLE??

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.20; Couvreur 1.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 398; Yishu 24:40.11a-12a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: They then cut small the fat from a wolf's breast,

sense.def: LIJI 8.4: cut into pieces; carve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.21; Couvreur 1.659f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.14a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: commence with a careful attention to the relations between husband and wife.

sense.def: begin with, start from; start out by V-ing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.21; Couvreur 1.659f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.14a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: commence with a careful attention to the relations between husband and wife.

sense.def: pay diligent attention to, pay close attention to; be carefully attentive to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.21; Couvreur 1.659f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.14a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: commence with a careful attention to the relations between husband and wife.

sense.def: marital relations

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.21; Couvreur 1.659f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.14a; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: guarded by porter and eunuch.

sense.def: eunuch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.22; Couvreur 1.660; Su1n Xïda4n 8.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.14b; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: nor to put anything in his boxes or satchels;

sense.def: ZZ: small box made of bamboo; YTL: small box (e.g.for valuables, or for books)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.22; Couvreur 1.660; Su1n Xïda4n 8.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.14b; tr. Legge 1.470;

tls:text.tls:line: nor to put anything in his boxes or satchels;

sense.def: ZZ 631: four-cornered oblong bamboo basket with cover for the carrying of clothes (examples found in Mawangdui)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.24; Couvreur 1.661; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.15a; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: rinsed her mouth and washed,

sense.def: rinse the mouth; wash one's mouth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.24; Couvreur 1.661; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 399; Yishu 24:40.15a; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: rinsed her mouth and washed,

sense.def: wash one's head (?)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.26; Couvreur 1.662; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.18a; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: where the husband sent twice a day to ask for her.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.26; Couvreur 1.662; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.18a; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: If he were moved and came himself to ask about her,

sense.def: oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro+V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.27; Couvreur 1.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.471;

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.27; Couvreur 1.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: 16... If the child were a boy, a bow was placed on the left of the door;

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.27; Couvreur 1.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: 16... If the child were a boy, a bow was placed on the left of the door;

sense.def: boy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.27; Couvreur 1.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: 16... If the child were a boy, a bow was placed on the left of the door;

sense.def: wooden bow; general name for a bow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.27; Couvreur 1.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.7f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.18a-18b; tr. Legge 1.471;

tls:text.tls:line: and if a girl, a handkerchief on the right of it.

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.28; Couvreur 1.663; Su1n Xïda4n 8.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.20b; tr. Legge 1.472;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. When a son and heir to the ruler of a state was born,

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.30; Couvreur 1.664; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.23a; tr. Legge 1.472;

tls:text.tls:line: a day was chosen;

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.30; Couvreur 1.664; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.23a; tr. Legge 1.472;

tls:text.tls:line: for the son of an officer, a single pig;

sense.def: single, not member of a whole set; isolated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.31; Couvreur 1.664f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.24a; tr. Legge 1.472;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. A special apartment was prepared in the palace for the child,

sense.def: small child, infant; young man

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.31; Couvreur 1.664f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.24a; tr. Legge 1.472;

tls:text.tls:line: and from all the concubines and other likely individuals

sense.def: choose (between or among...)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.31; Couvreur 1.664f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.24a; tr. Legge 1.472;

tls:text.tls:line: there was sought one distinguished for her generosity of mind, her gentle kindness,

sense.def: tolerance and generosity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.31; Couvreur 1.664f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.24a; tr. Legge 1.472;

tls:text.tls:line: there was sought one distinguished for her generosity of mind, her gentle kindness,

sense.def: loving and caring generosity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.32; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.25b; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: a day was chosen for shaving off the hair of the child, excepting certain portions,

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.32; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.25b; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: - the horn-like tufts of a boy, and the circlet on the crown for a girl.

sense.def: boy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.32; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.25b; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: - the horn-like tufts of a boy, and the circlet on the crown for a girl.

sense.def: girl (On analogy with 男 one might be tempted to take this to be a case of n[adN], i.e. short for 女人. But this seems curiously unnatural.)待考

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.32; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400; Yishu 24:40.25b; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: If they were of noble families, they were both in full dress.

sense.def: clothes; garment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: all rinsed their mouths and washed their heads.

sense.def: rinse the mouth; wash one's mouth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: all rinsed their mouths and washed their heads.

sense.def: wash one's head (?)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: Husband and wife rose early,

sense.def: generally: early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: Husband and wife rose early,

sense.def: get up, rise; get active

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: bathed and dressed

sense.def: wash one's body including one's hair in the context of taking a luxurious bath, sometimes with tāng 湯 "hot water"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: bathed and dressed

sense.def: wash the whole body; bathe, take a bath

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: The wife with the boy in her arms came forth from her room

sense.def: embrace; carry in one's arms, carry along in one's arms; hold in one's arms

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: The wife with the boy in her arms came forth from her room

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.33; Couvreur 1.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 400f; Yishu 24:40.25b-26a; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: The wife with the boy in her arms came forth from her room

sense.def: non-main roomBUDDH: cell

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.34; Couvreur 1.666f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.27b; tr. Legge 1.473;

tls:text.tls:line: reverently to present you to the child!'

sense.def: small child, infant; young man

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.36; Couvreur 1.666f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.28b; tr. Legge 1.474;

tls:text.tls:line: A record was made to the effect -

sense.def: to V as follows: S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.37; Couvreur 1.666f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.28b; tr. Legge 1.474;

tls:text.tls:line: who made out two copies of it.

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.38; Couvreur 1.668f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.30a; tr. Legge 1.474;

tls:text.tls:line: 23. When an heir-son has been born,

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.39; Couvreur 1.668f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.32a; tr. Legge 1.474;

tls:text.tls:line: The other observances were as before,

sense.def: follow the example (constituted by something); follow as a duty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.42; Couvreur 1.670; Su1n Xïda4n 8.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.34b; tr. Legge 1.475;

tls:text.tls:line: When the son was born, at the end of three months,

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.42; Couvreur 1.670; Su1n Xïda4n 8.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.34b; tr. Legge 1.475;

tls:text.tls:line: he washed her mouth and feet, adjusted herself early in the morning

sense.def: rinse the mouth; wash one's mouth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.42; Couvreur 1.670; Su1n Xïda4n 8.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.34b; tr. Legge 1.475;

tls:text.tls:line: he washed her mouth and feet, adjusted herself early in the morning

sense.def: wash one's head (?)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.43; Couvreur 1.670f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.35b; tr. Legge 1.475;

tls:text.tls:line: 27. When the child of an inferior member of the ruler's harem was about to be born,

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.43; Couvreur 1.670f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.35b; tr. Legge 1.475;

tls:text.tls:line: an officer was employed to name them.

sense.def: cause to have a name> give a name to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.45; Couvreur 1.671f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 401; Yishu 24:40.37b-38a; tr. Legge 1.476;

tls:text.tls:line: 30. The nurse of the ruler's boy

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.47; Couvreur 1.672f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.40b; tr. Legge 1.476;

tls:text.tls:line: a boy (was taught to) respond boldly and clearly; a girl, submissively and low.

sense.def: boy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.47; Couvreur 1.672f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.40b; tr. Legge 1.476;

tls:text.tls:line: The former was fitted with a girdle of leather;

sense.def: large belt; leather belt; belt with a pouch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.47; Couvreur 1.672f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.40b; tr. Legge 1.476;

tls:text.tls:line: the latter, with one of silk.

sense.def: girl (On analogy with 男 one might be tempted to take this to be a case of n[adN], i.e. short for 女人. But this seems curiously unnatural.)待考

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.47; Couvreur 1.672f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.40b; tr. Legge 1.476;

tls:text.tls:line: the latter, with one of silk.

sense.def: large belt; leather belt; belt with a pouch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.48; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: boys and girls did not occupy the same mat

sense.def: boy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.48; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: boys and girls did not occupy the same mat

sense.def: girl (On analogy with 男 one might be tempted to take this to be a case of n[adN], i.e. short for 女人. But this seems curiously unnatural.)待考

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.48; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: when going out or coming in at a gate or door, and going to their mats to eat and drink,

sense.def: any door

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.49; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: He learned the (different classes of) characters and calculation;

sense.def: the art of writing; the writing system

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.49; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: He learned the (different classes of) characters and calculation;

sense.def: arithmetics; calculation of an amount; calculation of the relevant advantages

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.49; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: he did not wear his jacket or trousers of silk;

sense.def: ZHUANG: long-sleeved jacket

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.49; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: he did not wear his jacket or trousers of silk;

sense.def: trousers (typically without crotch in early China, until Han times)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.49; Couvreur 1.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.41b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: in his manners he followed his early lessons;

sense.def: follow the example (constituted by something); follow as a duty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.51; Couvreur 1.674f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.43b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: and attended sedulously to filial and fraternal duties.

sense.def: earnestly; sedulously

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.52; Couvreur 1.674f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.45b; tr. Legge 1.478;

tls:text.tls:line: He was deferential to his friends, having regar to the aims (which they displayed).

sense.def: [my] friend, person of similar ideals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
