tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.55; Couvreur 1.675f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.48a; tr. Legge 1.479;

tls:text.tls:line: 37. At fifteen, she assumed the hair-pin;

sense.def: [put on a hairpin as sign of maturity >][CA] (of girls) ca. 15 years of age [LIJI age of 20][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.55; Couvreur 1.675f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.48a; tr. Legge 1.479;

tls:text.tls:line: If there were the betrothal rites, she became a wife;

sense.def: main wife of a contextually determinate person; someone's main wife; one's main wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 12.02.55; Couvreur 1.675f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 404; Yishu 24:40.48a; tr. Legge 1.479;

tls:text.tls:line: and if she went without them, a concubine.

sense.def: concubine

tls:text.tls:srcline: 玄端而朝日於東門之外，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.01; Couvreur 1.677f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.2b-9a; tr. Legge 2.1;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. When saluting the appearance of the sun outside the eastern gate, he wore the dark-coloured square-cut robes;

sense.def: two-wing (main) gate; main gate

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.01; Couvreur 1.677f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.2b-9a; tr. Legge 2.1;

tls:text.tls:line: he caused the left leaf of the door to be shut,

sense.def: close (door)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.01; Couvreur 1.677f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.2b-9a; tr. Legge 2.1;

tls:text.tls:line: he caused the left leaf of the door to be shut,

sense.def: left

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.01; Couvreur 1.677f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.2b-9a; tr. Legge 2.1;

tls:text.tls:line: he caused the left leaf of the door to be shut,

sense.def: leaf of a (two-leaf) door or gate; an outer gate with only one wing or leaf

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.02; Couvreur 1.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.10a-11b; tr. Legge 2.2;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. He wore the skin cap at the daily audience in the court,

sense.def: made of hide or fur 皮冠 "leather hat"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.02; Couvreur 1.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.10a-11b; tr. Legge 2.2;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. He wore the skin cap at the daily audience in the court,

sense.def: fairly distinguished cap

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.02; Couvreur 1.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.10a-11b; tr. Legge 2.2;

tls:text.tls:line: At midday he partook of what was left in the morning.

sense.def: on midday, at noon

tls:text.tls:srcline:
上水、
漿、酒、
醴、酏。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.02; Couvreur 1.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.10a-11b; tr. Legge 2.2;

tls:text.tls:line: - water, which was the principal; rice-water, spirits, must, and millet-water.

sense.def: sweet wine; must

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.03; Couvreur 1.679; Su1n Xïda4n 8.23f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.11b-14a; tr. Legge 2.2;

tls:text.tls:line: 5... His actions were written down by the recorder of the Left,

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.03; Couvreur 1.679; Su1n Xïda4n 8.23f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 407; Yishu 25:41.11b-14a; tr. Legge 2.2;

tls:text.tls:line: and his utterances by the recorder of the Right.

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.04; Couvreur 1.679f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 408; Yishu 25:41.15a; tr. Legge 2.3;

tls:text.tls:line: They wore the skin-cap, when listening tothe notification of the first day of the month in the Grand temples;

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:text.tls:srcline:
特牲，
三俎，
祭肺，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.06; Couvreur 1.680f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 408; Yishu 25:41.20b; tr. Legge 2.3;

tls:text.tls:line: There was a single animal, with three (other) dishes of meat, the lungs forming the sacrificial offering.

sense.def: single, not member of a whole set; isolated

tls:text.tls:srcline:
特牲，
三俎，
祭肺，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.06; Couvreur 1.680f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 408; Yishu 25:41.20b; tr. Legge 2.3;

tls:text.tls:line: There was a single animal, with three (other) dishes of meat, the lungs forming the sacrificial offering.

sense.def: lung

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.07; Couvreur 1.6i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 409; Yishu 25:41.23a; tr. Legge 2.4;

tls:text.tls:line: A superior man had his shambles and kitchen at a distance (from the) house;

sense.def: the kitchen 伊尹烹於庖廚 is NOT: "was cooking in this or that kitchen"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.11; Couvreur 1.6i3; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.31b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The regular place for a gentleman was exactly opposite the door, (facing the light).

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.11; Couvreur 1.6i3; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.31b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The regular place for a gentleman was exactly opposite the door, (facing the light).

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:text.tls:srcline:
若有疾風、
迅雷、
甚雨，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.11; Couvreur 1.6i3; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.31b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: When there came violent wind, or rapid thunder, or a great rain,

sense.def: fast, very quick; gusty (winds)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
若有疾風、
迅雷、
甚雨，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.11; Couvreur 1.6i3; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.31b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: When there came violent wind, or rapid thunder, or a great rain,

sense.def: very fast; very abrupt; gushy (wind)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.12; Couvreur 1.6i4; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.32a; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. He washed his hands five times a day.

sense.def: wash one's hands

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.12; Couvreur 1.6i4; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.32a; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: For his hair (when wet) he used a comb of white-grained wood,

sense.def: SHI: comb

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.12; Couvreur 1.6i4; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.32a; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: and an ivory comb for it when dry.

sense.def: hair; human hair on the head

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.12; Couvreur 1.6i4; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.32a; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: and an ivory comb for it when dry.

sense.def: be dried

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.12; Couvreur 1.6i4; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.32a; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: and an ivory comb for it when dry.

sense.def: made of ivory; more generally: sculpted 象箸

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.12; Couvreur 1.6i4; Su1n Xïda4n 8.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 410; Yishu 25:41.32a; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: and an ivory comb for it when dry.

sense.def: SHI: comb

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.14; Couvreur 1.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411; Yishu 25:41.33b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: his secretary brought him the ivory tablet,

sense.def: made of ivory; more generally: sculpted 象箸

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.14; Couvreur 1.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411; Yishu 25:41.33b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: his secretary brought him the ivory tablet,

sense.def: wooden tablet inscribed with duties at court; ritual 笏 were made of jade

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.14; Couvreur 1.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411; Yishu 25:41.33b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: on which were written his thoughts (which he should communicate to the ruler), and how he should respond to orders (that he might recieve).

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.14; Couvreur 1.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411; Yishu 25:41.33b; tr. Legge 2.5;

tls:text.tls:line: on which were written his thoughts (which he should communicate to the ruler), and how he should respond to orders (that he might recieve).

sense.def: thought; ability to think

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.16; Couvreur 1.685f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411; Yishu 25:41.35b; tr. Legge 2.6;

tls:text.tls:line: showing how they should give place to the son of Heaven.

sense.def: yield to, pass on the privilege to; yield precedence to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.16; Couvreur 1.685f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411; Yishu 25:41.35b; tr. Legge 2.6;

tls:text.tls:line: showing how they should give place to the son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.18; Couvreur 1.686; Su1n Xïda4n 8.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411f; Yishu 25:41.38b; tr. Legge 2.6;

tls:text.tls:line: If he were to read any writings

sense.def: read out, recite or at least mumble (usually prose); pronounce cf. even Jin Yong: 讀給他聽。 聽清客讀了，很感興味。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.18; Couvreur 1.686; Su1n Xïda4n 8.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 411f; Yishu 25:41.38b; tr. Legge 2.6;

tls:text.tls:line: If he were to read any writings

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.21; Couvreur 1.687f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.35f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 412; Yishu 25:41.42a-42b; tr. Legge 2.7;

tls:text.tls:line: till the ruler had touched the corners of his mouth with his hands and put them down.

sense.def: LIJI: add liquid to the rice before and eat it, probably at the end of a meal (see WANGLI: 1661)Rarely also: 'eat a warm meal'GY 08.01.03/287 優施出， 里克辟奠， 不飧而寑〔一〕。 ( 飧 : 熟食曰飧。 )

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.22; Couvreur 1.687f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 412; Yishu 25:41.43b; tr. Legge 2.7;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. Whenever pressed (by his host) to eat,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.01.24; Couvreur 1.688f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 412; Yishu 25:41.44b; tr. Legge 2.8;

tls:text.tls:line: The rule for a superior man in drinking (withthe ruler) was this:

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.02; Couvreur 1.690f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 413; Yishu 25:42.1b; tr. Legge 2.9;

tls:text.tls:line: The cap of black linen, with strings and tassels of various coloours,

sense.def: black

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.02; Couvreur 1.690f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 413; Yishu 25:42.1b; tr. Legge 2.9;

tls:text.tls:line: was used a thte capping of a feudal prince.

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.02; Couvreur 1.690f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 413; Yishu 25:42.1b; tr. Legge 2.9;

tls:text.tls:line: A dark-coloured cap with scarlet strings and tassels

sense.def: cinnabar red

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.02; Couvreur 1.690f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 413; Yishu 25:42.1b; tr. Legge 2.9;

tls:text.tls:line: was worn by a feudal lord, when fasting.

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.03; Couvreur 1.690f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 413; Yishu 25:42.4b; tr. Legge 2.9;

tls:text.tls:line: was worn after the sacrifice at the end of he year's mourning.

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.04; Couvreur 1.690f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.40f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 413; Yishu 25:42.7a-8b; tr. Legge 2.10;

tls:text.tls:line: When his parents were dead, (a son) did not have his hair dressed in tufts (anymore).

sense.def: have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.05; Couvreur 1.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 414; Yishu 25:42.9b; tr. Legge 2.10;

tls:text.tls:line: that dress a the waist was thrice the width of the sleeve;

sense.def: opening of the sleeve, front part of the sleeve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.05; Couvreur 1.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 414; Yishu 25:42.9b; tr. Legge 2.10;

tls:text.tls:line: at the bottom twice as wide as at the waist.

sense.def: waist

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.05; Couvreur 1.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 414; Yishu 25:42.9b; tr. Legge 2.10;

tls:text.tls:line: It was gathered in at each side (of the body).

sense.def: lapel, overlapping cloth over the chest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.05; Couvreur 1.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 414; Yishu 25:42.9b; tr. Legge 2.10;

tls:text.tls:line: It was gathered in at each side (of the body).

sense.def: side (of a road, roadside); one's side 身邊

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.05; Couvreur 1.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 414; Yishu 25:42.9b; tr. Legge 2.10;

tls:text.tls:line: The sleeve could be turned back to the elbow.

sense.def: sleeve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.05; Couvreur 1.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 414; Yishu 25:42.9b; tr. Legge 2.10;

tls:text.tls:line: The sleeve could be turned back to the elbow.

sense.def: elbow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.09; Couvreur 1.694f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 414f; Yishu 25:42.15b; tr. Legge 2.11;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When good order does not prevail in the states and clans,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.11; Couvreur 1.696; Su1n Xïda4n 8.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 415; Yishu 25:42.20a; tr. Legge 2.12;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. (Great and other) officers wore the fur of the blue fox, with sleeves of leopard's fur,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.16; Couvreur 1.698f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 417; Yishu 25:42.26b-28a; tr. Legge 2.13;

tls:text.tls:line: he used the tablet.

sense.def: wooden tablet inscribed with duties at court; ritual 笏 were made of jade

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.16; Couvreur 1.698f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 417; Yishu 25:42.26b-28a; tr. Legge 2.13;

tls:text.tls:line: he wrote it down on it.

sense.def: write the contextually determinate thing N1 down on the object N2

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.16; Couvreur 1.698f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 417; Yishu 25:42.26b-28a; tr. Legge 2.13;

tls:text.tls:line: he wrote it down on it.

sense.def: wooden tablet inscribed with duties at court; ritual 笏 were made of jade

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.16; Couvreur 1.698f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 417; Yishu 25:42.26b-28a; tr. Legge 2.13;

tls:text.tls:line: For all these purposes the tablet was used,

sense.def: wooden tablet inscribed with duties at court; ritual 笏 were made of jade

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.18; Couvreur 1.699f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 418; Yishu 25:42.29a-32a; tr. Legge 2.13;

tls:text.tls:line: and young lads, one of white silk.

sense.def: young man; juniors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.19; Couvreur 1.701f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.53f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 418; Yishu 25:42.32a; tr. Legge 2.14;

tls:text.tls:line: with the corners at the top rounded off;

sense.def: round off and make smooth; blunt (the sharpness of a blade)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.21; Couvreur 1.702f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 418; Yishu 25:42.37b; tr. Legge 2.14;

tls:text.tls:line: and this, when carried around the body a second time, appeared to be 4 inches.

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.22; Couvreur 1.702f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 418; Yishu 25:42.37b; tr. Legge 2.14;

tls:text.tls:line: there was no needlework.

sense.def: short needle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.23; Couvreur 1.702; Su1n Xïda4n 8.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 418; Yishu 25:42.39a; tr. Legge 2.15;

tls:text.tls:line: One who had recieved the second commission wore a scarlet cover, (also) with a black supporter for the pendant;

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.02.26; Couvreur 1.703f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.57f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 418; Yishu 25:42.44a-46b; tr. Legge 2.16;

tls:text.tls:line: (the wife of the Great officer of acount or baron), who had recieved two degrees, wore a robe of fresh yellow;

sense.def: of fresh yellow cloth (used in the queen's ritual garments)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.01; Couvreur 1.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.1a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. All (officers) in attendance on the ruler

sense.def: serve 侍於

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.01; Couvreur 1.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.1a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: let the sash hang down

sense.def: dangle, be suspended

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.01; Couvreur 1.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.1a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: Their chins projected like the eaves of a house, and their hands were clasped before them low down.

sense.def: have one's hands folded and hanging low in front of one's stomach> be inactive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.04; Couvreur 1.706f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.4a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: if he had occasion to speak of a Great officer who was dead,

sense.def: have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.04; Couvreur 1.706f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.4a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: he called him by his posthumous epithet, or by the designation of his maturity;

sense.def: posthumous name

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.04; Couvreur 1.706f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.4a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: he called him by his posthumous epithet, or by the designation of his maturity;

sense.def: or (between nominals)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.04; Couvreur 1.706f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.4a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: he called him by his posthumous epithet, or by the designation of his maturity;

sense.def: courtesy name

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.04; Couvreur 1.706f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.4a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: he mentioned officers by their name, and (other) Great officers by their designation.

sense.def: call by a certain name;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.04; Couvreur 1.706f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 420; Yishu 25:43.4a; tr. Legge 2.17;

tls:text.tls:line: he mentioned officers by their name, and (other) Great officers by their designation.

sense.def: use the courtesy name for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.07; Couvreur 1.707f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 421; Yishu 25:43.6b; tr. Legge 2.18;

tls:text.tls:line: heard the harmonious sounds of its bells;

sense.def: bell fixed on vehicles (eight of them), also on horse-bits, and on knives (!) which was supposed to make a sound like a luán-bird or phoenix

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.07; Couvreur 1.707f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 421; Yishu 25:43.6b; tr. Legge 2.18;

tls:text.tls:line: heard the harmonious sounds of its bells;

sense.def: bell on carriage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.07; Couvreur 1.707f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 421; Yishu 25:43.6b; tr. Legge 2.18;

tls:text.tls:line: heard the harmonious sounds of its bells;

sense.def: generally: sound made by any creature

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.09; Couvreur 1.708f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 421; Yishu 25:43.13b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: A man of rank was never without his penddant,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.09; Couvreur 1.708f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 421; Yishu 25:43.13b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: he regarded the pieces of jade as emblematic of the virtues (which he should cultivate).

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.09; Couvreur 1.708f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 421; Yishu 25:43.13b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: he regarded the pieces of jade as emblematic of the virtues (which he should cultivate).

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.11; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.15b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. According to the regulations for (the dress of) a lad,

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.11; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.15b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: his upper garment was of black linen, with an embroidered edging.

sense.def: embroidered [made of brocade][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.11; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.15b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: his upper garment was of black linen, with an embroidered edging.

sense.def: border of garment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.11; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.15b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: His sash was embroidered,

sense.def: embroidered piece of cloth dangling from the outer belt; sash; put on a sash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.11; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.15b; tr. Legge 2.19;

tls:text.tls:line: With such a string he bound up his hair. The embroidered border and strings were all red.

sense.def: bright and lively red

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.12; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 ; Yishu 25:43.16a; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: If they were running, they thrust them in the breast.

sense.def: embrace with one arm only, hold fondly in one's arms

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.13; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.16a; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. A lad did not wear furs, nor silk,

sense.def: wear a fur coat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.13; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.16a; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. A lad did not wear furs, nor silk,

sense.def: wear silk clothes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.13; Couvreur 1.710f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 422; Yishu 25:43.16a; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: nor the ornamental points on his shoes.

sense.def: ornamented shoe-lace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.14; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17a-17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: When the host himself put down the pickle (for the guest),

sense.def: 自V其N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.14; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17a-17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: the guest himself removed it.

sense.def: oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro+V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.15; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: When the members of a household ate together,

sense.def: "house of" 周室 "house of Zhōu"; household; members of the household 公室

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.15; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: not being hosts and guests,

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.15; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: one of them removed the dishes;

sense.def: ceremoniously remove sacrificial offerings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.15; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: and the same was done

sense.def: together 壹食之人 "in the case of several people eating together".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.15; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: when a company had eaten together.

sense.def: ceremoniously remove sacrificial offerings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.15; Couvreur 1.711f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 423; Yishu 25:43.17b; tr. Legge 2.20;

tls:text.tls:line: the women (of the house) did not remove the dishes.

sense.def: ceremoniously remove sacrificial offerings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.16; Couvreur 1.712; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 424; Yishu 25:43.18a; tr. Legge 2.21;

tls:text.tls:line: When others were eating fruits with a man of rank, they ate them after him;

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.16; Couvreur 1.712; Su1n Xïda4n 8.67f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 424; Yishu 25:43.18a; tr. Legge 2.21;

tls:text.tls:line: cooked viands they ate before him.

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.17; Couvreur 1.712f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 424; Yishu 25:43.19b; tr. Legge 2.21;

tls:text.tls:line: but finished the meal with the rice and liquid added to it, without eating any of the flesh.

sense.def: LIJI: add liquid to the rice before and eat it, probably at the end of a meal (see WANGLI: 1661)Rarely also: 'eat a warm meal'GY 08.01.03/287 優施出， 里克辟奠， 不飧而寑〔一〕。 ( 飧 : 熟食曰飧。 )

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.19; Couvreur 1.713f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.68f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 425; Yishu 25:43.20b-22a; tr. Legge 2.21;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. Whenever a gift was conferred on a man of rank,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.19; Couvreur 1.713f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.68f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 425; Yishu 25:43.20b-22a; tr. Legge 2.21;

tls:text.tls:line: nothing was given to a small man on the same day.

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.19; Couvreur 1.713f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.68f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 425; Yishu 25:43.20b-22a; tr. Legge 2.21;

tls:text.tls:line: nothing was given to a small man on the same day.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.21; Couvreur 1.715; Su1n Xïda4n 8.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 425; Yishu 25:43.23a-25a; tr. Legge 2.22;

tls:text.tls:line: lest the ruler should come to respond to him.

sense.def: object pronoun, resumptive, non-contrastive: oneself, himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.21; Couvreur 1.715; Su1n Xïda4n 8.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 425; Yishu 25:43.23a-25a; tr. Legge 2.22;

tls:text.tls:line: An officer, (doing the same), waited to recieve the ruler's acknowledgement (of his visit), and then retired,

sense.def: saying: yes! (reduplicated) rare

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.22; Couvreur 1.716f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 425; Yishu 25:43.25a; tr. Legge 2.22;

tls:text.tls:line: the latter bowed in recieving it;

sense.def: sometimes almost adverbially: with a bow; bowingly 拜送, 拜送，拜曰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.25; Couvreur 1.717f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 426; Yishu 25:43.27b; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: a son reverently obeyed it without any delay.

sense.def: agree to do the contextually determinate thing, say yes 唯而不諾

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.26; Couvreur 1.717f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 426f; Yishu 25:43.29a; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. When his father died, he could not (bear to) read his books;

sense.def: die; have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.26; Couvreur 1.717f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 426f; Yishu 25:43.29a; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. When his father died, he could not (bear to) read his books;

sense.def: read out, recite or at least mumble (usually prose); pronounce cf. even Jin Yong: 讀給他聽。 聽清客讀了，很感興味。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.26; Couvreur 1.717f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 426f; Yishu 25:43.29a; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. When his father died, he could not (bear to) read his books;

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.26; Couvreur 1.717f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 426f; Yishu 25:43.29a; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: When his mother died, he could not (bear to) drink from the cups and bowls that she had used;

sense.def: die; have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.28; Couvreur 1.718f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.73f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 428; Yishu 25:43.32a; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: In walking slowly, they all observed these rules.

sense.def: scuddle, scurry, shuffle forward (either fast or slowly)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.28; Couvreur 1.718f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.73f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 428; Yishu 25:43.32a; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: In walking rapidly, while they wished to push on (and did so),

sense.def: scuddle, scurry, shuffle forward (either fast or slowly)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.29; Couvreur 1.718f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 428; Yishu 25:43.32a; tr. Legge 2.24;

tls:text.tls:line: they raised their toes and trailed their heels,

sense.def: heel; also of shoe

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.30; Couvreur 1.720; Su1n Xïda4n 8.74f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 428; Yishu 25:43.34b-35a; tr. Legge 2.25;

tls:text.tls:line: 28. The carriage of a man of rank was easy, but somewhat slow;

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.31; Couvreur 1.720; Su1n Xïda4n 8.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 428f; Yishu 25:43.35a; tr. Legge 2.25;

tls:text.tls:line: and his head was carried upright.

sense.def: head (also of birds etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.32; Couvreur 1.721f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.75f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.36b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: the bearing and appearance (of the worshippers)

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.32; Couvreur 1.721f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.75f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.36b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: 30. When engaged with the mourning rites,

sense.def: proper dignified appearance, appropriate form, ritually correct form

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.32; Couvreur 1.721f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.75f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.36b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: they had a wearied look, and an aspect of sorrow and unrest.

sense.def: proper dignified appearance, appropriate form, ritually correct form

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.32; Couvreur 1.721f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.75f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.36b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: Their eyes looked startled and dim,

sense.def: proper dignified appearance, appropriate form, ritually correct form

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.32; Couvreur 1.721f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.75f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.36b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: and their speech was drawling and low.

sense.def: proper dignified appearance, appropriate form, ritually correct form

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.33; Couvreur 1.721f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.37a-37b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: his speech had a tone of decision and command;

sense.def: speech; way of talking

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.33; Couvreur 1.721f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.37a-37b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: His head rose straight up from the centre of the neck.

sense.def: head (also of birds etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.34; Couvreur 1.722; Su1n Xïda4n 8.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.39b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: 33. When they spoke of themselves,

sense.def: self-reference

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.34; Couvreur 1.722; Su1n Xïda4n 8.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429; Yishu 25:43.39b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: the style of the son of Heaven was, 'I, the One man;'

sense.def: I, the one person (the king)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.35; Couvreur 1.722; Su1n Xïda4n 8.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 429f; Yishu 25:43.39b; tr. Legge 2.26;

tls:text.tls:line: Among his equals and those below him,

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.36; Couvreur 1.723; Su1n Xïda4n 8.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 430; Yishu 25:43.41b; tr. Legge 2.27;

tls:text.tls:line: 34. A Great officer of hte highest grade (at his own court), called himself 'Your inferior minister;'

sense.def: I, lowly servant (Warring States)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.36; Couvreur 1.723; Su1n Xïda4n 8.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 430; Yishu 25:43.41b; tr. Legge 2.27;

tls:text.tls:line: The son and heir of a feudal prince (at his own court), called himself by name;

sense.def: call (oneself) by one's own name

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 13.03.37; Couvreur 1.723f; Su1n Xïda4n 8.78f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 430; Yishu 25:43.43a-44b; tr. Legge 2.27;

tls:text.tls:line: When a Great officer went on any mission,

sense.def: OBI: set out for; be on one's way; go along to; go to GUAN: 往之, 所往

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.06; Couvreur 1.728f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 433; Yishu 26:44.16a-16b; tr. Legge 2.31;

tls:text.tls:line: he made dried slices of (the flesh of) the marquis of Kwei, and used them in feasting the princes.

sense.def: ZGC: cut into slices

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.07; Couvreur 1.728f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 433; Yishu 26:44.16b; tr. Legge 2.31;

tls:text.tls:line: instituted ceremonies, made his instruments of music,

sense.def: to institute, to set up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.07; Couvreur 1.728f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 433; Yishu 26:44.16b; tr. Legge 2.31;

tls:text.tls:line: gave out his standard weights and measures,

sense.def: distribute; promulgate

tls:text.tls:srcline: 命魯公世世祀周公以天子之禮樂。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.08; Couvreur 1.728f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 433; Yishu 26:44.17b; tr. Legge 2.31;

tls:text.tls:line: He (also) gave charge that (the princes of) Lu, from generation to generation, should sacrifice to the duke of Kau with the ceremonies and music proper at a sacrifice by the son of Heaven.

sense.def: as in 宋公: Duke

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.12; Couvreur 1.729f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 433f; Yishu 26:44.30b; tr. Legge 2.32;

tls:text.tls:line: in their skin caps, and large white skirts gathered at the waist,

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.14; Couvreur 1.732f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 435; Yishu 26:44.34b; tr. Legge 2.33;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. The ruler, in his dragon-figured robe and cap with pendants, stood at the eastern steps;

sense.def: east-side staircase; staircase used by the emperor at his succession or to perform a sacrifice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.14; Couvreur 1.732f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 435; Yishu 26:44.34b; tr. Legge 2.33;

tls:text.tls:line: and his wife, in her head-dress and embroidered robe, stood in her room.

sense.def: (wearing) as head-dress

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.14; Couvreur 1.732f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 435; Yishu 26:44.34b; tr. Legge 2.33;

tls:text.tls:line: and his wife, in her head-dress and embroidered robe, stood in her room.

sense.def: (wearing) as an embroidered robe??

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.14; Couvreur 1.732f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 435; Yishu 26:44.34b; tr. Legge 2.33;

tls:text.tls:line: The ministers and Great officers assisted the ruler;

sense.def: give generous support; (often said of Heaven) give succour to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.14; Couvreur 1.732f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 435; Yishu 26:44.34b; tr. Legge 2.33;

tls:text.tls:line: their wives assisted his wife.

sense.def: give generous support; (often said of Heaven) give succour to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.18; Couvreur 1.734f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 437; Yishu 26:44.43b; tr. Legge 2.34;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. (The princes of Lu) had, as carriages,

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.20; Couvreur 1.734f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 437; Yishu 26:44.46a; tr. Legge 2.35;

tls:text.tls:line: the white horses of Yin,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.20; Couvreur 1.734f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 437; Yishu 26:44.46a; tr. Legge 2.35;

tls:text.tls:line: and the bay horses of Kau,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.20; Couvreur 1.734f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 437; Yishu 26:44.46a; tr. Legge 2.35;

tls:text.tls:line: with red manes.

sense.def: horse's mane

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.20; Couvreur 1.734f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 437; Yishu 26:44.46a; tr. Legge 2.35;

tls:text.tls:line: preferred black victims;

sense.def: admire and venerate as the best of alternatives; prefer, treasure most

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.24; Couvreur 1.735f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 438; Yishu 26:44.49b; tr. Legge 2.35;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. They had the earthen drum, with clods for the drumstick and the reed pipe,

sense.def: primitive short bamboo flute with three holes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.25; Couvreur 1.737f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 439; Yishu 26:44.51a; tr. Legge 2.36;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. The temple of the duke of Lu

sense.def: as in 宋公: Duke

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.29; Couvreur 1.738f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 440; Yishu 26:44.55b; tr. Legge 2.37;

tls:text.tls:line: that of Yin, with the high-toothed face-board;

sense.def: high and impressive, imposing (of mountains or buildings)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.29; Couvreur 1.738f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 440; Yishu 26:44.55b; tr. Legge 2.37;

tls:text.tls:line: that of Yin, with the high-toothed face-board;

sense.def: tooth-like shape; dented ornament

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 14.01.34; Couvreur 1.740f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 440; Yishu 26:44.61b-63a; tr. Legge 2.39;

tls:text.tls:line: (the flags) with their toothed edges of Yin;

sense.def: tooth-like shape; dented ornament

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.01; Couvreur 1.742f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 443; Yishu 27:45.2a; tr. Legge 2.40;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. When wearing the unhemmed sackcloth (for a father),

sense.def: wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.01; Couvreur 1.742f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 443; Yishu 27:45.2a; tr. Legge 2.40;

tls:text.tls:line: (A wife), when wearing the (one year's mourning) of sackcloth with the edges even,

sense.def: read zī zuī: respectfully wear mourning garments with hemmed sleeves LY 9.10

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.02; Couvreur 1.742f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 443; Yishu 27:45.5a-8a; tr. Legge 2.40;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. (Ordinarily) men wore the cap, and women the hair-pin;

sense.def: wear a hat; be of the age beyond 20 where one wears hats

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.02; Couvreur 1.742f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 443; Yishu 27:45.5a-8a; tr. Legge 2.40;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. (Ordinarily) men wore the cap, and women the hair-pin;

sense.def: wear a hairpin; be given a hairpin to wear when coming of age; see also AGE

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.02; Couvreur 1.742f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 443; Yishu 27:45.5a-8a; tr. Legge 2.40;

tls:text.tls:line: (in mourning) men wore the cincture, and women the same after the female fashion.

sense.def: wear mourning hat (of women); cincture

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.02; Couvreur 1.742f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 443; Yishu 27:45.5a-8a; tr. Legge 2.40;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. The dark-coloured staff

sense.def: dark-colored; black (LIJI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.02; Couvreur 1.742f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 443; Yishu 27:45.5a-8a; tr. Legge 2.40;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. The dark-coloured staff

sense.def: walking stick, staff; stick

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.05; Couvreur 1.744; Su1n Xïda4n 9.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 445; Yishu 27:45.11b; tr. Legge 2.42;

tls:text.tls:line: and the mourning for kindred thus came to an end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.06; Couvreur 1.745f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.25f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446; Yishu 27:45.16a; tr. Legge 2.42;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. At the great royal sacrifice to all ancestors, the first place was given to him from whom the founder of the line sprang,

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.07; Couvreur 1.745f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.26f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446; Yishu 27:45.19a-21b; tr. Legge 2.43;

tls:text.tls:line: his successor was its Honoured Head,

sense.def: senior person, Honoured Head

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.07; Couvreur 1.745f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.26f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446; Yishu 27:45.19a-21b; tr. Legge 2.43;

tls:text.tls:line: After five generations there was a change again of the Honoured Head;

sense.def: honoured early ancestor of the clan; early ancestor, ancestry; common pre-Buddhist: ancestral, pertaining to ancestral worship or clan worship

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.07; Couvreur 1.745f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.26f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446; Yishu 27:45.19a-21b; tr. Legge 2.43;

tls:text.tls:line: and the change of the Honoured Head low down (in it).

sense.def: honoured early ancestor of the clan; early ancestor, ancestry; common pre-Buddhist: ancestral, pertaining to ancestral worship or clan worship

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.08; Couvreur 1.747f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.28f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446; Yishu 27:45.22b-26a; tr. Legge 2.43;

tls:text.tls:line: showed that (only he was in the direct line from) the Honoured Head (of their branch of the family).

sense.def: senior person, Honoured Head

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.08; Couvreur 1.747f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.28f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446; Yishu 27:45.22b-26a; tr. Legge 2.43;

tls:text.tls:line: So, no son but he wore the (three years') unhemmed sackcloth for his eldest son,

sense.def: eldest 長子 "eldest son"; most senior

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.08; Couvreur 1.747f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.28f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446; Yishu 27:45.22b-26a; tr. Legge 2.43;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. None of the other sons sacrificed to a son (of his own) who had died prematurely, or one who had left no posterity.

sense.def: child by a mother other than one's main wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.09; Couvreur 1.747f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.29f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446f; Yishu 27:45.28b-29b; tr. Legge 2.44;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. Nor could any of them sacrifice to their father;

sense.def: child by a mother other than one's main wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.09; Couvreur 1.747f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.29f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446f; Yishu 27:45.28b-29b; tr. Legge 2.44;

tls:text.tls:line: showing that (the eldest son was the representative of) the Honoured Head.

sense.def: senior person, Honoured Head

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.09; Couvreur 1.747f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.29f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 446f; Yishu 27:45.28b-29b; tr. Legge 2.44;

tls:text.tls:line: and as the different tributes to amles and females;

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.14; Couvreur 1.750f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.33f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 448f; Yishu 27:45.37a-38b; tr. Legge 2.45;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. The mourning which lasted for two complete years

sense.def: [REPEATED>] double 再期 "double period (of mourning)"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.16; Couvreur 1.751f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 449; Yishu 27:45.40a-45a; tr. Legge 2.46;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. When the interment (for some reason) did not take place till after the three years, it was the rule that the two sacrifices (proper at the end of the first and second years) should then be offered.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.16; Couvreur 1.751f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 449; Yishu 27:45.40a-45a; tr. Legge 2.46;

tls:text.tls:line: If one who was merely a friend took that direction,

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.16; Couvreur 1.751f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 449; Yishu 27:45.40a-45a; tr. Legge 2.46;

tls:text.tls:line: he only offered the sacrifice of Repose, and that of the placing of the tablet in the shrine.

sense.def: sacrifice associating a deceased to his ancestor

tls:text.tls:srcline:
生不及祖父母、
諸父、
昆弟

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.17; Couvreur 1.752f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 449; Yishu 27:45.45b-48a; tr. Legge 2.47;

tls:text.tls:line: 25. When one had been born (in another state), and had no intercouirse with his grand-uncles and aunts, uncles and cousins,

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:text.tls:srcline:
為君之父母、
妻、長子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.17; Couvreur 1.752f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 449; Yishu 27:45.45b-48a; tr. Legge 2.47;

tls:text.tls:line: 26. If one did not (through being abroad) hear

sense.def: eldest 長子 "eldest son"; most senior

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.01.18; Couvreur 1.752f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 449; Yishu 27:45.48b; tr. Legge 2.47;

tls:text.tls:line: when he assumed mourning (on his return, for relatives who had died when he was a way), also put it on.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.01; Couvreur 1.754f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.37f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 451; Yishu 27:46.1a-3a; tr. Legge 2.48;

tls:text.tls:line: after the placing of the tablet of the deceased (in hte shrine of the grandfather),

sense.def: the placing of the spirit tablet of the deceased next to that of his ancestor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.02; Couvreur 1.754f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.38f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 452; Yishu 27:46.4a-5b; tr. Legge 2.49;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. For the ruler's eldest son a concubine wore the mourning

sense.def: eldest 長子 "eldest son"; most senior

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.03; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 453; Yishu 27:46.6a-8a; tr. Legge 2.49;

tls:text.tls:line: For a wife they wrote her surname, and her place among her sisters.

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.03; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 453; Yishu 27:46.6a-8a; tr. Legge 2.49;

tls:text.tls:line: If they did not know her surname, they wrote the branch-name of her family.

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.03; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 453; Yishu 27:46.6a-8a; tr. Legge 2.49;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. The girdle of dolychos cloth assumed with the unhemmed saccloth (at the end of the wailing), and the hempen girdle worn when one (first) put on the hemmed sackcloth (of one year's mourning), were of the same size.

sense.def: mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves (worn for a father)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.03; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 453; Yishu 27:46.6a-8a; tr. Legge 2.49;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. The girdle of dolychos cloth assumed with the unhemmed saccloth (at the end of the wailing), and the hempen girdle worn when one (first) put on the hemmed sackcloth (of one year's mourning), were of the same size.

sense.def: (compared/related etc) with

tls:text.tls:srcline: 齊衰之葛與大功之麻同，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.03; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 453; Yishu 27:46.6a-8a; tr. Legge 2.49;

tls:text.tls:line: The girdle of dolychos cloth assumed (as a change) in the hemmed sackcloth mourning, and that of hempen cloth at the (beginning of the) nine months' mourning, were of the same size.

sense.def: read zī zuī: sackclock mourning garment with hemmed sleeves

tls:text.tls:srcline: 齊衰之葛與大功之麻同，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.03; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.39f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 453; Yishu 27:46.6a-8a; tr. Legge 2.49;

tls:text.tls:line: The girdle of dolychos cloth assumed (as a change) in the hemmed sackcloth mourning, and that of hempen cloth at the (beginning of the) nine months' mourning, were of the same size.

sense.def: (compared/related etc) with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.04; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 454; Yishu 27:46.10b-11a; tr. Legge 2.50;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. When the mourning rites for both parents occurred at the same time,

sense.def: occur together

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.04; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 454; Yishu 27:46.10b-11a; tr. Legge 2.50;

tls:text.tls:line: the sacrifices of repose and of the enshrining of the tablet, for the (mother) who was buried first,

sense.def: sacrifice associating a deceased to his ancestor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.04; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 454; Yishu 27:46.10b-11a; tr. Legge 2.50;

tls:text.tls:line: was unhemmed and jagged.

sense.def: wear and make use of, dress up in; carry on one's side (a sword); wear on one's head (a hat); wear as embellishments of one's robe (jade)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.04; Couvreur 1.756f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 454; Yishu 27:46.10b-11a; tr. Legge 2.50;

tls:text.tls:line: was unhemmed and jagged.

sense.def: mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves (worn for a father)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.05; Couvreur 1.757f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.41f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 455f; Yishu 27:46.12a-14b; tr. Legge 2.50;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. When the tablet of an (ordinary) officer was placed in the shrine of (his grandfather who had been) a Great of ficer, the victim due to him (as an officer) was changed (for that due to a Great officer).

sense.def: place the spirit tablet of the deceased next to (that of his ancestor, or person of higher status, or indeed of any person with whom a relation is to be ritually asserted)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.07; Couvreur 1.759f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.43f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 457; Yishu 27:46.18a; tr. Legge 2.51;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. When people wailed for a friend,

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.07; Couvreur 1.759f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.43f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 457; Yishu 27:46.18a; tr. Legge 2.51;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. When one was buried in a grave already occupied, there was no divination about the site 8in the second case).

sense.def: bury husband and wife together

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.08; Couvreur 1.759f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.44f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 457; Yishu 27:46.18a-18b; tr. Legge 2.51;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. The tablet of an (ordinary) officer or of a Great officer sould not be placed in the shrine of a grandfather who had been the lord of a state;

sense.def: place the spirit tablet of the deceased next to (that of his ancestor, or person of higher status, or indeed of any person with whom a relation is to be ritually asserted)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.09; Couvreur 1.761f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 457f; Yishu 27:46.21b-26b; tr. Legge 2.52;

tls:text.tls:line: 21.The son who was the lineal Head of his new branch of the surname,

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.09; Couvreur 1.761f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 457f; Yishu 27:46.21b-26b; tr. Legge 2.52;

tls:text.tls:line: might act as son to that other;

sense.def: wife, concubine (the one among the wives/concubines which has given birth to a child of her husband)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.09; Couvreur 1.761f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.45f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 457f; Yishu 27:46.21b-26b; tr. Legge 2.52;

tls:text.tls:line: 23. The mourning went on to the than ceremony for a parent, a wife, and the eldest son.

sense.def: eldest 長子 "eldest son"; most senior

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.10; Couvreur 1.762f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 458; Yishu 27:46.29a; tr. Legge 2.52;

tls:text.tls:line: When a grown-up youth had been capped, (and died), though his death could not be considered premature;

sense.def: adult male

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.10; Couvreur 1.762f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 458; Yishu 27:46.29a; tr. Legge 2.52;

tls:text.tls:line: and a (young) wife, after having worn the hair-pin, (died), though neither could her death be said to be premature;

sense.def: a woman (married or definitely of marriagable age i.e. above 15)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.11; Couvreur 1.762f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.47f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 458; Yishu 27:46.30b-32b; tr. Legge 2.53;

tls:text.tls:line: 27.The hair-pin of the arrow-bamboo was worn by (an unmarried daughter for her father) to the end of the three years' mourning.

sense.def: hairpin which holds headgear

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.12; Couvreur 1.764f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 459; Yishu 27:46.33a-33b; tr. Legge 2.53;

tls:text.tls:line: They looked that everything was clean,

sense.def: the washing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.12; Couvreur 1.764f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 459; Yishu 27:46.33a-33b; tr. Legge 2.53;

tls:text.tls:line: The officers having announced that these were over, he resumed his staff,

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.13; Couvreur 1.764f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 459; Yishu 27:46.33b; tr. Legge 2.53;

tls:text.tls:line: At the sacrifice for the end of the second year,

sense.def: auspicious memorial sacrifice; auspiciousness sacrifice in which one seeks (but does not necessarily get) a favourable response for a project

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.15; Couvreur 1.765f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 460; Yishu 27:46.35b; tr. Legge 2.54;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler of that state recieved him and acted as the presiding mourner.

sense.def: a host, person ritually in charge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.15; Couvreur 1.765f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 460; Yishu 27:46.35b; tr. Legge 2.54;

tls:text.tls:line: The rule was

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.15; Couvreur 1.765f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 460; Yishu 27:46.35b; tr. Legge 2.54;

tls:text.tls:line: that he should wear the skin cap and the starched sackcloth.

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.16; Couvreur 1.765f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.51f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 461; Yishu 27:46.37b; tr. Legge 2.54;

tls:text.tls:line: he did not change the mourning which he might be wearing.

sense.def: emphatic or contrastive form of 其； (often but not always contrastive:) one's his/her/its own N; all of one's own (and special)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.17; Couvreur 1.766f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 461; Yishu 27:46.39b-40b; tr. Legge 2.55;

tls:text.tls:line: 34. In the mourning rites for a wife, at the sacrifices of repose and on the ending of the wailing,

sense.def: place the spirit tablet of the deceased next to (that of his ancestor, or person of higher status, or indeed of any person with whom a relation is to be ritually asserted)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.17; Couvreur 1.766f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 461; Yishu 27:46.39b-40b; tr. Legge 2.55;

tls:text.tls:line: her father-in-law presided.

sense.def: father-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.18; Couvreur 1.766f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 461; Yishu 27:46.40b-41b; tr. Legge 2.55;

tls:text.tls:line: of the Honoured Head of their branch of the surname that he could do so.

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.18; Couvreur 1.766f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.52f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 461; Yishu 27:46.40b-41b; tr. Legge 2.55;

tls:text.tls:line: the latter recieved him in the part of host, but without the mourning cincture.

sense.def: host; master of ceremonies; pater familias

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.20; Couvreur 1.769f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.54f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 463f; Yishu 27:46.43b-45a; tr. Legge 2.56;

tls:text.tls:line: the sash

sense.def: specifically: inner belt; any belt or sash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.20; Couvreur 1.769f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.54f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 463f; Yishu 27:46.43b-45a; tr. Legge 2.56;

tls:text.tls:line: was of bleached hemp from which the roots were not cut away.

sense.def: washed and bleached; used for washing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.20; Couvreur 1.769f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.54f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 463f; Yishu 27:46.43b-45a; tr. Legge 2.56;

tls:text.tls:line: 42. When the tablet of a wife was to be placed by that of her husband's grandmother,

sense.def: place the spirit tablet of the deceased next to (that of his ancestor, or person of higher status, or indeed of any person with whom a relation is to be ritually asserted)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.21; Couvreur 1.769f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 464; Yishu 27:46.46b-48b; tr. Legge 2.56;

tls:text.tls:line: if his tablet were placed (on his death) by that of his wife, the victim of the occasion was not changed (from that due to an ordianry officer).

sense.def: place the spirit tablet of the deceased next to (that of his ancestor, or person of higher status, or indeed of any person with whom a relation is to be ritually asserted)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.22; Couvreur 1.770; Su1n Xïda4n 9.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 465; Yishu 27:46.49a; tr. Legge 2.57;

tls:text.tls:line: 45. When a wife did not preside at the mourning rites and yet carried the staff,

sense.def: a host, person ritually in charge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.22; Couvreur 1.770; Su1n Xïda4n 9.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 465; Yishu 27:46.49a; tr. Legge 2.57;

tls:text.tls:line: it was when her mother-in-law was alive, and she did so for her husband.

sense.def: mother-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.22; Couvreur 1.770; Su1n Xïda4n 9.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 465; Yishu 27:46.49a; tr. Legge 2.57;

tls:text.tls:line: A daughter, who was still in her apartment unmarried, carried a staff for her father or mother.

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 15.02.26; Couvreur 1.773f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 466; Yishu 27:46.53b; tr. Legge 2.58;

tls:text.tls:line: descended to the court, and went through his leaping.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.01; Couvreur 1.775f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 469; Yishu 28:47.1b; tr. Legge 2.60;

tls:text.tls:line: The chief place was then given to him from whom the founder of the line sprang,

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.02; Couvreur 1.776f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 470; Yishu 28:47.7a; tr. Legge 2.60;

tls:text.tls:line: he reared a burning pile to God;

sense.def: make an offering by burning firewood; rear a burning pile of wood

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.04; Couvreur 1.776f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 470; Yishu 28:47.11a; tr. Legge 2.61;

tls:text.tls:line: and his every distinction was in harmony with what was proper and right.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.05; Couvreur 1.777f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 471; Yishu 28:47.14a; tr. Legge 2.61;

tls:text.tls:line: the second, the reward of merit;

sense.def: thank for in response

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.07; Couvreur 1.778f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 471; Yishu 28:47.16a; tr. Legge 2.61;

tls:text.tls:line: and distinctions in dress:

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.08; Couvreur 1.778f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 471; Yishu 28:47.16a-16b; tr. Legge 2.61;

tls:text.tls:line: the respect due to the aged,

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.09; Couvreur 1.779f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 472; Yishu 28:47.19a; tr. Legge 2.62;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. Members of the same surname were united together in the various ramifications of their kinship,

sense.def: clan, the overall clan; the leading clan; clan as united by ancestral worship and respect for the living representative of the ancestors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.09; Couvreur 1.779f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 472; Yishu 28:47.19a; tr. Legge 2.62;

tls:text.tls:line: the different positions of males and females were determined.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.12; Couvreur 1.779f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 473; Yishu 28:47.26b; tr. Legge 2.63;

tls:text.tls:line: 8 As the branch-surnames which arose seperated the members of hem from their relatives of a former time,

sense.def: to be distinguished; be held apart intellectually

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.12; Couvreur 1.779f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 473; Yishu 28:47.26b; tr. Legge 2.63;

tls:text.tls:line: But there was that original surname tying all the members together without distinction,

sense.def: bind together, tie together, link up; BUDDH: tie up and restrain from freely functioning (thinking)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.17; Couvreur 1.7i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.69f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.35b-37a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. Any son but the eldest, (though all sons of the wife proper), did not sacrifice to his grandfather,

sense.def: child by a mother other than one's main wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.17; Couvreur 1.7i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.69f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.35b-37a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: Nor could he wear mourning for his eldest son for three years,

sense.def: eldest son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.18; Couvreur 1.7i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.41a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: was the successor and representative of the other than the eldest son (who became the ancestor of a line);

sense.def: non-eldest son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.19; Couvreur 1.7i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.41a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: They honoured the Ancestor, and therefore they reverenced the Head.

sense.def: venerate, revere, show respect for; treat with demonstrative respect

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.19; Couvreur 1.7i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.41a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: They honoured the Ancestor, and therefore they reverenced the Head.

sense.def: senior person, Honoured Head

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.19; Couvreur 1.7i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.41a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: The reverence

sense.def: show respect for; show obedient unquestioning respect for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.19; Couvreur 1.7i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.41a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: The reverence

sense.def: senior person, Honoured Head

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.20; Couvreur 1.785f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 475; Yishu 28:47.44a; tr. Legge 2.65;

tls:text.tls:line: All these might exist in the instance of the son of the ruler of a state.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 16.01.24; Couvreur 1.787f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 477; Yishu 28:47.48b; tr. Legge 2.66;

tls:text.tls:line: and from these, in fine, came happiness and enjoyment:

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.01; Couvreur 2.1f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 479; Yishu 29:48.1b; tr. Legge 2.68;

tls:text.tls:line: When one wished to see for the first time another of character and position,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.03; Couvreur 2.1f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 480; Yishu 29:48.4a; tr. Legge 2.68;

tls:text.tls:line: if he were a youth,

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.04; Couvreur 2.2; Su1n Xïda4n 9.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 480; Yishu 29:48.4b; tr. Legge 2.69;

tls:text.tls:line: if a minister were presenting to him money or pieces of jade, or any other article,

sense.def: supposing that it is so; if

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.10; Couvreur 2.5; Su1n Xïda4n 9.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i1; Yishu 29:48.9b-10b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: are you skilful at such and such an accomplishment?'

sense.def: be good at Nab-ing.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.10; Couvreur 2.5; Su1n Xïda4n 9.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i1; Yishu 29:48.9b-10b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. (A man ought to) give no occasion for doubt about himself,

sense.def: person; formal or poetic: his person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.11; Couvreur 2.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i2; Yishu 29:48.12a-12b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. Sweeping in general was called sao.

sense.def: all objects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.11; Couvreur 2.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i2; Yishu 29:48.12a-12b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: 12. Sweeping in general was called sao.

sense.def: to sweep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.11; Couvreur 2.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i2; Yishu 29:48.12a-12b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: Sweeping up in front of a mat was called phan.

sense.def: do the sweeping around a sitting mat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.11; Couvreur 2.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i2; Yishu 29:48.12a-12b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: In sweeping a mat they did not use a common broom. [broom made of horse mane]

sense.def: sweep (something) away, specifically around a mat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.11; Couvreur 2.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i2; Yishu 29:48.12a-12b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: In sweeping a mat they did not use a common broom. [broom made of horse mane]

sense.def: (horse's mane used as a) broom

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.11; Couvreur 2.5f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i2; Yishu 29:48.12a-12b; tr. Legge 2.70;

tls:text.tls:line: the sweeper held the dust-pan with the tounge towards himself.

sense.def: dustpan

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.12; Couvreur 2.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i3; Yishu 29:48.13b; tr. Legge 2.71;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. When others more honourable and older than one's self took preceedence of him,

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.14; Couvreur 2.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i3; Yishu 29:48.14b; tr. Legge 2.71;

tls:text.tls:line: If he conquered, he washed the cup ad gave it to the other, asking him to drink.

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.14; Couvreur 2.6f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i3; Yishu 29:48.14b; tr. Legge 2.71;

tls:text.tls:line: they did not remove the (figure of a) horse (for marking the numbers).

sense.def: remove; eliminate; take away

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.17; Couvreur 2.9; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 4i4; Yishu 29:48.19a; tr. Legge 2.72;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. When sitting by a person of rank,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.19; Couvreur 2.10; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 485; Yishu 29:48.21a; tr. Legge 2.72;

tls:text.tls:line: 20. They did not spy into privacies

sense.def: strain to catch sight of, try to get a look at; peep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.19; Couvreur 2.10; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 485; Yishu 29:48.21a; tr. Legge 2.72;

tls:text.tls:line: nor form intimacies on matters aside from their proper business.

sense.def: sideways, towards the side 旁出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.19; Couvreur 2.10; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 485; Yishu 29:48.21a; tr. Legge 2.72;

tls:text.tls:line: nor form intimacies on matters aside from their proper business.

sense.def: cultivate intimate friendships

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.19; Couvreur 2.10; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 485; Yishu 29:48.21a; tr. Legge 2.72;

tls:text.tls:line: They did not speak of old affairs,

sense.def: cite, quote; advocate, maintain (that); mention; bring up as a subject

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.20; Couvreur 2.10f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 486; Yishu 29:48.21b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. One in the position of a miniater and inferior

sense.def: one's (hypothetical) subordinates, ministers of all kinds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.20; Couvreur 2.10f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 486; Yishu 29:48.21b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: if (the government) were going to wreck, he might sweep it away, and institute a new one.

sense.def: replace and change into something new

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.20; Couvreur 2.10f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 486; Yishu 29:48.21b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: if (the government) were going to wreck, he might sweep it away, and institute a new one.

sense.def: sweep away, to clean away by sweeping

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.21; Couvreur 2.11; Su1n Xïda4n 9.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 486; Yishu 29:48.22b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: Do not take liberties with

sense.def: treat without proper respect

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.21; Couvreur 2.11; Su1n Xïda4n 9.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 486; Yishu 29:48.22b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: A workman should follow the rules (of his art),

sense.def: conform to (rules)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.23; Couvreur 2.11f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 487; Yishu 29:48.24b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: 23. The style prized in conversation

sense.def: speech; way of talking

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.23; Couvreur 2.11f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 487; Yishu 29:48.24b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: The beauty of their bells

sense.def: bell fixed on vehicles (eight of them), also on horse-bits, and on knives (!) which was supposed to make a sound like a luán-bird or phoenix

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.23; Couvreur 2.11f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 487; Yishu 29:48.24b; tr. Legge 2.73;

tls:text.tls:line: The beauty of their bells

sense.def: bell on carriage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.30; Couvreur 2.14f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 488; Yishu 29:48.32b-33b; tr. Legge 2.75;

tls:text.tls:line: 31. Till they had offered a portion in the temple, they did not eat of a new crop.

sense.def: always; would always; never fail to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.30; Couvreur 2.14f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 488; Yishu 29:48.32b-33b; tr. Legge 2.75;

tls:text.tls:line: 31. Till they had offered a portion in the temple, they did not eat of a new crop.

sense.def: fresh things (offerings); fresh fruit, fresh crop

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.30; Couvreur 2.14f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 488; Yishu 29:48.32b-33b; tr. Legge 2.75;

tls:text.tls:line: 32. In the case of a charioteer and the gentleman whom he was driving,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.30; Couvreur 2.14f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 488; Yishu 29:48.32b-33b; tr. Legge 2.75;

tls:text.tls:line: when the latter m ounted or descended, the other handed him the strap.

sense.def: the person of high rank mentioned above; the person in charge>the ruler> my ruler侍坐於君子，君子問更端 often works like a NP[post-N]@soc.si.def "my (one and only) lord

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.30; Couvreur 2.14f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 488; Yishu 29:48.32b-33b; tr. Legge 2.75;

tls:text.tls:line: When the gentleman descneded to walk, (he also descnded)

sense.def: the person of high rank mentioned above; the person in charge>the ruler> my ruler侍坐於君子，君子問更端 often works like a NP[post-N]@soc.si.def "my (one and only) lord

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.31; Couvreur 2.15f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.91f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 489; Yishu 29:48.34a; tr. Legge 2.75;

tls:text.tls:line: 33. The riders in an attendant carriage (to court or temple), bowed forward to the bar,

sense.def: assistant

tls:text.tls:srcline:
有貳車者之乘馬、
服車不齒。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.32; Couvreur 2.16; Su1n Xïda4n 9.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 489; Yishu 29:48.35b; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: 34. People did not speak of the age of the horses or of the cariages of those who posessed such attendant carriages;

sense.def: be ranked

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.32; Couvreur 2.16; Su1n Xïda4n 9.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 489; Yishu 29:48.35b; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: nor did they put a value on the dress,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.34; Couvreur 2.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.36a-36b; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: In presenting birds, if there were more than a couple,

sense.def: pair

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.34; Couvreur 2.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.36a-36b; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: he carried a couple in his hand,

sense.def: pair

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.35; Couvreur 2.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.37b; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: An ox was held by the tether,

sense.def: rope for leading cattle and horses; tether
