tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.35; Couvreur 2.16f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.37b; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: and a horse by the bridle.

sense.def: horse reins

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.36; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.38a; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: he took off its covering, and bore the helmet in his hands.

sense.def: helmet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.36; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.38a; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of a bow, with his left hand he stript off the case, and took hold of the middle of the back.

sense.def: bowcase used in ritual; bowcase

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.36; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.38a; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of a bow, with his left hand he stript off the case, and took hold of the middle of the back.

sense.def: handle (of a weapon)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.36; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.38a; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of a sword, he opened the cover of its case, and placed it underneath.

sense.def: open (so that it will be permanently unlocked or visible) YILI: 啟會"open the lid"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.36; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.38a; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of a sword, he opened the cover of its case, and placed it underneath.

sense.def: small wooden box, smaller than guì 匱.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.36; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.38a; tr. Legge 2.76;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of a sword, he opened the cover of its case, and placed it underneath.

sense.def: lid or cover

tls:text.tls:srcline:
笏、書、
脩、苞苴、
弓、茵、
席、枕、
几、熲、
杖、琴、
瑟、戈有刃者櫝、
筴、籥，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.37; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.39a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 38. Official tablets; writings; stalks of dried flesh; parcels wrapped in reeds; bows; cushions; mats; pillows; stools; spikes; staffs; lutes, large and small; sharp-edged lances in sheaths; divining stalks; and flutes:

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:text.tls:srcline:
笏、書、
脩、苞苴、
弓、茵、
席、枕、
几、熲、
杖、琴、
瑟、戈有刃者櫝、
筴、籥，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.37; Couvreur 2.17f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 490; Yishu 29:48.39a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 38. Official tablets; writings; stalks of dried flesh; parcels wrapped in reeds; bows; cushions; mats; pillows; stools; spikes; staffs; lutes, large and small; sharp-edged lances in sheaths; divining stalks; and flutes:

sense.def: primitive short bamboo flute with three holes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.39; Couvreur 2.19; Su1n Xïda4n 9.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 491; Yishu 29:48.40a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 40. For visitors and guests the principal thing was a courteous humility;

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.39; Couvreur 2.19; Su1n Xïda4n 9.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 491; Yishu 29:48.40a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: at sacrifices, reverence;

sense.def: sacrificing of all kinds; the various required sacrifices

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.39; Couvreur 2.19; Su1n Xïda4n 9.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 491; Yishu 29:48.40a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: at mourning rites, sorrow;

sense.def: the matter of mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.39; Couvreur 2.19; Su1n Xïda4n 9.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 491; Yishu 29:48.40a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: at mourning rites, sorrow;

sense.def: grief for a contextually determinate person; vocally and publically display commendable and genuine grief about something other than death; feel and show commendable deep sadness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.39; Couvreur 2.19; Su1n Xïda4n 9.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 491; Yishu 29:48.40a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: at meetings and reunions, an active interest.

sense.def: assemblies, gathering, formal get-togethers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.40; Couvreur 2.20; Su1n Xïda4n 9.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 492; Yishu 29:48.41a; tr. Legge 2.77;

tls:text.tls:line: 41. When feasting with a man of superior rank and character,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.42; Couvreur 2.21f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 492f; Yishu 29:48.44b-45b; tr. Legge 2.78;

tls:text.tls:line: 46. A cup was poured out for the driver of a personator of the dead

sense.def: ladle wine for (a guest)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.43; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.100f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 493f; Yishu 29:48.46b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: A gentleman did not eat the entrails of grain-fed animals.

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.43; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.100f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 493f; Yishu 29:48.46b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: A gentleman did not eat the entrails of grain-fed animals.

sense.def: fatty belly meat, entrails

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.43; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.100f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 493f; Yishu 29:48.46b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: Before rinsing a cup, they washed their hands.

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.43; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.100f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 493f; Yishu 29:48.46b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: Before rinsing a cup, they washed their hands.

sense.def: wash one's hands

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.44; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.102f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.46b-47b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: In selecting an onion or scallion for a gentleman,

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.44; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.102f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.46b-47b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: In selecting an onion or scallion for a gentleman,

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.44; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.102f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.46b-47b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: In selecting an onion or scallion for a gentleman,

sense.def: shallot; scallion

tls:text.tls:srcline: 尊者以酌者之左為上尊。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.44; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.102f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.46b-47b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: 48. He who set forth the jugs considered the left of the cup-bearer to be the place for the topmost one.

sense.def: engage in ladling wine; ladle wine; ladle water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.44; Couvreur 2.22f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.102f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.46b-47b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: The jugs and jars were placed with their spouts towards the arranger.

sense.def: spout

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: 49. The flesh of oxen, sheep, and fish

sense.def: raw meat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: was cut small, and made into mince.

sense.def: LIJI 8.4: cut into pieces; carve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: was cut small, and made into mince.

sense.def: minced meat, either raw or cooked

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: That of elks and deer was pickled;

sense.def: minced pickled meat sauce

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: that of the wild pig was hashed:

sense.def: thin slice of meat; hashed meat (LI) (loan?)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: - these were all sliced, but not cut small.

sense.def: be cut into small pieces

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: The flesh of the muntjac was alone pickled,

sense.def: fallow-deer; general name for hornless deer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: and that of fowls and hares,

sense.def: spleen; milt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.45; Couvreur 2.23f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 494; Yishu 29:48.49b; tr. Legge 2.79;

tls:text.tls:line: being slaced and cut small.

sense.def: LIJI 8.4: cut into pieces; carve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.47; Couvreur 2.24; Su1n Xïda4n 9.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 495; Yishu 29:48.51a; tr. Legge 2.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 51. When a man had his robes on his person,

sense.def: archaic?: [one's own] body 鞠躬

tls:text.tls:srcline:
洗、盥、
執食飲者勿氣，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.49; Couvreur 2.25f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 495; Yishu 29:48.51b-52b; tr. Legge 2.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 53. When one was carrying in water or liquor and food to a superior of elder, the rule was not to breathe on it;

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:text.tls:srcline:
洗、盥、
執食飲者勿氣，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.49; Couvreur 2.25f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 495; Yishu 29:48.51b-52b; tr. Legge 2.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 53. When one was carrying in water or liquor and food to a superior of elder, the rule was not to breathe on it;

sense.def: wash one's hands

tls:text.tls:srcline:
洗、盥、
執食飲者勿氣，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.49; Couvreur 2.25f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 495; Yishu 29:48.51b-52b; tr. Legge 2.80;

tls:text.tls:line: 53. When one was carrying in water or liquor and food to a superior of elder, the rule was not to breathe on it;

sense.def: smell

tls:text.tls:srcline: 為己祭而致膳於君子曰膳；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.50; Couvreur 2.26; Su1n Xïda4n 9.107; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 496; Yishu 29:48.53a; tr. Legge 2.i1;

tls:text.tls:line: When sending of the flesh of his own sacrifice to a superior man, the party simply announced what it was.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 為己祭而致膳於君子曰膳；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.50; Couvreur 2.26; Su1n Xïda4n 9.107; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 496; Yishu 29:48.53a; tr. Legge 2.i1;

tls:text.tls:line: When sending of the flesh of his own sacrifice to a superior man, the party simply announced what it was.

sense.def: a person of high rank, a gentleman 侍坐於君子，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.51; Couvreur 2.26f; Su1n Xïda4n 9.107; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 496; Yishu 29:48.53a-53b; tr. Legge 2.i1;

sense.def: the person of high rank mentioned above; the person in charge>the ruler> my ruler侍坐於君子，君子問更端 often works like a NP[post-N]@soc.si.def "my (one and only) lord

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.52; Couvreur 2.27; Su1n Xïda4n 9.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 497; Yishu 29:48.54b; tr. Legge 2.i1;

tls:text.tls:line: 55. When the revenues of a state were at a low ebb,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.52; Couvreur 2.27; Su1n Xïda4n 9.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 497; Yishu 29:48.54b; tr. Legge 2.i1;

tls:text.tls:line: the superior man did not wear shoes of silk;

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 17.01.52; Couvreur 2.27; Su1n Xïda4n 9.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 497; Yishu 29:48.54b; tr. Legge 2.i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and horses were not regularly supplied with grain.

sense.def: be fed; be supplied with (grain)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.01; Couvreur 2.28; Su1n Xïda4n 10.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 499; Yishu 29:49.1b; tr. Legge 2.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: If he wish to transform the people and to perfect their manners and customs,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.01; Couvreur 2.28; Su1n Xïda4n 10.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 499; Yishu 29:49.1b; tr. Legge 2.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: If he wish to transform the people and to perfect their manners and customs,

sense.def: teach and transform, teach successfully; get to change to the better; educate 化民

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.02; Couvreur 2.28f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 500; Yishu 29:49.3b; tr. Legge 2.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: On this account the ancient kings,

sense.def: the true kings (of a given time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.03; Couvreur 2.29f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 500; Yishu 29:49.4b; tr. Legge 2.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. However fine the viands be,

sense.def: repast including meat, elaborate meal, meat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.04; Couvreur 2.29f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 500; Yishu 29:49.4b-5a; tr. Legge 2.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: one is able to turn round and examine himself;

sense.def: reflect upon (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.04; Couvreur 2.29f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 500; Yishu 29:49.4b-5a; tr. Legge 2.i2;

tls:text.tls:line: he is able to stimulate himself to effort.

sense.def: cause (oneself) to be strong> strengthen (oneself) 修身自強

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.06; Couvreur 2.30f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 501; Yishu 29:49.8a; tr. Legge 2.i3;

tls:text.tls:line: in the seventh year, how they could discuss the subjects of their studies and select their friends.

sense.def: [my] friend, person of similar ideals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.07; Couvreur 2.30f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.3f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 501; Yishu 29:49.8a-8b; tr. Legge 2.i3;

tls:text.tls:line: After this the training was sufficient to transform the people, and to changhe (anything bad in) manners and customs.

sense.def: teach and transform, teach successfully; get to change to the better; educate 化民

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.08; Couvreur 2.31f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 502; Yishu 29:49.10b-11a; tr. Legge 2.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: (the masters) in their skin caps presented the offerings of vegetables (to the ancient sages),

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.08; Couvreur 2.31f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 502; Yishu 29:49.10b-11a; tr. Legge 2.i4;

tls:text.tls:line: The cane and the thorns

sense.def: concrete thing; things; external things; kind of thing (Note incidentally that according to AC Graham this should probably be taken as a mass noun, so that 萬物 should literally become "myriad kinds of things"! 劉徽 on 九章算術 8.1: èr wù 二物 NOT: two items, but: two kinds of items, as in 二物者再程 "in the case of two kinds of items one measures twice". 物數 "number of kinds of things".)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.13; Couvreur 2.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 503; Yishu 29:49.18a; tr. Legge 2.85;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. Therefore a student of talents and virtue pursues his studies,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.13; Couvreur 2.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 503; Yishu 29:49.18a; tr. Legge 2.85;

tls:text.tls:line: he rests quietly in his studies and seeks the comlpany of his teachers;

sense.def: regard as conducive to peace; feel at ease with, feel comfortable with; find one's peace in; be content with; find comfort in (women and feasting)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.13; Couvreur 2.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 503; Yishu 29:49.18a; tr. Legge 2.85;

tls:text.tls:line: he rests quietly in his studies and seeks the comlpany of his teachers;

sense.def: the attempt to learn about things (typically from a teacher) study; the pursuit of intellectual/moral self-development; learning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.13; Couvreur 2.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 503; Yishu 29:49.18a; tr. Legge 2.85;

tls:text.tls:line: he rests quietly in his studies and seeks the comlpany of his teachers;

sense.def: 人師,民師 teacher, guiding authority; sometimes specifically: music master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.13; Couvreur 2.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 503; Yishu 29:49.18a; tr. Legge 2.85;

tls:text.tls:line: he finds pleasure in his friends, and has all confidence in their course.

sense.def: [my] friend, person of similar ideals

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以雖離師輔而不反也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.13; Couvreur 2.33f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 503; Yishu 29:49.18a; tr. Legge 2.85;

tls:text.tls:line: Although he should be separated from his teachers and helpers, he will not act contrary to the course;

sense.def: assistant; helper; senior aide; most important minister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.18; Couvreur 2.36; Su1n Xïda4n 10.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 505; Yishu 29:49.22b; tr. Legge 2.86;

tls:text.tls:line: Learning alone and without friends

sense.def: [my] friend, person of similar ideals

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.20; Couvreur 2.36f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 505; Yishu 29:49.23b; tr. Legge 2.87;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. When a superior man knows the causes which make instruction successful,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.22; Couvreur 2.37f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 506; Yishu 29:49.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.87;

tls:text.tls:line: in the multitude of their studies;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.22; Couvreur 2.37f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 506; Yishu 29:49.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.87;

tls:text.tls:line: some, in their fewness;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.22; Couvreur 2.37f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 506; Yishu 29:49.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.87;

tls:text.tls:line: some, in the feeling of ease (with which they proceed);

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.22; Couvreur 2.37f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 506; Yishu 29:49.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.87;

tls:text.tls:line: and some, in the readiness with which they stop.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.26; Couvreur 2.38f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 507; Yishu 29:49.27b; tr. Legge 2.88;

tls:text.tls:line: and the choice of a teacher demands the greatest care;

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.29; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.30b; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: while the master is diligent with him, yet makes (only) half the attainments (of the former),

sense.def: be industrious and strenous in one's efforts, make strenuous efforts, be assiduous

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.30; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.30b; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: The skilful questioner

sense.def: 切問而近思conduct consultations of one who are supposed to know

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.30; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.30b; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: The unscillful questioner takes the opposite course.

sense.def: 切問而近思conduct consultations of one who are supposed to know

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.31; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.31a; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: may be compared to a bell when it is struck.

sense.def: struck (bell etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.31; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.31a; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: Struck with a small hammer, it gives a small sound.

sense.def: knock at; strike against so as to make a sound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.31; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.31a; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: Struck with a great one, it gives a great sound.

sense.def: knock at; strike against so as to make a sound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.31; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.31a; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: But let it be struck leisurely and properly,

sense.def: easy leisure, natural action

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.31; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.31a; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: He who is not skillful in replying to questions is the opposite of this.

sense.def: reply to (a question)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.31; Couvreur 2.40f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 508; Yishu 29:49.31a; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: He who is not skillful in replying to questions is the opposite of this.

sense.def: 大哉問form of words used to ask a question; question uttered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.32; Couvreur 2.41; Su1n Xïda4n 10.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 509; Yishu 29:49.33a; tr. Legge 2.89;

tls:text.tls:line: is not fit to be a master.

sense.def: a teacher for others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.33; Couvreur 2.42; Su1n Xïda4n 10.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 509; Yishu 29:49.34b; tr. Legge 2.90;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man who examines these cases

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.34; Couvreur 2.42f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 510; Yishu 29:49.36a; tr. Legge 2.90;

tls:text.tls:line: The drum has no spacial relation to any of the musical notes;

sense.def: tone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 18.01.34; Couvreur 2.42f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 510; Yishu 29:49.36a; tr. Legge 2.90;

tls:text.tls:line: Learning has no particular realtion to any of the five senses;

sense.def: sense organ, sense 五官 "the five senses"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.01; Couvreur 2.45f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 513; Yishu 30:50.3a-3b; tr. Legge 2.92;

tls:text.tls:line: The affections

sense.def: be stimulated by

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.02; Couvreur 2.45f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 513f; Yishu 30:50.3b; tr. Legge 2.92;

tls:text.tls:line: and the (direction in harmony with them of the) shields and axes, and of the plumes and ox-tails,

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.02; Couvreur 2.45f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 513f; Yishu 30:50.3b; tr. Legge 2.92;

tls:text.tls:line: and the (direction in harmony with them of the) shields and axes, and of the plumes and ox-tails,

sense.def: oxtail banner; oxtail pennant

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其本在人心之感於物也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.03; Couvreur 2.46f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 514; Yishu 30:50.5b; tr. Legge 2.92;

tls:text.tls:line: and its source is in the affections of the m ind as it is influenced by (external) things.

sense.def: the human heart

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其本在人心之感於物也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.03; Couvreur 2.46f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 514; Yishu 30:50.5b; tr. Legge 2.92;

tls:text.tls:line: and its source is in the affections of the m ind as it is influenced by (external) things.

sense.def: be moved by

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.04; Couvreur 2.46f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.19f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 514; Yishu 30:50.5b; tr. Legge 2.92;

tls:text.tls:line: the sound is coarse and fierce;

sense.def: (physically) rough, coarse, crude

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.04; Couvreur 2.46f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.19f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 514; Yishu 30:50.5b; tr. Legge 2.92;

tls:text.tls:line: they indicate the impressions produced by (external) things.

sense.def: be stimulated by

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.05; Couvreur 2.46f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 514; Yishu 30:50.8a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: laws to unify their conduct;

sense.def: cause to be one and the same; cause to be coherently adjusted by one principle SEE SYN. GROUP 'UNITE'

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: the airs of an age of good order indicate composure and enjoyment.

sense.def: music

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: The airs of an age of disorder indicate dissatisfaction and anger,

sense.def: music

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: The airs of an age of disorder indicate dissatisfaction and anger,

sense.def: resentfully [???SURELY 以 GOES WITH WHAT FOLLOWS!!!CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: and its government is perversely bad.

sense.def: contrary, perverse; be at odds with each other; be at loggerheads

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: The airs of a state going to ruin are expressive of sorrow and (troubled) thought.

sense.def: music

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: The airs of a state going to ruin are expressive of sorrow and (troubled) thought.

sense.def: full of sympathetic grief, full of saddened sympathy [???SURELY 以 GOES WITH WHAT FOLLOWS!!!CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: The airs of a state going to ruin are expressive of sorrow and (troubled) thought.

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: The airs of a state going to ruin are expressive of sorrow and (troubled) thought.

sense.def: mournful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.07; Couvreur 2.47f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.8b-9a; tr. Legge 2.93;

tls:text.tls:line: There is an interaction between the words and airs (of the people)

sense.def: sound of the human voice; by extension very occasionally: of ants

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.09; Couvreur 2.48f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.21f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.9b; tr. Legge 2.94;

tls:text.tls:line: If kih be irregular, (the air) expresses sorrow;

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.10; Couvreur 2.48f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 515; Yishu 30:50.10a; tr. Legge 2.94;

tls:text.tls:line: the resources (of the state) are exhausted.

sense.def: be deficient, be in short supply 財匱

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.12; Couvreur 2.50; Su1n Xïda4n 10.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 516; Yishu 30:50.15b; tr. Legge 2.95;

tls:text.tls:line: know the modulations, but they do not know music.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.15; Couvreur 2.50f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 516; Yishu 30:50.18b; tr. Legge 2.95;

tls:text.tls:line: one lute began, and (only) three others joined it;

sense.def: one person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.15; Couvreur 2.50f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 516; Yishu 30:50.18b; tr. Legge 2.95;

tls:text.tls:line: one lute began, and (only) three others joined it;

sense.def: lead the singing > take the lead; initiate

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.16; Couvreur 2.50f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 516; Yishu 30:50.18b-20b; tr. Legge 2.95;

tls:text.tls:line: but they intended to teach the people to regulate their likings and dislikings,

sense.def: special fondness; "taste for", preference for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.16; Couvreur 2.50f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 516; Yishu 30:50.18b-20b; tr. Legge 2.95;

tls:text.tls:line: but they intended to teach the people to regulate their likings and dislikings,

sense.def: hatred; dislikes (versus likes); bad feelings; hating people

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.17; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.21b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: as from Heaven, to be still at his birth.

sense.def: Nature; what is natural; natural endowment, natural features

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.17; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.21b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: His activity shows itself as he is acted on by external things,

sense.def: be stimulated by

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.17; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.21b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: When these are not regulated by anything within,

sense.def: special fondness; "taste for", preference for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.17; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.21b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: When these are not regulated by anything within,

sense.def: hatred; dislikes (versus likes); bad feelings; hating people

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.17; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.21b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: he cannot come back to himself,

sense.def: person; formal or poetic: his person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.18; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.25b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: and when his likings and dislikings are not subject to ergulation (from within),

sense.def: special fondness; "taste for", preference for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.18; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.25b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: he is changed into the nature of things as they come before him;

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.18; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517; Yishu 30:50.25b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: On this we have the rebellious and deceitful heart,

sense.def: for this reason, and thus, and so

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.19; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517f; Yishu 30:50.25b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: The strong press upon the weak;

sense.def: threaten; put under pressure; oppress

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.19; Couvreur 2.52f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 517f; Yishu 30:50.25b; tr. Legge 2.96;

tls:text.tls:line: the old and young, orphans and solitaires are neglected:

sense.def: those in any way bereaved

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.20; Couvreur 2.54f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 518; Yishu 30:50.27a; tr. Legge 2.97;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. Therefore the ancient kings, when they instituted their ceremonies and music,

sense.def: to institute, to set up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.20; Couvreur 2.54f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 518; Yishu 30:50.27a; tr. Legge 2.97;

tls:text.tls:line: By the bells, drums, shields, and axes,

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.20; Couvreur 2.54f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 518; Yishu 30:50.27a; tr. Legge 2.97;

tls:text.tls:line: they maintained the separation that should exist between male and female.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.23; Couvreur 2.55f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 519; Yishu 30:50.33a; tr. Legge 2.98;

tls:text.tls:line: By the exhibition o what was to be liked and what was to be disliked,

sense.def: special fondness; "taste for", preference for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.23; Couvreur 2.55f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 519; Yishu 30:50.33a; tr. Legge 2.98;

tls:text.tls:line: a distinction was made betweenthe worthy ad unworthy.

sense.def: to be distinguished; be held apart intellectually

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.28; Couvreur 2.58f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 520; Yishu 30:50.39a; tr. Legge 2.99;

tls:text.tls:line: In the visible spere there are the ceremonies and music;

sense.def: the sphere of the visible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.28; Couvreur 2.58f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 520; Yishu 30:50.39a; tr. Legge 2.99;

tls:text.tls:line: in the invisible,m the spiritual agencies.

sense.def: the sphere of dark invisibility; the underworld

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.29; Couvreur 2.58f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 520; Yishu 30:50.41b; tr. Legge 2.99;

tls:text.tls:line: The occasions and forms were according to the timmes when they were made;

sense.def: be coordinated, be synchronised. occur together with 事與時並

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.30; Couvreur 2.59f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 521; Yishu 30:50.43b; tr. Legge 2.100;

tls:text.tls:line: the plume, the file, the shield, and the axe

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.30; Couvreur 2.59f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 521; Yishu 30:50.43b; tr. Legge 2.100;

tls:text.tls:line: the curvings and stretchings (of the body), the bending down and lifting up (of the head);

sense.def: stretch as one is yawning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.30; Couvreur 2.59f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 521; Yishu 30:50.43b; tr. Legge 2.100;

tls:text.tls:line: the curvings and stretchings (of the body), the bending down and lifting up (of the head);

sense.def: stoop down; bow down; bow the head 俯而泣, but also ZUO Zhao 7 一命而僂，再命而傴，三命而俯

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.30; Couvreur 2.59f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 521; Yishu 30:50.43b; tr. Legge 2.100;

tls:text.tls:line: the curvings and stretchings (of the body), the bending down and lifting up (of the head);

sense.def: throw one's head back, look upwards, look up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.32; Couvreur 2.59f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 521; Yishu 30:50.44b; tr. Legge 2.100;

tls:text.tls:line: and they who had learned their elegant accompaniements could hand them down.

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.32; Couvreur 2.59f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 521; Yishu 30:50.44b; tr. Legge 2.100;

tls:text.tls:line: the transmitters intelligent.

sense.def: hand down things, engage in handing down things

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.33; Couvreur 2.60f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 522; Yishu 30:50.45b; tr. Legge 2.100;

tls:text.tls:line: to those orderly distinctions they owe the differences between them.

sense.def: to be distinguished; be held apart intellectually

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.37; Couvreur 2.62f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 522f; Yishu 30:50.50b; tr. Legge 2.101;

tls:text.tls:line: 26. When the (ancient) kings had accomplished their undertakings, they made their music (to commemorate them);

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.37; Couvreur 2.62f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 522f; Yishu 30:50.50b; tr. Legge 2.101;

tls:text.tls:line: The dances with shields and axes did not belong to the most excellent music,

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.38; Couvreur 2.62f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 523; Yishu 30:50.52b; tr. Legge 2.102;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore they did not each adopt the music of his predecessor.

sense.def: follow; adopt; follow the example of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.38; Couvreur 2.62f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 523; Yishu 30:50.52b; tr. Legge 2.102;

tls:text.tls:line: and coarseness in ceremonies indicates something one-sided.

sense.def: (figuratively, transferred sense:) be unsubtle, be coarse LIJI 10.32 coarse (of ceremonies); LIJI 10.39f: coarse (of people)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.41; Couvreur 2.63f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 523; Yishu 30:50.56b; tr. Legge 2.103;

tls:text.tls:line: Normal distinction is the thing aimed at in ceremonies:

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.43; Couvreur 2.64f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 524; Yishu 30:50.58b; tr. Legge 2.103;

tls:text.tls:line: that ceremonies were framed after the distinctions between heaven and earth.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.46; Couvreur 2.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 524; Yishu 30:50.63a-64a; tr. Legge 2.104;

tls:text.tls:line: and if no distinction were observed between males and females, disorder would arise and grow:

sense.def: arise

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.46; Couvreur 2.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 524; Yishu 30:50.63a-64a; tr. Legge 2.104;

tls:text.tls:line: - such is the nature fo the (different qualities of) heaven and earth.

sense.def: genuine nature, essential nature, essence; esential tendencies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.46; Couvreur 2.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 524; Yishu 30:50.63a-64a; tr. Legge 2.104;

tls:text.tls:line: how there are in them the phenomena of retrogression and expansion, and a communication with the spirit-like (operations of nature),

sense.def: get through (of a way, as opposed to sè 塞 "be blocked");

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.01.46; Couvreur 2.66f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.34f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 524; Yishu 30:50.63a-64a; tr. Legge 2.104;

tls:text.tls:line: we must pronounce their heigh the highest, their reach the farthest, their depth the most profound, an their breath the greatest.

sense.def: fathom, assess depth or height of (physical objects)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.05; Couvreur 2.69f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.37f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 526; Yishu 31:51.6b-8a; tr. Legge 2.106;

tls:text.tls:line: and yet cases of litigation are m ore numerous in consequence of it:

sense.def: litigation of all kinds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.05; Couvreur 2.69f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.37f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 526; Yishu 31:51.6b-8a; tr. Legge 2.106;

tls:text.tls:line: and yet cases of litigation are m ore numerous in consequence of it:

sense.def: increasingly; the more... the more; more, ever more

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.06; Couvreur 2.69f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 526; Yishu 31:51.8a-8b; tr. Legge 2.106;

tls:text.tls:line: Where there is (but) one presentation of the cup (at one time),

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.07; Couvreur 2.69f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 526; Yishu 31:51.9b; tr. Legge 2.107;

tls:text.tls:line: had their rules according to which they expressed their grief;

sense.def: show one's grief about something as a sign of mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.07; Couvreur 2.69f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 526; Yishu 31:51.9b; tr. Legge 2.107;

tls:text.tls:line: and on occasions of great happiness,

sense.def: great happiness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.08; Couvreur 2.69f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 526f; Yishu 31:51.11a; tr. Legge 2.107;

tls:text.tls:line: and the change which it produces in manners and customs,

sense.def: local ways; current habit

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.08; Couvreur 2.69f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 526f; Yishu 31:51.11a; tr. Legge 2.107;

tls:text.tls:line: and the change which it produces in manners and customs,

sense.def: current local custom; temporary habit

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.09; Couvreur 2.71f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 527; Yishu 31:51.11b-12b; tr. Legge 2.107;

tls:text.tls:line: but for their (affections of) grief, pleasure, joy, and anger there are no invariable rules.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:text.tls:srcline:
寬裕、
肉好、
順成、
和動之音作，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.10; Couvreur 2.71f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 527f; Yishu 31:51.12b; tr. Legge 2.107;

tls:text.tls:line: when he is magnanimous, placid, and kind, the notes are natural, full, and harmonious,

sense.def: tolerance and generosity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.11; Couvreur 2.72f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 528; Yishu 31:51.16a; tr. Legge 2.108;

tls:text.tls:line: the ancient kings (in framing their music), laid its foundations in the feelings and nature of men;

sense.def: lay the foundations of N1 in N2

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.16; Couvreur 2.74f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 529; Yishu 31:51.23b; tr. Legge 2.109;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. In such a case the notes are melancholy but without gravity,

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.16; Couvreur 2.74f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 529; Yishu 31:51.23b; tr. Legge 2.109;

tls:text.tls:line: 13. In such a case the notes are melancholy but without gravity,

sense.def: be dignified and serious in action; put on an air of dignified seriousness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.16; Couvreur 2.74f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 529; Yishu 31:51.23b; tr. Legge 2.109;

tls:text.tls:line: One falls into such a state of dissoluteness that he forgets the virtue properly bleonging to his nature.

sense.def: be given to (wine)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.17; Couvreur 2.75f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 530; Yishu 31:51.25b; tr. Legge 2.110;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. Whenever the notes that are evil and depraved affect men,

sense.def: whenever

tls:text.tls:srcline:
使耳、
目、鼻、
口、心知、
百體

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.19; Couvreur 2.75f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 530; Yishu 31:51.27b; tr. Legge 2.110;

tls:text.tls:line: And thus he makes his ears, eyes, nose, and mouth, the apprehensions of his mind, and tha movements of his body,

sense.def: nose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.20; Couvreur 2.75f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 531; Yishu 31:51.29a; tr. Legge 2.111;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. After this there ensues tha manifestation (of the inward thoughts) by the modulations of note and tone,

sense.def: "the sounds of music", the sound of music including instrumental and vocal sound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.20; Couvreur 2.75f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 531; Yishu 31:51.29a; tr. Legge 2.111;

tls:text.tls:line: the movements with the shield and battle-axe,

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.20; Couvreur 2.75f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 531; Yishu 31:51.29a; tr. Legge 2.111;

tls:text.tls:line: the ornaments of the plumes and ox-tails,

sense.def: oxtail banner; oxtail pennant

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.24; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.38a; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: Superior men rejoice in attanining to the course (which they wish to pursue);

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.24; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.38a; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: and smaller men in obtaining things which they desire.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.26; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.39b; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: is the blossoming of virtue.

sense.def: blossom (ERYA: on trees and bushes);

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.26; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.39b; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: Metal, stone, silk, and bamboo

sense.def: metal; bronze

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.26; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.39b; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: Metal, stone, silk, and bamboo

sense.def: stone; rockrocks

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.26; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.39b; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: Metal, stone, silk, and bamboo

sense.def: raw silk thread produced from cocoons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.26; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.39b; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: Metal, stone, silk, and bamboo

sense.def: bamboo

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.26; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.39b; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: singing prolongs the notes (of the voice);

sense.def: intone (poetry, sounds, tunes) with deep, often with drawn-out, emotion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.27; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.42a; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: A harmonious conformity (to virtue) is realised within, and the blossoming display of it is conspicuous without,

sense.def: magnificent display (like that of a flower)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.27; Couvreur 2.78f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 532; Yishu 31:51.42a; tr. Legge 2.112;

tls:text.tls:line: A harmonious conformity (to virtue) is realised within, and the blossoming display of it is conspicuous without,

sense.def: manifest oneself (in the place N)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.29; Couvreur 2.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 533; Yishu 31:51.44b; tr. Legge 2.113;

tls:text.tls:line: This is done a second time and they begin to move forward;

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.30; Couvreur 2.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 533; Yishu 31:51.44b; tr. Legge 2.113;

tls:text.tls:line: Superior men by it nourish their love of what is good;

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.30; Couvreur 2.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 533; Yishu 31:51.44b; tr. Legge 2.113;

tls:text.tls:line: small men in it hear the (correction of) their errors.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.30; Couvreur 2.80f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 533; Yishu 31:51.44b; tr. Legge 2.113;

tls:text.tls:line: 'for the courses to be pursued by men

sense.def: alive, live; living; occurring during one's lifetime

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.31; Couvreur 2.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 534; Yishu 31:51.46b; tr. Legge 2.113;

tls:text.tls:line: expresses the delight in what produces it,

sense.def: the place wherefrom

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.32; Couvreur 2.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 534; Yishu 31:51.48a; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: the flag with dragons, and a nine-scolloped border,

sense.def: banner with bells, used by feudal lords and by the emperor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.32; Couvreur 2.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 534; Yishu 31:51.48a; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: the flag with dragons, and a nine-scolloped border,

sense.def: pendant for banner or cap

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.32; Couvreur 2.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 534; Yishu 31:51.48a; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: was the banner (conferred by) the son of Heaven;

sense.def: yak-tail banner on a feather-decked pole

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.32; Couvreur 2.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 534; Yishu 31:51.48a; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: taht with the azure and black edging exhibited the precious tortoises,

sense.def: green; green/blue; dark grey

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.02.32; Couvreur 2.i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 534; Yishu 31:51.48a; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: taht with the azure and black edging exhibited the precious tortoises,

sense.def: black; blackened

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.02; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.2b; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: penetrate to the virtues of the spiritual Intelligences,

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.02; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.2b; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: They give a sort of substantial embodiment of what is most subtle as well as material,

sense.def: ZZ 17.593: be crude and visible (parts of the material world)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.02; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.2b; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: and regulate the duties between father and son, ruler and subject.

sense.def: control, administer, regulate; constrain and control

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.02; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.2b; tr. Legge 2.114;

tls:text.tls:line: and regulate the duties between father and son, ruler and subject.

sense.def: modesty, (female) virtue; probity; proper constraint, proper moderation; rules of decent behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.03; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: The genial airs from agbove and the responsive action below will overspread and nourish all things.

sense.def: nourish and cater for in every way

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: Then plants and trees will grow luxuriantly;

sense.def: grow lush, become luxuriant

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: curling sprouts and buds will expand;

sense.def: new twigs with sprouts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: horns and antlers wil grow;

sense.def: horn (of a rhino); horns (of bovines)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: horns and antlers wil grow;

sense.def: grow, have one's habitat (as crops)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: insects will come to the light and revive;

sense.def: hibernating

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: insects will come to the light and revive;

sense.def: worm; insect; maggot

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: insects will come to the light and revive;

sense.def: come to life again, be resurrected; be reborn, be born again

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: birds will breed and brood;

sense.def: hatch; sit on eggs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: the hairy tribes will mate and bring forth;

sense.def: become pregnant (of humans or animals)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: the mammalia will have no abortions,

sense.def: (born) from the womb

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: the mammalia will have no abortions,

sense.def: have an abortion; be stillborn

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.04; Couvreur 2.i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 535; Yishu 32:52.5b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: and no eggs will be broken or addled,

sense.def: (born) from an egg 卵生

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.05; Couvreur 2.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 536; Yishu 32:52.7b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: (In the same way), the spreading of mats,

sense.def: SHI: long rough mat put directly on the floor to sit on on festive occasions, mostly with an additional mat on top, larger than xí 席. Also small tables were put on this mat.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.05; Couvreur 2.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 536; Yishu 32:52.7b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: (In the same way), the spreading of mats,

sense.def: mat to sit on, usually, on festive occasions, this mat being put on another rough mat on the floor; sometimes: mat to sleep on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.06; Couvreur 2.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 536; Yishu 32:52.7b; tr. Legge 2.115;

tls:text.tls:line: The music-masters decide on the tunes and the pieces of poetry;

sense.def: specialist of N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.07; Couvreur 2.i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 536; Yishu 32:52.8b; tr. Legge 2.116;

tls:text.tls:line: and the practice of any art of inferior;

sense.def: the fine arts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.08; Couvreur 2.86f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.10b; tr. Legge 2.116;

tls:text.tls:line: I am only afraid that I shall go to sleep.

sense.def: [I] only fear that [I] shall V

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.08; Couvreur 2.86f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.10b; tr. Legge 2.116;

tls:text.tls:line: I am only afraid that I shall go to sleep.

sense.def: be afraid that V; be afraid to V

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.08; Couvreur 2.86f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.10b; tr. Legge 2.116;

tls:text.tls:line: I am only afraid that I shall go to sleep.

sense.def: nodd off; rest (as on a table before one), take a nap; doze off 醉而臥; often: take a nap during the day

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.08; Couvreur 2.86f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.10b; tr. Legge 2.116;

tls:text.tls:line: let me ask

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.10; Couvreur 2.86f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.11a-11b; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: The character is cultivated; the family is regulated;

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.11; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.14a; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. 'But now, in the new music,

sense.def: newfangled, new; newly introduced; fresh, unaccustomed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.11; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.14a; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: Among the players

sense.def: dwarf clown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.11; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.14a; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: there are dwarfs like monkeys, while boys and girls are mixed together,

sense.def: boy 子女 "boys and girls"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.11; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.14a; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: there are dwarfs like monkeys, while boys and girls are mixed together,

sense.def: girl (On analogy with 男 one might be tempted to take this to be a case of n[adN], i.e. short for 女人. But this seems curiously unnatural.)待考

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.11; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.14a; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: there are dwarfs like monkeys, while boys and girls are mixed together,

sense.def: kind of monkey

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.11; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.14a; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: there are dwarfs like monkeys, while boys and girls are mixed together,

sense.def: get mixed in; CC20: mixed; CC242: mixed (colour); CC279 mixed (and confused/chaotic); CC 350, LIJI

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.12; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 537; Yishu 32:52.15a; tr. Legge 2.117;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. 'What you ask about is music;

sense.def: ask about (something or someone to be discussed) 問政

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.13; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 538; Yishu 32:52.15b-16a; tr. Legge 2.118;

tls:text.tls:line: asked him to explain,

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.14; Couvreur 2.87f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 538; Yishu 32:52.16a; tr. Legge 2.118;

tls:text.tls:line: and gave harmony to the five notes (of the scale),

sense.def: tone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.17; Couvreur 2.90f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539; Yishu 32:52.18a; tr. Legge 2.118;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Let me ask where the vile airs come from?'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.20; Couvreur 2.90f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539; Yishu 32:52.20b; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: has only to be careful of what he likes and dislikes.

sense.def: pay diligent attention to, pay close attention to; be carefully attentive to

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人作為鞉、
鼓、椌、
楬、壎、
篪，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the sages mede hand-drums and drums, the stopper and the starter, the earthen whistle and the bamboo flute,

sense.def: simple egg-shaped flute with three or more holes

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人作為鞉、
鼓、椌、
楬、壎、
篪，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the sages mede hand-drums and drums, the stopper and the starter, the earthen whistle and the bamboo flute,

sense.def: small hand-drum with two ears

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人作為鞉、
鼓、椌、
楬、壎、
篪，

tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the sages mede hand-drums and drums, the stopper and the starter, the earthen whistle and the bamboo flute,

sense.def: a hollow wodden instrument of music (which is used to indicate the end of a musical piece ??)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人作為鞉、
鼓、椌、
楬、壎、
篪，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the sages mede hand-drums and drums, the stopper and the starter, the earthen whistle and the bamboo flute,

sense.def: kind of percussion instrument ?? (used to indicate the beginning of a musical piece ??)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人作為鞉、
鼓、椌、
楬、壎、
篪，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the sages mede hand-drums and drums, the stopper and the starter, the earthen whistle and the bamboo flute,

sense.def: bamboo flute with seven holes

tls:text.tls:srcline:
然後鍾、
磬、竽、
瑟以和之，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the shields, axes, kox-tails, and plumes, brandished by the pantomimes in time and tune.

sense.def: large suspended bell without a clapper; bell without a clapper

tls:text.tls:srcline:
然後鍾、
磬、竽、
瑟以和之，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the shields, axes, kox-tails, and plumes, brandished by the pantomimes in time and tune.

sense.def: music stone

tls:text.tls:srcline:
然後鍾、
磬、竽、
瑟以和之，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the shields, axes, kox-tails, and plumes, brandished by the pantomimes in time and tune.

sense.def: reed organ with upto 36 pipes

tls:text.tls:srcline:
然後鍾、
磬、竽、
瑟以和之，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: the shields, axes, kox-tails, and plumes, brandished by the pantomimes in time and tune.

sense.def: zither with a large number of strings, typically 25.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: These they employed at he sacrifices in the temple of the former kings,

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.21; Couvreur 2.91f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 539f; Yishu 32:52.21a; tr. Legge 2.119;

tls:text.tls:line: These they employed at he sacrifices in the temple of the former kings,

sense.def: oxtail banner; oxtail pennant

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.22; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: When the ruler hears the sound of the bell,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.23; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.57f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: he thinks of his officers who die in defence of his frontiers.

sense.def: boundaries (of a state, or between fields)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.23; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.57f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: The stringed instruments give out a melancholy sound,

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.23; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.57f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: which produces purity of thought and fidelity,

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.23; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.57f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: When the ruler hears the sound of the lute and cithern,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:text.tls:srcline:
君子聽竽、
笙、簫、
管之聲

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.24; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b-23a; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: When the ruler hears the sound of his organs, pipes, and flutes,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.24; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b-23a; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: When the ruler hears the sound of his drums and tambours,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.24; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b-23a; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: he thinks of his leaders and commanders.

sense.def: generals, military leaders

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.24; Couvreur 2.92f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 540; Yishu 32:52.22b-23a; tr. Legge 2.120;

tls:text.tls:line: When a superior man thus hears his musical instruments,

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.25; Couvreur 2.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 541; Yishu 32:52.26a; tr. Legge 2.121;

tls:text.tls:line: 'How is it that (when the performance has commenced)

sense.def: intone (poetry, sounds, tunes) with deep, often with drawn-out, emotion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.25; Couvreur 2.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 541; Yishu 32:52.26a; tr. Legge 2.121;

tls:text.tls:line: 'How is it that (when the performance has commenced)

sense.def: to sigh about, heave sighs concerning (often sighs of admiration)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.26; Couvreur 2.94f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 541f; Yishu 32:52.26a; tr. Legge 2.121;

tls:text.tls:line: 'To show his apprehension that some (princes) might not come up in time for the engagement.'

sense.def: catch up, overtake; come in time for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.29; Couvreur 2.96; Su1n Xïda4n 10.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 543; Yishu 32:52.29b; tr. Legge 2.122;

tls:text.tls:line: but let me ask

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.31; Couvreur 2.97f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 543; Yishu 32:52.31b; tr. Legge 2.122;

tls:text.tls:line: in the second, they show the extinction of Shang;

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.31; Couvreur 2.97f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 543; Yishu 32:52.31b; tr. Legge 2.122;

tls:text.tls:line: in the fourth, they show the laying out of the Southern states;

sense.def: general: border between any type of territory; border territory [the result of a systematic division of a large tract of land into fields (mǔ 畝)] [Jens]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.36; Couvreur 2.99f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 543; Yishu 32:52.36a; tr. Legge 2.123;

tls:text.tls:line: The shields and spears were turned upside down

sense.def: turn upside down; pervert

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.36; Couvreur 2.99f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 543; Yishu 32:52.36a; tr. Legge 2.123;

tls:text.tls:line: and conveyed away, wrapped in tiger skins, which were styled "the appointed cases."

sense.def: hide, skin or hide which originally had hair on it or was furry; whole skin of an animal

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.36; Couvreur 2.99f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 543; Yishu 32:52.36a; tr. Legge 2.123;

tls:text.tls:line: The leaders and commanders

sense.def: generals, military leaders

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.39; Couvreur 2.102; Su1n Xïda4n 10.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 543f; Yishu 32:52.42a; tr. Legge 2.124;

tls:text.tls:line: he himself (the son of Heaven) had his breast bared and cut up the animals.

sense.def: kill (a sacrificial animal) by cutting up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.40; Couvreur 2.102; Su1n Xïda4n 10.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 544; Yishu 32:52.42b; tr. Legge 2.125;

tls:text.tls:line: and the interaction of ceremonies and music was established;

sense.def: be in harmonious unison

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.41; Couvreur 2.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 546; Yishu 32:52.43a; tr. Legge 2.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Ceremonies and music should not for a moment be neglected by any one.

sense.def: for a short while; for as much as one moment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.41; Couvreur 2.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 546; Yishu 32:52.43a; tr. Legge 2.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Ceremonies and music should not for a moment be neglected by any one.

sense.def: moment of time

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.42; Couvreur 2.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.67f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 546; Yishu 32:52.43a-44b; tr. Legge 2.125;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. 'When one has mastered completely (the principle of) ceremonies so as to regulate his person accordingly, he becomes grave and reverential.

sense.def: person; formal or poetic: his person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.42; Couvreur 2.103f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.67f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 546; Yishu 32:52.43a-44b; tr. Legge 2.125;

tls:text.tls:line: If the heart be for a moment without the feeling of harmony and joy,

sense.def: for a short while; for as much as one moment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.43; Couvreur 2.104f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 546; Yishu 32:52.46a; tr. Legge 2.126;

tls:text.tls:line: the people behold his countenance

sense.def: look upwards towards something/someone (as in awe), look in front; look into the distance (LISAO 瞻前而顧後)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.43; Couvreur 2.104f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 546; Yishu 32:52.46a; tr. Legge 2.126;

tls:text.tls:line: the people behold his countenance

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.45; Couvreur 2.105f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 547; Yishu 32:52.47b; tr. Legge 2.126;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence it is the rule to make ceremonies as few and brief as possible,

sense.def: economy; reduction, decreasing, diminishing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.47; Couvreur 2.106f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.50a; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: That pleasure must arise from the modulation of the sounds,

sense.def: "the sounds of music", the sound of music including instrumental and vocal sound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.47; Couvreur 2.106f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.50a; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: These modulations and movements

sense.def: "the sounds of music", the sound of music including instrumental and vocal sound

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.48; Couvreur 2.106f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.50a; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus men will not be without the ministration of pleasure,

sense.def: be able to (loan for 能)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.48; Couvreur 2.106f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.50a; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: and pleasure will not be without its embodiment,

sense.def: be able to (loan for 能)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.48; Couvreur 2.106f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.50a; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: it is impossible that disorder should not arise.

sense.def: be able to (loan for 能)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.49; Couvreur 2.106f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.50a-50b; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: The ancient kings, feeling that they would feel ashamed (in the event of such disorder arising),

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.49; Couvreur 2.106f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.50a-50b; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: without including any looseness of thought or depraved air to be suggested.

sense.def: unrestrained, not properly controlled

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.50; Couvreur 2.108f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.52b; tr. Legge 2.127;

tls:text.tls:line: Within the gate of the family,

sense.def: what it inside doors: private quarters; room; rooms of the palace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.52; Couvreur 2.109f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.55a; tr. Legge 2.128;

tls:text.tls:line: From the manner in which the shields and axes are held and brandished,

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.52; Couvreur 2.109f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.55a; tr. Legge 2.128;

tls:text.tls:line: and from the movements of the body in practice with them, now turned up, now bent down, now retiring, now stretching forward,

sense.def: salutation with a bow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.52; Couvreur 2.109f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.55a; tr. Legge 2.128;

tls:text.tls:line: and from the movements of the body in practice with them, now turned up, now bent down, now retiring, now stretching forward,

sense.def: the action of throwing one's head back so as to face upwards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.52; Couvreur 2.109f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.55a; tr. Legge 2.128;

tls:text.tls:line: and from the movements of the body in practice with them, now turned up, now bent down, now retiring, now stretching forward,

sense.def: retiring, withdrawing movement of the body

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.52; Couvreur 2.109f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.71f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 548; Yishu 32:52.55a; tr. Legge 2.128;

tls:text.tls:line: and from the movements of the body in practice with them, now turned up, now bent down, now retiring, now stretching forward,

sense.def: the action of stretching out

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.55; Couvreur 2.110f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.59a; tr. Legge 2.129;

tls:text.tls:line: and am not worthy to be asked what songs are appropriate for particular individuals;

sense.def: how on earth? How on earth could you/he/I? 回何敢死？ 丘何敢乎？何足憂？

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.56; Couvreur 2.111; Su1n Xïda4n 10.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.59a-59b; tr. Legge 2.129;

tls:text.tls:line: is for one to make himself right, and then to display his virtue.

sense.def: be straight and strict with (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.56; Couvreur 2.111; Su1n Xïda4n 10.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.59a-59b; tr. Legge 2.129;

tls:text.tls:line: is for one to make himself right, and then to display his virtue.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.56; Couvreur 2.111; Su1n Xïda4n 10.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.59a-59b; tr. Legge 2.129;

tls:text.tls:line: When he has thus put himself in a position to act, Heaven and Earth resond to him,

sense.def: cause (oneself) to move

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.56; Couvreur 2.111; Su1n Xïda4n 10.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.59a-59b; tr. Legge 2.129;

tls:text.tls:line: When he has thus put himself in a position to act, Heaven and Earth resond to him,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.56; Couvreur 2.111; Su1n Xïda4n 10.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.59a-59b; tr. Legge 2.129;

tls:text.tls:line: the stars and constellations observe their proper laws,

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.56; Couvreur 2.111; Su1n Xïda4n 10.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.59a-59b; tr. Legge 2.129;

tls:text.tls:line: and all thing are nourished and thrive.'

sense.def: be nurtured; be raised; be properly nurtured

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.58; Couvreur 2.112f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.62b-63a; tr. Legge 2.130;
