tls:text.tls:line: and having been remembered by the people of Khi,

sense.def: be still aware of, remember; make sure one remembers; keep in mind; take note of; be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 19.03.60; Couvreur 2.112f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 550; Yishu 32:52.64a; tr. Legge 2.130;

tls:text.tls:line: the high notes rise as if they were borne aloft;

sense.def: be lifted high

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.05; Couvreur 2.117f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 554; Yishu 33:53.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.133;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. In every announcement of a death to the ruler

sense.def: ritually announce the death of someone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.07; Couvreur 2.117f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 554; Yishu 33:53.8a; tr. Legge 2.133;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. When an announcement of the death of a Great officer was sent to another of the same grade,

sense.def: ritually announce the death of someone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.09; Couvreur 2.119f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 554; Yishu 33:53.9a; tr. Legge 2.134;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. In the announcement of the death of an ordinary officer to the same parties, it was made in the same style, only that 'So and so has died,' was employed in all the cases.

sense.def: ritually announce the death of someone

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.11; Couvreur 2.120; Su1n Xïda4n 10.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 555; Yishu 33:53.9b; tr. Legge 2.134;

tls:text.tls:line: A Great officer occupied the mourning shed;

sense.def: mourning shed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.13; Couvreur 2.121f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 556; Yishu 33:53.17a-17b; tr. Legge 2.135;

tls:text.tls:line: was only the same as that of a son by the proper wife who was not a gGreat officer.

sense.def: be of equal status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.14; Couvreur 2.122; Su1n Xïda4n 10.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 556; Yishu 33:53.18b-21a; tr. Legge 2.135;

tls:text.tls:line: The diviner wore a skin cap.

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.15; Couvreur 2.123; Su1n Xïda4n 10.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 556f; Yishu 33:53.23a-24b; tr. Legge 2.135;

tls:text.tls:line: wailed, stamped,

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.15; Couvreur 2.123; Su1n Xïda4n 10.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 556f; Yishu 33:53.23a-24b; tr. Legge 2.135;

tls:text.tls:line: Afther this (the son) folded up the offerings, and read the list (of the gifts that hd been sent).

sense.def: read out, recite or at least mumble (usually prose); pronounce cf. even Jin Yong: 讀給他聽。 聽清客讀了，很感興味。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.15; Couvreur 2.123; Su1n Xïda4n 10.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 556f; Yishu 33:53.23a-24b; tr. Legge 2.135;

tls:text.tls:line: Afther this (the son) folded up the offerings, and read the list (of the gifts that hd been sent).

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.16; Couvreur 2.125; Su1n Xïda4n 10.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 557; Yishu 33:53.25b; tr. Legge 2.136;

sense.def: greenish-yellow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.19; Couvreur 2.127f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 558; Yishu 33:53.31a; tr. Legge 2.137;

tls:text.tls:line: If there had been no such wife,

sense.def: imperial female companion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.21; Couvreur 2.128f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 559; Yishu 33:53.34a-35a; tr. Legge 2.137;

tls:text.tls:line: but if there occurred the placing in its shrine of the tablet of brother who had died prematurely, the cap and other mourning worn during that first year was worn in doing so.

sense.def: bury (someone) in a shared grave

tls:text.tls:srcline:
則自附，
至於練、
祥，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.24; Couvreur 2.131f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.91f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 560; Yishu 33:53.38a-39a; tr. Legge 2.138;

tls:text.tls:line: himself conducted the placing of her tablet (in its proper shrine).

sense.def: the placing of the spirit tablet of the deceased next to that of his ancestor

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.01.24; Couvreur 2.131f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.91f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 560; Yishu 33:53.38a-39a; tr. Legge 2.138;

tls:text.tls:line: did not take place in the principal apartment.

sense.def: to be in; to be at; be conducted in/at (place or time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.02; Couvreur 2.132f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.93f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 561; Yishu 33:54.2a-2b; tr. Legge 2.139;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. On all occasions of mourning, if, before the mourning robes had all been completed,

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.05; Couvreur 2.134f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.95f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 562f; Yishu 33:54.5a; tr. Legge 2.140;

tls:text.tls:line: served to distinguish it from one used on a festive occasion.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.06; Couvreur 2.134f; Su1n Xïda4n 10.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 563; Yishu 33:54.6a; tr. Legge 2.140;

tls:text.tls:line: which then was glazed

sense.def: ashes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.08; Couvreur 2.135f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 563; Yishu 33:54.9a-10a; tr. Legge 2.141;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. (Sometimes) rice was sent,

sense.def: provisions of food

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.08; Couvreur 2.135f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 563; Yishu 33:54.9a-10a; tr. Legge 2.141;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. At the sacrifices (after the sacrifice of Repose), the mourner styled himself 'the filial son,' or 'The filial grandson;'

sense.def: characterised by filial love (see VIRTUE)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.08; Couvreur 2.135f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 563; Yishu 33:54.9a-10a; tr. Legge 2.141;

tls:text.tls:line: at the previous rites, 'The grieving son,' or 'The grieving grandson.'

sense.def: mourning (person) 哀子"mourning son"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.10; Couvreur 2.136f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 564; Yishu 33:54.12a; tr. Legge 2.141;

tls:text.tls:line: but that of skin when sacrificing at his own shrines.

sense.def: his own [thing/interests]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.10; Couvreur 2.136f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 564; Yishu 33:54.12a; tr. Legge 2.141;

tls:text.tls:line: and the cap (of dark cloth) in his own.

sense.def: his own [thing/interests]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.10; Couvreur 2.136f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 564; Yishu 33:54.12a; tr. Legge 2.141;

tls:text.tls:line: at his own shrines.

sense.def: his own [thing/interests]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.13; Couvreur 2.139f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.5f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 565; Yishu 33:54.18a-19a; tr. Legge 2.142;

tls:text.tls:line: When the bier had been removed, the curtain was no more suspanded.

sense.def: be screened (from view)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.15; Couvreur 2.140; Su1n Xïda4n 11.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 566; Yishu 33:54.20a; tr. Legge 2.142;

tls:text.tls:line: (the suit belonging to) the skin cap;

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.26; Couvreur 2.145f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 570; Yishu 33:54.29b; tr. Legge 2.145;

tls:text.tls:line: and descending by the same steps, went towards the east (to deposit it in the proper place).

sense.def: in relation to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.27; Couvreur 2.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 571; Yishu 33:54.31b; tr. Legge 2.145;

tls:text.tls:line: with his left hand holding the neck of the upper garment,

sense.def: with the left hand

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.27; Couvreur 2.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 571; Yishu 33:54.31b; tr. Legge 2.145;

tls:text.tls:line: and with his right the waist.

sense.def: with the right hand

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.28; Couvreur 2.147f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 571; Yishu 33:54.31b; tr. Legge 2.145;

tls:text.tls:line: then the skin cap and clothes which he recieved in the middle of the courtyard;

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.37; Couvreur 2.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 573; Yishu 33:54.35b; tr. Legge 2.147;

tls:text.tls:line: saying that he also firmly declined

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.38; Couvreur 2.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 573; Yishu 33:54.35b; tr. Legge 2.147;

sense.def: a guest of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.38; Couvreur 2.150f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 573; Yishu 33:54.35b; tr. Legge 2.147;

tls:text.tls:line: Since he thus firmly declines what I request,

sense.def: obtain through effort, get hold of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 20.02.42; Couvreur 2.153; Su1n Xïda4n 11.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 574; Yishu 33:54.39a; tr. Legge 2.148;

tls:text.tls:line: 37. The female relatives of the exterior kept in their apartments;

sense.def: in-laws

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.01; Couvreur 2.155f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 575; Yishu 34:55.1a; tr. Legge 2.150;

tls:text.tls:line: if his mother died before the period of mourning was completed,

sense.def: whole (generation) 沒世

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.02; Couvreur 2.155f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 575; Yishu 34:55.2a; tr. Legge 2.150;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. When ocasion occurred for wearing the mourning for uncles or cousins,

sense.def: senior and junior cousins as well as brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.02; Couvreur 2.155f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 575; Yishu 34:55.2a; tr. Legge 2.150;

tls:text.tls:line: then the previous mourning was not laid aside,

sense.def: senior and junior cousins as well as brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.05; Couvreur 2.157f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 576; Yishu 34:55.6b; tr. Legge 2.151;

tls:text.tls:line: if, after the inspection of the washing of the vessel to be used,

sense.def: the washing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.06; Couvreur 2.157f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 576; Yishu 34:55.6b; tr. Legge 2.151;

tls:text.tls:line: If the parent's death took place before the inspection of the washing,

sense.def: the washing

tls:text.tls:srcline:
如諸父、
昆弟、
姑、姊妹之喪，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.06; Couvreur 2.157f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 576; Yishu 34:55.6b; tr. Legge 2.151;

tls:text.tls:line: When the death that occurred was that of an uncle, aunt, or cousin,

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:text.tls:srcline:
如諸父、
昆弟、
姑、姊妹之喪，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.06; Couvreur 2.157f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 576; Yishu 34:55.6b; tr. Legge 2.151;

tls:text.tls:line: When the death that occurred was that of an uncle, aunt, or cousin,

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.10; Couvreur 2.159f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 577; Yishu 34:55.9a; tr. Legge 2.152;

tls:text.tls:line: if a death occurred in the family of a brother or cousin,

sense.def: a brother; brothers; elder and younger brothers, the flock of brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.12; Couvreur 2.160f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 578; Yishu 34:55.10a; tr. Legge 2.152;

tls:text.tls:line: all sipped the cups presented to htem.

sense.def: sip, drink; taste

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.14; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.12b; tr. Legge 2.153;

tls:text.tls:line: grief is next to it;

sense.def: mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.14; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.12b; tr. Legge 2.153;

tls:text.tls:line: The face should wear the appearance of the inward feeling,

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.14; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.12b; tr. Legge 2.153;

tls:text.tls:line: The face should wear the appearance of the inward feeling,

sense.def: weigh against; balance out; match up to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.14; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.12b; tr. Legge 2.153;

tls:text.tls:line: The face should wear the appearance of the inward feeling,

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.15; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.12b-14a; tr. Legge 2.153;

tls:text.tls:line: He begged to ask about the mourning for a brother,

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.15; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.12b-14a; tr. Legge 2.153;

tls:text.tls:line: are to be found in the tablets where they are written.'

sense.def: documents, books

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.16; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.14b; tr. Legge 2.153;

tls:text.tls:line: for the (first) year they were full of grief;

sense.def: feel intense grief, be very saddened

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.17; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.15a; tr. Legge 2.154;

tls:text.tls:line: In the shed

sense.def: mourning shed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.18; Couvreur 2.162f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 579; Yishu 34:55.15a; tr. Legge 2.154;

tls:text.tls:line: To occupy the shed

sense.def: live in the mourning shed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.19; Couvreur 2.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 580; Yishu 34:55.16a-17b; tr. Legge 2.154;

tls:text.tls:line: that for a father's sister or one's own sister was like that for a cousin;

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.19; Couvreur 2.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 580; Yishu 34:55.16a-17b; tr. Legge 2.154;

tls:text.tls:line: that for a father's sister or one's own sister was like that for a cousin;

sense.def: one's brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.19; Couvreur 2.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 580; Yishu 34:55.16a-17b; tr. Legge 2.154;

tls:text.tls:line: But (beyond) what appears in the countenance is this,

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.20; Couvreur 2.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 580; Yishu 34:55.18a; tr. Legge 2.154;

tls:text.tls:line: if, when walking along the road,

sense.def: the roads, all kinds of roads

tls:text.tls:srcline: 顏色戚容必有以異於人也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.20; Couvreur 2.163f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 580; Yishu 34:55.18a; tr. Legge 2.154;

tls:text.tls:line: there will be something in his face and distressed manner different from other men.

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.23; Couvreur 2.166; Su1n Xïda4n 11.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5i1f; Yishu 34:55.21b; tr. Legge 2.155;

tls:text.tls:line: he put a stop to it, and went to salute and bow to him.

sense.def: stop (the current practice of) V-ing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.26; Couvreur 2.168f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5i3; Yishu 34:55.24b; tr. Legge 2.156;

tls:text.tls:line: After this (it was made a rule

sense.def: thereafter, from then on, from that point onwards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.27; Couvreur 2.168f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5i3f; Yishu 34:55.25a-25b; tr. Legge 2.156;

tls:text.tls:line: From the enshrouding to thte slighter dressing,

sense.def: from N1 until N2 自從。。。至於

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.29; Couvreur 2.169f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5i4; Yishu 34:55.26a; tr. Legge 2.156;

tls:text.tls:line: When a son treats his parents in this way as his (honoured) guests,

sense.def: treat as a guest of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.29; Couvreur 2.169f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 5i4; Yishu 34:55.26a; tr. Legge 2.156;

tls:text.tls:line: it is an expression of his grief (for their loss).

sense.def: mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.31; Couvreur 2.169f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 585; Yishu 34:55.28a; tr. Legge 2.157;

tls:text.tls:line: he recieved it in his sackcloth and band.

sense.def: clad in traditional mourning garments (typically made of sack-cloth, with rough band as belt)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.35; Couvreur 2.172f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 586; Yishu 34:55.30b; tr. Legge 2.158;

tls:text.tls:line: one went to condole with another in the same district,

sense.def: neighbour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.37; Couvreur 2.172f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 586; Yishu 34:55.32a; tr. Legge 2.159;

tls:text.tls:line: If they were intimate friends,

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.38; Couvreur 2.172f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 586; Yishu 34:55.32b; tr. Legge 2.159;

tls:text.tls:line: Those of the same district who were fifty followed him back to the house and wailed;

sense.def: neighbour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.39; Couvreur 2.175f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 587; Yishu 34:55.33b; tr. Legge 2.159;

tls:text.tls:line: If he through satiety forgot his sorrow,

sense.def: forget about> ignore, neglect; disregard (sometimes: the fact that S); fail to pay proper careful attention to, heed, fail to be mindful of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.39; Couvreur 2.175f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 587; Yishu 34:55.33b; tr. Legge 2.159;

tls:text.tls:line: If he through satiety forgot his sorrow,

sense.def: mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.40; Couvreur 2.175f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 587; Yishu 34:55.33b; tr. Legge 2.159;

tls:text.tls:line: should not walk correctly

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.40; Couvreur 2.175f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.37; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 587; Yishu 34:55.33b; tr. Legge 2.159;

tls:text.tls:line: or be unconscious of his occasion for sorrow;

sense.def: regard as distressing, embarrassing or dissatisfying; feel and show strong dissatisfaction with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.01.44; Couvreur 2.177f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.37f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 588; Yishu 34:55.35a-35b; tr. Legge 2.160;

tls:text.tls:line: one was not seen on the road with the mourning cap, which was used instead of the ordinary one.

sense.def: path; way; road

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.01; Couvreur 2.179; Su1n Xïda4n 11.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 590; Yishu 34:56.1a; tr. Legge 2.161;

tls:text.tls:line: of his father's aunts or sisters.

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.01; Couvreur 2.179; Su1n Xïda4n 11.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 590; Yishu 34:56.1a; tr. Legge 2.161;

tls:text.tls:line: he did not use when at her side.

sense.def: side, position next to a person; environment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.02; Couvreur 2.180; Su1n Xïda4n 11.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 591; Yishu 34:56.3a; tr. Legge 2.162;

tls:text.tls:line: the subject went in, wailed and leaped,

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.04; Couvreur 2.180; Su1n Xïda4n 11.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 591; Yishu 34:56.4a-4b; tr. Legge 2.162;

tls:text.tls:line: Although one himself

sense.def: oneself (emphatic, contrasting with others)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.05; Couvreur 2.1i1; Su1n Xïda4n 11.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 591; Yishu 34:56.8a; tr. Legge 2.162;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. Whenever he wore the cap of skin with a sackcloth band (in paying a visit of condolence),

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.07; Couvreur 2.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 592; Yishu 34:56.10b; tr. Legge 2.162;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. When an aunt of sister died (leaving no son),

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.07; Couvreur 2.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 592; Yishu 34:56.10b; tr. Legge 2.162;

tls:text.tls:line: her husband (also) were dead,

sense.def: ego's husband; [occasionally understood as "potential husbands"]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.07; Couvreur 2.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 592; Yishu 34:56.10b; tr. Legge 2.162;

tls:text.tls:line: her husband (also) were dead,

sense.def: be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.07; Couvreur 2.1i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 592; Yishu 34:56.10b; tr. Legge 2.162;

tls:text.tls:line: and there were no brother or cousin in his relative circle,

sense.def: one's brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.10; Couvreur 2.1i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 593; Yishu 34:56.13a; tr. Legge 2.163;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. A lad, when wailing, did not sob or quaver;

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.10; Couvreur 2.1i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 593; Yishu 34:56.13a; tr. Legge 2.163;

tls:text.tls:line: did not leap;

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.10; Couvreur 2.1i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 593; Yishu 34:56.13a; tr. Legge 2.163;

tls:text.tls:line: and did not occupy the mourning shed.

sense.def: live in the mourning shed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.11; Couvreur 2.1i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 593; Yishu 34:56.13a; tr. Legge 2.163;

tls:text.tls:line: For aunts and sisters the mourning for nine months is worn,

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.14; Couvreur 2.1i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 594; Yishu 34:56.15b; tr. Legge 2.164;

tls:text.tls:line: and the same month the wailing was ended.

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.15; Couvreur 2.185f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 594; Yishu 34:56.17a; tr. Legge 2.164;

tls:text.tls:line: All these things were transacted on the same day,

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.16; Couvreur 2.185f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 594; Yishu 34:56.17a; tr. Legge 2.164;

tls:text.tls:line: When a Great officer of high minister was buried,

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.17; Couvreur 2.185f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 594; Yishu 34:56.17b; tr. Legge 2.164;

tls:text.tls:line: they were all gagged.

sense.def: small branch growing immediately on the main trunk; minor branch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.17; Couvreur 2.185f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 594; Yishu 34:56.17b; tr. Legge 2.164;

tls:text.tls:line: The minister of War superintended the clappers;

sense.def: bell with a tongue, often used in warfare to declare war ritually. The tongue can be of timber (for ritual purposes) or of metal (for open air use in warfare with zhēng 鉦)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.20; Couvreur 2.186f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 595; Yishu 34:56.19a; tr. Legge 2.165;

tls:text.tls:line: A superior man will not encroach on (the observances of) those above him,

sense.def: usurp the authority of, encroach on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.20; Couvreur 2.186f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 595; Yishu 34:56.19a; tr. Legge 2.165;

tls:text.tls:line: nor put difficulties in the way of those below him.'

sense.def: encroach on, exert pressure on; exert undue pressure on (those above or below)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.22; Couvreur 2.187f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.48f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 596; Yishu 34:56.20b-21b; tr. Legge 2.166;

tls:text.tls:line: she entered by the women's gate,

sense.def: minor door; minor entrance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.22; Couvreur 2.187f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.48f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 596; Yishu 34:56.20b-21b; tr. Legge 2.166;

tls:text.tls:line: she entered by the women's gate,

sense.def: minor gate inside a palace; minor entrance; minor gate

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.24; Couvreur 2.189; Su1n Xïda4n 11.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.22a; tr. Legge 2.166;

tls:text.tls:line: There are five things that occasion shame to a superior man (who is engaged in governmental duties):

sense.def: what is a public disgrace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.24; Couvreur 2.189; Su1n Xïda4n 11.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.22a; tr. Legge 2.166;

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.24; Couvreur 2.189; Su1n Xïda4n 11.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.22a; tr. Legge 2.166;

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.25; Couvreur 2.189; Su1n Xïda4n 11.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.22a; tr. Legge 2.166;

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.25; Couvreur 2.189; Su1n Xïda4n 11.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.22a; tr. Legge 2.166;

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.25; Couvreur 2.189; Su1n Xïda4n 11.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.22a; tr. Legge 2.166;

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.26; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.23b-24b; tr. Legge 2.166;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In bad years they used in their carriages their poorest horses,

sense.def: of horses (and sometimes men): weak, of bad quality, not very useful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.26; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.23b-24b; tr. Legge 2.166;

tls:text.tls:line: Those rites were thus committed at that time to writing.

sense.def: N thus/therefore VERBed.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.26; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597; Yishu 34:56.23b-24b; tr. Legge 2.166;

tls:text.tls:line: Those rites were thus committed at that time to writing.

sense.def: write the contextually determinate thing down; make a written record of a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.27; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597f; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: 23. Zǐgòng having gone to see the là agricultural sacrifice at the end of the year,

sense.def: to visit (a place); survey (an event); survey intellectually

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.27; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597f; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: 23. Zǐgòng having gone to see the là agricultural sacrifice at the end of the year,

sense.def: sacrifice to Heaven and Earth organised by the Son of Heaven and the feudal lords, held in october (loan for 腊)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.27; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597f; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: 'My friend Zǐgòng, did you enjoy yourself (on the occasion)?'

sense.def: you, my friend Npr

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.27; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597f; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: 'My friend Zǐgòng, did you enjoy yourself (on the occasion)?'

sense.def: (of persons) feel deeply moved in the direction of harmonious delight, be full of joy; be joyfully satisfied

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.27; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597f; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Everyone throughout the whole state was like a madman;

sense.def: the whole of (a state etc), a whole 一國"the whole country"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.27; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 597f; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Everyone throughout the whole state was like a madman;

sense.def: 大巧若拙 be as if Ving

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.28; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 598; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: if it were always drawn and never relaxed;

sense.def: See 周文王

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.28; Couvreur 2.190f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 598; Yishu 34:56.24b; tr. Legge 2.167;

tls:text.tls:line: if it were always drawn and never relaxed;

sense.def: See 周武王

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.30; Couvreur 2.191f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 598; Yishu 34:56.28b; tr. Legge 2.168;

tls:text.tls:line: 26. The mourning of a ruler and his wife

sense.def: in-laws

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.31; Couvreur 2.192f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 599; Yishu 34:56.30a; tr. Legge 2.168;

tls:text.tls:line: 27. When the stables of Confucius were burned,

sense.def: horse stable; occasionally: fodder house (for horse fodder)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.31; Couvreur 2.192f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 599; Yishu 34:56.30a; tr. Legge 2.168;

tls:text.tls:line: 27. When the stables of Confucius were burned,

sense.def: burn down; burn; catch fire

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.31; Couvreur 2.192f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 599; Yishu 34:56.30a; tr. Legge 2.168;

tls:text.tls:line: and the friends of his district came (to offer their condolences) on account of the fire,

sense.def: neighbour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.31; Couvreur 2.192f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 599; Yishu 34:56.30a; tr. Legge 2.168;

tls:text.tls:line: once to the ordinary officers,

sense.def: do something once

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.31; Couvreur 2.192f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 599; Yishu 34:56.30a; tr. Legge 2.168;

tls:text.tls:line: and twice to the Great officers;

sense.def: occasionally used verbally in plain sense: repeat, do something twice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.34; Couvreur 2.193f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.53f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 600; Yishu 34:56.31a-31b; tr. Legge 2.168;

tls:text.tls:line: he called him by the name given him on his maturity.

sense.def: courtesy name

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、宗人、
宰夫、
雍人，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.37; Couvreur 2.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 601; Yishu 34:56.34b; tr. Legge 2.169;

tls:text.tls:line: - The officer of prayer, the cook, and the butcher,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline:
祝、宗人、
宰夫、
雍人，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.37; Couvreur 2.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 601; Yishu 34:56.34b; tr. Legge 2.169;

tls:text.tls:line: - The officer of prayer, the cook, and the butcher,

sense.def: official in charge of the clan sacrifices

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.37; Couvreur 2.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 601; Yishu 34:56.34b; tr. Legge 2.169;

tls:text.tls:line: The butcher rubbed the sheep clean,

sense.def: wipe; wipe off

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.37; Couvreur 2.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 601; Yishu 34:56.34b; tr. Legge 2.169;

tls:text.tls:line: took it to the pillar

sense.def: (sometimes inscribed?) pillar; post

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.39; Couvreur 2.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 601; Yishu 34:56.34b-35a; tr. Legge 2.169;

tls:text.tls:line: the officer of prayer announced that it was so,

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.40; Couvreur 2.195f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 601; Yishu 34:56.35a; tr. Legge 2.169;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The blood-consecration has been performed.'

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.42; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 602; Yishu 34:56.37b-38a; tr. Legge 2.170;

tls:text.tls:line: 34. When a feudal lord sent his wife away,

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.42; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 602; Yishu 34:56.37b-38a; tr. Legge 2.170;

tls:text.tls:line: 'My poor ruler, from his want of ability,

sense.def: be incompetent (typically used in polite speech of oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.44; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 602f; Yishu 34:56.39a; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: 'So and so, through her want of ability,

sense.def: be incompetent (typically used in polite speech of oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.45; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603; Yishu 34:56.39a; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: the principal party bowing to him, and escorting him.

sense.def: accompany some way upon departure

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.45; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603; Yishu 34:56.39a; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: then he named himself;

sense.def: father-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.45; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603; Yishu 34:56.39a; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: if he were dead,

sense.def: have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.46; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603; Yishu 34:56.39a; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: (At the other end of the transaction), if the lady were an aunt, an elder sister, or a younger,

sense.def: aunt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.46; Couvreur 2.197f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603; Yishu 34:56.39a; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: (At the other end of the transaction), if the lady were an aunt, an elder sister, or a younger,

sense.def: one's sister

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.47; Couvreur 2.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603f; Yishu 34:56.40b; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: When I was about to take the concluding potions,

sense.def: LIJI: add liquid to the rice before and eat it, probably at the end of a meal (see WANGLI: 1661)Rarely also: 'eat a warm meal'GY 08.01.03/287 優施出， 里克辟奠， 不飧而寑〔一〕。 ( 飧 : 熟食曰飧。 )

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.47; Couvreur 2.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603f; Yishu 34:56.40b; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: "I would not injure you

sense.def: coarse, unrefined (food) 疏食

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.47; Couvreur 2.199f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 603f; Yishu 34:56.40b; tr. Legge 2.171;

tls:text.tls:line: "I would not injure you

sense.def: Note that Lù Démíng reads this meaning as sì in several places of 經典釋文: provisions; food supply; staple food; food for general sustenance while at home; (e.g. beg for) something to eat; food supplies; fodder (e.g. for horses)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.48; Couvreur 2.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.59f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 604; Yishu 34:56.41b-42a; tr. Legge 2.172;

tls:text.tls:line: her (husband's) unmarried aunts and sisters

sense.def: one's brothers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 21.02.49; Couvreur 2.200f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 604; Yishu 34:56.42a; tr. Legge 2.172;

tls:text.tls:line: the rule was for a young lady to wear the hair-pin;

sense.def: [put on a hairpin as sign of maturity >][CA] (of girls) ca. 15 years of age [LIJI age of 20][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.01; Couvreur 2.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 607; Yishu 35:57.1b; tr. Legge 2.173;

tls:text.tls:line: all about the establishment was swept clean, inside and out.

sense.def: be swept clean

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.01; Couvreur 2.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 607; Yishu 35:57.1b; tr. Legge 2.173;

tls:text.tls:line: The clothes ordinarily worn were removed,

sense.def: favoured; intimate; private (dress; 褻衣 underwear); informal (dress 褻服 informal dress)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.01; Couvreur 2.202f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 607; Yishu 35:57.1b; tr. Legge 2.173;

tls:text.tls:line: and new clothes substituted for them.

sense.def: new; unused; newly established (ruler)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.06; Couvreur 2.204f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.67f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 609; Yishu 35:57.9a; tr. Legge 2.175;

tls:text.tls:line: and a woman by her designation.

sense.def: courtesy name

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.07; Couvreur 2.206f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 610; Yishu 35:57.10a; tr. Legge 2.175;

tls:text.tls:line: his female relatives wailed and leaped.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:text.tls:srcline:
外命婦率外宗哭于堂上，
北面。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.08; Couvreur 2.206f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 610; Yishu 35:57.11a; tr. Legge 2.175;

tls:text.tls:line: and the wives, his relatives of the same surname,m whose position had been confirmed in their relation to their husbands, at the head of all the others married similarly to husbands of other surnames, wailed above in the hall, facing the north.

sense.def: in-laws

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.09; Couvreur 2.206f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.70; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 610; Yishu 35:57.13a; tr. Legge 2.175;

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever they wailed by the corpse in the apartment,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.14; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611; Yishu 35:57.17a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: the preceeding mourner took his place inside the door (on the east of it),

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.15; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611; Yishu 35:57.17a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: and bound up his hair with sackcloth.

sense.def: tie; bind; tie up; bring together

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.15; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611; Yishu 35:57.17a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: and bound up his hair with sackcloth.

sense.def: hair; human hair on the head

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.15; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611; Yishu 35:57.17a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: and bound up his hair with sackcloth.

sense.def: hemp, sackcloth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.15; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611; Yishu 35:57.17a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: and put on the sackcloth girdle in her room.

sense.def: non-main roomBUDDH: cell

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.16; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611f; Yishu 35:57.19a-20a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of (the three grades of) officers, they recieved three side-bows, one for each grade.

sense.def: sideways, towards the side 旁出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.16; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611f; Yishu 35:57.19a-20a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of (the three grades of) officers, they recieved three side-bows, one for each grade.

sense.def: bow (thrice)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.16; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611f; Yishu 35:57.19a-20a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: With regard to the wives of Great officers and of other officers, she bowed especially

sense.def: especially; very; singularily; for the sole purpose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.16; Couvreur 2.210f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 611f; Yishu 35:57.19a-20a; tr. Legge 2.177;

tls:text.tls:line: to each whose position had recieved the oficial appointment; - all above in the hall.

sense.def: all objects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.20; Couvreur 2.212f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 612; Yishu 35:57.25b; tr. Legge 2.179;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. When the guests went out, the curtain was removed.

sense.def: distinguished guest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.20; Couvreur 2.212f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 612; Yishu 35:57.25b; tr. Legge 2.179;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. When the guests went out, the curtain was removed.

sense.def: remove; send away; pull down

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.20; Couvreur 2.212f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 612; Yishu 35:57.25b; tr. Legge 2.179;

tls:text.tls:line: 16. When the guests went out, the curtain was removed.

sense.def: ZUO Xuan 17: area sealed off by curtains, tent (without roof) to prevent outsiders from seeing what is going on inside; certain

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.29; Couvreur 2.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.34b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Over these they placed the couch with a single sheet

sense.def: ZUO, LIJI: bamboo mat placed on bed, bed-mat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.29; Couvreur 2.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.34b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and covered with a large sheet.

sense.def: to be covered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.29; Couvreur 2.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.34b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: A servant plugged the mouth open with the spoon of horn;

sense.def: to insert a wedge between (the teeth of a corpse)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.29; Couvreur 2.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.34b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: A servant plugged the mouth open with the spoon of horn;

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.29; Couvreur 2.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.34b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: A servant plugged the mouth open with the spoon of horn;

sense.def: YILI: large spoon, small ladle used in funeral contexts in serving libation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.29; Couvreur 2.218f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.34b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and to keep the feet from contracting, and easy stool was employed.

sense.def: read jī: small table, low table

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.30; Couvreur 2.219f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.35b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. The servant in charge of the apartments drew the water,

sense.def: fetch water, draw water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.30; Couvreur 2.219f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.35b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: four lower servants holding up the sheet,

sense.def: to lift; lift up; raise

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.31; Couvreur 2.219f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 615; Yishu 35:57.35b; tr. Legge 2.1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: the female attendants in waiting in the inner room held up the sheet and washed the body.

sense.def: to lift; lift up; raise

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.38; Couvreur 2.222f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 617; Yishu 35:57.42a; tr. Legge 2.1i4;

tls:text.tls:line: When they first ate flesh, it was dry flesh;

sense.def: dried up; parched

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.38; Couvreur 2.222f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 617; Yishu 35:57.42a; tr. Legge 2.1i4;

tls:text.tls:line: when they first drank liquor, it was that newly made.

sense.def: sweet wine; must

tls:text.tls:srcline:
壹不食，
再不食可也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.41; Couvreur 2.224f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 617f; Yishu 35:57.43b; tr. Legge 2.1i4;

tls:text.tls:line: it was allowable to abstain from eating once or twice.

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:text.tls:srcline:
壹不食，
再不食可也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.41; Couvreur 2.224f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 617f; Yishu 35:57.43b; tr. Legge 2.1i4;

tls:text.tls:line: it was allowable to abstain from eating once or twice.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.01.43; Couvreur 2.224f; Su1n Xïda4n 11.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 618; Yishu 35:57.44a; tr. Legge 2.185;

tls:text.tls:line: if a Great officer or a friend of his father did so,

sense.def: friend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.02; Couvreur 2.226f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 619; Yishu 35:58.1b; tr. Legge 2.185;

tls:text.tls:line: the sash and sheet were not among them.

sense.def: shroud

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.06; Couvreur 2.227f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 620; Yishu 35:58.5b; tr. Legge 2.186;

tls:text.tls:line: and then they used those contributed by their realtives;

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.10; Couvreur 2.230f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 621; Yishu 35:58.10a-10b; tr. Legge 2.188;

tls:text.tls:line: they, after the work was done, omitted a meal.

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.13; Couvreur 2.233f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 622; Yishu 35:58.12b; tr. Legge 2.188;

tls:text.tls:line: The female relations from other states were int their apartments with their faces to the south.7

sense.def: in-laws

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.15; Couvreur 2.234f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.13b-14a; tr. Legge 2.189;

tls:text.tls:line: outside which the exorcist stopped.

sense.def: shamaness; (but note GUAN 女巫 ); generally: shaman; exorcist GY: 如是則明神降之〔六〕，在男曰覡，在女曰巫〔七〕。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.15; Couvreur 2.234f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.13b-14a; tr. Legge 2.189;

tls:text.tls:line: and the blesser preceeding him, entered and went up to the hall.

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:text.tls:srcline: 卿大夫即位于堂廉楹西，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.16; Couvreur 2.234f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.14a; tr. Legge 2.189;

tls:text.tls:line: while the ministers and Great officers took theirs at the corner of the hall on the west of the pillar,

sense.def: pillar in front of the main hall, on the main platform in front of the main hall; but the term can also be used to refer quite generally to a pillar of any kind, including the structurally crucial zhù 柱.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.20; Couvreur 2.236f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.16b; tr. Legge 2.190;

tls:text.tls:line: A ruler laid his hand on the body of a minister;

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.20; Couvreur 2.236f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.16b; tr. Legge 2.190;

tls:text.tls:line: parents, while bending over that of a son, also took hold of his hand.

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.20; Couvreur 2.236f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.16b; tr. Legge 2.190;

tls:text.tls:line: A son bent over his parents, bringing his breast to theirs.

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.20; Couvreur 2.236f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.16b; tr. Legge 2.190;

tls:text.tls:line: A wife seemed as if she would place her two arms beneath the bodies of her parents-in-law;

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.20; Couvreur 2.236f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.16b; tr. Legge 2.190;

tls:text.tls:line: while they (simply) laid their hands on her.

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.20; Couvreur 2.236f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 623; Yishu 35:58.16b; tr. Legge 2.190;

tls:text.tls:line: A wife made as if she would cling to her husbvand's body;

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.22; Couvreur 2.238f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 624; Yishu 35:58.18b; tr. Legge 2.191;

tls:text.tls:line: nd the hut was plastered, but not on the outside which could be seen.

sense.def: to be in; to be at; be conducted in/at (place or time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.23; Couvreur 2.238f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 624f; Yishu 35:58.18b-20a; tr. Legge 2.191;

tls:text.tls:line: even before the burial had huts made for themselves in out-of-the-way places.

sense.def: mourning shed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.25; Couvreur 2.239f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 625; Yishu 35:58.21a; tr. Legge 2.192;

tls:text.tls:line: then the ruler consulted about the government of the state;

sense.def: administration of (some state N etc) Note: 夏政 1. administration by the Xia; 2. administration of the Xia kingdom

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.27; Couvreur 2.241f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 625; Yishu 35:58.22a; tr. Legge 2.192;

tls:text.tls:line: 20... At the one year's mourning, he occupied the hut;

sense.def: mourning shed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.28; Couvreur 2.241f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 625; Yishu 35:58.22a-24a; tr. Legge 2.192;

tls:text.tls:line: A wife did not occupy hte hut,

sense.def: mourning shed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.30; Couvreur 2.243f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 627; Yishu 35:58.26b; tr. Legge 2.193;

tls:text.tls:line: 24. At the mourning rites for a Great officer or his acknowledged wife,

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.32; Couvreur 2.244f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 627; Yishu 35:58.28a; tr. Legge 2.194;

tls:text.tls:line: The exorcist stoopped outside,

sense.def: shamaness; (but note GUAN 女巫 ); generally: shaman; exorcist GY: 如是則明神降之〔六〕，在男曰覡，在女曰巫〔七〕。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.32; Couvreur 2.244f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 627; Yishu 35:58.28a; tr. Legge 2.194;

tls:text.tls:line: and the blesser took his place,

sense.def: invocator, impersonator of the dead ancestor at prayer; person in charge of ancestral prayers; prayer-master

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.35; Couvreur 2.246; Su1n Xïda4n 12.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 627; Yishu 35:58.30a; tr. Legge 2.194;

tls:text.tls:line: 27. When a Great officer was ill,

sense.def: at the time of S1, N V-ed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.35; Couvreur 2.246; Su1n Xïda4n 12.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 627; Yishu 35:58.30a; tr. Legge 2.194;

tls:text.tls:line: visited (his son) once.

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.38; Couvreur 2.246f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 627; Yishu 35:58.32a; tr. Legge 2.195;

tls:text.tls:line: or visitors from the neighbouring states,

sense.def: neighbouring 四鄰諸侯

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.38; Couvreur 2.246f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 627; Yishu 35:58.32a; tr. Legge 2.195;

tls:text.tls:line: or visitors from the neighbouring states,

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.40; Couvreur 2.249f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 629; Yishu 35:58.34a; tr. Legge 2.196;

tls:text.tls:line: and the innnermost, four inches.z

sense.def: LIJI: ritual coffin made for the ruler on his accession to the throne and lacquered afresh every year; also used as a dignified general term for a coffin.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.42; Couvreur 2.249f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 629; Yishu 35:58.36a-36b; tr. Legge 2.196;

tls:text.tls:line: those of an officer were buried (without being put in the coffin).

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.43; Couvreur 2.250f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 630; Yishu 35:58.37a; tr. Legge 2.196;

tls:text.tls:line: till, when all was finished and plastered, there was the appearance of a house.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.43; Couvreur 2.250f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 630; Yishu 35:58.37a; tr. Legge 2.196;

tls:text.tls:line: till, when all was finished and plastered, there was the appearance of a house.

sense.def: to smear, to plaster; apply (a substance) by smearing it on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.43; Couvreur 2.250f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 630; Yishu 35:58.37a; tr. Legge 2.196;

tls:text.tls:line: till, when all was finished and plastered, there was the appearance of a house.

sense.def: ordinary non-main house for non-leading members of the clan; generally: house (occasionally even refers to many-storeyed 樓)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.44; Couvreur 2.250f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 630; Yishu 35:58.38b; tr. Legge 2.197;

tls:text.tls:line: by that of a common officer, four baskets, containing two kinds.

sense.def: all-purpose square basket (for example used to pick up horse dung with)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.46; Couvreur 2.252f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 630f; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.197;

tls:text.tls:line: There were (at the corners) two streamers of feathers, suspended from a frame with the axes on it;

sense.def: axe-patterned

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.46; Couvreur 2.252f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 630f; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.197;

tls:text.tls:line: There were (at the corners) two streamers of feathers, suspended from a frame with the axes on it;

sense.def: plumed streamer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.46; Couvreur 2.252f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 630f; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.197;

tls:text.tls:line: two from another, bearing the symbol of discrimination;

sense.def: 亞-patterned

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.47; Couvreur 2.252f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.24f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 631; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.197;

tls:text.tls:line: and three symbols of discrimination.

sense.def: blue/green-and-black ceremonial embroidery with 亞 pattern

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.48; Couvreur 2.252f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 631; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.197;

tls:text.tls:line: There were two feather-streamers from a frame with axes,

sense.def: 亞-patterned

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.48; Couvreur 2.252f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 631; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.197;

tls:text.tls:line: There were two feather-streamers from a frame with axes,

sense.def: plumed streamer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.49; Couvreur 2.253f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 631; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.198;

tls:text.tls:line: The purple ties were two,

sense.def: purple; light red; brown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.49; Couvreur 2.253f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 631; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.198;

tls:text.tls:line: and the black also two.

sense.def: knot; button; tie

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.50; Couvreur 2.253f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 631; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.198;

tls:text.tls:line: The front supports of the catafalque were purple, and those behind black.

sense.def: be purple; light red; brown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.50; Couvreur 2.253f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 631; Yishu 35:58.39b; tr. Legge 2.198;

tls:text.tls:line: The front supports of the catafalque were purple, and those behind black.

sense.def: dark as black silk, generally: dark and black

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.51; Couvreur 2.254f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 632; Yishu 35:58.44a; tr. Legge 2.198;

tls:text.tls:line: They employed two ropes and no post.

sense.def: (sometimes inscribed?) pillar; post

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.52; Couvreur 2.254f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 632; Yishu 35:58.46a; tr. Legge 2.199;

tls:text.tls:line: they removed the ropes from the posts, and pulled at them with their backs to the posts.

sense.def: (sometimes inscribed?) pillar; post

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.52; Couvreur 2.254f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 632; Yishu 35:58.46a; tr. Legge 2.199;

tls:text.tls:line: Orders were given that they should not cry out in letting down that of the ruler.

sense.def: informal: shout and make a lot of noise, bawl

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 22.02.53; Couvreur 2.256; Su1n Xïda4n 12.29f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 633; Yishu 35:58.47b-49a; tr. Legge 2.199;

tls:text.tls:line: 42. In the rites of a ruler, the shell was lined, and there were baskets of yi;

sense.def: all-purpose square basket (for example used to pick up horse dung with)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.01; Couvreur 2.257f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 635; Yishu 36:59.1b; tr. Legge 2.201;

tls:text.tls:line: Under Yin, they gave the place of honour to Khu, and made Ming the correlate at the border sacrifice;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.01; Couvreur 2.257f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 635; Yishu 36:59.1b; tr. Legge 2.201;

tls:text.tls:line: Under Kau they gave the place of honour to Khu, and made Ki the correlate at the border sacrifice;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.02; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.5a; tr. Legge 2.202;

tls:text.tls:line: hy sacrificed to Heaven;

sense.def: sacrifice to (specifically to the spirits of the Earth) with wine, grain, and meat[also: sacrifice (something)][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.02; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.5a; tr. Legge 2.202;

tls:text.tls:line: by burying (the victim) in the Grand mound,

sense.def: bury the contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.02; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.5a; tr. Legge 2.202;

tls:text.tls:line: (In both cases) they used a red victim.

sense.def: red; red-furred

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. By burying a sheep and a pig at (the altar of) Great broghtness,

sense.def: dig (something) ritually into the ground (without the use of a coffin)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. By burying a sheep and a pig at (the altar of) Great broghtness,

sense.def: of young age; (in office designations) junior; of younger age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: they sacrificed to the seasons.

sense.def: sacrifice to (specifically to the spirits of the Earth) with wine, grain, and meat[also: sacrifice (something)][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: at the pit and the altar, using prayers of deprecation and petition;

sense.def: Spirit of the Cold

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: to the sun,

sense.def: royal palace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: at the (altar called the) royal palace;

sense.def: sacrifice to (specifically to the spirits of the Earth) with wine, grain, and meat[also: sacrifice (something)][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: at the (pit called the) light of the night;

sense.def: sacrifice to (specifically to the spirits of the Earth) with wine, grain, and meat[also: sacrifice (something)][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.03; Couvreur 2.259f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 636; Yishu 36:59.6b; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: to the stars

sense.def: dark and shady, dark and secluded (like a shadowy valley); overgrown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.06; Couvreur 2.260f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.10a; tr. Legge 2.203;

tls:text.tls:line: What the seven dyansties made changes in,

sense.def: by way of introducing a change intended to constitute an improvement; in a way so as to try to improve and change things

tls:text.tls:srcline:
設廟、
祧、壇、
墠而祭之，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.07; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: they made ancestral temples and the arrangements for altering the spirit-tablets; they raised altars, and they cleared the ground around them for the performance of the sacrifices.

sense.def: temporary shrine, sometimes specifically for remote ancestors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.08; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: The temples were - his father's;

sense.def: ancestral temple (especially place of worship for the former kings or former rulers) and centre of state ritual

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.08; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: his grandfather's;

sense.def: LIJI: (deceased) grand-father

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.08; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: his great-grandfathers;

sense.def: honorific and poetic term for one's father [also sometimes: great-grandfather][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.08; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: his great-great-grandfather's;

sense.def: LIJI: great-great grandfather

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.08; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: and the temple of his high ancestor.

sense.def: LIJI: highest ancestors in the father's lineage; lineage of ancestors; sometimes also referring specifically to the father of the king

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.08; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: they were two,

sense.def: temporary shrine, sometimes specifically for remote ancestors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.09; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: For the removed tablet of one more remote, an altar was raised

sense.def: temporary shrine, sometimes specifically for remote ancestors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.09; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: For the removed tablet of one more remote, an altar was raised

sense.def: altar, sacrificial mound; high ground round a building used for ritual or sacrificial purposes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.09; Couvreur 2.261f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.204;

tls:text.tls:line: and its corresponding area;

sense.def: levelled area used for sacrifices

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.10; Couvreur 2.262f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637f; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.205;

tls:text.tls:line: his grand-father's;

sense.def: LIJI: (deceased) grand-father

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.10; Couvreur 2.262f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637f; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.205;

tls:text.tls:line: and his great-grandfather's;

sense.def: honorific and poetic term for one's father [also sometimes: great-grandfather][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.10; Couvreur 2.262f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637f; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.205;

tls:text.tls:line: In the temples of the great-great grandfather,

sense.def: LIJI: great-great grandfather

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.10; Couvreur 2.262f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 637f; Yishu 36:59.12a; tr. Legge 2.205;

tls:text.tls:line: and that of the (high) ancestor only,

sense.def: LIJI: highest ancestors in the father's lineage; lineage of ancestors; sometimes also referring specifically to the father of the king

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.14; Couvreur 2.264f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 638; Yishu 36:59.12b; tr. Legge 2.205;

tls:text.tls:line: that, namely, of his father.

sense.def: deceased father

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.15; Couvreur 2.265f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 639; Yishu 36:59.20b; tr. Legge 2.206;

tls:text.tls:line: and one for himself

sense.def: establish an N2 for (onself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.16; Couvreur 2.266f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 640; Yishu 36:59.23a; tr. Legge 2.206;

tls:text.tls:line: He also had seven corresponding altars for himself.

sense.def: for the sake of (oneself) 自為

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.17; Couvreur 2.266f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 640; Yishu 36:59.23a; tr. Legge 2.206;

tls:text.tls:line: He also had five corresponding altars for himself.

sense.def: for the sake of (oneself) 自為

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.19; Couvreur 2.266f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 640; Yishu 36:59.23a; tr. Legge 2.206;

tls:text.tls:line: Some raised one altar for the guardian of the door;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.19; Couvreur 2.266f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 640; Yishu 36:59.23a; tr. Legge 2.206;

tls:text.tls:line: Some raised one altar for the guardian of the door;

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.19; Couvreur 2.266f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 640; Yishu 36:59.23a; tr. Legge 2.206;

tls:text.tls:line: and others, one for the guardian of the furnace.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.20; Couvreur 2.267f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 640; Yishu 36:59.27b; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: to rightful great-grandsons;

sense.def: removed by one generation, great-(grandson)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.21; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.28b; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. According to the institutes of the sage kings about sacrifices,

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.22; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.28b; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: and to him who had

sense.def: protect against, fend off, ward off; defend somebody; guard

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.23; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.28b-29a; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: Hau-thu, a son of the line of Kun(g)-kung,

sense.def: get to dominate as hegemon, gain the ascendancy over

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.23; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.28b-29a; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: who was able to reduce them all to order,

sense.def: the Nine Provinces (of China) [This is pervasively difficult to distinguish from the more universal and almost cosmographic notion of the Nine Continents.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.23; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.28b-29a; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: the Ti Khu, who could define all hte zodiacal stars, and exhibit their times to the people;

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.24; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.29a; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: Thang, who ruled the people with a benignant sway and cut off their oppressor;

sense.def: somebody who is cruel; oppressor; tyrant

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.25; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.29a; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: As to the sun and the moon, the stars and constellations,

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 23.01.25; Couvreur 2.268f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 641; Yishu 36:59.29a; tr. Legge 2.207;

tls:text.tls:line: the people look up to them,

sense.def: look up to with respect

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.01; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.1b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: Nor should they be at distant intervals.

sense.def: should (in one's own interest) 不欲 "should not"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.02; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.1b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: When he treads

sense.def: hoar-frost

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.02; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.1b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: When he treads

sense.def: go down

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.02; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.1b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: he cannot help a feeling of sadness, which arises in his mind,

sense.def: sad, distressed, melancholic

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.02; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.1b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: and cannot be ascribed to the cold.

sense.def: be reckoned to be; be considered to be a matter ofbe called; be addressed as; be labeled as

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.02; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.1b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: wet with the rains and dews that have fallen heavily,

sense.def: walk on, use as one's walking surface tread on; step on (so as to hold down)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.02; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.1b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: he cannot avoid being moved by a feeling

sense.def: full of intense anxiety

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.03; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.2a; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: We meet the approach of our friends with music, [joy!]

sense.def: joyfully, with delight [???SURELY 以 GOES WITH WHAT FOLLOWS!!!CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.03; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.2a; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: escort them away with sadness,

sense.def: full of sympathetic grief, full of saddened sympathy [???SURELY 以 GOES WITH WHAT FOLLOWS!!!CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.03; Couvreur 2.271f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 643; Yishu 36:60.2a; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: escort them away with sadness,

sense.def: be (or sound) mournful or grief-stricken; show genuine feelings of grief 哭之哀 "lamented for him and show real grief" is idiomatic, and it is tempting to think of this āi 哀 as adverbial, although there is nothing to prove the point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.04; Couvreur 2.272f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 644; Yishu 36:60.3b; tr. Legge 2.210;

tls:text.tls:line: how they smiled and spoke,

sense.def: full of laughter, accomnpanied by laughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.05; Couvreur 2.273f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 644f; Yishu 36:60.5b; tr. Legge 2.211;

tls:text.tls:line: After he has moved about (and performed his operations), and is leaving at the door,

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.06; Couvreur 2.273f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 645; Yishu 36:60.6b; tr. Legge 2.211;

tls:text.tls:line: how could his sacrifices be without the accompaniment of reverence?

sense.def: how? (idiomatic in 安得 "how can one get to?", 安敢"how would I dare to?")

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.07; Couvreur 2.274f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 645; Yishu 36:60.7b; tr. Legge 2.211;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. The superior man, while (his parents) are alive, reverently nourishes them;

sense.def: be alive; remain alive; cf. also shēng qín 生擒 "catch while he is still alive"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.07; Couvreur 2.274f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 645; Yishu 36:60.7b; tr. Legge 2.211;

tls:text.tls:line: and, when they ar edead, he reverently sacrifices to them;

sense.def: be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.08; Couvreur 2.275f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 646; Yishu 36:60.9a; tr. Legge 2.212;

tls:text.tls:line: the filial son approaches the personator of the departed without having occasion to blush;

sense.def: show a sense of shame; to blush; change the color of face; show shyness, be shy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.10; Couvreur 2.276f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 646; Yishu 36:60.11a; tr. Legge 2.212;

tls:text.tls:line: On the recurrence of their death-day, he was sad;

sense.def: grief for a contextually determinate person; vocally and publically display commendable and genuine grief about something other than death; feel and show commendable deep sadness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.11; Couvreur 2.276f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 646f; Yishu 36:60.11a; tr. Legge 2.212;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When early dawn unseals my eyes,

sense.def: fall asleep; get to sleep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.11; Couvreur 2.276f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 646f; Yishu 36:60.11a; tr. Legge 2.212;

tls:text.tls:line: when the day broke, he did not sleep,

sense.def: be deep asleep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.12; Couvreur 2.276f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 647; Yishu 36:60.11b; tr. Legge 2.212;

tls:text.tls:line: his joy and sorrow were blended together.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.15; Couvreur 2.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 647; Yishu 36:60.14b-15a; tr. Legge 2.213;

tls:text.tls:line: to one whose thoughts are turned in on himself (lest he should make a mistake).[????]

sense.def: reflect upon (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.15; Couvreur 2.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 647; Yishu 36:60.14b-15a; tr. Legge 2.213;

tls:text.tls:line: But how should such demeanour

sense.def: reflect upon (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.15; Couvreur 2.277f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 647; Yishu 36:60.14b-15a; tr. Legge 2.213;

tls:text.tls:line: consist with communion with the spirits (sacrificed to)?

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.17; Couvreur 2.279f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 648; Yishu 36:60.17a; tr. Legge 2.214;

tls:text.tls:line: he is anxious that all preparations should be made beforehand;

sense.def: prepare beforehand against the contextually determinate thing, prepare in very good time against the contextually determinate thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.19; Couvreur 2.279f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 648; Yishu 36:60.17a; tr. Legge 2.214;

tls:text.tls:line: and thus

sense.def: for this reason, and thus, and so

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.19; Couvreur 2.279f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 648; Yishu 36:60.17a; tr. Legge 2.214;
