tls:text.tls:line: and in his lost abstraction of mind seeks to have communion with the dead in their spiritual state,

sense.def: profound confusion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.19; Couvreur 2.279f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 648; Yishu 36:60.17a; tr. Legge 2.214;

tls:text.tls:line: and in his lost abstraction of mind seeks to have communion with the dead in their spiritual state,

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.21; Couvreur 2.280f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 649; Yishu 36:60.19b; tr. Legge 2.215;

tls:text.tls:line: he should be reverent, with an expression of pleasure;

sense.def: be mildly happy; be amused; be happily at ease; feel contentment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.22; Couvreur 2.280f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 649; Yishu 36:60.19b; tr. Legge 2.215;

tls:text.tls:line: to carry the service forward without an expression of pleasure

sense.def: be mildly happy; be amused; be happily at ease; feel contentment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.24; Couvreur 2.2i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 649; Yishu 36:60.21b; tr. Legge 2.215;

tls:text.tls:line: having a look of pleasure,

sense.def: happy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.29; Couvreur 2.2i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 650; Yishu 36:60.24b; tr. Legge 2.217;

tls:text.tls:line: was the way by which they united and kept together the kingdom with its sttes and families.

sense.def: lead, act as leader of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.29; Couvreur 2.2i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 650; Yishu 36:60.24b; tr. Legge 2.217;

tls:text.tls:line: was the way by which they united and kept together the kingdom with its sttes and families.

sense.def: the nations in question

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.30; Couvreur 2.2i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 650; Yishu 36:60.26b; tr. Legge 2.217;

tls:text.tls:line: 'the laying of the foundation of (all) love in the love of parents

sense.def: loving care; love; feelings of love; sollicitousness; active affection

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.32; Couvreur 2.285f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 651; Yishu 36:60.27b-28a; tr. Legge 2.217;

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are wearing mourning do not dare to enter the gate of the capital;

sense.def: by way of mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.32; Couvreur 2.285f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 651; Yishu 36:60.27b-28a; tr. Legge 2.217;

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are wearing mourning do not dare to enter the gate of the capital;

sense.def: dress ceremoniously in robes, be ceremoniously dressed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.33; Couvreur 2.285f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 651; Yishu 36:60.28a; tr. Legge 2.217;

tls:text.tls:line: they fastened the victim to the stone pillar.

sense.def: (sometimes inscribed?) pillar; post

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.33; Couvreur 2.285f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 651; Yishu 36:60.28a; tr. Legge 2.217;

tls:text.tls:line: They then with the knife with the bvells attached to it, cut it open,

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.34; Couvreur 2.286f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 652; Yishu 36:60.29b; tr. Legge 2.218;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin dyansty they did so at noon.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.34; Couvreur 2.286f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 652; Yishu 36:60.29b; tr. Legge 2.218;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Kau they sacrificed all the day,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.35; Couvreur 2.286f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 652; Yishu 36:60.32a; tr. Legge 2.219;

tls:text.tls:line: - to mark the distinction between (the) gloom (of the one) and (the) brightness (of the other),

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.35; Couvreur 2.286f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 652; Yishu 36:60.32a; tr. Legge 2.219;

tls:text.tls:line: - to mark the distinction between (the) gloom (of the one) and (the) brightness (of the other),

sense.def: the sphere of dark invisibility; the underworld

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.01.35; Couvreur 2.286f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 652; Yishu 36:60.32a; tr. Legge 2.219;

tls:text.tls:line: - to mark the distinction between (the) gloom (of the one) and (the) brightness (of the other),

sense.def: the sphere of the visible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.02; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: All the living must die,

sense.def: the multitude of living creatures; BUDDH: the multitude of sentient beings (this is the Buddhist standard term for animate beings; usually referring to human beings but basically also including animals and sometimes even vegetation); skr. sattva

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.02; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: All the living must die,

sense.def: living being (often clearly including humans, but frequently indistinguishable from the examples collected under ANIMAL)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.03; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: The vapours and odours

sense.def: smell; vapour ???????

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.03; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: The vapours and odours

sense.def: stench

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.03; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: which promote a feeling of sadness (an arise from the decay of their substance),

sense.def: cause somebody to feel distressed and sad

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.03; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: to constitute pattern for the sun-tanned common people;

sense.def: the common people, the sun-tanned hard-working people

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.03; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: to constitute pattern for the sun-tanned common people;

sense.def: model

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.03; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: and all the multitudes were filled with awe,

sense.def: the masses, the people in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.03; Couvreur 2.289f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.55f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.1a; tr. Legge 2.220;

tls:text.tls:line: and all the multitudes were filled with awe,

sense.def: be awe-struck; stand in awe

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.04; Couvreur 2.290f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.9a; tr. Legge 2.221;

tls:text.tls:line: and framed their rules for ancestors who were always to be honoured, and those whose tablets should be removed;

sense.def: OBI: ancestral temple; SHI: ancestral temple of the clan

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.04; Couvreur 2.290f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.9a; tr. Legge 2.221;

tls:text.tls:line: and framed their rules for ancestors who were always to be honoured, and those whose tablets should be removed;

sense.def: temporary shrine, sometimes specifically for remote ancestors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.04; Couvreur 2.290f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 653; Yishu 36:61.9a; tr. Legge 2.221;

tls:text.tls:line: - thus making a distinction for nearer and more distant kinship, and for ancestors the remote and the recent,

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.06; Couvreur 2.291f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 654; Yishu 36:61.10a; tr. Legge 2.221;

tls:text.tls:line: and taught the people to love one another,

sense.def: love (each other)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.08; Couvreur 2.292f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 655; Yishu 36:61.16b; tr. Legge 2.222;

tls:text.tls:line: the son of Heaven had his field of a thousand acres,

sense.def: Chinese acre, one sixteenth of a hectar of land???

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.08; Couvreur 2.292f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 655; Yishu 36:61.16b; tr. Legge 2.222;

tls:text.tls:line: earing the square-topped cap with red ties.

sense.def: personally; in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.09; Couvreur 2.292f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 655; Yishu 36:61.16b; tr. Legge 2.222;

tls:text.tls:line: wearing the same cap with green ties.

sense.def: personally; in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.09; Couvreur 2.292f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 655; Yishu 36:61.16b; tr. Legge 2.222;

tls:text.tls:line: In this way did they procure these things;

sense.def: and therefore

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.10; Couvreur 2.293f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.18b; tr. Legge 2.222;

tls:text.tls:line: after vigil and fasting, they washed their heads, bathed, and visited them in person,

sense.def: personally; in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.11; Couvreur 2.293f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.18b; tr. Legge 2.222;

tls:text.tls:line: In his skin cap, and the white skirt gathered up to the waist,

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.12; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.20b; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler, in his skin cap and the white skirt,

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.13; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.20b; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: They washed the seeds in the stream,

sense.def: seeds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.13; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.20b; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: They washed the seeds in the stream,

sense.def: to wash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.13; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.20b; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: and dried them in the wind to feed the worms.

sense.def: by the wind ??; in the wind; like the wind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.13; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.20b; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: and dried them in the wind to feed the worms.

sense.def: dry

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.13; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656; Yishu 36:61.20b; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: and carried the cocoons to show them to the ruler.

sense.def: silkworm cocoon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.14; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 656f; Yishu 36:61.20b; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: This probably was the ancient custom

sense.def: silkworm cocoon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.15; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 657; Yishu 36:61.21a; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: to make the varoiusly coloured figures on robes.

sense.def: patterns of all styles; decorated brocade of all sorts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.15; Couvreur 2.294f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 657; Yishu 36:61.21a; tr. Legge 2.223;

tls:text.tls:line: to make the varoiusly coloured figures on robes.

sense.def: decorous manifestations; decorations; elaborate embellishments

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.16; Couvreur 2.296f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 657f; Yishu 36:61.24a; tr. Legge 2.224;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Ceremonies and music should not for a moment be neglected by any one.

sense.def: for a short while; for as much as one moment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.17; Couvreur 2.296f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 658; Yishu 36:61.24a-24b; tr. Legge 2.224;

tls:text.tls:line: When one has mastered (the principle of) ceremonies, and regulates h is person accordingly, he becomes grave and reverntial.

sense.def: person; formal or poetic: his person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.17; Couvreur 2.296f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 658; Yishu 36:61.24a-24b; tr. Legge 2.224;

tls:text.tls:line: If the outward demeanour be for a moment without gravity and reverentialness,

sense.def: for a short while; for as much as one moment

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則民瞻其顏色而不與爭也；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.18; Couvreur 2.296f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 658; Yishu 36:61.24b; tr. Legge 2.224;

tls:text.tls:line: the people behold his countenance and do not strive with him;

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.20; Couvreur 2.296f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 658; Yishu 36:61.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.224;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence it is the rule to make ceremonies as few and brief as possible,

sense.def: economy; reduction, decreasing, diminishing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.25; Couvreur 2.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.28b; tr. Legge 2.226;

tls:text.tls:line: if with friends he be not sincere,

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.26; Couvreur 2.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.28b-29a; tr. Legge 2.226;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Happy [lucky CH] are the parents who have such a son as this!'

sense.def: be happy by good fortune

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.28; Couvreur 2.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.29a; tr. Legge 2.226;

tls:text.tls:line: When his parents are dead,

sense.def: have died, be dead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.28; Couvreur 2.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.29a; tr. Legge 2.226;

tls:text.tls:line: and the son carefully watches over his actions,

sense.def: conduct (one's person); act out (the role of a gentleman etc);

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.28; Couvreur 2.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.29a; tr. Legge 2.226;

tls:text.tls:line: True love

sense.def: the concept of human-heartedness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.28; Couvreur 2.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.29a; tr. Legge 2.226;

tls:text.tls:line: True love

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.28; Couvreur 2.300f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.29a; tr. Legge 2.226;

tls:text.tls:line: is tha love of this;

sense.def: show kind-heartedness towards, treat with kindness, be kind to; be lenient towards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.32; Couvreur 2.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.32a; tr. Legge 2.227;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Trees are felled and animals killed,

sense.def: trees; trees of all kinds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.34; Couvreur 2.304f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 659; Yishu 36:61.32b; tr. Legge 2.227;

tls:text.tls:line: to ask the help only of the good to obtain the grain with which to sacrifice to them:

sense.def: those who are human-hearted

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.35; Couvreur 2.305f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 661; Yishu 36:61.34b; tr. Legge 2.228;

tls:text.tls:line: and (one of the) disciples of the school said to him,

sense.def: the disciples

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.35; Couvreur 2.305f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 661; Yishu 36:61.34b; tr. Legge 2.228;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Your foot, master, is better;

sense.def: be cured; have become better

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故君子頃步而弗敢忘孝也。』

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.37; Couvreur 2.305f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 661; Yishu 36:61.34b-35a; tr. Legge 2.228;

tls:text.tls:line: and hence a superior man does not dare to take the slightest step in forgetfulness of his filial duty.

sense.def: for the space of time used for one step

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.38; Couvreur 2.305f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 661; Yishu 36:61.35a; tr. Legge 2.228;

tls:text.tls:line: He should not forget his parents in the utterance of a single word,

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.40; Couvreur 2.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.36b; tr. Legge 2.229;

tls:text.tls:line: the souvereigns of Hsia honoured rank, and highly esteemed age;

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.40; Couvreur 2.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.36b; tr. Legge 2.229;

tls:text.tls:line: under Yin they honoured riches, and highly esteemed age;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.40; Couvreur 2.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.36b; tr. Legge 2.229;

tls:text.tls:line: under Yin they honoured riches, and highly esteemed age;

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.40; Couvreur 2.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.36b; tr. Legge 2.229;

tls:text.tls:line: under Kau, they honoured kinship, and highly esteemed age.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.40; Couvreur 2.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.36b; tr. Legge 2.229;

tls:text.tls:line: under Kau, they honoured kinship, and highly esteemed age.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.41; Couvreur 2.307f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.36b-39a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: at court among parties of the same rank, the highest place was given to the oldest.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:text.tls:srcline: 斑白者不以其任行乎道路，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.42; Couvreur 2.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.40a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: Men, where the white were mingling with their black hairs, did not carry burdens on the roads.

sense.def: be greying

tls:text.tls:srcline: 斑白者不以其任行乎道路，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.42; Couvreur 2.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.40a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: Men, where the white were mingling with their black hairs, did not carry burdens on the roads.

sense.def: burden

tls:text.tls:srcline: 斑白者不以其任行乎道路，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.42; Couvreur 2.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.40a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: Men, where the white were mingling with their black hairs, did not carry burdens on the roads.

sense.def: the roads, all kinds of roads

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.43; Couvreur 2.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.40a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: Residents in the country took their places according to their age,

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.43; Couvreur 2.308f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.40a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: nor did the strong come into collision with the weak,

sense.def: go against the wishes of a person; dare to go against a person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.44; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.41a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the submission of juniors was recognised in the arrangements for the hunts.

sense.def: hunt (LIJI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.44; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.41a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the submission of juniors was recognised in the arrangements for the hunts.

sense.def: hunt; hunting

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.44; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.41a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: In the tens and fives of the army and its detachments,

sense.def: a group of ten persons or items

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.44; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.65f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.41a; tr. Legge 2.230;

tls:text.tls:line: In the tens and fives of the army and its detachments,

sense.def: army unit (not necessarily consisting of five persons)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.45; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.42a; tr. Legge 2.231;

tls:text.tls:line: the practise of them on the road;

sense.def: the roads, all kinds of roads

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.45; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.42a; tr. Legge 2.231;

tls:text.tls:line: their extension to the huntings;

sense.def: hunt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.45; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.42a; tr. Legge 2.231;

tls:text.tls:line: their extension to the huntings;

sense.def: hunt (LIJI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.45; Couvreur 2.309f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 662; Yishu 36:61.42a; tr. Legge 2.231;

tls:text.tls:line: their extension to the huntings;

sense.def: hunt; hunting

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.49; Couvreur 2.311f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 664f; Yishu 36:61.44b; tr. Legge 2.231;

tls:text.tls:line: that in the country and villages regard was paid to age,

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.50; Couvreur 2.311f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 665; Yishu 36:61.46b; tr. Legge 2.232;

tls:text.tls:line: the princes (of each quarter) met him on their borders.

sense.def: border-line of a state, border (for 出境 compare 出門)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.53; Couvreur 2.313; Su1n Xïda4n 12.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 666; Yishu 36:61.50b-51b; tr. Legge 2.233;

tls:text.tls:line: Emoulment, rank, felicitations, and rewards

sense.def: commendation or reward of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.54; Couvreur 2.313; Su1n Xïda4n 12.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 666; Yishu 36:61.51b; tr. Legge 2.233;

tls:text.tls:line: what was wrong, to himself;

sense.def: speak of (oneself) (typically by way of explanation), declare (oneself) responsible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.54; Couvreur 2.313; Su1n Xïda4n 12.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 666; Yishu 36:61.51b; tr. Legge 2.233;

tls:text.tls:line: what was wrong, to himself;

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.55; Couvreur 2.315f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 666; Yishu 36:61.53b; tr. Legge 2.233;

tls:text.tls:line: the rule was that his countenance should be mild,

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 24.02.55; Couvreur 2.315f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.69; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 666; Yishu 36:61.53b; tr. Legge 2.233;

tls:text.tls:line: the rule was that his countenance should be mild,

sense.def: be mild and gentle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.01; Couvreur 2.317; Su1n Xïda4n 12.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 669; Yishu 37:62.2a; tr. Legge 2.236;

tls:text.tls:line: there is none m ore urgent than the use of ceremonies.

sense.def: be more urgently needed than

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.02; Couvreur 2.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 670; Yishu 37:62.3b; tr. Legge 2.236;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. The sacrifices of such men

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.03; Couvreur 2.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 670; Yishu 37:62.3b; tr. Legge 2.236;

tls:text.tls:line: the doing everything that should be done in one's internal self,

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.04; Couvreur 2.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 670; Yishu 37:62.3b; tr. Legge 2.236;

tls:text.tls:line: It is only the able and virtuous man who can attain to this perfection;

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.04; Couvreur 2.318f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.71; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 670; Yishu 37:62.3b; tr. Legge 2.236;

tls:text.tls:line: in the sacrifices of such a man

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.07; Couvreur 2.319; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.5b; tr. Legge 2.237;

tls:text.tls:line: and when the mourning is over by sacrificing to them

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.07; Couvreur 2.319; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.5b; tr. Legge 2.237;

tls:text.tls:line: in his funeral trites we see his sorrow;

sense.def: mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.07; Couvreur 2.319; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.5b; tr. Legge 2.237;

tls:text.tls:line: In these three ways，

sense.def: these so-and-so-many abstract Ns 此三欲

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.07; Couvreur 2.319; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.5b; tr. Legge 2.237;

tls:text.tls:line: In these three ways，

sense.def: way of doing things

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.08; Couvreur 2.320; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.6b; tr. Legge 2.238;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. When a son had done everything (for his sacrifices) that he could do himself,

sense.def: exhaust all one's (own) resources

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.08; Couvreur 2.320; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.6b; tr. Legge 2.238;

tls:text.tls:line: and this came through the rites of marriage.

sense.def: be because of such reasons 不知問是也"It is all because they do not know how to ask questions"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.09; Couvreur 2.320; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.238;

tls:text.tls:line: - small things,

sense.def: minced pickled meat sauce

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.09; Couvreur 2.320; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.238;

tls:text.tls:line: such asa the sourcrout of water plants

sense.def: pickled meat without many non-meat additions

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.10; Couvreur 2.320; Su1n Xïda4n 12.72; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671; Yishu 37:62.7a; tr. Legge 2.238;

tls:text.tls:line: Strange insects

sense.def: insects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.13; Couvreur 2.322f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 671f; Yishu 37:62.9a; tr. Legge 2.239;

tls:text.tls:line: When they had reverently done their outmost, they could serve the spiritual Intelligences

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.15; Couvreur 2.323f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 673; Yishu 37:62.10a; tr. Legge 2.239;

tls:text.tls:line: but kept them in a strict adherence to what was right.

sense.def: conform to (rules)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.16; Couvreur 2.323f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 673; Yishu 37:62.10a; tr. Legge 2.239;

tls:text.tls:line: but kept them firmly in the way of propriety.

sense.def: conform to (rules)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.16; Couvreur 2.323f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 673; Yishu 37:62.10a; tr. Legge 2.239;

tls:text.tls:line: After this it was possible to enter into communion with the spiritual Intelligences.

sense.def: interact with; cultivate contacts with (superiors, spirits); cultivate good diplomatic relations with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.16; Couvreur 2.323f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.73; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 673; Yishu 37:62.10a; tr. Legge 2.239;

tls:text.tls:line: After this it was possible to enter into communion with the spiritual Intelligences.

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.19; Couvreur 2.325f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.73f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 673; Yishu 37:62.12b; tr. Legge 2.240;

tls:text.tls:line: other officers carried the dried grass (to lay on the ground when it should be killed);

sense.def: hay, fodder (for domestic animals)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.19; Couvreur 2.325f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.73f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 673; Yishu 37:62.12b; tr. Legge 2.240;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler held in his hands the knife with bells;

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.20; Couvreur 2.327; Su1n Xïda4n 12.74; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 674; Yishu 37:62.16a; tr. Legge 2.241;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler, holding his shield and axe,

sense.def: ceremonial weapons

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.24; Couvreur 2.328f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 675; Yishu 37:62.18a; tr. Legge 2.241;

tls:text.tls:line: exerted himself to the outmost

sense.def: exhaust all one's (own) resources

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.25; Couvreur 2.329f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 676; Yishu 37:62.19a; tr. Legge 2.242;

tls:text.tls:line: there is the saying of antiquity,

sense.def: saying, memorable saying; sometimes: proverbial saying, popular saying; bon-mot, dict-on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.26; Couvreur 2.329f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.75; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 676; Yishu 37:62.19b; tr. Legge 2.242;

tls:text.tls:line: it was the remark of a superior manof antiquity, that

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.28; Couvreur 2.330f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.75f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 676; Yishu 37:62.21a; tr. Legge 2.243;

tls:text.tls:line: and thus there was marked the distinction between the degrees of the noble and the mean,

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.33; Couvreur 2.332f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 677; Yishu 37:62.22b; tr. Legge 2.244;

tls:text.tls:line: To disapprove of anything in another,

sense.def: criticise N1 in the agent N2

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.33; Couvreur 2.332f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 677; Yishu 37:62.22b; tr. Legge 2.244;

tls:text.tls:line: and do the same himself,

sense.def: show something as behaviour in (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.33; Couvreur 2.332f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 677; Yishu 37:62.22b; tr. Legge 2.244;

tls:text.tls:line: and do the same himself,

sense.def: regarding oneself, non-contrastive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.34; Couvreur 2.332f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 677; Yishu 37:62.22b; tr. Legge 2.244;

tls:text.tls:line: is to be found in sacrifice.'

sense.def: assertive combination of final particles

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.36; Couvreur 2.333f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.24b; tr. Legge 2.245;

tls:text.tls:line: the separate duties fo husband and wife;

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.36; Couvreur 2.333f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.24b; tr. Legge 2.245;

tls:text.tls:line: and the boundaries of high and low.

sense.def: interaction, relation; social intercourse; "interface!!"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.37; Couvreur 2.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.26b-27a; tr. Legge 2.245;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. The spreading of the mat and placing on it a stool to serve for two,

sense.def: SHI: long rough mat put directly on the floor to sit on on festive occasions, mostly with an additional mat on top, larger than xí 席. Also small tables were put on this mat.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.37; Couvreur 2.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.26b-27a; tr. Legge 2.245;

tls:text.tls:line: was the method pursued in (seeking) communion with the spirits.

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.37; Couvreur 2.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.26b-27a; tr. Legge 2.245;

tls:text.tls:line: - to avoid misconstruction.

sense.def: LIJI 12.77f: avoid

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.38; Couvreur 2.334f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.77f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.27a; tr. Legge 2.245;

tls:text.tls:line: when he entered that gate (on the occasion of the sacrifice), he had the full character of a subject,

sense.def: be wholly and perfectly devoted to being (a minister)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.40; Couvreur 2.335f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.29a; tr. Legge 2.246;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler washed the cup of jade, and presented it to the ministers.

sense.def: wash away the dust; wash horses; wash (a cup)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
所以別父子、
遠近、
長幼、
親疏之序而無亂也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.41; Couvreur 2.335f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.31a; tr. Legge 2.246;

tls:text.tls:line: and thus the distinction was maintained between the order of fathers and sons, near and the distant, the older and the younger, the more nearly realted and the more distantly, and there was no confucion.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.42; Couvreur 2.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.32a; tr. Legge 2.247;

tls:text.tls:line: the intelligent rulers conferred rank on the virtuous, and emoulments on the meritorious;

sense.def: enlightened rulers (of the past)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.43; Couvreur 2.337f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678; Yishu 37:62.32b; tr. Legge 2.247;

tls:text.tls:line: recieved the writing, returned (home),

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.44; Couvreur 2.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678f; Yishu 37:62.34a; tr. Legge 2.247;

tls:text.tls:line: (the officer) who held the vessels with new wine, presented them to her, holding them by the bottom;

sense.def: ritual vessel with high foot (like that used as lamps)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.44; Couvreur 2.338f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 678f; Yishu 37:62.34a; tr. Legge 2.247;

tls:text.tls:line: When the representative of the dead was handing the cup to the wife, he held it by the handle,

sense.def: MO: handle of a vessel

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.45; Couvreur 2.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 679; Yishu 37:62.35a; tr. Legge 2.248;

tls:text.tls:line: the chief atttention was given to the bones.

sense.def: the most important point; the essential thing, the main thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.45; Couvreur 2.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 679; Yishu 37:62.35a; tr. Legge 2.248;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin they preferred the thigh bone;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.45; Couvreur 2.339f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 679; Yishu 37:62.35a; tr. Legge 2.248;

tls:text.tls:line: and under the Kau, the shoulder bone.

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.48; Couvreur 2.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 679; Yishu 37:62.36a; tr. Legge 2.248;

tls:text.tls:line: The members of each row

sense.def: be of equal status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.48; Couvreur 2.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 679; Yishu 37:62.36a; tr. Legge 2.248;

tls:text.tls:line: had places according totheir age;

sense.def: be of equal status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.48; Couvreur 2.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 679; Yishu 37:62.36a; tr. Legge 2.248;

tls:text.tls:line: and in the same way were arranged all the assistants at the service.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.51; Couvreur 2.340f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 679; Yishu 37:62.38b; tr. Legge 2.249;

tls:text.tls:line: with an intelligent ruler above,

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.55; Couvreur 2.342f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i2; Yishu 37:62.40b; tr. Legge 2.249;

tls:text.tls:line: when the plants were cut down, the punishment of branding might be inflicted.

sense.def: conduct branding

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.57; Couvreur 2.344f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i2; Yishu 37:62.41b; tr. Legge 2.250;

tls:text.tls:line: is not complete,

sense.def: be perfectly present; be comprehensively developed; be in perfect shape

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.61; Couvreur 2.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i3; Yishu 37:62.44a; tr. Legge 2.251;

tls:text.tls:line: named himself,

sense.def: call (oneself) by one's own name

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.61; Couvreur 2.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i3; Yishu 37:62.44a; tr. Legge 2.251;

sense.def: call (oneself) by one's own name

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.62; Couvreur 2.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i3; Yishu 37:62.44a; tr. Legge 2.251;

tls:text.tls:line: and it is only the man of ability and virtue who can attain to it.

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.62; Couvreur 2.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i3; Yishu 37:62.44a; tr. Legge 2.251;

tls:text.tls:line: and it is only the man of ability and virtue who can attain to it.

sense.def: show a capacity for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.63; Couvreur 2.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i3; Yishu 37:62.44a; tr. Legge 2.251;

tls:text.tls:line: he makes himself famous;

sense.def: one's own (object) 自多其力 "overestimate one's own strength"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.63; Couvreur 2.346f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i3; Yishu 37:62.44a; tr. Legge 2.251;

tls:text.tls:line: In the cerlebration of his ancestors

sense.def: cause to be famous

tls:text.tls:srcline: 壹稱而上下皆得焉耳矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.64; Couvreur 2.347; Su1n Xïda4n 12.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i3; Yishu 37:62.45b; tr. Legge 2.251;

tls:text.tls:line: benefit accrues to the ancestors, to their descendant and to others after him.

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.68; Couvreur 2.348f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i4; Yishu 37:62.47a; tr. Legge 2.252;

tls:text.tls:line: 28... Your deceased father Waen Shu

sense.def: (N's) deceased father (Npr)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.68; Couvreur 2.348f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i4; Yishu 37:62.47a; tr. Legge 2.252;

tls:text.tls:line: and showed his great personal interest in the state of Wei.

sense.def: personally; in person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.70; Couvreur 2.348f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i4; Yishu 37:62.47a; tr. Legge 2.252;

tls:text.tls:line: In this way

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.70; Couvreur 2.348f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i4; Yishu 37:62.47a; tr. Legge 2.252;

tls:text.tls:line: thereby having the opportunity to introduce their own personality

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.71; Couvreur 2.348f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i4; Yishu 37:62.47b; tr. Legge 2.252;

tls:text.tls:line: that was falsehood;

sense.def: cheating, error, mistake, aberration; lie

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.71; Couvreur 2.348f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i4; Yishu 37:62.47b; tr. Legge 2.252;

tls:text.tls:line: - these are three things

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.71; Couvreur 2.348f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 6i4; Yishu 37:62.47b; tr. Legge 2.252;

tls:text.tls:line: of which a superior man should have been ashamed.

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:text.tls:srcline:
成王、
康王追念周公之所以勳勞者，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.72; Couvreur 2.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 685; Yishu 37:62.51b; tr. Legge 2.253;

tls:text.tls:line: the kings Kha(ng) and Khang, in mind all his admirable work,

sense.def: pursue in thought, let one's thoughts go out to; continue to be mindful of 追念

tls:text.tls:srcline:
成王、
康王追念周公之所以勳勞者，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.72; Couvreur 2.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 685; Yishu 37:62.51b; tr. Legge 2.253;

tls:text.tls:line: the kings Kha(ng) and Khang, in mind all his admirable work,

sense.def: think intensely of, ponder; refuse to put in the back of one's mind; be considerate in relation to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.72; Couvreur 2.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 685; Yishu 37:62.51b; tr. Legge 2.253;

tls:text.tls:line: granted to its lords the right of offering the greatest sacrifices;

sense.def: give N1 to N2

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 25.01.72; Couvreur 2.350f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 685; Yishu 37:62.51b; tr. Legge 2.253;

tls:text.tls:line: in the wider sphere of sacrifice;

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.01; Couvreur 2.353; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 687; Yishu 38:63.1b; tr. Legge 2.255;

tls:text.tls:line: If they show themselves men

sense.def: natural disposition; personality, personal nature (not countable)趙歧2B6:孟子不悅其為人.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.02; Couvreur 2.353; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 687; Yishu 38:63.1b; tr. Legge 2.255;

tls:text.tls:line: If they be large-hearted and generous, bland and honest,

sense.def: be generous

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.02; Couvreur 2.353; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 687; Yishu 38:63.1b; tr. Legge 2.255;

tls:text.tls:line: If they be large-hearted and generous, bland and honest,

sense.def: be broad, be not narrow (of learning or knowledge), comprehensive, wide-ranging

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.02; Couvreur 2.353; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 687; Yishu 38:63.1b; tr. Legge 2.255;

tls:text.tls:line: If they be large-hearted and generous, bland and honest,

sense.def: be decent, seemly, becoming

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.05; Couvreur 2.354; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 687f; Yishu 38:63.6a-6b; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. 'If they show themselves men

sense.def: natural disposition; personality, personal nature (not countable)趙歧2B6:孟子不悅其為人.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.05; Couvreur 2.354; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 687f; Yishu 38:63.6a-6b; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: their understanding of the Book of History is deep.

sense.def: understand deeply, have a deep mastery of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.05; Couvreur 2.354; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 687f; Yishu 38:63.6a-6b; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: their knowledge of Music is deep.

sense.def: understand deeply, have a deep mastery of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.08; Couvreur 2.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.7a; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: When he walks,

sense.def: walk along (in a dignified way)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.08; Couvreur 2.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.7a; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: there are the harmonious sounds of the bells attached to his horses.

sense.def: bell fixed on vehicles (eight of them), also on horse-bits, and on knives (!) which was supposed to make a sound like a luán-bird or phoenix

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.08; Couvreur 2.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.7a; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: there are the harmonious sounds of the bells attached to his horses.

sense.def: bell on carriage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.08; Couvreur 2.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.7a; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: there are the harmonious sounds of the bells attached to his horses.

sense.def: shaped sound, especially as part of music; sound of music, music; by extension, poetic, SHI: speech

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.09; Couvreur 2.355f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.7b; tr. Legge 2.256;

tls:text.tls:line: He has nothing wrong in his deportment,

sense.def: 是三臣

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.10; Couvreur 2.356f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.9a; tr. Legge 2.257;

tls:text.tls:line: we have the condition of benevolence.

sense.def: moral excellence; goodness; goodness of heart

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.11; Couvreur 2.356f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.9a; tr. Legge 2.257;

tls:text.tls:line: are the instruments of the presiding chieftain and the king.

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.11; Couvreur 2.356f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 689; Yishu 38:63.9a; tr. Legge 2.257;

tls:text.tls:line: are the instruments of the presiding chieftain and the king.

sense.def: (mere) tool; (abstract) instrument>method

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.12; Couvreur 2.357; Su1n Xïda4n 12.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.10b; tr. Legge 2.257;

tls:text.tls:line: or as the circle and square in determining what is square and what is round.

sense.def: compass and square

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.13; Couvreur 2.357; Su1n Xïda4n 12.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.10b; tr. Legge 2.257;

tls:text.tls:line: if the square and compass be truly employed,

sense.def: compass and square

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.15; Couvreur 2.357; Su1n Xïda4n 12.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.12a; tr. Legge 2.258;

tls:text.tls:line: 'For giving security to superiors and good government of the people,

sense.def: be better than N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.17; Couvreur 2.358f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.13a; tr. Legge 2.258;

tls:text.tls:line: and are like the embankments which prevent the overflow of water.

sense.def: dike

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.18; Couvreur 2.360; Su1n Xïda4n 12.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.14b; tr. Legge 2.259;

tls:text.tls:line: and quarrelsome litigations would be numerous.

sense.def: quarrelsome, conflict-ridden

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.18; Couvreur 2.360; Su1n Xïda4n 12.89; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.14b; tr. Legge 2.259;

tls:text.tls:line: and quarrelsome litigations would be numerous.

sense.def: litigation; criminal law case; trial; criminal procedure 獄決罪定

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.20; Couvreur 2.360; Su1n Xïda4n 12.89f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.16a; tr. Legge 2.259;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. Therefore the instructive and transforming power of ceremonies is subtile;

sense.def: proper education; reforming impact; reforming moral effort

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使人日徙善遠罪而不自知也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.20; Couvreur 2.360; Su1n Xïda4n 12.89f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.16a; tr. Legge 2.259;

tls:text.tls:line: causing men daily to move towards what is good, and keep themselves farther apart from guilt, without being themselves conscious of it.

sense.def: move in the direction of (rectitude)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使人日徙善遠罪而不自知也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 26.01.20; Couvreur 2.360; Su1n Xïda4n 12.89f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 690; Yishu 38:63.16a; tr. Legge 2.259;

tls:text.tls:line: causing men daily to move towards what is good, and keep themselves farther apart from guilt, without being themselves conscious of it.

sense.def: be aware of what is happening to oneself; be aware what is going on

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.01; Couvreur 2.362f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 693; Yishu 38:63.17a; tr. Legge 2.261;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I, Khiu, am a small man,

sense.def: be just an ordinary person;

tls:text.tls:srcline:
非禮無以別男女、
父子、
兄弟之親，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.02; Couvreur 2.362f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 693; Yishu 38:63.17b; tr. Legge 2.261;

tls:text.tls:line: without them they would have no means of maintaining the separate character of the intimate relations between male and female, father and son, elder brother and younger,

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:text.tls:srcline:
然後治其雕鏤、
文章、
黼黻以嗣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.03; Couvreur 2.363f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 693; Yishu 38:63.18b-21a; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: they proceeded to give rules for the engraving (of the ceremonial vessels), and the embroidering in various colours (of the robes),

sense.def: patterns of all styles; decorated brocade of all sorts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.05; Couvreur 2.363f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.21a; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: to have their houses low and poor;

sense.def: buildings; all kinds of buildings, any kind of building

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔之君子之行禮者如此。」

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.05; Couvreur 2.363f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.90; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.21a; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: In this manner did the superior man of antiquity practise the rites.'

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.06; Couvreur 2.365; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.23b; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: 'How is it that the superior men of the present day

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.06; Couvreur 2.365; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.23b; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: are never satisfied in their fondness for wealth,

sense.def: be never fed-up or satisfied; be insatiable

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.06; Couvreur 2.365; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.23b; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: are never satisfied in their fondness for wealth,

sense.def: insatiably

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.06; Couvreur 2.365; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.23b; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: and never wearied in the extravagance of their conduct.

sense.def: be indefatigable; be unexhausted

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.06; Couvreur 2.365; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.23b; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: and never wearied in the extravagance of their conduct.

sense.def: be tired and exhausted; also of strength: be worn out

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.06; Couvreur 2.365; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.23b; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: they are wild, idle, arrogant, and insolent.

sense.def: make a show of arrogance; be arrogant to others in attitude and action

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.07; Couvreur 2.365; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 694; Yishu 38:63.23b; tr. Legge 2.262;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior men of the present day

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.08; Couvreur 2.365f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.25a; tr. Legge 2.263;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask, according to the nature of men, which is the greatest thing (to be attended to in dealing with them.')

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.08; Couvreur 2.365f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.25a; tr. Legge 2.263;

tls:text.tls:line: 'That your lordship should put this question

sense.def: this 此說之難"These difficulties with persusasion"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.08; Couvreur 2.365f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.25a; tr. Legge 2.263;

tls:text.tls:line: is a good thing for the people.

sense.def: good deed; virtuous act

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.08; Couvreur 2.365f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.91; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.25a; tr. Legge 2.263;

tls:text.tls:line: government is the greatest thing for them.'

sense.def: the general question of political administration

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.09; Couvreur 2.365f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.25b; tr. Legge 2.263;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask what is meant by the practise of government.'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.10; Couvreur 2.365f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.26a; tr. Legge 2.263;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask how this practice of government is to be effected?'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.10; Couvreur 2.365f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.26a; tr. Legge 2.263;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Husbnd and wife have their separate functions;

sense.def: to be distinguished; be held apart intellectually

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.11; Couvreur 2.366f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 695; Yishu 38:63.26b; tr. Legge 2.264;

tls:text.tls:line: I should like to hear how these three things which you have mentioned can be rightly secured.

sense.def: statements; pronouncements; utterances

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.14; Couvreur 2.368f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 696; Yishu 38:63.28b; tr. Legge 2.264;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to continue the posterity of the former sages,

sense.def: the former sages

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.15; Couvreur 2.368f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 696; Yishu 38:63.31a; tr. Legge 2.265;

tls:text.tls:line: how should I have heard what you have just said?

sense.def: this 此說之難"These difficulties with persusasion"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.16; Couvreur 2.368f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 696; Yishu 38:63.31a; tr. Legge 2.265;

tls:text.tls:line: and is sufficient to supply the correlates to the spiritual Intelligences of heaven and earth;

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.17; Couvreur 2.368f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 696f; Yishu 38:63.31a; tr. Legge 2.265;

tls:text.tls:line: If there be ground for shame on account of (a deficiency of) resources,

sense.def: be disgraceful, be in a disgraceful state; be a disgraceful matter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.17; Couvreur 2.368f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 696f; Yishu 38:63.31a; tr. Legge 2.265;

tls:text.tls:line: if there be ground for shame on account of the condition of the states,

sense.def: be disgraceful, be in a disgraceful state; be a disgraceful matter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.19; Couvreur 2.370f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 697; Yishu 38:63.32b; tr. Legge 2.266;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man's respect is universal..

sense.def: in every way

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.21; Couvreur 2.370f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 697; Yishu 38:63.32b; tr. Legge 2.266;

tls:text.tls:line: If a ruler do these things,

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.22; Couvreur 2.372f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.94; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.34a; tr. Legge 2.266;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask what is meant by "respecting one's self."'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.24; Couvreur 2.372f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.35a; tr. Legge 2.267;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask what is meant by doing all that can be done for one's parents?'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.24; Couvreur 2.372f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.35a; tr. Legge 2.267;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Kun-(?)ze

sense.def: the word 'junzi' 君子也者，人之成名也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.24; Couvreur 2.372f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.35a; tr. Legge 2.267;

tls:text.tls:line: they say (in effect) that he is the son of a kun-(?)ze;

sense.def: people of moral superior character 養君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.24; Couvreur 2.372f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.35a; tr. Legge 2.267;

tls:text.tls:line: and thus he makes his parents (?father) to be a kun-(?)ze.

sense.def: be a person of superior character

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.27; Couvreur 2.374f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.36b; tr. Legge 2.268;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask what is meant by "doing all that can be done for one's person."'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.27; Couvreur 2.374f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.36b; tr. Legge 2.268;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask what is meant by "doing all that can be done for one's person."'

sense.def: cultivate to perfection one's own personality/character> perfect one's person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.27; Couvreur 2.374f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.36b; tr. Legge 2.268;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask what is meant by "doing all that can be done for one's person."'

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.28; Couvreur 2.374f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.37b; tr. Legge 2.268;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I venture to ask what it is that the superior man values in the way of Heaven.'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.30; Couvreur 2.374f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.96f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.39a-39b; tr. Legge 2.268;

tls:text.tls:line: 'A man of all-comprehensive virtue does not transgress what is due from him in al the sphere beyond himself,

sense.def: a man of human-heartedness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.30; Couvreur 2.374f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.96f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.39a-39b; tr. Legge 2.268;

tls:text.tls:line: a son of all-comperehensive virtue serves his parents as he serves Heaven,

sense.def: a man of human-heartedness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 27.01.31; Couvreur 2.374f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.97; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 698; Yishu 38:63.41a; tr. Legge 2.269;

tls:text.tls:line: is a happiness to me.'

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.02; Couvreur 2.376f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 701; Yishu 39:64.1b; tr. Legge 2.270;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Allow me to ask what you mean.'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.05; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.4b; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: 'May I be allowed to ask wether the rules of ceremony

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.05; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.4b; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: do not serve to control what is bad, and to complete what is good?'

sense.def: control, administer, regulate; constrain and control

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.05; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.98; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.4b; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: do not serve to control what is bad, and to complete what is good?'

sense.def: cause to be perfect, cause to be perfectly developed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.06; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.5a; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: give expression to the loving feeling towards all in the circle of the kindred;

sense.def: show kind-heartedness towards, treat with kindness, be kind to; be lenient towards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.06; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.5a; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: serves to express the loving feeling towards those who are dead and for whom they are mourning;

sense.def: show kind-heartedness towards, treat with kindness, be kind to; be lenient towards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.06; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.5a; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: express the loving feeling towards all in the district and neighbourhood;

sense.def: show kind-heartedness towards, treat with kindness, be kind to; be lenient towards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.06; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.5a; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: express the loving feeling towards visitors and guests.'

sense.def: show kind-heartedness towards, treat with kindness, be kind to; be lenient towards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.06; Couvreur 2.378f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.5a; tr. Legge 2.271;

tls:text.tls:line: express the loving feeling towards visitors and guests.'

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.07; Couvreur 2.379f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.6b; tr. Legge 2.272;

tls:text.tls:line: inside the door of the female apartments,

sense.def: what it inside doors: private quarters; room; rooms of the palace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.08; Couvreur 2.379f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702; Yishu 39:64.6b; tr. Legge 2.272;

tls:text.tls:line: in the different hunting expeditions,

sense.def: go on hunting parties (officially organised or not); engage in pleasure hunting, hunt for pleasure; go on some kind of hunt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.09; Couvreur 2.379f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 702f; Yishu 39:64.7a; tr. Legge 2.272;

tls:text.tls:line: the different periods of mourning will have their proper expression of sorrow;

sense.def: mourning

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬如終夜有求於幽室之中，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.10; Couvreur 2.3i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.99f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 703; Yishu 39:64.10b; tr. Legge 2.272;

tls:text.tls:line: Or he would be like one searching all night in a dark room without a light;

sense.def: dark and shady, dark and secluded (like a shadowy valley); overgrown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.11; Couvreur 2.3i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 703; Yishu 39:64.10b; tr. Legge 2.272;

tls:text.tls:line: then the right distinction between old and young will be lost;

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.11; Couvreur 2.3i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 703; Yishu 39:64.10b; tr. Legge 2.272;

tls:text.tls:line: in the female apartments,

sense.def: what it inside doors: private quarters; room; rooms of the palace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.12; Couvreur 2.3i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 703; Yishu 39:64.10b; tr. Legge 2.272;

tls:text.tls:line: in the different hunting expeditions,

sense.def: hunting expedition of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.16; Couvreur 2.3i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 705; Yishu 39:64.11b; tr. Legge 2.274;

tls:text.tls:line: When one ruler is visiting another,

sense.def: (any) two (N)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.17; Couvreur 2.3i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 705; Yishu 39:64.12a; tr. Legge 2.274;

tls:text.tls:line: The bells of the equipages are turned to the Khai-khǐ;

sense.def: bell on carriage

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.17; Couvreur 2.3i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 705; Yishu 39:64.12a; tr. Legge 2.274;

tls:text.tls:line: The bells of the equipages are turned to the Khai-khǐ;

sense.def: bell fixed on vehicles (eight of them), also on horse-bits, and on knives (!) which was supposed to make a sound like a luán-bird or phoenix

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.18; Couvreur 2.3i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.100; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 705; Yishu 39:64.12a; tr. Legge 2.274;

tls:text.tls:line: the superior men of antiquity

sense.def: the men of noble character (of a certain time or place) [predicate tensed] 古之君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.21; Couvreur 2.385f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 705; Yishu 39:64.20a-20b; tr. Legge 2.275;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Allow me to ask

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.24; Couvreur 2.387f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 707; Yishu 39:64.21b; tr. Legge 2.276;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. (?)ze-kang asked about government.

sense.def: the general question of political administration

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.25; Couvreur 2.387f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 707; Yishu 39:64.22a; tr. Legge 2.276;

tls:text.tls:line: do you think that the stools and mats must be set forth,

sense.def: SHI: long rough mat put directly on the floor to sit on on festive occasions, mostly with an additional mat on top, larger than xí 席. Also small tables were put on this mat.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君子力此二者以南面而立，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.26; Couvreur 2.387f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 707; Yishu 39:64.22a; tr. Legge 2.276;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler who vigorously pursues these two things may well stand with his face to the south,

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.26; Couvreur 2.387f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.103; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 707; Yishu 39:64.22a; tr. Legge 2.276;

tls:text.tls:line: for thus willreat peace and order be secured all under heaven;

sense.def: be entirely peaceful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.30; Couvreur 2.388f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 707; Yishu 39:64.24b; tr. Legge 2.277;

tls:text.tls:line: had heard these words from the Master,

sense.def: this 此說之難"These difficulties with persusasion"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 28.01.30; Couvreur 2.388f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 707; Yishu 39:64.24b; tr. Legge 2.277;

tls:text.tls:line: they saw clearly as if a film had been removed from their eyes.

sense.def: blindness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.01; Couvreur 2.391f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 709; Yishu 39:64.25b; tr. Legge 2.278;

tls:text.tls:line: "The happy and courteous souvereign

sense.def: poetic: supremely contented and happy (possibly to be read as vi)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 何如斯可謂民之父母矣？」

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.01; Couvreur 2.391f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.104; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 709; Yishu 39:64.25b; tr. Legge 2.278;

tls:text.tls:line: I beg to ask what the souvereign must be, who can be called the "parent of the people."'

sense.def: logical: then under those logical conditions [Move logical cases here.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.03; Couvreur 2.392f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 710; Yishu 39:64.27a; tr. Legge 2.278;

tls:text.tls:line: allow me to ask what "the five extreme points" (that you mention) mean.'

sense.def: I venture to ask S

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.04; Couvreur 2.392f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 710; Yishu 39:64.27b; tr. Legge 2.278;

tls:text.tls:line: has also its furthest indication in music.

sense.def: joyful satisfaction; state of delight or happiness; joyfulness; joy, delight; happiness;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.04; Couvreur 2.392f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 710; Yishu 39:64.27b; tr. Legge 2.278;

tls:text.tls:line: has also its furthest indication in the voice of sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.11; Couvreur 2.394f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 712; Yishu 39:64.32a; tr. Legge 2.280;

tls:text.tls:line: there is an inward reciprocity, and great pitifulness. [an inner concern/considerateness CH]

sense.def: be mindful of the concerns of others, fair and empathetic

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.11; Couvreur 2.394f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 712; Yishu 39:64.32a; tr. Legge 2.280;

tls:text.tls:line: there is an inward reciprocity, and great pitifulness. [an inner concern/considerateness CH]

sense.def: poetic: extremely

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.12; Couvreur 2.394f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 712; Yishu 39:64.32a; tr. Legge 2.280;

tls:text.tls:line: it reaches to all in all quarters.

sense.def: yì jí: continue on so as to reach> reach until

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.13; Couvreur 2.394f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.106; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 712; Yishu 39:64.32a; tr. Legge 2.280;

tls:text.tls:line: its influence extends to all within the four seas.

sense.def: yì jí: continue on so as to reach> reach until

tls:text.tls:srcline: 何如斯可謂參於天地矣？」

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.14; Couvreur 2.396f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.107; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 713; Yishu 39:64.35b; tr. Legge 2.2i1;

tls:text.tls:line: of what nature that virtue was which could be said to put its possessors on an equality with heaven and earth.'

sense.def: logical: then under those logical conditions [Move logical cases here.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.15; Couvreur 2.396f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.107; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 713; Yishu 39:64.35b; tr. Legge 2.2i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Reverently displaying these three characteristics and thereby comforting all under heaven under the toils which they imposed,

sense.def: 斯三者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.18; Couvreur 2.398f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 713; Yishu 39:64.40a; tr. Legge 2.2i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. 'When the personal character is pure and bright,

sense.def: person; formal or poetic: his person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.19; Couvreur 2.398f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 713; Yishu 39:64.40a; tr. Legge 2.2i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Those southern hills whose summits touch the skies!

sense.def: be high, outstanding and dangerous (as of mountains)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.19; Couvreur 2.398f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 713; Yishu 39:64.40a; tr. Legge 2.2i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Those southern hills whose summits touch the skies!

sense.def: reach as far as

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 29.01.21; Couvreur 2.398f; Su1n Xïda4n 12.108; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 713; Yishu 39:64.43b; tr. Legge 2.2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Your disciple dares not but recieve (your instructions) with reverence.'

sense.def: I, your disciple ZHUANG (Zhou)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.01; Couvreur 2.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 715; Yishu 39:65.1b; tr. Legge 2.2i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the superior men framed rules of ceremony for the conservation of virtue;

sense.def: dike > protect; defend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.02; Couvreur 2.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 716; Yishu 39:65.3a; tr. Legge 2.2i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The small man, when poor, feels the pinch of his straitened circumstances;

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.02; Couvreur 2.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 716; Yishu 39:65.3a; tr. Legge 2.2i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The small man, when poor, feels the pinch of his straitened circumstances;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.02; Couvreur 2.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 716; Yishu 39:65.3a; tr. Legge 2.2i4;

tls:text.tls:line: and when rich, is liable to become proud.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.02; Couvreur 2.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 716; Yishu 39:65.3a; tr. Legge 2.2i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the pinch of that poverty he may proceed to steal;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.02; Couvreur 2.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 716; Yishu 39:65.3a; tr. Legge 2.2i4;

tls:text.tls:line: and when proud, he may proceed to deeds of disorder.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.02; Couvreur 2.400f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 716; Yishu 39:65.3a; tr. Legge 2.2i4;

tls:text.tls:line: to serve as dykes for the people.

sense.def: dike > protection

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.05; Couvreur 2.401f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 717; Yishu 39:65.4a; tr. Legge 2.285;

tls:text.tls:line: These regulations were intended for the protection of the people,

sense.def: dike > protection

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.06; Couvreur 2.402; Su1n Xïda4n 13.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 717; Yishu 39:65.7a; tr. Legge 2.285;

tls:text.tls:line: that what is doubtful is displayed, and what is minute is distinguished,

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.06; Couvreur 2.402; Su1n Xïda4n 13.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 717; Yishu 39:65.7a; tr. Legge 2.285;

tls:text.tls:line: that they may serve as dykes for the people.

sense.def: dike > protection

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.07; Couvreur 2.402f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 718; Yishu 39:65.8a; tr. Legge 2.285;

tls:text.tls:line: 'There are not two suns in the sky,

sense.def: sun 十日

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.07; Couvreur 2.402f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 718; Yishu 39:65.8a; tr. Legge 2.285;

tls:text.tls:line: nor two superiors of equal honour;

sense.def: leading position, highest leading position; or: person of highest status 無二上

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.07; Couvreur 2.402f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 718; Yishu 39:65.8a; tr. Legge 2.285;

tls:text.tls:line: and the people are shown how the distinction between ruler and subject should be manitained.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.11; Couvreur 2.404f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 719; Yishu 39:65.12a; tr. Legge 2.286;

tls:text.tls:line: and yet the people will try to obtain more than is due to their years.

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.13; Couvreur 2.405; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 720; Yishu 39:65.13a; tr. Legge 2.287;
