tls:text.tls:line: 'The superior man exalts others and abases himself;

sense.def: humble (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.13; Couvreur 2.405; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 720; Yishu 39:65.13a; tr. Legge 2.287;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The superior man exalts others and abases himself;

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.13; Couvreur 2.405; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 720; Yishu 39:65.13a; tr. Legge 2.287;

tls:text.tls:line: he gives the first place to others and takes the last himself;

sense.def: give priority to; give precedence to; show a preference for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.13; Couvreur 2.405; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 720; Yishu 39:65.13a; tr. Legge 2.287;

tls:text.tls:line: he gives the first place to others and takes the last himself;

sense.def: consider as having only secondary importance, regard as less important

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.13; Couvreur 2.405; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 720; Yishu 39:65.13a; tr. Legge 2.287;

tls:text.tls:line: he gives the first place to others and takes the last himself;

sense.def: put last, give lowest priority to; deemphasise

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.13; Couvreur 2.405; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 720; Yishu 39:65.13a; tr. Legge 2.287;

tls:text.tls:line: he gives the first place to others and takes the last himself;

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.13; Couvreur 2.405; Su1n Xïda4n 13.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 720; Yishu 39:65.13a; tr. Legge 2.287;

tls:text.tls:line: but when he mentions his own ruler, he calls him "Our ruler of little virtue."'

sense.def: one's own (object) 自多其力 "overestimate one's own strength"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.16; Couvreur 2.406; Su1n Xïda4n 13.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 721; Yishu 39:65.15b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When the ruler of a state, with its clans,

sense.def: a nation, a state

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.16; Couvreur 2.406; Su1n Xïda4n 13.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 721; Yishu 39:65.15b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: When he thinks much of their ability, and little of the chariots (with which he rewards them),

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.16; Couvreur 2.406; Su1n Xïda4n 13.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 721; Yishu 39:65.15b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: the people address themselves to elegant arts.

sense.def: the fine arts

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.16; Couvreur 2.406; Su1n Xïda4n 13.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 721; Yishu 39:65.15b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence a superior man keeps his speech under control,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.16; Couvreur 2.406; Su1n Xïda4n 13.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 721; Yishu 39:65.15b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: while the small man is forward to speak.'

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.17; Couvreur 2.407; Su1n Xïda4n 13.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 721; Yishu 39:65.16a; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: If superiors pay no regard to the words of the people,

sense.def: consider carefully

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.18; Couvreur 2.407; Su1n Xïda4n 13.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 721; Yishu 39:65.16b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: With grass and fuel-gatherers councel take."'

sense.def: ask for advice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.19; Couvreur 2.408; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 722; Yishu 39:65.17b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to himself,

sense.def: speak of (oneself) (typically by way of explanation), declare (oneself) responsible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.19; Couvreur 2.408; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 722; Yishu 39:65.17b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to himself,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.19; Couvreur 2.408; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 722; Yishu 39:65.17b; tr. Legge 2.288;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to himself,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.20; Couvreur 2.408; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 722; Yishu 39:65.18a; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to himself,

sense.def: speak of (oneself) (typically by way of explanation), declare (oneself) responsible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.20; Couvreur 2.408; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 722; Yishu 39:65.18a; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to himself,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.21; Couvreur 2.409; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 723; Yishu 39:65.18b; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to themselves,

sense.def: speak of (oneself) (typically by way of explanation), declare (oneself) responsible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.21; Couvreur 2.409; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 723; Yishu 39:65.18b; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to themselves,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.23; Couvreur 2.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 723; Yishu 39:65.19b; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to himself,

sense.def: speak of (oneself) (typically by way of explanation), declare (oneself) responsible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.23; Couvreur 2.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 723; Yishu 39:65.19b; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: and what is wrong to himself,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.24; Couvreur 2.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 723; Yishu 39:65.19b; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: but the faultless virtue of my deceased father Wan.

sense.def: deceased father

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.24; Couvreur 2.409f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 723; Yishu 39:65.19b; tr. Legge 2.289;

tls:text.tls:line: it wil not be from any fault of my deceased father Wan,

sense.def: authoritative/solemn: my/our (朕考 "my ancestor" is PERHAPS best understood as "my(and thus more indirectly your) ancestor". It is as if this ancestry is not just a personal matter. The King respresents his community. His ancestors are "our ancestors" of the Zho1u people.)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.26; Couvreur 2.410f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 724; Yishu 39:65.21a; tr. Legge 2.290;

tls:text.tls:line: to remonstrate with them gently without being weary;

sense.def: be indefatigable; be unexhausted

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.26; Couvreur 2.410f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 724; Yishu 39:65.21a; tr. Legge 2.290;

tls:text.tls:line: "Your filial son was unceasing in his service."'

sense.def: fail, suffer failures; be a failure; fail to do what one should do

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.27; Couvreur 2.410f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 724f; Yishu 39:65.22a; tr. Legge 2.290;

tls:text.tls:line: "Brethren whose virtue stands the test, By bad example still unchanged,

sense.def: noble, esteemed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.27; Couvreur 2.410f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 724f; Yishu 39:65.22a; tr. Legge 2.290;

tls:text.tls:line: But if their virtue weakly fails The evil influence to withstand,

sense.def: noble, esteemed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.29; Couvreur 2.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.8f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 725; Yishu 39:65.23b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. The Master said,

sense.def: (often used within the scope of other verbs of speaking like yuē 曰) untensed, of persons, vt: (generally tend to) say, (generally tend to) claim:; (untensed) say:

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.29; Couvreur 2.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.8f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 725; Yishu 39:65.23b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Small men are all able to suport their parents.

sense.def: the petty people (often quantified: all)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.29; Couvreur 2.411f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.8f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 725; Yishu 39:65.23b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: If the superior man do not also reverence them,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.30; Couvreur 2.412; Su1n Xïda4n 13.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 726; Yishu 39:65.24b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: inside the female apartments

sense.def: what it inside doors: private quarters; room; rooms of the palace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.30; Couvreur 2.412; Su1n Xïda4n 13.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 726; Yishu 39:65.24b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: inside the female apartments

sense.def: ladies' apartments, ladies' quarters; private quarters

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.30; Couvreur 2.412; Su1n Xïda4n 13.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 726; Yishu 39:65.24b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: he may sport, but should not sigh.

sense.def: have sex; ingage in sexual activities

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.30; Couvreur 2.412; Su1n Xïda4n 13.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 726; Yishu 39:65.24b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: By these (rules) the superior man would protect the people (from evil),

sense.def: dike > protect; defend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.32; Couvreur 2.413; Su1n Xïda4n 13.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 726; Yishu 39:65.25b; tr. Legge 2.291;

tls:text.tls:line: were intended to teach the people to follow their dead with their filial duty.

sense.def: pursue in thought, let one's thoughts go out to; continue to be mindful of 追念

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.36; Couvreur 2.414f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 727; Yishu 39:65.28a; tr. Legge 2.292;

tls:text.tls:line: and the clear in the court below:

sense.def: clear and unruffled 澄水

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.38; Couvreur 2.414f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 727; Yishu 39:65.28a; tr. Legge 2.292;

tls:text.tls:line: Every smile and word is as it should be.'

sense.def: smile

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.38; Couvreur 2.414f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 727; Yishu 39:65.28a; tr. Legge 2.292;

tls:text.tls:line: Every smile and word is as it should be.'

sense.def: laughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.38; Couvreur 2.414f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 727; Yishu 39:65.28a; tr. Legge 2.292;

tls:text.tls:line: Every smile and word is as it should be.'

sense.def: talk; (often negative:) chatter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.39; Couvreur 2.416f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 728; Yishu 39:65.29b; tr. Legge 2.293;

tls:text.tls:line: the putting of rice into the mourth under the window;

sense.def: window in the wall, facing south, next to the door; rarely used in transferred sense: aperture

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.40; Couvreur 2.416f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 728; Yishu 39:65.29b; tr. Legge 2.293;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin dynasty they condoled with the mourners at the grave;

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.40; Couvreur 2.416f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 728; Yishu 39:65.29b; tr. Legge 2.293;

tls:text.tls:line: they di so under Kau in the house:

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.42; Couvreur 2.416f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 729; Yishu 39:65.30b; tr. Legge 2.294;

tls:text.tls:line: are designed to teach the people to continue their filial duty even to the dead.

sense.def: pursue in thought, let one's thoughts go out to; continue to be mindful of 追念

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.45; Couvreur 2.418f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 730; Yishu 39:65.32b; tr. Legge 2.294;

tls:text.tls:line: and yet there are those who forget their parents, and are double-minded to their ruler.'

sense.def: be disloyal to, disobey

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.46; Couvreur 2.420f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 730; Yishu 39:65.34a; tr. Legge 2.295;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence the superior man, when presents are brought to him,

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.47; Couvreur 2.420f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 730; Yishu 39:65.34b; tr. Legge 2.295;

tls:text.tls:line: "He reaps without having ploughed that he may reap;

sense.def: to harvest grain, reap the harvest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.47; Couvreur 2.420f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 730; Yishu 39:65.34b; tr. Legge 2.295;

tls:text.tls:line: - there will be evil."

sense.def: there is/will be (supernaturally ordained) disaster

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.48; Couvreur 2.421f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 731; Yishu 39:65.36b; tr. Legge 2.296;

tls:text.tls:line: if he hunts, he does not (also) fish;

sense.def: engage in professional fishery

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.48; Couvreur 2.421f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 731; Yishu 39:65.36b; tr. Legge 2.296;

tls:text.tls:line: he eats the (fruits of the) season, and is not eager for delicacies;

sense.def: strive for, try with all one's might to obtain

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.48; Couvreur 2.421f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 731; Yishu 39:65.36b; tr. Legge 2.296;

tls:text.tls:line: he eats the (fruits of the) season, and is not eager for delicacies;

sense.def: exquisite delicacies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.50; Couvreur 2.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 732; Yishu 39:65.38b; tr. Legge 2.297;

tls:text.tls:line: They display the separation which should be maintained (between the sexes),

sense.def: demonstrate; publicise, show up for what something is (loan for 彰); make visible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.50; Couvreur 2.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 732; Yishu 39:65.38b; tr. Legge 2.297;

tls:text.tls:line: They display the separation which should be maintained (between the sexes),

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.50; Couvreur 2.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 732; Yishu 39:65.38b; tr. Legge 2.297;

tls:text.tls:line: that there may be no occasion for suspicion,

sense.def: what is doubtful; doubt; uncertainty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.51; Couvreur 2.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 732; Yishu 39:65.38b; tr. Legge 2.297;

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.52; Couvreur 2.422f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 732; Yishu 39:65.38b; tr. Legge 2.297;

tls:text.tls:line: "How do we proceed in hewing an axe-handle?

sense.def: axe-handle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.53; Couvreur 2.423f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 733; Yishu 39:65.39b; tr. Legge 2.297;

tls:text.tls:line: - to show broadly the distinction (to be maintained between man and wife).

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.54; Couvreur 2.424; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 733; Yishu 39:65.40a; tr. Legge 2.298;

tls:text.tls:line: This was intended to guard the people against (undue freedom of intercourse);

sense.def: dike > protect; defend

tls:text.tls:srcline: 陽侯猶殺繆侯而竊其夫人。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.54; Couvreur 2.424; Su1n Xïda4n 13.14; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 733; Yishu 39:65.40a; tr. Legge 2.298;

tls:text.tls:line: and yet the marquis of Yang killed the marquis of M, and stole away his wife.

sense.def: get (a position etc) by inappropriate or illegal means

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.55; Couvreur 2.424f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 734; Yishu 39:65.42a; tr. Legge 2.298;

tls:text.tls:line: - this would seem to be an obstacle of friendship,

sense.def: show friendship to, give friendly support to; cultivate the friendship of; treat as a friend; gain as a friend

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.56; Couvreur 2.424f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 734; Yishu 39:65.42a; tr. Legge 2.298;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, in the intercourse of friends,

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.57; Couvreur 2.425f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 734; Yishu 39:65.42b; tr. Legge 2.298;

tls:text.tls:line: Princes of states should not be like fishers for beauty (in the families) below them.

sense.def: to fish for (profit, beautiful ladies, etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 30.01.58; Couvreur 2.425f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 734; Yishu 39:65.42b; tr. Legge 2.298;

tls:text.tls:line: if driving his wife in a carriage, a husband advances his left hand;

sense.def: wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.01; Couvreur 2.427f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 737; Yishu 40:66.2a-5a; tr. Legge 2.300;

tls:text.tls:line: should not be left for an instant;

sense.def: for a very short time, for as much as a moment; occasionally used nominally: a moment of life; after a very short time, in no time

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故君子戒慎乎其所不睹，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.01; Couvreur 2.427f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 737; Yishu 40:66.2a-5a; tr. Legge 2.300;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. On this account the superior man does not wait till he sees things to be cautious,

sense.def: see clearly, make out, catch sight of; notice, perceive; be able to recognise

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.03; Couvreur 2.428f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 737; Yishu 40:66.7a; tr. Legge 2.300;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. When there are no stirrings of pleasure, anger, sorrow, or joy,

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.04; Couvreur 2.429; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 737; Yishu 40:66.8b; tr. Legge 2.300;

tls:text.tls:line: and all things would be nourished (and flourish).

sense.def: be nurtured; be raised; be properly nurtured

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.05; Couvreur 2.429; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738; Yishu 40:66.9b; tr. Legge 2.301;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The superior man (exhibits) the state of equilibrium and harmony;

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.05; Couvreur 2.429; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738; Yishu 40:66.9b; tr. Legge 2.301;

tls:text.tls:line: the small man presents the opposite of those states.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.05; Couvreur 2.429; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738; Yishu 40:66.9b; tr. Legge 2.301;

tls:text.tls:line: because he is the superior man, and maintains himself in them;

sense.def: be a person of superior character

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.05; Couvreur 2.429; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738; Yishu 40:66.9b; tr. Legge 2.301;

tls:text.tls:line: because he is the superior man, and maintains himself in them;

sense.def: who

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.05; Couvreur 2.429; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738; Yishu 40:66.9b; tr. Legge 2.301;

tls:text.tls:line: because he is the small man, and exercises no apprehensive caution.'

sense.def: be a despicable petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.05; Couvreur 2.429; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738; Yishu 40:66.9b; tr. Legge 2.301;

tls:text.tls:line: because he is the small man, and exercises no apprehensive caution.'

sense.def: who

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.06; Couvreur 2.430; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738; Yishu 40:66.11b; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: Rare have they long been among the people who could attain it!'

sense.def: rarely, in only a few cases

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.07; Couvreur 2.430; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738f; Yishu 40:66.12b; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I know how it is

sense.def: true system of teachings: Buddhist, Taoist, or traditional Confucian

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.07; Couvreur 2.430; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 738f; Yishu 40:66.12b; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: That the Way is not clear,

sense.def: true system of teachings: Buddhist, Taoist, or traditional Confucian

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.08; Couvreur 2.430; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 739; Yishu 40:66.12b; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: The worthy go beyond it,

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.08; Couvreur 2.430; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 739; Yishu 40:66.12b; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: but they are few who can distinguish the flavours (of what they eat and drink).'

sense.def: archaic: few (opp 靡不 "all")

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.10; Couvreur 2.431; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 739; Yishu 40:66.14a; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: He laid hold of their two extremes, determined the mean between them,

sense.def: the pair of, the two, both 兩手，兩目，兩耳

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.10; Couvreur 2.431; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 739; Yishu 40:66.14a; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: It was this that made him Shun!'

sense.def: 斯食之 pronoun preceding a transitive verb of which it is the object [There are more examples of this that need to reclassified.]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 驅而納諸罟擭陷阱之中，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.11; Couvreur 2.431; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 740; Yishu 40:66.15b; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: but being driven forward and taken in a net, a trap, or a pitfall,

sense.def: trap, pitfall

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.11; Couvreur 2.431; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 740; Yishu 40:66.15b; tr. Legge 2.302;

tls:text.tls:line: but when they have chosen the state of equilibrium a nd harmony,

sense.def: opt for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.12; Couvreur 2.432; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 740; Yishu 40:66.17a; tr. Legge 2.303;

tls:text.tls:line: 'This was the character of Hui:

sense.def: natural disposition; personality, personal nature (not countable)趙歧2B6:孟子不悅其為人.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.12; Couvreur 2.432; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 740; Yishu 40:66.17a; tr. Legge 2.303;

tls:text.tls:line: - having chosen the state of equilibrium and harmony,

sense.def: opt for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.12; Couvreur 2.432; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 740; Yishu 40:66.17a; tr. Legge 2.303;

tls:text.tls:line: he grasped it firmly, wore it on his breast,

sense.def: chest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.17; Couvreur 2.434; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 742; Yishu 40:66.22a-24a; tr. Legge 2.303;

tls:text.tls:line: 21. 'The good man tries to proceed according to the (right) path,

sense.def: keep faithfully and earnestly to the path of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.17; Couvreur 2.434; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 742; Yishu 40:66.22a-24a; tr. Legge 2.303;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. 'The superior man, acting in accordance with the state of equilibrium and harmony,

sense.def: conform to (rules)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.17; Couvreur 2.434; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 742; Yishu 40:66.22a-24a; tr. Legge 2.303;

tls:text.tls:line: may be all unknown and unregarded by the world, but he feels no regret:

sense.def: withdraw from and hide from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.18; Couvreur 2.434f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 742; Yishu 40:66.25a; tr. Legge 2.304;

tls:text.tls:line: Common men and women, however much below the ordinary standard of character,

sense.def: the incompetent (persons); the unworthy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.20; Couvreur 2.435f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 742; Yishu 40:66.28a-28b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: Fishes spring in the deep,"

sense.def: Northern speech: very deep pool; deep pond

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.21; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.29b-30a; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: "In hewing and axe-shaft, in hewing an axe-shaft,

sense.def: axe-handle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.22; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.31a-31b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: 32. 'Fidelity to one's self and the corresponding reciprocity are not far from the path. (If one does one's loyal best... CH)

sense.def: show devoted effort and impartial considerateness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.22; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.31a-31b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: 32. 'Fidelity to one's self and the corresponding reciprocity are not far from the path. (If one does one's loyal best... CH)

sense.def: commitment; devoted effort, duty of loyal devotion; trustiness; the doing of one's loyal best 臣德也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.22; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.31a-31b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: 32. 'Fidelity to one's self and the corresponding reciprocity are not far from the path. (If one does one's loyal best... CH)

sense.def: fair empathy for others; non-discriminating considerateness; mindfulness of the concerns of others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.22; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.31a-31b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: What you do not like when done to yourself,

sense.def: do N1 to (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.22; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.31a-31b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: What you do not like when done to yourself,

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.22; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.31a-31b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: do not do to others.'

sense.def: do (something N1) (to someone N2) 勿施於

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.24; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.32b; tr. Legge 2.305;

tls:text.tls:line: to set the example in behaving to a friend

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.25; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.33b-34a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: and attention to his ordinary words,

sense.def: diligent attention to N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.25; Couvreur 2.436f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.33b-34a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: (the superior man) dares not but exert himself;

sense.def: make an intense effort; do one's best

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.26; Couvreur 2.438; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.35a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: Situated among barbarous tribes,

sense.def: the barbarians

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.26; Couvreur 2.438; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.35a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: he does what is proper in such a situation.

sense.def: the barbarians

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.28; Couvreur 2.439; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.36a-37a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: 38. 'He rectifies himself, and seeks for nothing from others;

sense.def: correct or rectify (oneself) 正己

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.28; Couvreur 2.439; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.36a-37a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: 38. 'He rectifies himself, and seeks for nothing from others;

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.28; Couvreur 2.439; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.36a-37a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: Above, he does not murmur against Heaven;

sense.def: feel a lasting aggressive anger and hatred for (often superiors); feel intensely resentful about the fact that; resent; gear a grudge against

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.28; Couvreur 2.439; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.36a-37a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: below, he does not find fault with men.'

sense.def: berate, to blame, to hold morally guilty See also GUILT

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.28; Couvreur 2.439; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 743; Yishu 40:66.36a-37a; tr. Legge 2.306;

tls:text.tls:line: while the mean man does what is full of risk, looking out for the turns of luck.'

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.29; Couvreur 2.439f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 744; Yishu 40:66.37b-38b; tr. Legge 2.307;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In archery we have something like (the way of) the superior man.

sense.def: similarity 有似於

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.29; Couvreur 2.439f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 744; Yishu 40:66.37b-38b; tr. Legge 2.307;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In archery we have something like (the way of) the superior man.

sense.def: being a gentleman; acting like a gentleman 射有似乎君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.29; Couvreur 2.439f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 744; Yishu 40:66.37b-38b; tr. Legge 2.307;

tls:text.tls:line: may be compared to what takes place in travelling, when to go far we must traverse the space that is near,

sense.def: what is near; those who are near NB: the two readings seem lexicalised.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.29; Couvreur 2.439f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 744; Yishu 40:66.37b-38b; tr. Legge 2.307;

tls:text.tls:line: and in ascending a height we must begin from the lower ground.

sense.def: what is humble

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.37; Couvreur 2.444f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 746; Yishu 40:66.47b; tr. Legge 2.309;

tls:text.tls:line: and his son transmitted it.'

sense.def: LY: transmit (a tradition), aiming for deep understanding; SJ, preface: make a coherent account of something for a better understanding

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.38; Couvreur 2.444f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 746; Yishu 40:66.48b; tr. Legge 2.309;

tls:text.tls:line: Once for all he buckled[by once buckling] his armour, and got possession of all under heaven;

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.39; Couvreur 2.444f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 746f; Yishu 40:66.49b; tr. Legge 2.309;

tls:text.tls:line: He carried back the title of king to Thai and Ki,

sense.def: pursue in thought, let one's thoughts go out to; continue to be mindful of 追念

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.01.39; Couvreur 2.444f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 746f; Yishu 40:66.49b; tr. Legge 2.309;

tls:text.tls:line: And the practice

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.01; Couvreur 2.448f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.1a-2a; tr. Legge 2.312;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. Duke Ai asked about government.

sense.def: the general question of political administration

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.02; Couvreur 2.448f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.2b-3a; tr. Legge 2.312;

tls:text.tls:line: That character is to be cultivated by pursuing the right course.

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.03; Couvreur 2.448f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.4a; tr. Legge 2.312;

tls:text.tls:line: Righteousness is (the accordance of actions with) what is right,

sense.def: rectitude; righteousness; moral principles

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.04; Couvreur 2.448f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.4b-5a; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. When those in inferior situations do not obtain (the confidence of) their superiors,

sense.def: be a success with, have success with (superiors etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.04; Couvreur 2.448f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.4b-5a; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: Desiring to cultivate his character,

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.05; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.6a; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: elder brother and younger;

sense.def: relations between brothers (not necessarily between the eldest and the others)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.05; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.6a; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: and the intercourse of friend and friend:

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.07; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. some are born with the knowledge of these (duties);

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.07; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: some know them by study;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.07; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: and some know them as the reslut of painfula experience.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.07; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. Some practise them with the ease of nature;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.07; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: some for the sake of the advantage;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.07; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: and some by dint of strong effort.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.07; Couvreur 2.451f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 749; Yishu 41:67.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.313;

tls:text.tls:line: and some by dint of strong effort.

sense.def: make a strenuous effort

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.08; Couvreur 2.452; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 750; Yishu 41:67.9a; tr. Legge 2.314;

tls:text.tls:line: to know to be ashamed is near to fortitude.

sense.def: the (proper) sense of what is publicly disgraceful, moral integrity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.08; Couvreur 2.452; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 750; Yishu 41:67.9a; tr. Legge 2.314;

tls:text.tls:line: He who knows these three things,

sense.def: 斯三者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.08; Couvreur 2.452; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 750; Yishu 41:67.9a; tr. Legge 2.314;

tls:text.tls:line: knows how to cultivate his own character.

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.08; Couvreur 2.452; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 750; Yishu 41:67.9a; tr. Legge 2.314;

tls:text.tls:line: Knowing how to cultivate his own character,

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.10; Couvreur 2.453; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 750; Yishu 41:67.10b; tr. Legge 2.314;

tls:text.tls:line: the cultivation ot themselves;

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.11; Couvreur 2.453; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 750f; Yishu 41:67.11b; tr. Legge 2.314;

tls:text.tls:line: 14. 'By (the ruler's) cultivation of himself there is set up (the example of) the course (which all should pursue);

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.12; Couvreur 2.454f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 751; Yishu 41:67.13b; tr. Legge 2.315;

tls:text.tls:line: - this is the way in which (the ruler) must cultivate his own character.

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.16; Couvreur 2.456f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.16a-17b; tr. Legge 2.316;

tls:text.tls:line: without such preparation there is failure.

sense.def: prepare beforehand against the contextually determinate thing, prepare in very good time against the contextually determinate thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.16; Couvreur 2.456f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.16a-17b; tr. Legge 2.316;

tls:text.tls:line: If actions to be performed be determined before hand, there will be no difficulty with them. (???)

sense.def: be distressed; be suffering

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.16; Couvreur 2.456f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.16a-17b; tr. Legge 2.316;

tls:text.tls:line: If the courses to be pursued be determined beforehand, the pursuit of them will be inexhaustible.

sense.def: be a success with, have success with (superiors etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.17; Couvreur 2.456f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.17b; tr. Legge 2.317;

tls:text.tls:line: 18. 'There is a way to obtain (the confidence of) the superior;

sense.def: be a success with, have success with (superiors etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.17; Couvreur 2.456f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.17b; tr. Legge 2.317;

tls:text.tls:line: There is a way to secure being believed in by his friends;

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.19; Couvreur 2.457f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.19a; tr. Legge 2.317;

tls:text.tls:line: He who possesses that perfection hits what is right without any effort,

sense.def: make an intense effort; do one's best

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.19; Couvreur 2.457f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.19a; tr. Legge 2.317;

tls:text.tls:line: he is the sage

sense.def: do as one pleases, act naturally; be easy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.19; Couvreur 2.457f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 752; Yishu 41:67.19a; tr. Legge 2.317;

tls:text.tls:line: he is the sage

sense.def: correspond exactly to, be exactly appropriate for; be in conformity with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.22; Couvreur 2.459f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 753; Yishu 41:67.20b; tr. Legge 2.318;

tls:text.tls:line: If another man succeed by one effort, he will use a hundred efforts;

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.22; Couvreur 2.459f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 753; Yishu 41:67.20b; tr. Legge 2.318;

tls:text.tls:line: if another succeeds by ten, he will use a thousand.

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.24; Couvreur 2.460f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.24b; tr. Legge 2.319;

tls:text.tls:line: he can assist the transforming and nourishing operations of heaven and earth.

sense.def: give generous support; (often said of Heaven) give succour to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.24; Couvreur 2.460f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.24b; tr. Legge 2.319;

tls:text.tls:line: Capable of assisting those transforming and nourishing operations,

sense.def: transforming nourishing care

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.26; Couvreur 2.462; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.28a; tr. Legge 2.320;

tls:text.tls:line: when a state or family is about to flourish,

sense.def: a nation, a state

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.26; Couvreur 2.462; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.28a; tr. Legge 2.320;

tls:text.tls:line: when a state or family is about to flourish,

sense.def: come to develop strongly; get to flourish; rise to power; go strong; be on the rise

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.26; Couvreur 2.462; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.28a; tr. Legge 2.320;

tls:text.tls:line: there are sure to be lucky omens,

sense.def: auspiciousness; good fortune

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.26; Couvreur 2.462; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.28a; tr. Legge 2.320;

tls:text.tls:line: there are sure to be lucky omens,

sense.def: good omens (for son); SHI 189.7: auspicious sign; GY 2.1: auspicious acts (are what one pleases the gods with)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.26; Couvreur 2.462; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.28a; tr. Legge 2.320;

tls:text.tls:line: there are sure to be unlucky omens.

sense.def: ZUO Zhuang 14: inauspicious supernatural occurrence

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.26; Couvreur 2.462; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.28a; tr. Legge 2.320;

tls:text.tls:line: there are sure to be unlucky omens.

sense.def: curse, supernatural disaster MENG 4A8: generally disaster

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.27; Couvreur 2.462; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 754; Yishu 41:67.28a; tr. Legge 2.320;

tls:text.tls:line: When calamity or happiness is about to come,

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.28; Couvreur 2.463f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.30b-31b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: 25. Perfection is seen in (its possessor's) self-completion;

sense.def: make (oneself) perfect and complete; achieve one's own purposes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.28; Couvreur 2.463f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.30b-31b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: and the path (which is its embodiment), in its self-direction.

sense.def: guide (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.29; Couvreur 2.463f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.31b-32b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: 28. He who is perfect does not only complete himself;

sense.def: contrastive: oneself, by oneself[PERVASIVELY DIFFICULT TO DISTINGUISH FROM THE "PERSONALLY npro.adV"] Latin: semet ipse (not semet ipsum!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.29; Couvreur 2.463f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.31b-32b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: 28. He who is perfect does not only complete himself;

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.29; Couvreur 2.463f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.31b-32b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: The completion of himself

sense.def: cause (oneself) to be complete> make (oneself) accomplished

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.29; Couvreur 2.463f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.31b-32b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: The completion of himself

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.30; Couvreur 2.464; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.33b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: evidencing itself, it reaches far;

sense.def: be very distant

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.31; Couvreur 2.464; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755; Yishu 41:67.34a; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: By reaching far and continuing long,

sense.def: be very long-lasting

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.32; Couvreur 2.464f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 755f; Yishu 41:67.34a-35b; tr. Legge 2.321;

tls:text.tls:line: by its reaching far and continuing long, it m akes him infinite.

sense.def: be very long-lasting

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.33; Couvreur 2.464f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.36a-36b; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: and so their production f things is inexhaustible.

sense.def: fathomable 不測"unfathomable"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.33; Couvreur 2.464f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.36a-36b; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: are to be large;

sense.def: be broad, be not narrow (of learning or knowledge), comprehensive, wide-ranging

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.33; Couvreur 2.464f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.36a-36b; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: to be far-reaching;

sense.def: enduring into the past

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.33; Couvreur 2.464f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.36a-36b; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: to be long-continuing.

sense.def: last long; be in a state for a long time; persevere; last long; be long-term

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.34; Couvreur 2.465f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: the sun, moon, stars, and constellations of the zodiac are suspended in it,

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.34; Couvreur 2.465f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: the sun, moon, stars, and constellations of the zodiac are suspended in it,

sense.def: be tied up and hung up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.34; Couvreur 2.465f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: and all things are overspread by it.

sense.def: be covered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.35; Couvreur 2.465f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: and contains the rivers and seas without their leaking away.

sense.def: to leak out (also used metaphorically)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.37; Couvreur 2.466f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: the largest tortoises, iguanas, iguanadons, dragons, fishes, and turtles are produced in them,

sense.def: soft-shelled large turtle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.37; Couvreur 2.466f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: the largest tortoises, iguanas, iguanadons, dragons, fishes, and turtles are produced in them,

sense.def: alligator

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.37; Couvreur 2.466f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: the largest tortoises, iguanas, iguanadons, dragons, fishes, and turtles are produced in them,

sense.def: river dragon; 6.1

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.37; Couvreur 2.466f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: the largest tortoises, iguanas, iguanadons, dragons, fishes, and turtles are produced in them,

sense.def: dragon[BUDDH: in the Buddhist context dragons (SANSKRIT nāga) are regarded as one of the eight kind of beings who protect the Buddhist teachings]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.37; Couvreur 2.466f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 756; Yishu 41:67.37a; tr. Legge 2.322;

tls:text.tls:line: the largest tortoises, iguanas, iguanadons, dragons, fishes, and turtles are produced in them,

sense.def: river turtle; sea turtle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.39; Couvreur 2.467f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 757; Yishu 41:67.40b-41a; tr. Legge 2.323;

tls:text.tls:line: it sends forth and nourishes all things!

sense.def: raise and bring up from birth; cater well for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.39; Couvreur 2.467f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 757; Yishu 41:67.40b-41a; tr. Legge 2.323;

tls:text.tls:line: 38. How complete is its greatness!

sense.def: be excellent, be outstanding; be more than qualified (to perform a function); excel

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.40; Couvreur 2.468f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 757; Yishu 41:67.42a-44a; tr. Legge 2.323;

tls:text.tls:line: He cheerishes his old knowledge so as (continually) to be acquiring new,

sense.def: what is recent

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.40; Couvreur 2.468f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 757; Yishu 41:67.42a-44a; tr. Legge 2.323;

tls:text.tls:line: and thus manifests an honest, generous, earnestness in the esteem and practice of all propriety.

sense.def: to hold in very high esteem, admire

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.42; Couvreur 2.469; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 758; Yishu 41:67.45a; tr. Legge 2.323;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Let a man who is ignorant be fond of using his own judgement;

sense.def: conform to (oneself)> be wilful, be opinionated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.42; Couvreur 2.469; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 758; Yishu 41:67.45a; tr. Legge 2.323;

tls:text.tls:line: let one who is living in the present age

sense.def: live in (times N)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.43; Couvreur 2.469; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 758; Yishu 41:67.45b-46a; tr. Legge 2.324;

tls:text.tls:line: 44. Now, throughout the whole kingdom, carriages have all wheels of the same breadth of rim;

sense.def: vehicles, chariots of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.43; Couvreur 2.469; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 758; Yishu 41:67.45b-46a; tr. Legge 2.324;

tls:text.tls:line: all writing is with the same characters;

sense.def: writings; written document of any kind; often specifically: official document; book; stationary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.43; Couvreur 2.469; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 758; Yishu 41:67.45b-46a; tr. Legge 2.324;

tls:text.tls:line: all writing is with the same characters;

sense.def: PATTERN> graph, graphic shape; written shape; (as opposed to 字 "written character standing for a word)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.43; Couvreur 2.469; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 758; Yishu 41:67.45b-46a; tr. Legge 2.324;

tls:text.tls:line: and for conduct there are the same rules.

sense.def: xìng: professional conduct, public demeanour, public conduct; personal conduct, behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.43; Couvreur 2.469; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 758; Yishu 41:67.45b-46a; tr. Legge 2.324;

tls:text.tls:line: and for conduct there are the same rules.

sense.def: fundamental human relations; moral standards of social behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.49; Couvreur 2.473; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 759; Yishu 41:67.52b; tr. Legge 2.325;

tls:text.tls:line: obtained an early renown throughout the kingdom who did not correspond to this description.

sense.def: great fame, renown; reputation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.50; Couvreur 2.473f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.53b-56b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: 52. Kung-nǐ handed down (the views of) Yau and Shun as if they had been his ancestors,

sense.def: LY: transmit (a tradition), aiming for deep understanding; SJ, preface: make a coherent account of something for a better understanding

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.50; Couvreur 2.473f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.53b-56b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: 53. He may be compared to heaven and earth in their suppoorting and containing,

sense.def: all objects =無所不

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.50; Couvreur 2.473f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.53b-56b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: 53. He may be compared to heaven and earth in their suppoorting and containing,

sense.def: hold up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.50; Couvreur 2.473f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.53b-56b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: their overshadowing and curtaining all things.

sense.def: cover properly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.50; Couvreur 2.473f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.53b-56b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: their overshadowing and curtaining all things.

sense.def: cover

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.51; Couvreur 2.474; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.56b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: 53... All things are nourished together without their injuring one another;

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.51; Couvreur 2.474; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.56b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: 53... All things are nourished together without their injuring one another;

sense.def: be nurtured; be raised; be properly nurtured

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.52; Couvreur 2.474; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.58a; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: magnanimous, generous, benign, and mild,

sense.def: tolerance and generosity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.52; Couvreur 2.474; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.58a; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: magnanimous, generous, benign, and mild,

sense.def: gentle softness, genteelness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.53; Couvreur 2.474; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760; Yishu 41:67.58a; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: fitted to exercise discrimination.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.54; Couvreur 2.475; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 760f; Yishu 41:67.58b-59b; tr. Legge 2.326;

tls:text.tls:line: 55. All-embracing is he and vast, deep and active as a fountain,

sense.def: deep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.55; Couvreur 2.475; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 761; Yishu 41:67.59b; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: 56... In this way his fame overspreads the Middle kingdom,

sense.def: fame

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.55; Couvreur 2.475; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 761; Yishu 41:67.59b; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: and spreads to all barbarous tribes.

sense.def: yì jí: continue on so as to reach> reach until

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.57; Couvreur 2.476; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 761; Yishu 41:67.60a-60b; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: and know the transforming and nourishing operations of haeaven and earth.

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.57; Couvreur 2.476; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 761; Yishu 41:67.60a-60b; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: and know the transforming and nourishing operations of haeaven and earth.

sense.def: transforming nourishing care

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.58; Couvreur 2.476; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.60b-62a; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: Call him an abyss, how deep is he!

sense.def: be very deep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.58; Couvreur 2.476; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.60b-62a; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: who is indeed quick in apprehension and clear in discernment, of sagely wisdom, and all-embracing knowledge, possessing heavenly virtue?

sense.def: who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.59; Couvreur 2.476f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.63a; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: Just so, it is the way of the superior man

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.59; Couvreur 2.476f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.63a; tr. Legge 2.327;

tls:text.tls:line: and it is the way of the small men to seek notoriety,

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.60; Couvreur 2.476f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.64a; tr. Legge 2.328;

tls:text.tls:line: appearing insipid, yet not to produce satiety; [yet not to be off-putting]

sense.def: be bland (psychologically); be insipid

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.60; Couvreur 2.476f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.64a; tr. Legge 2.328;

tls:text.tls:line: He knows where the wind proceeds from.

sense.def: reason, source (for insight). See SINCE

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.61; Couvreur 2.477f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.66a-66b; tr. Legge 2.328;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the superior man internally examines his heart, that there may be nothing wrong there,

sense.def: investigate oneself inwardly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.61; Couvreur 2.477f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.66a-66b; tr. Legge 2.328;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the superior man internally examines his heart, that there may be nothing wrong there,

sense.def: investigate oneself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.61; Couvreur 2.477f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.66a-66b; tr. Legge 2.328;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the superior man internally examines his heart, that there may be nothing wrong there,

sense.def: be distressed; be suffering

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.64; Couvreur 2.479; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.70b-71a; tr. Legge 2.329;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Among the appliances to transform the people, sounds and appearances

sense.def: teach and transform, teach successfully; get to change to the better; educate 化民

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 31.02.64; Couvreur 2.479; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 762; Yishu 41:67.70b-71a; tr. Legge 2.329;

tls:text.tls:line: "The doings of high Heaven

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.04; Couvreur 2.4i2; Su1n Xïda4n 13.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 767f; Yishu 42:68.4b-5b; tr. Legge 2.331;

tls:text.tls:line: His courtesy keeps shame at a distance.'

sense.def: public disgrace, opprobium 雪恥 "wash away a public disgrace"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君子不以一日使其躬儳焉

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.04; Couvreur 2.4i2; Su1n Xïda4n 13.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 767f; Yishu 42:68.4b-5b; tr. Legge 2.331;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man does not allow any irregularity in his person, even for a single day;

sense.def: person; formal or poetic: his person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.05; Couvreur 2.4i2; Su1n Xïda4n 13.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 768; Yishu 42:68.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.331;

tls:text.tls:line: the day and month in which to appear before the ruler are chosen beforehand:

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.05; Couvreur 2.4i2; Su1n Xïda4n 13.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 768; Yishu 42:68.7a-7b; tr. Legge 2.331;

tls:text.tls:line: '(The small man) is familiar and insolent.

sense.def: be impertinent; be unduly familiar with superiors or with other persons who deserve respect

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.06; Couvreur 2.4i3; Su1n Xïda4n 13.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 768; Yishu 42:68.7b; tr. Legge 2.331;

tls:text.tls:line: - these rules were made that the people might not take troublesome liberties with one another!

sense.def: be very close to; be too close to; have improperly intimate relations with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.07; Couvreur 2.4i3; Su1n Xïda4n 13.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 769; Yishu 42:68.9a; tr. Legge 2.332;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. These were the words of the Master,

sense.def: the following

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.07; Couvreur 2.4i3; Su1n Xïda4n 13.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 769; Yishu 42:68.9a; tr. Legge 2.332;

tls:text.tls:line: '(Humanity, of which the characteristic is) Benevolence,

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.08; Couvreur 2.4i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 769; Yishu 42:68.10a; tr. Legge 2.332;

tls:text.tls:line: - "Answers to every word will leap,

sense.def: answer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.11; Couvreur 2.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 770; Yishu 42:68.11b; tr. Legge 2.332;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the superior man reasons about the path to be trodden from the standpoint of himself,

sense.def: take one's point of departure from (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.11; Couvreur 2.4i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 770; Yishu 42:68.11b; tr. Legge 2.332;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the superior man reasons about the path to be trodden from the standpoint of himself,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.12; Couvreur 2.485f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 770; Yishu 42:68.12b; tr. Legge 2.333;

tls:text.tls:line: (The virtues of) humanity appear in three ways.

sense.def: three kinds, three types, three categories 仁有三

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.12; Couvreur 2.485f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 770; Yishu 42:68.12b; tr. Legge 2.333;

tls:text.tls:line: Those to whom it really belongs practise it easily and naturally;

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.12; Couvreur 2.485f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 770; Yishu 42:68.12b; tr. Legge 2.333;

tls:text.tls:line: Those to whom it really belongs practise it easily and naturally;

sense.def: regard as conducive to peace; feel at ease with, feel comfortable with; find one's peace in; be content with; find comfort in (women and feasting)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.12; Couvreur 2.485f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 770; Yishu 42:68.12b; tr. Legge 2.333;

tls:text.tls:line: the wise practise it for the sake of the advantage which it brings;

sense.def: the wise

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.12; Couvreur 2.485f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 770; Yishu 42:68.12b; tr. Legge 2.333;

tls:text.tls:line: the wise practise it for the sake of the advantage which it brings;

sense.def: make use of, deploy; put into practice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.15; Couvreur 2.487; Su1n Xïda4n 13.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 771; Yishu 42:68.16b; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: 17. These were the words of the Master:

sense.def: the following

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.15; Couvreur 2.487; Su1n Xïda4n 13.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 771; Yishu 42:68.16b; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: Where there is a deep and compassionate sympathy in the heart,

sense.def: in the bottom of heart, from the bottom of one's heart; sincerely

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.15; Couvreur 2.487; Su1n Xïda4n 13.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 771; Yishu 42:68.16b; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: Where there is a deep and compassionate sympathy in the heart,

sense.def: feel miserable and despondent; (of things:) cause one to be miserable, be woeful, painful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.15; Couvreur 2.487; Su1n Xïda4n 13.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 771; Yishu 42:68.16b; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: Where there is a deep and compassionate sympathy in the heart,

sense.def: be very sad

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.15; Couvreur 2.487; Su1n Xïda4n 13.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 771; Yishu 42:68.16b; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: Where there is a deep and compassionate sympathy in the heart,

sense.def: be sad

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.16; Couvreur 2.487; Su1n Xïda4n 13.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 771; Yishu 42:68.16b; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: To his sons he would leave

sense.def: present (somebody N1) with (a present N2); bestow something on somebody

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.18; Couvreur 2.487f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 772; Yishu 42:68.19a; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: and like a long road.

sense.def: way in the sense of distance covered, or stretch to be covered; route

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.18; Couvreur 2.487f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 772; Yishu 42:68.19a; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: and thus he who tries to nerve huimself to it

sense.def: make in effort for, work hard towards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.19; Couvreur 2.487f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 772; Yishu 42:68.19a; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: when he looks at men and compares them with one another,

sense.def: look at so as to compare

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.19; Couvreur 2.487f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 772; Yishu 42:68.19a; tr. Legge 2.334;

tls:text.tls:line: he knows who among them is more worthy.'

sense.def: the most talented one

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.20; Couvreur 2.488f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 773; Yishu 42:68.20a; tr. Legge 2.335;

tls:text.tls:line: 'It is only one man (here and there) under heaven,

sense.def: in the bottom of heart, from the bottom of one's heart; sincerely

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.20; Couvreur 2.488f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 773; Yishu 42:68.20a; tr. Legge 2.335;

tls:text.tls:line: 'It is only one man (here and there) under heaven,

sense.def: regard as conducive to peace; feel at ease with, feel comfortable with; find one's peace in; be content with; find comfort in (women and feasting)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.20; Couvreur 2.488f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 773; Yishu 42:68.20a; tr. Legge 2.335;

tls:text.tls:line: Light as a hair, yet few can bear The burden of its weight.

sense.def: rarely, in only a few cases

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.23; Couvreur 2.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 773; Yishu 42:68.21b; tr. Legge 2.335;

tls:text.tls:line: - and hence it is easy to apologise for the errors of those who are seeking this humanity.'

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.23; Couvreur 2.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 773; Yishu 42:68.21b; tr. Legge 2.335;

tls:text.tls:line: - and hence it is easy to apologise for the errors of those who are seeking this humanity.'

sense.def: be explained (Zheng Xuan!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.24; Couvreur 2.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.22b; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: economy is near to humanity;

sense.def: come close to (something abstract like humaneness)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.25; Couvreur 2.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.22b; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: in the case of those who practise these things?

sense.def: elevated style?: be few and far between; be sparse, be scarce, be few; be a rare case 不鮮 "be not so few"; 天下鮮矣 "there are few under the sun".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.25; Couvreur 2.489f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.22b; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: For virtue's structure, broad and high."'

sense.def: basis, foundations (of the state etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.26; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: it is only the superior man who is able to reach it.

sense.def: show a capacity for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.26; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: does not make himself the rule,

sense.def: using (oneself)> with one's own things, by one's own standards

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.26; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: does not make himself the rule,

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.26; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: but gives them his instructions so that they shall be able to stimulate themselves to endeavour,

sense.def: feel ashamed about, feel embarrassed about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.27; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: and friendship to perfect it:

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.27; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: - he desires in this way to produce a uniformity of the people.

sense.def: harmony

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.27; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: "Shall they unblushing break man's law?

sense.def: be ashamed in front of, be ashamed vis-a-vis (also abstract values)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.27; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.24a; tr. Legge 2.336;

tls:text.tls:line: Shall they not stand of Heaven in awe?"

sense.def: be frightened of; stand in fearful awe of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故君子恥服其服而無其容，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.28; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.27a; tr. Legge 2.337;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence the superior man is ashamed to wear the robes, and not have the demeanour,

sense.def: find it publicly unacceptable to V; find it a public disgrace to V, feel it to be a public disgrace that one Vs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.28; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.27a; tr. Legge 2.337;

tls:text.tls:line: ashamed to have the demeanour, and not the style of speech;

sense.def: find it publicly unacceptable to V; find it a public disgrace to V, feel it to be a public disgrace that one Vs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.28; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774; Yishu 42:68.27a; tr. Legge 2.337;

tls:text.tls:line: ashamed to have the style of speech, and not the virtues;

sense.def: find it publicly unacceptable to V; find it a public disgrace to V, feel it to be a public disgrace that one Vs

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故君子衰絰則有哀色；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.29; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774f; Yishu 42:68.27b; tr. Legge 2.337;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus it is that when the superior man has on his sackcloth and other mourning, his countenance wears an air of sorrow;

sense.def: put on traditional mourning garments

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故君子衰絰則有哀色；

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.29; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774f; Yishu 42:68.27b; tr. Legge 2.337;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus it is that when the superior man has on his sackcloth and other mourning, his countenance wears an air of sorrow;

sense.def: grief-stricken 哀色

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.29; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774f; Yishu 42:68.27b; tr. Legge 2.337;

tls:text.tls:line: when he wears the square-cut dress and square-topped cap, his countenance wears an air of respect;

sense.def: respectful, devoted 敬色

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.29; Couvreur 2.490f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 774f; Yishu 42:68.27b; tr. Legge 2.337;

tls:text.tls:line: and when he wears his mail-coat and helmet, is countenance says that he is not to be meddled with.

sense.def: be humiliated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.32; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: He gives place willingly to men of ability and virtue.

sense.def: yield to, pass on the privilege to; yield precedence to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.32; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: He abases himself and gives honour to others.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.32; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: If he succeeds in doing so (and obtaining his ruler's approbation), he feels that he has done right;

sense.def: consider (oneself) as right, consider one's own opinions as true

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.32; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: if he do not succeed, he still feels that he has done right:

sense.def: consider (oneself) as right, consider one's own opinions as true

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.33; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: Round the branches and stems!

sense.def: twig; long twig

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.33; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: Round the branches and stems!

sense.def: small branch growing immediately on the main trunk; minor branch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.33; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: Happiness increased unsought, Nor by crooked ways was bought."

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven or the ancestors); good fortune sent from above; fortunate circumstances

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.33; Couvreur 2.493f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 776; Yishu 42:68.29b; tr. Legge 2.338;

tls:text.tls:line: Happiness increased unsought, Nor by crooked ways was bought."

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.35; Couvreur 2.495; Su1n Xïda4n 13.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 777; Yishu 42:68.32b; tr. Legge 2.339;

tls:text.tls:line: - they would have been ashamed if the name had gone beyond the actions (of the life).

sense.def: consider as shameful> be ashamed that S; feel bashful about, feel shy about; show shyness concerning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.36; Couvreur 2.495; Su1n Xïda4n 13.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 777; Yishu 42:68.32b; tr. Legge 2.339;

tls:text.tls:line: In accordance with this the superior man does not himself magnify his doings,

sense.def: one's own (object) 自多其力 "overestimate one's own strength"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.36; Couvreur 2.495; Su1n Xïda4n 13.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 777; Yishu 42:68.32b; tr. Legge 2.339;

tls:text.tls:line: In accordance with this the superior man does not himself magnify his doings,

sense.def: make big words about, brag about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.36; Couvreur 2.495; Su1n Xïda4n 13.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 777; Yishu 42:68.32b; tr. Legge 2.339;

tls:text.tls:line: In accordance with this the superior man does not himself magnify his doings,

sense.def: exaggerate 自大其事

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.36; Couvreur 2.495; Su1n Xïda4n 13.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 777; Yishu 42:68.32b; tr. Legge 2.339;

tls:text.tls:line: nor himself exalt his merit,

sense.def: brag about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.36; Couvreur 2.495; Su1n Xïda4n 13.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 777; Yishu 42:68.32b; tr. Legge 2.339;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, altough the superior man abases himself,

sense.def: treat (oneself) as (if) being of low status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.37; Couvreur 2.496; Su1n Xïda4n 13.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 778; Yishu 42:68.34a; tr. Legge 2.340;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore th said of himself that he was simply "a man useful to others."'

sense.def: call (oneself) N2

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.38; Couvreur 2.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 778; Yishu 42:68.34b; tr. Legge 2.340;

tls:text.tls:line: "The happy and corteous prince

sense.def: poetic: supremely contented and happy (possibly to be read as vi)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.39; Couvreur 2.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 778; Yishu 42:68.35a; tr. Legge 2.340;

tls:text.tls:line: With all their happiness, there is no wild extravagance;

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.39; Couvreur 2.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 778; Yishu 42:68.35a; tr. Legge 2.340;

tls:text.tls:line: Could any one who was not possessed of perfect virtue be able to ccomplish this?

sense.def: who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.40; Couvreur 2.496f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 778; Yishu 42:68.36a; tr. Legge 2.341;

tls:text.tls:line: she pities those who do not show ability:

sense.def: feel sympathy and commiserations as well as affection for; show sympathetic care for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.45; Couvreur 2.498f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 779; Yishu 42:68.37b; tr. Legge 2.341;

tls:text.tls:line: striving to surpass each other without any sense of shame.

sense.def: the (proper) sense of what is publicly disgraceful, moral integrity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.45; Couvreur 2.498f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 779; Yishu 42:68.37b; tr. Legge 2.341;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Kau dynasty, they honoured the ceremonial usages, and set a high value on bestowing (favours);

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.46; Couvreur 2.498f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 779; Yishu 42:68.37b; tr. Legge 2.341;

tls:text.tls:line: were all for accomplishments, and shameless;

sense.def: feel embarrassed 大慚

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.47; Couvreur 2.499f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 780; Yishu 42:68.41a; tr. Legge 2.342;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Yin dynasty, they did not trouble (the people) with ceremonies,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.47; Couvreur 2.499f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.29; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 780; Yishu 42:68.41a; tr. Legge 2.342;

tls:text.tls:line: Under the Kau dynasty, they were rigornous with the people,

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
