tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.52; Couvreur 2.500f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7i1; Yishu 42:68.45b; tr. Legge 2.343;

tls:text.tls:line: were ashamed of lavish expenditure, and set little store by their accumulation of substrance;

sense.def: consider a disgrace, regard as shameful

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.52; Couvreur 2.500f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7i1; Yishu 42:68.45b; tr. Legge 2.343;

tls:text.tls:line: were ashamed of lavish expenditure, and set little store by their accumulation of substrance;

sense.def: expenditure; cost; expense; lavish use of resources

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.53; Couvreur 2.502; Su1n Xïda4n 13.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7i2; Yishu 42:68.48b; tr. Legge 2.344;

tls:text.tls:line: and (when they are accepted), he will bow and voluntarily offer his person

sense.def: one's own (object) 自多其力 "overestimate one's own strength"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.54; Couvreur 2.502f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7i2; Yishu 42:68.50b; tr. Legge 2.345;

tls:text.tls:line: 'In the service of a ruler, when great words are spoken to (and accepted by) him, great advantages (to the state) may be expected from them;

sense.def: reward

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.54; Couvreur 2.502f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7i2; Yishu 42:68.50b; tr. Legge 2.345;

tls:text.tls:line: and when wirds of small importance are presented to him, only small advantages are to be looked for.

sense.def: reward

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.55; Couvreur 2.503; Su1n Xïda4n 13.31; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7i3; Yishu 42:68.52b; tr. Legge 2.345;

tls:text.tls:line: nor set a high value on speeches,

sense.def: rhetorical formulation, proper formulation; diction;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.57; Couvreur 2.504; Su1n Xïda4n 13.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 7i3f; Yishu 42:68.55b; tr. Legge 2.346;

tls:text.tls:line: No; - if the words were once but spoken,

sense.def: in the bottom of heart, from the bottom of one's heart; sincerely

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故君子於有喪者之側，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.65; Couvreur 2.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 786; Yishu 42:68.62a; tr. Legge 2.347;

tls:text.tls:line: In accordance with this, when a superior man is by the side of one occupied with the mourning rites,

sense.def: to be in; to be at; be conducted in/at (place or time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.65; Couvreur 2.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 786; Yishu 42:68.62a; tr. Legge 2.347;

tls:text.tls:line: when he is by the side of one who is ill,

sense.def: to be in; to be at; be conducted in/at (place or time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.66; Couvreur 2.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 786; Yishu 42:68.62a; tr. Legge 2.347;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence the intercourse of a superior man may be compared to water,

sense.def: people of moral superior character 養君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.66; Couvreur 2.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 786; Yishu 42:68.62a; tr. Legge 2.347;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man seems insipid, but he helps to perfection;

sense.def: be bland (psychologically); be insipid

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.66; Couvreur 2.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 786; Yishu 42:68.62a; tr. Legge 2.347;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man seems insipid, but he helps to perfection;

sense.def: but; but in spite of this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.66; Couvreur 2.507f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 786; Yishu 42:68.62a; tr. Legge 2.347;

tls:text.tls:line: the small man seems sweet, but he leads to ruin.

sense.def: but; but in spite of this

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.70; Couvreur 2.509; Su1n Xïda4n 13.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 787; Yishu 42:68.65a; tr. Legge 2.349;

tls:text.tls:line: "I wildly go; I never know its smiles and chat again,

sense.def: words uttered in conversation, dinner talk

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.70; Couvreur 2.509; Su1n Xïda4n 13.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 787; Yishu 42:68.65a; tr. Legge 2.349;

tls:text.tls:line: "I wildly go; I never know its smiles and chat again,

sense.def: smile

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.70; Couvreur 2.509; Su1n Xïda4n 13.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 787; Yishu 42:68.65a; tr. Legge 2.349;

tls:text.tls:line: To me you clearly swore the faith,

sense.def: in a trusty way, in a trustworthy fashion; in good faith

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.70; Couvreur 2.509; Su1n Xïda4n 13.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 787; Yishu 42:68.65a; tr. Legge 2.349;

tls:text.tls:line: To me you clearly swore the faith,

sense.def: swear oath ( with an appeal to the gods to reinforce a promise)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.71; Couvreur 2.510; Su1n Xïda4n 13.35f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 788; Yishu 42:68.66a-66b; tr. Legge 2.349;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The superior man is not affectionate to others with his countenance

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 在小人則穿窬之盜也與？」

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.71; Couvreur 2.510; Su1n Xïda4n 13.35f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 788; Yishu 42:68.66a-66b; tr. Legge 2.349;

tls:text.tls:line: That belongs to the small man, and stamps him as no better than the thief who makes a hole in the wall.'

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.72; Couvreur 2.510f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.36; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 788; Yishu 42:68.67a; tr. Legge 2.349;

tls:text.tls:line: all served the Spiritual Intelligences of heaven and earth,

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.73; Couvreur 2.510f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.36f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 788; Yishu 42:68.69a; tr. Legge 2.350;

tls:text.tls:line: (In divining) about external affairs they used the odd days;

sense.def: odd-numbered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 32.01.73; Couvreur 2.510f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.36f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 788; Yishu 42:68.69a; tr. Legge 2.350;

tls:text.tls:line: and for internal affairs, the even.

sense.def: even-numbered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: 〓#1.The Master pronounced on matters as follows:

sense.def: express in words; put into words; explain (something) in fairly formal discourse or discussion, pronounce on formally; discuss (a matter); make explicit

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: "If those who are leaders are easy to serve,

sense.def: fulfill the function of (occasionally also: pretend to be), impersonate,

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: "If those who are leaders are easy to serve,

sense.def: the leadership; those who are of superior rank, those in high social or political positions;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: "If those who are leaders are easy to serve,

sense.def: be easy to VERB

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: "If those who are leaders are easy to serve,

sense.def: be served

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and if those who are subjects are easy to supervise

sense.def: fulfill the function of (occasionally also: pretend to be), impersonate,

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and if those who are subjects are easy to supervise

sense.def: be supervised and administered

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: then physical punishments will not multiply.'

sense.def: physical punishment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.01; Couvreur 2.514; Su1n Xïda4n 13.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 791; Yishu 43:69.1b; tr. Legge 2.352; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: then physical punishments will not multiply.'

sense.def: become numerous

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.02; Couvreur 2.514f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.2a; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When (the superior) is fond of the worthy [GD 美 "admirable/beautiful persons"] like the black robes

sense.def: distinguished person; person of talent and worth (always non-referential?) 尊賢使能

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.02; Couvreur 2.514f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.2a; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When (the superior) is fond of the worthy [GD 美 "admirable/beautiful persons"] like the black robes

sense.def: black

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, when the ruler of the people

sense.def: rule over as a ruler; lord it over (subjects or a state)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, when the ruler of the people

sense.def: the common people of the contextually determinate place, the native people, the permanently resident people

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: treats them as their sons so that he takes loving care of them,

sense.def: treat like a son; treat like one's children

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: treats them as their sons so that he takes loving care of them,

sense.def: love and care for, take loving care of; generally: take proper care of (one's person/life)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: then the people will treat him as their parents;

sense.def: treat as one's parents

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: they do not turn away from him;

sense.def: revolt against, turn against [to be moved in under 倍/背]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: when he preseides over them with courtesy,

sense.def: be formally in charge of, deal with (administrative matters); sometimes used as a success verb: deal effectively with, govern properly, lead with natural authority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.04; Couvreur 2.515f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 792; Yishu 43:69.3b; tr. Legge 2.352;

tls:text.tls:line: their hearts are docile to him.

sense.def: obedient

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: 'When superiors are fond of Goodness

sense.def: the leadership, the authorities; one's ruler, the ruler; superiors; persons in high position

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: then their inferiors, in their practice of Goodness, will strive to outstrip each others.

sense.def: subordinates; those who are of lower rank; inferiors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: then their inferiors, in their practice of Goodness, will strive to outstrip each others.

sense.def: undertake; do deliberately (something right or something wrong), commit (a crime etc); act out (a virtue); conduct (government); engage in (thievery); set out to do

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: then their inferiors, in their practice of Goodness, will strive to outstrip each others.

sense.def: compete to V; truggle to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore those who preside over the people

sense.def: be the senior of> to govern (over somebody); to be the leader (of somebody)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
章志、
貞教，
尊仁

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: should make their moral aspirations clear, should make their instructions straight and proper, and should honour the Good.

sense.def: demonstrate; publicise, show up for what something is (loan for 彰); make visible

tls:text.tls:srcline:
章志、
貞教，
尊仁

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: should make their moral aspirations clear, should make their instructions straight and proper, and should honour the Good.

sense.def: make truly devoted and morally immaculate

tls:text.tls:srcline:
章志、
貞教，
尊仁

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: should make their moral aspirations clear, should make their instructions straight and proper, and should honour the Good.

sense.def: training; drill; moral instruction; instruction

tls:text.tls:srcline:
章志、
貞教，
尊仁

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: should make their moral aspirations clear, should make their instructions straight and proper, and should honour the Good.

sense.def: venerate, revere, show respect for; treat with demonstrative respect

tls:text.tls:srcline:
章志、
貞教，
尊仁

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: should make their moral aspirations clear, should make their instructions straight and proper, and should honour the Good.

sense.def: good persons\

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: As if they were their own children they should love the hundred families.

sense.def: love and care for, take loving care of; generally: take proper care of (one's person/life)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Then the people will use their outmost efforts with themselves to satisfy their superiors.

sense.def: cause to get to the ultimate point, cause to get to the point of perfect realisation; perform completely what one is trying to do

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Then the people will use their outmost efforts with themselves to satisfy their superiors.

sense.def: comportment of oneself> comportment, behaviour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Then the people will use their outmost efforts with themselves to satisfy their superiors.

sense.def: conduct (one's person); act out (the role of a gentleman etc);

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Then the people will use their outmost efforts with themselves to satisfy their superiors.

sense.def: regarding oneself, non-contrastive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Then the people will use their outmost efforts with themselves to satisfy their superiors.

sense.def: according to, in the way of (emperor Yáo etc); according to (the right season); at (a certain time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Then the people will use their outmost efforts with themselves to satisfy their superiors.

sense.def: cause to be satisfied, satisfy, give satisfaction to; make pleased; please

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.09; Couvreur 2.517; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 794; Yishu 43:69.6b-7a; tr. Legge 2.354; Guodian 6

tls:text.tls:line: Then the people will use their outmost efforts with themselves to satisfy their superiors.

sense.def: the leadership, the authorities; one's ruler, the ruler; superiors; persons in high position

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.10; Couvreur 2.517f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 795; Yishu 43:69.7b; tr. Legge 2.354;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the gret man does not take the lead in idle speaking.

sense.def: men of importance in public life

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.10; Couvreur 2.517f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 795; Yishu 43:69.7b; tr. Legge 2.354;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the gret man does not take the lead in idle speaking.

sense.def: take the lead in VERBING

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.12; Couvreur 2.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 795; Yishu 43:69.9a-9b; tr. Legge 2.354;

tls:text.tls:line: and when the people will be atentive to their words; and circumspect in their conduct.

sense.def: be diligent about, pay painstaking attention to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.12; Couvreur 2.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 795; Yishu 43:69.9a-9b; tr. Legge 2.354;

tls:text.tls:line: and when the people will be atentive to their words; and circumspect in their conduct.

sense.def: be careful and wary about; be wary in

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.13; Couvreur 2.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 795; Yishu 43:69.9b; tr. Legge 2.354;

tls:text.tls:line: "Be circumspect in all you say,

sense.def: utterance; language

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.13; Couvreur 2.518f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 795; Yishu 43:69.9b; tr. Legge 2.354;

tls:text.tls:line: "Be circumspect in all you say,

sense.def: what is said > phrase, saying

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.14; Couvreur 2.519; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 796; Yishu 43:69.10b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 9

tls:text.tls:line: then the virtue of the people will become uniform.

sense.def: become united

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.15; Couvreur 2.519; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 796; Yishu 43:69.10b-11a; tr. Legge 2.355;

tls:text.tls:line: "in the old capital they stood,

sense.def: enfeoffed city; administrative centre (of a district); by Han times: capital of a kingdom within the empire; the reference is frequently to a capital: 宋都 would appear to refer to the capital of Sòng and not to any city or administrative centre of of Sòng.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.17; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 796; Yishu 43:69.12a; tr. Legge 2.355;

tls:text.tls:line: they both have one and the same virtue."

sense.def: united, unified

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: 'When he who governs a country

sense.def: HF 9.2.34: be formally or effectively in charge of (a state); control (a person) 有國

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: 'When he who governs a country

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: publicises the good and discloses [GD: publicises] the bad

sense.def: demonstrate; publicise, show up for what something is (loan for 彰); make visible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: thus showing the people his solid moral substance.

sense.def: demonstrate (something N2) to (someone N1), make (something N2) clear to (an audience N1); make a demonstration of N2 to N1

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: thus showing the people his solid moral substance.

sense.def: moral generosity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: then the loyalties of the people will not be divided.

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: "Show quiet politeness in your position,

sense.def: SHI: be poised and calm

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: "Show quiet politeness in your position,

sense.def: your plur

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.18; Couvreur 2.519f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.13b; tr. Legge 2.355; Guodian 2

tls:text.tls:line: and show fondness for this proper straightness."'

sense.def: proper straightness, upright straightness; moral correctness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.19; Couvreur 2.521; Su1n Xïda4n 13.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.14b; tr. Legge 2.356; Guodian 4.1

tls:text.tls:line: As for the leader, if people are doubtful about him, the hundred families will be confused;

sense.def: the leader

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.19; Couvreur 2.521; Su1n Xïda4n 13.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.14b; tr. Legge 2.356; Guodian 4.1

tls:text.tls:line: As for the leader, if people are doubtful about him, the hundred families will be confused;

sense.def: be misguided, deluded, confused

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.19; Couvreur 2.521; Su1n Xïda4n 13.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.14b; tr. Legge 2.356; Guodian 4.1

tls:text.tls:line: when the people below are hard to predict then the ruler will always wear themselves out.

sense.def: subordinates; those who are of lower rank; inferiors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.19; Couvreur 2.521; Su1n Xïda4n 13.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.14b; tr. Legge 2.356; Guodian 4.1

tls:text.tls:line: when the people below are hard to predict then the ruler will always wear themselves out.

sense.def: ruler

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.19; Couvreur 2.521; Su1n Xïda4n 13.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 797; Yishu 43:69.14b; tr. Legge 2.356; Guodian 4.1

tls:text.tls:line: when the people below are hard to predict then the ruler will always wear themselves out.

sense.def: (of persons) get worn out;

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.22; Couvreur 2.522; Su1n Xïda4n 13.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 798; Yishu 43:69.17b; tr. Legge 2.356;

tls:text.tls:line: and (the infliction of) punishments and penalties is unfit to make them ashamed (of evil).

sense.def: be regarded as a public disgrace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.23; Couvreur 2.522f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 799; Yishu 43:69.18b; tr. Legge 2.357;

tls:text.tls:line: this is because the loyalty (of the ministers) and the respect (of the ruler) are not sufficient,

sense.def: devoted respect> respectful devotion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.24; Couvreur 2.522f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 799; Yishu 43:69.18b-19a; tr. Legge 2.357;

tls:text.tls:line: the ministers closer to him will not be indignant;

sense.def: feel acute anguish

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.25; Couvreur 2.522f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 799; Yishu 43:69.19a; tr. Legge 2.357;

tls:text.tls:line: do not for the sake of a favourite concubine provoke queen Kwang;

sense.def: favourite; owing one's status to the favour of a ruler

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.25; Couvreur 2.522f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 799; Yishu 43:69.19a; tr. Legge 2.357;

tls:text.tls:line: do not for the sake of a favourite concubine provoke queen Kwang;

sense.def: cause to be feel anguished; arouse the resentment of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.25; Couvreur 2.522f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 799; Yishu 43:69.19a; tr. Legge 2.357;

tls:text.tls:line: do not for the sake of a favourite officer provoke your grave officers,

sense.def: favourite; owing one's status to the favour of a ruler

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.27; Couvreur 2.524f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.43; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 799f; Yishu 43:69.22b-23a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: (they are full of desire) as if they could not get a sight of him;

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.28; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: 'A small man is drowned in the water;

sense.def: be drowned by

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.28; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: a superior man is drowned or ruined by his mouth;

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.28; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: a superior man is drowned or ruined by his mouth;

sense.def: be drowned by

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.28; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: the great man suffers his ruin from the people;

sense.def: men of importance in public life

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.28; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: the great man suffers his ruin from the people;

sense.def: be drowned by

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.28; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: - all suffer from what they have played and taken liberties with.

sense.def: be unduly intimate in one's relations with (a superior)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.28; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: Water is near to men, and yet it drowns them.

sense.def: drown a person, metaphoric: cause somebody to face serious problems

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.29; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: they should be respected, and should not be treated with contempt;

sense.def: rudely hoodwink, rudely deceive

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.30; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a-24b; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: "Do not frustrate the charge to me, and bring yourself your own overthrow.

sense.def: defeat (oneself), bring about one's own defeat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.30; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a-24b; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: Be like the forester, who, when he has adjusted the string,

sense.def: trigger mechanism (especially in crossbow)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.30; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a-24b; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: goes to examine the end of the arrow, wether it be placed according to rule, and then lets go."

sense.def: go to a contextually determinate place and V, set out to V; be on one's way to (with a verbal (or subjectless sentential, if one prefers) object) 往拜之

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.30; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24a-24b; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: before spear and shield are used, one should examine himself."

sense.def: person; formal or poetic: his person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.31; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24b; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: "Calamities sent by Heaven

sense.def: curse, supernatural disaster MENG 4A8: generally disaster

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.31; Couvreur 2.525f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.44; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 800; Yishu 43:69.24b; tr. Legge 2.358;

tls:text.tls:line: but from those brought on by one's self

sense.def: curse, supernatural disaster MENG 4A8: generally disaster

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.34; Couvreur 2.527f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 802; Yishu 43:69.28a; tr. Legge 2.359; Guodian 5.2

tls:text.tls:line: "Formerly we had the former leader,

sense.def: ruler; rulers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.34; Couvreur 2.527f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 802; Yishu 43:69.28a; tr. Legge 2.359; Guodian 5.2

tls:text.tls:line: The state with its clans was thereby at ease,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.34; Couvreur 2.527f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 802; Yishu 43:69.28a; tr. Legge 2.359; Guodian 5.2

tls:text.tls:line: the chief cities and towns were thereby brought into good shape.

sense.def: administrative centres and settlements

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.35; Couvreur 2.527f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 802; Yishu 43:69.28a; tr. Legge 2.359;

tls:text.tls:line: "In the heat and rain of summer days

sense.def: it is hot

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.36; Couvreur 2.528f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 802; Yishu 43:69.30b; tr. Legge 2.360;

tls:text.tls:line: and in this case their views will not be the same,

sense.def: become united

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.37; Couvreur 2.528f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 803; Yishu 43:69.31b; tr. Legge 2.360;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Words should be capable of proof by instances, and conduct should be conformed to rule;

sense.def: content; distinct substantial meaning; concrete reference 言之有物

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.39; Couvreur 2.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 803; Yishu 43:69.33b; tr. Legge 2.361;

tls:text.tls:line: while to the small man what is correct is poison.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.39; Couvreur 2.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 803; Yishu 43:69.33b; tr. Legge 2.361;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the friends of the superior man have the definite aims which they pursue,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.39; Couvreur 2.529f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 803; Yishu 43:69.33b; tr. Legge 2.361;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the friends of the superior man have the definite aims which they pursue,

sense.def: associates and friends, colleagues and friends

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.45; Couvreur 2.531f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 805; Yishu 43:69.38b; tr. Legge 2.362;

tls:text.tls:line: "A flaw in mace of white jade may

sense.def: darkish pattern in jade; defect; flaw in jade/gem

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.49; Couvreur 2.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 806; Yishu 43:69.41a; tr. Legge 2.363;

tls:text.tls:line: this will be fortunate in a wife,

sense.def: be auspicious; be lucky; bode well

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 33.01.49; Couvreur 2.532f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 806; Yishu 43:69.41a; tr. Legge 2.363;

tls:text.tls:line: but in a husband evil."'

sense.def: be ominous, baleful, ill-omened, inauspicious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.01; Couvreur 2.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 809; Yishu 43:70.1b-2a; tr. Legge 2.365;

tls:text.tls:line: and gave full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.02; Couvreur 2.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.50; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 809; Yishu 43:70.2b; tr. Legge 2.365;

tls:text.tls:line: he stooped and wailed, giving full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.03; Couvreur 2.534f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.51; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 809; Yishu 43:70.3b; tr. Legge 2.366;

tls:text.tls:line: and wailed, giving full vent to his grief.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:text.tls:srcline:
入門左，
中庭北面，
哭盡哀，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.08; Couvreur 2.537f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.53; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i11; Yishu 43:70.8a; tr. Legge 2.367;

tls:text.tls:line: he entered the gate at the left side of it, and stood in the middle of the court-yard with his face to the north, wailing and giving full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:text.tls:srcline:
丈夫、
婦人之待之也，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.09; Couvreur 2.537f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.53f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i11; Yishu 43:70.8a; tr. Legge 2.367;

tls:text.tls:line: The husbands and wives (of the family) waited for him

sense.def: husband

tls:text.tls:srcline:
丈夫、
婦人之待之也，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.09; Couvreur 2.537f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.53f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i11; Yishu 43:70.8a; tr. Legge 2.367;

tls:text.tls:line: The husbands and wives (of the family) waited for him

sense.def: wife

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.10; Couvreur 2.537f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i11; Yishu 43:70.9b; tr. Legge 2.367;

tls:text.tls:line: he wails with his face to the west, giving full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.11; Couvreur 2.539; Su1n Xïda4n 13.54; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i12; Yishu 43:70.10b; tr. Legge 2.368;

tls:text.tls:line: There she wailed, giving full vent to her grief.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.12; Couvreur 2.539f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i12; Yishu 43:70.11a-11b; tr. Legge 2.368;

tls:text.tls:line: he wailed, giving full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.14; Couvreur 2.539f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i12; Yishu 43:70.12a; tr. Legge 2.368;

tls:text.tls:line: and with his face to the north, wiled and gave full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.16; Couvreur 2.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i12; Yishu 43:70.12a; tr. Legge 2.369;

tls:text.tls:line: the director announced that the business was over.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.17; Couvreur 2.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i12; Yishu 43:70.13b; tr. Legge 2.369;

tls:text.tls:line: was that there was but one tying up of the hair.

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.18; Couvreur 2.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i13; Yishu 43:70.14a; tr. Legge 2.369;

tls:text.tls:line: and there wailed with his face to the west, giving full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.19; Couvreur 2.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i13; Yishu 43:70.14a; tr. Legge 2.369;

tls:text.tls:line: and the director announced that the business was over.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.19; Couvreur 2.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.56; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i13; Yishu 43:70.14a; tr. Legge 2.369;

tls:text.tls:line: he wailed with his face to the north, giving full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.20; Couvreur 2.541f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.56f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i13; Yishu 43:70.14a; tr. Legge 2.369;

tls:text.tls:line: the director announced that the business was over.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.21; Couvreur 2.544f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i14; Yishu 43:70.16a-16b; tr. Legge 2.370;

tls:text.tls:line: and (on hearing them) wailed again, and gave full vent to his grief.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.26; Couvreur 2.546f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i15; Yishu 43:70.19a; tr. Legge 2.371;

tls:text.tls:line: he went to the station, and wailed, giving full vent to his sorrow.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.27; Couvreur 2.546f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.58f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i15; Yishu 43:70.19a; tr. Legge 2.371;

tls:text.tls:line: the director announced to them that the business was ended.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.30; Couvreur 2.548; Su1n Xïda4n 13.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i17; Yishu 43:70.21b; tr. Legge 2.372;

tls:text.tls:line: for a friend, outside the door of the back-chamber;

sense.def: one's own friend or colleague (of of any kind, singular or plural!)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.30; Couvreur 2.548; Su1n Xïda4n 13.59; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i17; Yishu 43:70.21b; tr. Legge 2.372;

tls:text.tls:line: for an acquaintance, in the open country, having pitched a tent for the occasion. Some say the wailing for a mother's relation was in the temple.

sense.def: recognise, be familiar with, know (a person); be acquainted with; recognize the identity of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.32; Couvreur 2.549; Su1n Xïda4n 13.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i17; Yishu 43:70.24a-25a; tr. Legge 2.373;

tls:text.tls:line: 25. Officers, of the same surname with a feudal prince, (but who were serving in other states),

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.33; Couvreur 2.549f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.60f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i17f; Yishu 43:70.25b-26a; tr. Legge 2.373;

tls:text.tls:line: 26. In all cases where one made a place (at a distance) at which to wail, he bared his arms (only) once.

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.33; Couvreur 2.549f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.60f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i17f; Yishu 43:70.25b-26a; tr. Legge 2.373;

tls:text.tls:line: 27. In condoling with (the relations of) an acquaintance (after he has been buried),

sense.def: recognise, be familiar with, know (a person); be acquainted with; recognize the identity of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 34.01.34; Couvreur 2.550; Su1n Xïda4n 13.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i18; Yishu 43:70.26b; tr. Legge 2.373;

tls:text.tls:line: if the father were alive, he acted as presiding mourner;

sense.def: a host, person ritually in charge

tls:text.tls:srcline:
傷腎、
乾肝、
焦肺，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.01; Couvreur 2.552f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2i21; Yishu 43:70.29a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: his kidneys were injured, his liver dried up, and his lungs scorched,

sense.def: make dry, cause to become dry

tls:text.tls:srcline:
傷腎、
乾肝、
焦肺，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.01; Couvreur 2.552f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.62; Jia1ng Yi4hua2i21; Yishu 43:70.29a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: his kidneys were injured, his liver dried up, and his lungs scorched,

sense.def: burn so as to make parched dry

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.02; Couvreur 2.552f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i21; Yishu 43:70.29a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: The internal grief and sorrow

sense.def: intense grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.02; Couvreur 2.552f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i21; Yishu 43:70.29a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: his mouth could not relish any savoury food,

sense.def: FIND SAVOURY> appreciate; have a taste for; have a proper sense for; taste with pleasure, enjoy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.03; Couvreur 2.553f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22; Yishu 43:70.30b-31a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: so did his grief and sorrow fill his mind and agitate his spirit,

sense.def: intense grief

tls:text.tls:srcline:
故發胸、
擊心、
爵踊，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.04; Couvreur 2.553f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22; Yishu 43:70.31a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore they (merely) pushed out the breast, and smote upon their hearts,moving their feet with a sliding, hopping motion,

sense.def: breast, chest

tls:text.tls:srcline:
故發胸、
擊心、
爵踊，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.04; Couvreur 2.553f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22; Yishu 43:70.31a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore they (merely) pushed out the breast, and smote upon their hearts,moving their feet with a sliding, hopping motion,

sense.def: knock against (mostly drums but also bells) so as to produce a sound; knock (at a gate)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
故發胸、
擊心、
爵踊，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.04; Couvreur 2.553f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22; Yishu 43:70.31a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore they (merely) pushed out the breast, and smote upon their hearts,moving their feet with a sliding, hopping motion,

sense.def: chest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.04; Couvreur 2.553f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22; Yishu 43:70.31a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: The expression of grief, sorrow, and deep-seated pain was extreme;

sense.def: intense grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.04; Couvreur 2.553f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22; Yishu 43:70.31a; tr. Legge 2.375;

tls:text.tls:line: 'With beating of the breast and movement of the feet, did they sorrowfully accompany the body;

sense.def: full of sympathetic grief, full of saddened sympathy [???SURELY 以 GOES WITH WHAT FOLLOWS!!!CH]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.05; Couvreur 2.554; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22; Yishu 43:70.31a; tr. Legge 2.376;

tls:text.tls:line: as if they were following some one, and unable to get up to him.

sense.def: pursue with friendly or at least peacefully competitive intentions

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.07; Couvreur 2.554f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22f; Yishu 43:70.31a-33a; tr. Legge 2.376;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore they wailed, wept, beat their breasts, and leaped,

sense.def: wailing and weeping

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.07; Couvreur 2.554f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22f; Yishu 43:70.31a-33a; tr. Legge 2.376;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore they wailed, wept, beat their breasts, and leaped,

sense.def: jump up and down in extreme grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.07; Couvreur 2.554f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22f; Yishu 43:70.31a-33a; tr. Legge 2.376;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore they wailed, wept, beat their breasts, and leaped,

sense.def: beat one's breast (check pronunciation: pǐ?)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.07; Couvreur 2.554f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i22f; Yishu 43:70.31a-33a; tr. Legge 2.376;

tls:text.tls:line: giving full vent to their sorrow, before they ceased.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.08; Couvreur 2.555f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i23; Yishu 43:70.33a; tr. Legge 2.377;

tls:text.tls:line: lamenting that his parent was now outside.

sense.def: be sad about, grieve about

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.09; Couvreur 2.555f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i23; Yishu 43:70.33a; tr. Legge 2.377;

tls:text.tls:line: His heart of loving thoughts

sense.def: full of fond remembrance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.10; Couvreur 2.556f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.34a; tr. Legge 2.377;

tls:text.tls:line: the filial son is sad and sorrowful, and his mind is full of trouble.

sense.def: feel intense grief, be very saddened

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.10; Couvreur 2.556f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.34a; tr. Legge 2.377;

tls:text.tls:line: the filial son is sad and sorrowful, and his mind is full of trouble.

sense.def: be full of pent-up feelings of resentment and powerless sadness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.10; Couvreur 2.556f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.34a; tr. Legge 2.377;

tls:text.tls:line: He crawls about and bewails his loss,

sense.def: crawl about (also as sign of extreme mourning grief)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.11; Couvreur 2.556f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.34a; tr. Legge 2.377;

tls:text.tls:line: the relations and connexions who live at a distance

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.14; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. And so, when a bald man does not wear the cincture,

sense.def: bald

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: that in the rites of mourning it is the sorrow that is the principal thing.

sense.def: mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: that in the rites of mourning it is the sorrow that is the principal thing.

sense.def: the most important point; the essential thing, the main thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: When a daughter wails, weeps, and is sad,

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: When a daughter wails, weeps, and is sad,

sense.def: wail and weep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: When a daughter wails, weeps, and is sad,

sense.def: feel intense grief, be very saddened

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: beats her breast, and wounds her heart;

sense.def: knock against (mostly drums but also bells) so as to produce a sound; knock (at a gate)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: beats her breast, and wounds her heart;

sense.def: breast, chest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: beats her breast, and wounds her heart;

sense.def: heart 剖心

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: and when a son wails, weeps, is sad,

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: and when a son wails, weeps, is sad,

sense.def: wail; lament

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: and when a son wails, weeps, is sad,

sense.def: come to shed tears; sob, weep

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: and bows down till his forehead touches the ground, without regard to elegance of demeanour,

sense.def: forehead

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: and bows down till his forehead touches the ground, without regard to elegance of demeanour,

sense.def: touch; dash into; bump into; bump one's head against (also deliberately)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.15; Couvreur 2.557f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i24; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: this may be accepted as the highest expression of sorrow.

sense.def: mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.16; Couvreur 2.558f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i25; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Boys do not wear (even) the three months' mourning;

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.16; Couvreur 2.558f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i25; Yishu 43:70.35b; tr. Legge 2.378;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Boys do not wear (even) the three months' mourning;

sense.def: to wear a mourning dress of coarse cloth (GU, LI)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 35.01.18; Couvreur 2.559f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i26; Yishu 43:70.37b; tr. Legge 2.379;

tls:text.tls:line: his body becomes ill and his limbs emaciated;

sense.def: gaunt (because of circumstances like famine)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 36.01.09; Couvreur 2.566; Su1n Xïda4n 13.73f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i30; Yishu 43:70.54b-56b; tr. Legge 2.3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: His wife observed the rule of a lady of ther husband's house who had gone to her own married home in mourning for the ruler.

sense.def: in-laws

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.01; Couvreur 2.567f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i33; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.1a; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: The appearance of (the mourners), wearing the sackcloth for a father withits jagged edges, corresponds to those fibres.

sense.def: mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves (worn for a father)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.01; Couvreur 2.567f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i33; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.1a; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: That of one wearing he sackcloth for a mother with its even edges, corresponds to the fibres of the male plant.

sense.def: read zī zuī: sackclock mourning garment with hemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.01; Couvreur 2.567f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i33; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.1a; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: That of one wearing he sackcloth for a mother with its even edges, corresponds to the fibres of the male plant.

sense.def: external shape, contour

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.01; Couvreur 2.567f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.76; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i33; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.1a; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifestations of sorrow in the bodily appearance.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.02; Couvreur 2.570; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.3b; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. The wailing of one wearing the sackcloth for his father

sense.def: those who wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.02; Couvreur 2.570; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.3b; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: seems to go forth in one unbroken strain;

sense.def: set out; go along; walk off

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.02; Couvreur 2.570; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.3b; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: seems to go forth in one unbroken strain;

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.02; Couvreur 2.570; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.3b; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: that of one wearing the sackcloth or a mother

sense.def: read zī zuī: someone wearing sackcloth mourning garment with hemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.02; Couvreur 2.570; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.3b; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifesttations of sorrow in the modulations of the voice.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.02; Couvreur 2.570; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.3b; tr. Legge 2.385;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifesttations of sorrow in the modulations of the voice.

sense.def: sound of the human voice; by extension very occasionally: of ants

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.03; Couvreur 2.570f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.4a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. When wearing the sackcloth for a father,

sense.def: wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.03; Couvreur 2.570f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.4a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: when wering that for a mother,

sense.def: read zī zuī: respectfully wear mourning garments with hemmed sleeves LY 9.10

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.03; Couvreur 2.570f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.4a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifestations of sorrow in speech.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.03; Couvreur 2.570f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.4a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifestations of sorrow in speech.

sense.def: language

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.03; Couvreur 2.570f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i34; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.4a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifestations of sorrow in speech.

sense.def: speech; way of talking

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.04; Couvreur 2.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.5a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. When a mourner has assumed the sackcloth for a father,

sense.def: wear sackcloth mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.04; Couvreur 2.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.5a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: for a mother,

sense.def: read zī zuī: respectfully wear mourning garments with hemmed sleeves LY 9.10

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.04; Couvreur 2.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.5a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: he abstains from three meals;

sense.def: thrice; three ways; in three ways; under three aspects

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.04; Couvreur 2.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.5a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: for two.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.06; Couvreur 2.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.5a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifestations of sorow in drinking and eating.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.06; Couvreur 2.571f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.77; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.5a; tr. Legge 2.386;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the manifestations of sorow in drinking and eating.

sense.def: food in general; nutrition; mealtime

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.07; Couvreur 2.572f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.5b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: After another year, when the greater sacrifice has been offered,

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.08; Couvreur 2.572f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i35; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6a; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: when they begin to eat flesh, they first take that which has been dried.

sense.def: dried up; parched

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: and slept on straw with a clod for his pillow,

sense.def: rest onself on when going to sleep; to sleep on, sleep in (a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: and slept on straw with a clod for his pillow,

sense.def: straw mat; thatch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: and slept on straw with a clod for his pillow,

sense.def: read zhe4n: use as a pillow for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: and slept on straw with a clod for his pillow,

sense.def: clod of earth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: without taking off the headband or girdle.

sense.def: hempen or sackcloth belt worn in mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: without taking off the headband or girdle.

sense.def: sashes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: without taking off the headband or girdle.

sense.def: specifically: inner belt; any belt or sash

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.09; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: (sleeping on) typha rushes with their topos cut off, but not woven together.

sense.def: Rhemannia, kind of grass

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.10; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: it was allowed to use a bedstead.

sense.def: use a proper bedstead, make one's bedstead (in a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.10; Couvreur 2.573; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.6b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: These were the manifestatios of sorrow given in the dwelling-places.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.12; Couvreur 2.573f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.7b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: After another year, and when the greater felicitous sacrifice had been offered,

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.12; Couvreur 2.573f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.78; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i36; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.7b; tr. Legge 2.387;

tls:text.tls:line: he used a bedstead.

sense.def: use a proper bedstead, make one's bedstead (in a place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.13; Couvreur 2.574f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.8b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: 8. The mourning with jagged edges was made with 3 shang of hempen threads, each shang containing ?? threads;

sense.def: mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves (worn for a father)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
齊衰四升、
五升、
六升，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.13; Couvreur 2.574f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.8b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: that with even edge, with 4, 5, or 6 shang;

sense.def: read zī zuī: sackclock mourning garment with hemmed sleeves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.13; Couvreur 2.574f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.8b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: These were the manifestations of sorrow shown in the fabrics of the different mournings.

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.13; Couvreur 2.574f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.79; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.8b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: These were the manifestations of sorrow shown in the fabrics of the different mournings.

sense.def: way of dressing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.14; Couvreur 2.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.80; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.11b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: 9. The sackcloth with jagged edges (worn at first) was made with 3 shang,

sense.def: mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves (worn for a father)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.15; Couvreur 2.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.11b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: At the end of the year, and when the first felicitous sacrifice has been offered,

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.15; Couvreur 2.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.11b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: still retaining the sash and headband.

sense.def: waist

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.15; Couvreur 2.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.11b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: still retaining the sash and headband.

sense.def: waist belt worn in mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.15; Couvreur 2.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.11b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: still retaining the sash and headband.

sense.def: hempen or sackcloth belt worn in mourning

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.16; Couvreur 2.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.11b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: At the end of the second year, and when the greater felicitous sacrifice had been offered,

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.16; Couvreur 2.575f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i37; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.11b; tr. Legge 2.388;

tls:text.tls:line: and all the appendages of the girdle were assumed.

sense.def: carry or wear (adornment or other precious item, e.g. a seal, or a belt) on the waist

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.17; Couvreur 2.577f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i38; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.16a; tr. Legge 2.389;

tls:text.tls:line: there came occasion to wear the even-edged sackcloth for a mother,

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.17; Couvreur 2.577f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i38; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.16a; tr. Legge 2.389;

tls:text.tls:line: when there occurred occasion for the mourning rites for nine months,

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 37.01.18; Couvreur 2.578; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i38; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.16a; tr. Legge 2.389;

tls:text.tls:line: there came o ccasion to wear the mourning for nine months,

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.01; Couvreur 2.580; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i41; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.20a; tr. Legge 2.391;

tls:text.tls:line: and the distinctions shown of kindred as nearer or more distant, and of ranks as more noble or less.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.02; Couvreur 2.580f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.i4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i41; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.22a; tr. Legge 2.391;

tls:text.tls:line: 2. The greater a wound is, the longer it remains;

sense.def: wound, laceration; dent (caused by an axe in a tree)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.03; Couvreur 2.5i1; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i41; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.22b; tr. Legge 2.391;

tls:text.tls:line: came really to an end with (the close of) the twenty-fifth month.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.03; Couvreur 2.5i1; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i41; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.22b; tr. Legge 2.391;

tls:text.tls:line: The sorrow and pain were not yet ended,

sense.def: deeply felt comendable grief; proper grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.03; Couvreur 2.5i1; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i41; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.22b; tr. Legge 2.391;

tls:text.tls:line: The sorrow and pain were not yet ended,

sense.def: intense grief

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.03; Couvreur 2.5i1; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i41; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.22b; tr. Legge 2.391;

tls:text.tls:line: and the longing loving thoughts were not yet forgotten;

sense.def: fond remembrance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.03; Couvreur 2.5i1; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i41; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.22b; tr. Legge 2.391;

tls:text.tls:line: was it not shown that there should be an end to the duties rendered to the dead,

sense.def: send off (the dead etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.04; Couvreur 2.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i42; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.23b; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: being endowed with blood and breath,

sense.def: blood energy> blood, physical energies; vital spirits

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.04; Couvreur 2.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i42; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.23b; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: being endowed with blood and breath,

sense.def: what belongs to a certain category; the likes of 有血氣之屬

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.04; Couvreur 2.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i42; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.23b; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: have a certain amount of knowledge.

sense.def: awareness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.04; Couvreur 2.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i42; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.23b; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: there is not one of them but knows to love its species.

sense.def: be especially fond of; appreciate more; like, show an emotional preference for; be psychologically more attached to (something, compared to others); sometimes specifically: have as a protegé

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.04; Couvreur 2.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i42; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.23b; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: there is not one of them but knows to love its species.

sense.def: members of the category

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.04; Couvreur 2.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i42; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.23b; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: - when one of them has lost its mate,

sense.def: mate, companion; peer

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.05; Couvreur 2.5i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i42; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.23b; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: chatter and cry for a little

sense.def: for a moment, for a certain time

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.07; Couvreur 2.5i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.85; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i43; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.24a; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: we shall find that they are not equal to the birds and beasts.

sense.def: then [I collect here the cases where I have so far not found it plausible or easy to attribute to shì a clear anaphoric reference.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.08; Couvreur 2.5i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i43; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: after which the mourning of three years comes to an end,

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.08; Couvreur 2.5i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i43; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: it will prove to be inexhaustible.

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.08; Couvreur 2.5i2f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i43; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.24b-25a; tr. Legge 2.392;

tls:text.tls:line: As soon as it was sufficient for the elegant expression of the varied feeling,

sense.def: as soon as

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.09; Couvreur 2.5i3f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.86; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i43; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.25b-26a; tr. Legge 2.393;

tls:text.tls:line: begin their processes anew.

sense.def: another time, yet again; once more; also plural: more times in the future

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.10; Couvreur 2.5i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i43f; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.26b-27a; tr. Legge 2.393;

tls:text.tls:line: the time is doubled,

sense.def: redouble, make double, double up

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.10; Couvreur 2.5i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i43f; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.26b-27a; tr. Legge 2.393;

tls:text.tls:line: and so embraces two round years. [also the second???]

sense.def: the second 再世 "after the second generation"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 人之所以群居和壹之理盡矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.11; Couvreur 2.5i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.87; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i44; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.27a; tr. Legge 2.393;

tls:text.tls:line: The harmony and unity that should characterise men living in their kinships are hereby completly shown.

sense.def: be in harmony with one another

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.12; Couvreur 2.585f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i44; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.28a-28b; tr. Legge 2.394;

tls:text.tls:line: and ancient and modern customs are onea nd the same.

sense.def: be the same with regard to (something)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 38.01.13; Couvreur 2.586; Su1n Xïda4n 13.88; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i44; Yi4 Shu1 44:71.29a; tr. Legge 2.394;

tls:text.tls:line: ceases to be carried in the arms of his plarents.

sense.def: bosom (especially as repository of feelings on the one hand, and as repository for things carried along)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.01; Couvreur 2.587; Su1n Xïda4n 13.89f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i45; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.2b; tr. Legge 2.395;

tls:text.tls:line: (the width of) the seam at the waist was half that at the bottom (of the skirt).

sense.def: waist

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.02; Couvreur 2.587f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.90f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i45; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.5b; tr. Legge 2.395;

tls:text.tls:line: The sash was put on where there were no bones,

sense.def: thigh; specifically: thigh bone, femur; leg and loin of a deer, sheep, or other animal, prepared for, or served at, table

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.02; Couvreur 2.587f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.90f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i45; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.5b; tr. Legge 2.395;

tls:text.tls:line: so as not to interfere with the action of the thighs below

sense.def: rib

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.03; Couvreur 2.588f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i46; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.6b; tr. Legge 2.395;

tls:text.tls:line: The sleeve was made round, as if fashioned by a disk.

sense.def: sleeve

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.03; Couvreur 2.588f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i46; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.6b; tr. Legge 2.395;

tls:text.tls:line: The cord-like seam at the back descended to the ankles, as if it had been a straight line.

sense.def: ancle

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.06; Couvreur 2.588f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.92; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i46; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.10a; tr. Legge 2.396;

tls:text.tls:line: and regulate the cohorts of their armies.

sense.def: the troops

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.07; Couvreur 2.590; Su1n Xïda4n 13.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i47; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.12a; tr. Legge 2.396;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of an orphan son,

sense.def: isolated, without support; lonely; solitary

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 39.01.07; Couvreur 2.590; Su1n Xïda4n 13.93; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i47; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.12a; tr. Legge 2.396;

tls:text.tls:line: The border round the mouth of the sleeves and all the edges of the dress

sense.def: border of garment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.02; Couvreur 2.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i49; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.17b; tr. Legge 2.397;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have partaken, Sir, of your excellent drink and admirable viands;

sense.def: exquisite, of outstanding culinary quality

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.02; Couvreur 2.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i49; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.17b; tr. Legge 2.397;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have partaken, Sir, of your excellent drink and admirable viands;

sense.def: praiseworthy; fine; distinguished

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.02; Couvreur 2.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.95; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 i49; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.17b; tr. Legge 2.397;

tls:text.tls:line: 'I have partaken, Sir, of your excellent drink and admirable viands;

sense.def: repast including meat, elaborate meal, meat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.05; Couvreur 2.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 850; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.17b; tr. Legge 2.397;

tls:text.tls:line: The guest then bows twice, and signifies that he will recieve (the arrows).

sense.def: with a double deep bow to show one's polite gratitude (note that 再拜受之 could be taken as two verbs in series, but a lingering doubt remains, since 再拜 so often precedes main verbs, and is never modified by an adverb. 待考)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.05; Couvreur 2.591f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 850; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.17b; tr. Legge 2.397;

tls:text.tls:line: and then at the top of the steps on the east, he bows to the guest and gives him the arrows.

sense.def: give; hand over the contextually determinate thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.06; Couvreur 2.593f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 850; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.19a; tr. Legge 2.398;

tls:text.tls:line: advances to the space between the two pillars.

sense.def: the pair of, the two, both 兩手，兩目，兩耳

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.06; Couvreur 2.593f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.96; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 850; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.19a; tr. Legge 2.398;

tls:text.tls:line: motioning also to the guest to go to his mat (for piching from).

sense.def: SHI: long rough mat put directly on the floor to sit on on festive occasions, mostly with an additional mat on top, larger than xí 席. Also small tables were put on this mat.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.09; Couvreur 2.593f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.99; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 851; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.23b; tr. Legge 2.398;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Yes.'

sense.def: (Said by superior) [I hereby] approve [this]. All right! (Said by inferior) Yes!

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.13; Couvreur 2.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.101; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 852; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.28a; tr. Legge 2.399;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Let the cup go round,'

sense.def: beaker or bowl filled with wine: a beaker of any kind filled with wine

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.13; Couvreur 2.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.101; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 852; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.28a; tr. Legge 2.399;

tls:text.tls:line: and the cup-bearer (of the successful side) replies,

sense.def: engage in ladling wine; ladle wine; ladle water

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.13; Couvreur 2.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.101; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 852; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.28a; tr. Legge 2.399;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Yes.'

sense.def: (Said by superior) [I hereby] approve [this]. All right! (Said by inferior) Yes!

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.15; Couvreur 2.596f; Su1n Xïda4n 13.102; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 853; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.29b; tr. Legge 2.399;

tls:text.tls:line: all express their assent.
