sense.def: (Said by superior) [I hereby] approve [this]. All right! (Said by inferior) Yes!

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.18; Couvreur 2.598; Su1n Xïda4n 13.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 854; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.34b; tr. Legge 2.400;

tls:text.tls:line: 11. In Lu, they young people (taking part in the game) were admonished in these words,

sense.def: young man; juniors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.19; Couvreur 2.598; Su1n Xïda4n 13.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 854; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.34b; tr. Legge 2.400;

tls:text.tls:line: A similar admonition in Hsieh was to this effect:

sense.def: young man; juniors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 40.01.21; Couvreur 2.599; Su1n Xïda4n 13.105; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 854; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.36b; tr. Legge 2.400;

tls:text.tls:line: the musicians and the boys who acted as attendants,

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.01; Couvreur 2.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 857; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.39a; tr. Legge 2.402;

tls:text.tls:line: that of a scholar?'

sense.def: Confucian (scholars)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.02; Couvreur 2.600f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.1; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 857; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.39a; tr. Legge 2.402;

tls:text.tls:line: I do not know of any dress of the scholar.'

sense.def: Confucian (scholars)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.03; Couvreur 2.601; Su1n Xïda4n 14.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 857f; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.41a; tr. Legge 2.402;

tls:text.tls:line: You would have changed all your attendants-in-waiting before I had concluded.'

sense.def: replace and change into something new

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.04; Couvreur 2.601f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 858; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.41b; tr. Legge 2.403;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The scholar has a precious gem placed upon his mat, with which he is waiting to recieve an invitation (from some ruler);

sense.def: exquisite things that are conceived as primarily rare, extraordinary and as being of high aesthetic value

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.04; Couvreur 2.601f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.2; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 858; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.41b; tr. Legge 2.403;

tls:text.tls:line: - so does he establish his character and prepare himself (for the future).

sense.def: establish (onself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.05; Couvreur 2.602; Su1n Xïda4n 14.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 858; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.43a; tr. Legge 2.403;

tls:text.tls:line: and in small matters, of modesty;

sense.def: feel ashamed; feel embarrassed; show embarrassment 心愧 but also 愧於心

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.06; Couvreur 2.603; Su1n Xïda4n 14.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 859; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.44b; tr. Legge 2.403;

tls:text.tls:line: he guards against death that he may be in waiting (for whatever he may be called to);

sense.def: be chary with; begrudge, be stingy with; be possessive about; be loath to lose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.06; Couvreur 2.603; Su1n Xïda4n 14.3; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 859; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.44b; tr. Legge 2.403;

tls:text.tls:line: he guards against death that he may be in waiting (for whatever he may be called to);

sense.def: death, also abstract: the fact of dying; mode of dying

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.07; Couvreur 2.603f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.4; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 859; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.45b; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: but leal-heartedness and good faith;

sense.def: most important thing, objectively most valuable thing 諸侯之寶三

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.09; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: he will look death on the face without changing thte principles (which) he maintains;

sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.09; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: he will look death on the face without changing thte principles (which) he maintains;

sense.def: [WHAT ONE PRESERVES AS VALUES>] treasured values

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.10; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: he has no occasion to regret what he has done in the lpast,

sense.def: be a matter of the past, be past

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.10; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: nor to make preparations for what may come to him in the future;

sense.def: occur in the future; come in the future

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.10; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: nor to make preparations for what may come to him in the future;

sense.def: prepare beforehand against the contextually determinate thing, prepare in very good time against the contextually determinate thing

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.10; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: he does not repeat any error of speech;

sense.def: by mistake, mistakenly; through insouciance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.10; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: he does not repeat any error of speech;

sense.def: occasionally used verbally in plain sense: repeat, do something twice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.10; Couvreur 2.604f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 860; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.47a; tr. Legge 2.404;

tls:text.tls:line: - such are the things in which he stands out and apart from other men.

sense.def: on one's own; by oneself; particularly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.11; Couvreur 2.605f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.5f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 861; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.49b; tr. Legge 2.405;

tls:text.tls:line: near association with him can be sought, but cannot be forced on him;

sense.def: be pressed upon; be supressed; come under pressure; feel oppressed

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.12; Couvreur 2.606; Su1n Xïda4n 14.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 861; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.51a; tr. Legge 2.405;

tls:text.tls:line: but he does not change his course:

sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.12; Couvreur 2.606; Su1n Xïda4n 14.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 861; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.51a; tr. Legge 2.405;

tls:text.tls:line: but he does not change his course:

sense.def: [WHAT ONE AIMS FOR>] standpoint

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.12; Couvreur 2.606; Su1n Xïda4n 14.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 861; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.51a; tr. Legge 2.405;

tls:text.tls:line: - such is the way in which he maintains himself.

sense.def: establish (onself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.13; Couvreur 2.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 862; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.53a; tr. Legge 2.405;

tls:text.tls:line: within, the inner door stopped up with brushwood, and little round windows like the mouth of a jar;

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.13; Couvreur 2.606f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.6; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 862; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.53a; tr. Legge 2.405;

tls:text.tls:line: within, the inner door stopped up with brushwood, and little round windows like the mouth of a jar;

sense.def: window in the wall, facing south, next to the door; rarely used in transferred sense: aperture

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.14; Couvreur 2.607; Su1n Xïda4n 14.7; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 862; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.54b; tr. Legge 2.406;

tls:text.tls:line: If it should be that his own age does not understand and encourage him,

sense.def: meet (the right object); be exposed to (the right person, times, etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.16; Couvreur 2.608; Su1n Xïda4n 14.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 863; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.56a; tr. Legge 2.406;

tls:text.tls:line: he does what he does with all his might, but is never weary;

sense.def: be indefatigable; be unexhausted

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.16; Couvreur 2.608; Su1n Xïda4n 14.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 863; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.56a; tr. Legge 2.406;

tls:text.tls:line: he may be living unnoticed, but does not give way to licentiousness;

sense.def: in hiding, hidden away, all hidden away; in hidden confinement 幽死

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.17; Couvreur 2.608f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 863; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.57b; tr. Legge 2.407;

tls:text.tls:line: without expecting any recompense from them;

sense.def: look out for> hope for, look forward to in the future; place one's hopes in (a person or thing) N

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.17; Couvreur 2.608f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.8; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 863; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.57b; tr. Legge 2.407;

tls:text.tls:line: and if benefit results to the state,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.19; Couvreur 2.609f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 864; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.59b; tr. Legge 2.407;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. 'The scholar keeps his person free from stain, and continually bathes (and refreshes) his virtue;

sense.def: wash (one's body etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.19; Couvreur 2.609f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 864; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.59b; tr. Legge 2.407;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. 'The scholar keeps his person free from stain, and continually bathes (and refreshes) his virtue;

sense.def: cleanse, purify

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.20; Couvreur 2.609f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 864; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.59b; tr. Legge 2.407;

tls:text.tls:line: - so does he stand out alone among others and take his own solitary course.

sense.def: on one's own; by oneself; particularly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.20; Couvreur 2.609f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.9; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 864; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.59b; tr. Legge 2.407;

tls:text.tls:line: - so does he stand out alone among others and take his own solitary course.

sense.def: (positive:) all on one's own, independently, relying on oneself only; under four eyes

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.22; Couvreur 2.611; Su1n Xïda4n 14.10; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 865; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.64a; tr. Legge 2.408;

tls:text.tls:line: when they stand on the same level with him, the rejoices in them;

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.23; Couvreur 2.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 866; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.66b; tr. Legge 2.409;

tls:text.tls:line: generosity and large-mindedness

sense.def: tolerance and generosity

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.24; Couvreur 2.611f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 866; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.67a; tr. Legge 2.409;

tls:text.tls:line: speech

sense.def: public discussion and talk; current public discussion; open discussion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.25; Couvreur 2.612f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.11; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 866; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.69b; tr. Legge 2.409;

tls:text.tls:line: and they constantly employ it to one and another as a term of reproach.'

sense.def: vilify, revile and humiliate noisily; curse (Heaven etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.26; Couvreur 2.613; Su1n Xïda4n 14.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 867; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.69b; tr. Legge 2.409;

tls:text.tls:line: When the duke heard these words,

sense.def: this 此說之難"These difficulties with persusasion"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.26; Couvreur 2.613; Su1n Xïda4n 14.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 867; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.69b; tr. Legge 2.409;

tls:text.tls:line: He said, 'To the end of my days

sense.def: whole (generation) 沒世

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 41.01.26; Couvreur 2.613; Su1n Xïda4n 14.12; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 867; Yi4 Shu1 44:72.69b; tr. Legge 2.409;

tls:text.tls:line: He said, 'To the end of my days

sense.def: life; lifetime 沒世"to the end of his life"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.03; Couvreur 2.615f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.3b; tr. Legge 2.411;

tls:text.tls:line: they first regulated their families.

sense.def: sort out properly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.03; Couvreur 2.615f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.3b; tr. Legge 2.411;

tls:text.tls:line: Wishing to regulate their families,

sense.def: sort out properly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.04; Couvreur 2.615f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.4a-5a; tr. Legge 2.411;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. The extension of knowledge is by the investigation of htings.

sense.def: obtain

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.04; Couvreur 2.615f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.4a-5a; tr. Legge 2.411;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. The extension of knowledge is by the investigation of htings.

sense.def: read zhì: understanding; proper knowledge

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.05; Couvreur 2.616; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.6a; tr. Legge 2.412;

tls:text.tls:line: Their families being regulated, their states were rightly governed.

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.05; Couvreur 2.616; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.6a; tr. Legge 2.412;

tls:text.tls:line: their states being rightly governed, the whole kingdom was made tranquil and happy.

sense.def: be happily at peace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.06; Couvreur 2.616f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.6a; tr. Legge 2.412;

tls:text.tls:line: 4... From the son of Heaven down to the multitudes of the people,

sense.def: (from the X-kind) down to (the Y-kind of people)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.06; Couvreur 2.616f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.6a; tr. Legge 2.412;

tls:text.tls:line: all considered the cultivation of the person to be the root (of everything besides).

sense.def: this (particular concrete thing)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.06; Couvreur 2.616f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.6a; tr. Legge 2.412;

tls:text.tls:line: all considered the cultivation of the person to be the root (of everything besides).

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.06; Couvreur 2.616f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.6a; tr. Legge 2.412;

tls:text.tls:line: and at the same time what was of slight importance has been greatly cared for.

sense.def: there has never been such a person/course of events S者未之有也

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.06; Couvreur 2.616f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 870; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.6a; tr. Legge 2.412;

tls:text.tls:line: and at the same time what was of slight importance has been greatly cared for.

sense.def: have happened 有諸 "has this happened"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.07; Couvreur 2.617; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: is the allowing no self-deception;

sense.def: deceive (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.07; Couvreur 2.617; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: - as when we hate a bad smell

sense.def: odour 無聲無臭

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.07; Couvreur 2.617; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: - as when we hate a bad smell

sense.def: bad; dishonourable; offensive (words); of bad quality (clothes); malignant (of disease); foul (of smells)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.07; Couvreur 2.617; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: and love what is beautiful,

sense.def: find attractive, be deeply fond of (persons, things, or courses of action); be disposed to love; be preoccupied by; like; sometimes specifically: LY 4.3 be truly fond of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.07; Couvreur 2.617; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: and love what is beautiful,

sense.def: comely, handsome; good to look at

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: 5... There is no evil to which the small man, dwelling retired,

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: but when he sees a superior man, he tries to disguise himself,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: concealing his evil,

sense.def: cover up (wicked deeds)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: concealing his evil,

sense.def: wickedness, bad actions; an action that is not good

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: and displaying what is good.

sense.def: ZZ 33.1337: make manifest (oneself); celebrate publicly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: and displaying what is good.

sense.def: moral excellence in action; acts of goodness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: The other beholds him

sense.def: oneself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: as if he saw his heart and reins;

sense.def: lung

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.08; Couvreur 2.617f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.9b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: as if he saw his heart and reins;

sense.def: liver

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.11; Couvreur 2.618f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871f; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.13b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: Around each cove of Khi!

sense.def: kind of plant, creeper [also a sort of green bamboo][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.11; Couvreur 2.618f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 871f; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.13b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: Around each cove of Khi!

sense.def: bamboo

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.12; Couvreur 2.618f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 872; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.13b; tr. Legge 2.413;

tls:text.tls:line: indicates that of self-culture.

sense.def: cultivate (oneself) 自修

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.15; Couvreur 2.620; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 872f; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.17b; tr. Legge 2.414;

tls:text.tls:line: These (plassages) all show how (those sovereigns) made themselves illustrious.

sense.def: make (oneself) illustrious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.21; Couvreur 2.622f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.25a; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: 15. What is meant by 'the cultivation of the person depends on the rectifying of the mind' (may be thus illustrated):

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.22; Couvreur 2.622f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.25a; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: This is what is meant by saying that 'the cultivation of the person depends on the rectifying of the mind.'

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.23; Couvreur 2.623f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.26b; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: - Men are partial where they feel affection and love;

sense.def: love intensely; love dearly (also as people loving ruler) 甚親愛

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.23; Couvreur 2.623f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.26b; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: partial where they despise and dislike;

sense.def: hold in low esteem; think nothing of; hold in contempt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.23; Couvreur 2.623f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.26b; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: partial where they feel sorrow and compassion;

sense.def: feel intense sympathy with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.23; Couvreur 2.623f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.26b; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: partial where they are arrogant and rude.

sense.def: treat with arrogant disrespect; be arrogant towards be non-chalant vis-a-vis (e.g. punishments)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.23; Couvreur 2.623f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.26b; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: partial where they are arrogant and rude.

sense.def: feel no respect for; show no respect for

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.23; Couvreur 2.623f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.26b; tr. Legge 2.416;

tls:text.tls:line: or who hate and yet know the good qualities (of the object of their hatred).

sense.def: elevated style?: be few and far between; be sparse, be scarce, be few; be a rare case 不鮮 "be not so few"; 天下鮮矣 "there are few under the sun".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.24; Couvreur 2.624; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 875; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.26b; tr. Legge 2.417;

tls:text.tls:line: 'A man does not know the badness of his son;

sense.def: none of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.26; Couvreur 2.624f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.29b; tr. Legge 2.417;

tls:text.tls:line: '(Deal withthe people) as if you were watching over an infant.'

sense.def: little baby

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.27; Couvreur 2.625; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.30b; tr. Legge 2.417;

tls:text.tls:line: - such is the nature of the influence.

sense.def: causal mechanism; crucial mechanism; underlying mechanism

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.28; Couvreur 2.625f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.32a; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: 19. Yao and Shun presided over the kingdom with benevolence,

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.29; Couvreur 2.625f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.32b; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: 20. Therefore the ruler must have in himself the (good) qualities,

sense.def: have N1 in (oneself) 有諸己

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.29; Couvreur 2.625f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.32b; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: 20. Therefore the ruler must have in himself the (good) qualities,

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.29; Couvreur 2.625f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.32b; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: if they are not in himself,

sense.def: lack N1 within (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.29; Couvreur 2.625f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.32b; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: if they are not in himself,

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.29; Couvreur 2.625f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.32b; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: Never has there been a man (If what is hidden in one's own person one is not forgiving/understanding towards... ???CH)

sense.def: forgive; be forgiving/understanding with respect to

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.29; Couvreur 2.625f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.32b; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: was able effectually to instruct them. (that has never happened CH)

sense.def: there has never been such a person/course of events S者未之有也

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.31; Couvreur 2.626f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.34a; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: Good order for his rule throughout the state.'

sense.def: 是三臣

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.31; Couvreur 2.626f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 876; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.34a; tr. Legge 2.418;

tls:text.tls:line: then the people imitate him.

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 所謂平天下在治其國者：

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.32; Couvreur 2.627; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 878; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.35b; tr. Legge 2.419;

tls:text.tls:line: 22. What is meant by 'The making the whole kingdom peaceful and happy depends n the government of its states' is this:

sense.def: cause to be happily at peace

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.36; Couvreur 2.628f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 878; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.39a; tr. Legge 2.420;

tls:text.tls:line: uprears its craggy height;

sense.def: be impressively craggy

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.38; Couvreur 2.629f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 879; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.40b; tr. Legge 2.420;

tls:text.tls:line: Possessing virtue will give him the people.

sense.def: (one set of parallel examples:) then (like 斯 "then"); then that DADAILIJI P. 190誠在其中，此見於外。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.38; Couvreur 2.629f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 879; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.40b; tr. Legge 2.420;

tls:text.tls:line: Possessing the people will give him the territory.

sense.def: (one set of parallel examples:) then (like 斯 "then"); then that DADAILIJI P. 190誠在其中，此見於外。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.38; Couvreur 2.629f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 879; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.40b; tr. Legge 2.420;

tls:text.tls:line: Possessing the territory will give him its wealth.

sense.def: (one set of parallel examples:) then (like 斯 "then"); then that DADAILIJI P. 190誠在其中，此見於外。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.38; Couvreur 2.629f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 879; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.40b; tr. Legge 2.420;

tls:text.tls:line: Possessing the wealth, he will have resouces for expenditure.

sense.def: (one set of parallel examples:) then (like 斯 "then"); then that DADAILIJI P. 190誠在其中，此見於外。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.40; Couvreur 2.630f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 879; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.43b-45a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The state of Khu does not consider (such a toy) to be precious.

sense.def: be precious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.40; Couvreur 2.630f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 879; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.43b-45a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: Its good men are what it considers to be precious.'

sense.def: be precious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.40; Couvreur 2.630f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 879; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.43b-45a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: 'A fugitive (like you) should not account (that) to be precious.

sense.def: be precious

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.41; Couvreur 2.631; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: regarding the talents of others

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.41; Couvreur 2.631; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: as if they were his own;

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.42; Couvreur 2.631; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: more that his mouth expresses,

sense.def: only

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.42; Couvreur 2.631; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: more that his mouth expresses,

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.42; Couvreur 2.631; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: more that his mouth expresses,

sense.def: mouth

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.42; Couvreur 2.631; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: and really showing himself able to bear them (and employ them),

sense.def: this same item

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.42; Couvreur 2.631; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: and other benefits (to the state) may well be expected from him.

sense.def: still

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.43; Couvreur 2.631f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: 30... But if (it be his character) when he finds men of ability,

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.43; Couvreur 2.631f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: to be jealous of them and hate them;

sense.def: be jealous of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.43; Couvreur 2.631f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: to be jealous of them and hate them;

sense.def: be jealous of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.43; Couvreur 2.631f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.46a; tr. Legge 2.421;

tls:text.tls:line: showing himself really not able to bear them,

sense.def: this same item

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.44; Couvreur 2.632; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.48b; tr. Legge 2.422;

tls:text.tls:line: 31. It is only the truly virtuous man that can send away such a man and banish him,

sense.def: a man of human-heartedness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.44; Couvreur 2.632; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.48b; tr. Legge 2.422;

tls:text.tls:line: This is on accordance with the saying, 'It is only the truly virtuous man who can love others

sense.def: a man of human-heartedness

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.45; Couvreur 2.632; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.49b; tr. Legge 2.422;

tls:text.tls:line: To see bad men, and not to be able to remove them;

sense.def: the bad, the wicked

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.46; Couvreur 2.632f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880f; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.50a-51a; tr. Legge 2.422;

tls:text.tls:line: Calamities are sure to come on him who does so.

sense.def: get as far as the contextually determinate point; affect

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.46; Couvreur 2.632f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 880f; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.50a-51a; tr. Legge 2.422;

tls:text.tls:line: 34. Thus we see that the ruler has a great course to pursue.

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.47; Couvreur 2.633; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 8i1f; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.51b-52b; tr. Legge 2.422;

tls:text.tls:line: The vicious ruler will accumulate wealth, even though it cost him his life.

sense.def: abstractly: "the cruel people" (in any place and at any time)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.51; Couvreur 2.635; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 8i2; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.56a-57a; tr. Legge 2.423;

tls:text.tls:line: but when such a person is employed in the administration of a state or family,

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.51; Couvreur 2.635; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 8i2; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.56a-57a; tr. Legge 2.423;

tls:text.tls:line: but when such a person is employed in the administration of a state or family,

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.51; Couvreur 2.635; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 8i2; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.56a-57a; tr. Legge 2.423;

tls:text.tls:line: but when such a person is employed in the administration of a state or family,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 42.01.51; Couvreur 2.635; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 8i2; Yi4 Shu1 45:73.56a-57a; tr. Legge 2.423;

tls:text.tls:line: calamities and injuries will befall it together;

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:text.tls:srcline:
在於正容體、
齊顏色、
順辭令。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 43.01.01; Couvreur 2.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 885; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.2b; tr. Legge 2.425;

tls:text.tls:line: appear in the correct arrangement of the bodily carriage, the harmonious adjustment of the countenance, and in the natural ordering of he speech.

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:text.tls:srcline:
服備而后容體正、
顏色齊、
辭令順。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 43.01.02; Couvreur 2.636f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.13; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 885; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.2b; tr. Legge 2.425;

tls:text.tls:line: With the complete provision of dress, the bodily carriage becomes (fully) correct, the harmonious expression of the countenance is made perfect, and the speech is all conformed to its purposes.

sense.def: facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 43.01.05; Couvreur 2.637f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.15; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 887; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.9a; tr. Legge 2.426;

tls:text.tls:line: In the dark-coloured cap, and the dark-coloured square-cut robes,

sense.def: reddish dark; generally: dark

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 43.01.07; Couvreur 2.639f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.16; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 888; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.12a; tr. Legge 2.427;

tls:text.tls:line: It was on this account that the sage kings attached such an importance to the ceremony,

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 43.01.08; Couvreur 2.639f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 888; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.12a; tr. Legge 2.427;

tls:text.tls:line: they therefore humbled themselves, and gave honour in doing so to their forefathers.

sense.def: treat (oneself) as (if) being of low status

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.01; Couvreur 2.641f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.17; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 889; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.15a; tr. Legge 2.428;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the superior men, (the ancient rulers9, set a great value on it.

sense.def: consider as important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.02; Couvreur 2.641f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 889; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.15a; tr. Legge 2.428;

tls:text.tls:line: - these all were recieved by the principal party (on the lady's side), as he rested on his mat or leaning-stool in the ancestral temple.

sense.def: SHI: long rough mat put directly on the floor to sit on on festive occasions, mostly with an additional mat on top, larger than xí 席. Also small tables were put on this mat.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.03; Couvreur 2.642f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.18; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 890; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.20a; tr. Legge 2.429;

tls:text.tls:line: Her father, who had been resting on his mat and leaning-stool in the temple,

sense.def: SHI: long rough mat put directly on the floor to sit on on festive occasions, mostly with an additional mat on top, larger than xí 席. Also small tables were put on this mat.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.04; Couvreur 2.642f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.18f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 890; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.20b; tr. Legge 2.429;

tls:text.tls:line: When she arrived,

sense.def: wife; sometimes: wife to be, bride

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.04; Couvreur 2.642f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.18f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 890; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.20b; tr. Legge 2.429;

tls:text.tls:line: When she arrived,

sense.def: arrive on the scene; turn up; move in to take action; come to join

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.05; Couvreur 2.644; Su1n Xïda4n 14.19; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.24a; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: and served to establish the distinction to be observed between man and woman,

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. Rising early (the morning after marriage),

sense.def: generally: early

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: 5. Rising early (the morning after marriage),

sense.def: get up, rise; get active

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: the young wife washed her head and bathed her person, and waited to be presented (to her husband's parents),

sense.def: wash one's body including one's hair in the context of taking a luxurious bath, sometimes with tāng 湯 "hot water"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: the young wife washed her head and bathed her person, and waited to be presented (to her husband's parents),

sense.def: wash the whole body; bathe, take a bath

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: the young wife washed her head and bathed her person, and waited to be presented (to her husband's parents),

sense.def: take the time to V; wait for the V-ing to be finished

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: as soon as it was bright day.

sense.def: one's mother's brother; wife's brother

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: as soon as it was bright day.

sense.def: mother-in-law

tls:text.tls:srcline:
執笲、
棗、栗、
段脩以見，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: she appeared before them, bearing a basket woth dates, chestnuts, ans slices of dried spiced meat.

sense.def: basket

tls:text.tls:srcline:
執笲、
棗、栗、
段脩以見，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: she appeared before them, bearing a basket woth dates, chestnuts, ans slices of dried spiced meat.

sense.def: fruit of the jujube tree; jujube date

tls:text.tls:srcline:
執笲、
棗、栗、
段脩以見，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: she appeared before them, bearing a basket woth dates, chestnuts, ans slices of dried spiced meat.

sense.def: fruit of the chestnut tree; chestnut

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: and she offered in sacrifice some of the dried meat and also of the liquor,

sense.def: fine thin slices of dried meat produced by the use of salt

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: thus perfoming the ceremony

sense.def: sacrifice to (specifically to the spirits of the Earth) with wine, grain, and meat[also: sacrifice (something)][CA]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.08; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 891f; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.25b; tr. Legge 2.430;

tls:text.tls:line: thus perfoming the ceremony

sense.def: serve a cup of sweet wine to; give a cup of sweet wine to (for sacrifice)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.09; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 892; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.27a-28a; tr. Legge 2.431;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. The father and mother-in-law then entered their apartment,

sense.def: father-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.09; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 892; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.27a-28a; tr. Legge 2.431;

tls:text.tls:line: 6. The father and mother-in-law then entered their apartment,

sense.def: mother-in-law

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.09; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 892; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.27a-28a; tr. Legge 2.431;

tls:text.tls:line: where she set before them a single dressed pig,

sense.def: object marker: 把(這個東西) also: 以。。。而。。。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.09; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 892; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.27a-28a; tr. Legge 2.431;

tls:text.tls:line: where she set before them a single dressed pig,

sense.def: single, not member of a whole set; isolated

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.09; Couvreur 2.645f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.20f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 892; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.27a-28a; tr. Legge 2.431;

tls:text.tls:line: where she set before them a single dressed pig,

sense.def: piglet

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.11; Couvreur 2.646f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.21; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 892; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.33b; tr. Legge 2.431;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the ancient kings attached much importance (to the marriage ceremonies).

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.12; Couvreur 2.647f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 893; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.33a; tr. Legge 2.432;

tls:text.tls:line: if the temple of the high ancestor (of her surname) were still standing (and she had admission to it),

sense.def: ZUO Zhao 22: original first ancestor of the clan; the highest ancestor (BUDDH: patriarch (the founder or transmitter of a Buddhist lineage))

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.12; Couvreur 2.647f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.22; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 893; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.33a; tr. Legge 2.432;

tls:text.tls:line: she was taught in the public hall of the Head of taht branch of the surname to which she belonged;

sense.def: clan, the overall clan; the leading clan; clan as united by ancestral worship and respect for the living representative of the ancestors

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.14; Couvreur 2.648f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 894; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.35b; tr. Legge 2.432;

tls:text.tls:line: and thus harmony was secured in all external affairs, and the states were properly governed.

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.15; Couvreur 2.648f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.23; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 894; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.36a; tr. Legge 2.432;

tls:text.tls:line: the states and the families were ruled according to their requirements:

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.19; Couvreur 2.650f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 895; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.40b; tr. Legge 2.434;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence for him who is the Heaven(-appointed) king they wear the sackcloth with the jagged edges,

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 44.01.19; Couvreur 2.650f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.24; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 895; Yi4 Shu1 46:74.40b; tr. Legge 2.434;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence for him who is the Heaven(-appointed) king they wear the sackcloth with the jagged edges,

sense.def: mourning garment with unhemmed sleeves (worn for a father)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.01; Couvreur 2.652f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 897; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.4a; tr. Legge 2.435;

tls:text.tls:line: (The host) washes his hands, rinses the cup, and raises it,

sense.def: wash one's hands

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.01; Couvreur 2.652f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 897; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.4a; tr. Legge 2.435;

tls:text.tls:line: (The host) washes his hands, rinses the cup, and raises it,

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.01; Couvreur 2.652f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 897; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.4a; tr. Legge 2.435;

tls:text.tls:line: (The host) washes his hands, rinses the cup, and raises it,

sense.def: magnificently decorated very large bronze or earthenware, sometimes even wooden wine beaker with round base (is illustrated CD 10.1385);

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.02; Couvreur 2.652f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 897; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.4a; tr. Legge 2.435;

tls:text.tls:line: they bow as (the cup) is washed;

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:text.tls:srcline: 斯君子所以免於人禍也，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.03; Couvreur 2.652f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 897; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.6b; tr. Legge 2.435;

tls:text.tls:line: It was thus that superior men escaped suffering calamity from other men;

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.04; Couvreur 2.654f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 898; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.7b; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: 3. The chief of the district with the accomplished and virtuous men belonging to it

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.04; Couvreur 2.654f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 898; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.7b; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: had the vessel of liquor placed between the room (on the east),and the door (leading to the apartments on the west),

sense.def: one-wing door leading to a room; simple, ordinary door HF 入室閉戶 HF 蓬戶

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.04; Couvreur 2.654f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 898; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.7b; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: The vessel contained the dark-coloured liquor (of pure water);

sense.def: reddish dark; generally: dark

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.04; Couvreur 2.654f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 898; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.7b; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: The viands came forth from the room on the east;

sense.def: non-main roomBUDDH: cell

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.04; Couvreur 2.654f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 898; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.7b; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: All washing took place (in the courtyard) opposite the eastern wing;

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.04; Couvreur 2.654f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.25; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 898; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.7b; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: - showing how the host purified himself

sense.def: purify (oneself)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.05; Couvreur 2.655; Su1n Xïda4n 14.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.10a; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: 4. The (principal) guest and the host represented heaven and earth;

sense.def: be symbolically linked with; symbolise, represent; symbolise cosmologically

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.05; Couvreur 2.655; Su1n Xïda4n 14.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.10a; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: the attendants of the guest and host respectively represented the forces inherent in nature in their contracting and expanding operations;

sense.def: be symbolically linked with; symbolise, represent; symbolise cosmologically

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.05; Couvreur 2.655; Su1n Xïda4n 14.26; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.10a; tr. Legge 2.436;

tls:text.tls:line: the three (heads of the) guests (in their threefold division) represented the three (great) luminaries;

sense.def: be symbolically linked with; symbolise, represent; symbolise cosmologically

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.06; Couvreur 2.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.13b; tr. Legge 2.437;

tls:text.tls:line: begins in the south-west

sense.def: south-west

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.06; Couvreur 2.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.13b; tr. Legge 2.437;

tls:text.tls:line: and is strongest in the north-west.

sense.def: north-west

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.07; Couvreur 2.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.13b; tr. Legge 2.437;

tls:text.tls:line: assigns him his seat on the north-west,

sense.def: assign a seat to; seat somebody

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.07; Couvreur 2.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.13b; tr. Legge 2.437;

tls:text.tls:line: assigns him his seat on the north-west,

sense.def: north-west

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.07; Couvreur 2.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.13b; tr. Legge 2.437;

tls:text.tls:line: and that of his attendant on the south-west, that he may there (most conveniently) assist him.

sense.def: attendant; butler (whose task it is to act as middleman between visitors and host)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.07; Couvreur 2.656f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.27; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 899; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.13b; tr. Legge 2.437;

tls:text.tls:line: and that of his attendant on the south-west, that he may there (most conveniently) assist him.

sense.def: south-west

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.11; Couvreur 2.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 900; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.17a; tr. Legge 2.439;

tls:text.tls:line: when he proceeded to take some of the lungs in his teeth,

sense.def: take into one's mouth in order to eat

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.11; Couvreur 2.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 900; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.17a; tr. Legge 2.439;

tls:text.tls:line: when he proceeded to take some of the lungs in his teeth,

sense.def: lung

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.11; Couvreur 2.658f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.28; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 900; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.17a; tr. Legge 2.439;

tls:text.tls:line: he thereby tasted (the host's) courtesy;

sense.def: tasting

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.17; Couvreur 2.660f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 902; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.26b; tr. Legge 2.440;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 'The host in person invites the principal guest and his attendant,

sense.def: and [no examples in LY]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.17; Couvreur 2.660f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 902; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.26b; tr. Legge 2.440;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. 'The host in person invites the principal guest and his attendant,

sense.def: attendant; butler (whose task it is to act as middleman between visitors and host)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.17; Couvreur 2.660f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 902; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.26b; tr. Legge 2.440;

tls:text.tls:line: he bows (and welcomes) the chief guest and his attendant,

sense.def: and [no examples in LY]

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.17; Couvreur 2.660f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 902; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.26b; tr. Legge 2.440;

tls:text.tls:line: he bows (and welcomes) the chief guest and his attendant,

sense.def: attendant; butler (whose task it is to act as middleman between visitors and host)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.17; Couvreur 2.660f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 902; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.26b; tr. Legge 2.440;

tls:text.tls:line: In this way the distinction between the noble and the mean is exhibited.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.18; Couvreur 2.661; Su1n Xïda4n 14.30; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 902; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.27a; tr. Legge 2.440;

tls:text.tls:line: but the attention paid to the assistant is less.

sense.def: attendant; butler (whose task it is to act as middleman between visitors and host)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.21; Couvreur 2.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 903; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.31b; tr. Legge 2.441;

tls:text.tls:line: the host pledges the attendants,

sense.def: drink a toast to; respond by offering a toast to someone who has offered a toast to one.

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.21; Couvreur 2.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 903; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.31b; tr. Legge 2.441;

tls:text.tls:line: Young and old pledge one a nother according to their age,

sense.def: age; seniority; degree of seniority, rank of seniority

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.21; Couvreur 2.662f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 903; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.31b; tr. Legge 2.441;

tls:text.tls:line: and the cup circulates on to the keepers of the vases and the cup-washers.

sense.def: wash something contextually determinate; often specifically: wash the ceremonial cup

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.23; Couvreur 2.663f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.32; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 904; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.33a; tr. Legge 2.442;

tls:text.tls:line: When that one state is tranquil, all under heaven will be the same.

sense.def: be happily at peace; find peace and happiness; lead a happy enough life; be conducive to happy peace of mind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.25; Couvreur 2.664; Su1n Xïda4n 14.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 905; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.33b; tr. Legge 2.442;

tls:text.tls:line: the presiding idea as found in heaven and earth;

sense.def: govern well, govern properly; deal with efficiently as the person responsible

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.26; Couvreur 2.664f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.33; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 905; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.34b; tr. Legge 2.443;

tls:text.tls:line: The vessel contained the dark-coloured liquid;

sense.def: reddish dark; generally: dark

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.27; Couvreur 2.665f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.34; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 906; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.35b; tr. Legge 2.443;

tls:text.tls:line: - (there is then at work that mysterious) intelligence that gives birth to all things.

sense.def: cause to arise; produce

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.29; Couvreur 2.666f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 906; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.38a; tr. Legge 2.444;

tls:text.tls:line: and (it is spring) which produces all things.

sense.def: cause to arise; produce

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 45.01.29; Couvreur 2.666f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.35; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 906; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.38a; tr. Legge 2.444;

tls:text.tls:line: that is, he produces all things.

sense.def: cause to arise; produce

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.05; Couvreur 2.669f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.37f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 910; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.45b; tr. Legge 2.446;

tls:text.tls:line: and when their undertakings were successful, the states were tranquil and happy.

sense.def: be happily at peace; find peace and happiness; lead a happy enough life; be conducive to happy peace of mind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.06; Couvreur 2.671; Su1n Xïda4n 14.38; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 911; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.47b; tr. Legge 2.448;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore the ancient kings paid much attention to it.

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.07; Couvreur 2.671f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.39; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 911; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.48a; tr. Legge 2.448;

tls:text.tls:line: the feudal princes annually presented the officers who had charge of their tibute to the son of Heaven,

sense.def: hand up (something N1) as a formal offering to (a beneficiary N2); offer to give; give politely (to superiors or inferiors)有獻不死之藥於荊王者

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.10; Couvreur 2.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 912; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.49b; tr. Legge 2.449;

tls:text.tls:line: 'The long-descended lord

sense.def: removed by one generation, great-(grandson)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.11; Couvreur 2.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 912; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.50a; tr. Legge 2.449;

tls:text.tls:line: they were happy and got renown.

sense.def: be happily at peace; find peace and happiness; lead a happy enough life; be conducive to happy peace of mind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.11; Couvreur 2.673f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.40; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 912; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.50a; tr. Legge 2.449;

tls:text.tls:line: they were happy and got renown.

sense.def: be praised; be renowned, enjoy renown

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.14; Couvreur 2.674f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 913; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.51a; tr. Legge 2.449;

tls:text.tls:line: and resolved to maitain their characters to death?

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.15; Couvreur 2.674f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.41; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 913; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.51b; tr. Legge 2.449;

tls:text.tls:line: Do those of you who are eighty, ninety, or one hundred, expound the way (of virtue) without confusion or error?

sense.def: loan for 耄: those, who are 80/90 years of age

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.16; Couvreur 2.676f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 914; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.55a; tr. Legge 2.450;

tls:text.tls:line: means every one unfolding his own idea;

sense.def: emphatic or contrastive form of 其； (often but not always contrastive:) one's his/her/its own N; all of one's own (and special)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.18; Couvreur 2.676f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.42; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 914; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.55a; tr. Legge 2.450;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the archer shoots at the mark of his (ideal) self;

sense.def: emphatic or contrastive form of 其； (often but not always contrastive:) one's his/her/its own N; all of one's own (and special)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.21; Couvreur 2.678; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.57b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. Hence, when a son is born,

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.21; Couvreur 2.678; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.57b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: a bow of mulberry wood, and six arrows of he wild raspberry plant (are polaced on the left of the door),

sense.def: wooden bow; general name for a bow

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.21; Couvreur 2.678; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.57b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: a bow of mulberry wood, and six arrows of he wild raspberry plant (are polaced on the left of the door),

sense.def: SHU: arrow; arrow with wooden shaft and feathers

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.22; Couvreur 2.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.58b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: (The archer) seeks to be correct in himself,

sense.def: correct things in (oneself) 正諸己

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.22; Couvreur 2.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.58b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: (The archer) seeks to be correct in himself,

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.22; Couvreur 2.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.58b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: he is not angry with the one who has surpassed himself,

sense.def: object pronoun, resumptive, non-contrastive: oneself, himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.22; Couvreur 2.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.58b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: but turns round and seeks (for the cause of failure) in himself.

sense.def: seek N1 from (oneself) 求諸己

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.22; Couvreur 2.678f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.45; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.58b; tr. Legge 2.452;

tls:text.tls:line: but turns round and seeks (for the cause of failure) in himself.

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 46.01.24; Couvreur 2.679f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.46; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 916f; Yi4 Shu1 46:75.59a; tr. Legge 2.453;

tls:text.tls:line: - it is only the archer of superior virtue who can do this!

sense.def: be a worthy, be a person of moral talent; also plural: be persons of moral worth, be worthies

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.01; Couvreur 2.6i1f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.47; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 919; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.4b; tr. Legge 2.454;

tls:text.tls:line: arranged them in their different classes;

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.04; Couvreur 2.6i3; Su1n Xïda4n 14.48; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 920; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.9b; tr. Legge 2.455;

tls:text.tls:line: with his face to the west he stands there by himself:

sense.def: on one's own; by oneself; particularly

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.07; Couvreur 2.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 921; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.12b; tr. Legge 2.455;

tls:text.tls:line: for every act of courtesy must be responded to:

sense.def: all objects =無所不

tls:text.tls:srcline: 臣下竭力盡能以立功於國，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.07; Couvreur 2.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.49; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 921; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.12b; tr. Legge 2.455;

tls:text.tls:line: When ministers and inferiors do their outmost to perform service for the state,

sense.def: one's (hypothetical) subordinates, ministers of all kinds

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故臣下皆務竭力盡能以立功，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.08; Couvreur 2.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 921f; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.13a; tr. Legge 2.455;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence all officers and inferiors endeavour with their outmost strength and ability to establish their merit,

sense.def: one's (hypothetical) subordinates, ministers of all kinds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.08; Couvreur 2.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 921f; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.13a; tr. Legge 2.455;

tls:text.tls:line: then he may take from them a thenth part (of their revenues).

sense.def: (amout of) ten; unit of ten

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.08; Couvreur 2.6i4f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.49f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 921f; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.13a; tr. Legge 2.455;

tls:text.tls:line: In this way he has enough, and his subjects do not suffer want.

sense.def: suffer shortages, be in straights; suffer want 匱餓

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 47.01.11; Couvreur 2.686f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.50f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 922; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.15b; tr. Legge 2.456;

tls:text.tls:line: were all proportioned to the differences of rank in the guests:

sense.def: distinction made, differentiation in social practice

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.01; Couvreur 2.688f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.52; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 925; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.20a-22a; tr. Legge 2.458;

tls:text.tls:line: A superior man, where he wishes to do honour, will not venture to communicate directly and in person.

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.04; Couvreur 2.689f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.54f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 926; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.25a-25b; tr. Legge 2.459;

tls:text.tls:line: they would not attack or encroach on one another.

sense.def: encroach upon, trespass against, infringe on the rights and responsibilities of (a ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.04; Couvreur 2.689f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.54f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 926; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.25a-25b; tr. Legge 2.459;

tls:text.tls:line: they would not attack or encroach on one another.

sense.def: offend against, presumtuously act against

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.05; Couvreur 2.689f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 926; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.25b; tr. Legge 2.459;

tls:text.tls:line: (When he had delivered his message), the ruler himself showed him courtesy, (and presented to him the cup of new liquor).

sense.def: distinguished guest

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.05; Couvreur 2.689f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 926; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.25b; tr. Legge 2.459;

tls:text.tls:line: and also with the ruler.

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.05; Couvreur 2.689f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 926; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.25b; tr. Legge 2.459;

tls:text.tls:line: and also with the ruler.

sense.def: make a visit (to a ruler or person in authority)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 所以明賓客君臣之義也。

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.05; Couvreur 2.689f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.55; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 926; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.25b; tr. Legge 2.459;

tls:text.tls:line: All these observance served to illustrate the idea underlying the relations between ruler and minister in recieving visitors and guests.

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.06; Couvreur 2.691; Su1n Xïda4n 14.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 927; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.29a; tr. Legge 2.460;

tls:text.tls:line: If the messenger committed andy error in the exchange of his mission,

sense.def: commit a mistake; do things by mistake or inadvertently

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.06; Couvreur 2.691; Su1n Xïda4n 14.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 927; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.29a; tr. Legge 2.460;

tls:text.tls:line: - thereby making him ashamed, and stimulating him.

sense.def: make feel ashamed; bring shame upon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.07; Couvreur 2.691; Su1n Xïda4n 14.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 927; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.29b; tr. Legge 2.460;

tls:text.tls:line: they did not make any attacks on one another,

sense.def: encroach upon, trespass against, infringe on the rights and responsibilities of (a ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.07; Couvreur 2.691; Su1n Xïda4n 14.57; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 927; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.29b; tr. Legge 2.460;

tls:text.tls:line: and i their states there was no oppression or encrooachment.

sense.def: offend against, presumtuously act against

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.08; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.31a-33a; tr. Legge 2.460;

tls:text.tls:line: - showing the small importance to be attached to their value, and the great importance of the ceremony.

sense.def: this abstract subject (is N)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.09; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.33a; tr. Legge 2.461;

tls:text.tls:line: There were five pairs of birds that went in flocks every day.

sense.def: fowl, bird, epecially large wild bird or bird of prey, and birds one might try to catch

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.09; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.33a; tr. Legge 2.461;

tls:text.tls:line: There were five pairs of birds that went in flocks every day.

sense.def: pair

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.09; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.33a; tr. Legge 2.461;

tls:text.tls:line: There was one meal (a day in the court), and two (spare) entertainments (in the temple).

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.09; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.33a; tr. Legge 2.461;

tls:text.tls:line: There was one meal (a day in the court), and two (spare) entertainments (in the temple).

sense.def: conduct a formal ritual dinner

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.09; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.33a; tr. Legge 2.461;

tls:text.tls:line: There was one meal (a day in the court), and two (spare) entertainments (in the temple).

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.09; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.33a; tr. Legge 2.461;

tls:text.tls:line: There was one meal (a day in the court), and two (spare) entertainments (in the temple).

sense.def: OBI 4: preside over and ritually lead a ritual entertainment; hold an entertainment

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.10; Couvreur 2.692f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.58; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 928; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.35b; tr. Legge 2.461;

tls:text.tls:line: 10. They could not always be so profuse as this in antiquity in the use of their wealth;

sense.def: 養民如子 like (comparison being with the V-ing of N2, the object of the preceding transitive verb with the V-ing of N1)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.12; Couvreur 2.694; Su1n Xïda4n 14.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 929; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.37a; tr. Legge 2.462;

tls:text.tls:line: though the stalks of flesh were dry (and ready to their hand),

sense.def: be completely lacking in (life-giving) humidity, dead dry; be dry; be dried

tls:text.tls:srcline:
故聖王之貴勇敢、
強有力

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.16; Couvreur 2.694; Su1n Xïda4n 14.60; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 929; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.37b; tr. Legge 2.462;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the way the sage kings set high store by courage, valour, and strength

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.18; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 920; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.41a; tr. Legge 2.463;

tls:text.tls:line: hanging down (in beads) as if it would fall to the ground,

sense.def: SW: 從高墜也。 (of dew) drop; CC136 hail down (arrows); CC446: fall from the sky (stars)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.19; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 920; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.41b; tr. Legge 2.463;

tls:text.tls:line: when struck, yieding a note, clear and prolonged,

sense.def: knock at; strike against so as to make a sound

tls:text.tls:srcline:
瑕不揜瑜、
瑜不揜瑕，

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.19; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 920; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.41b; tr. Legge 2.463;

tls:text.tls:line: its flaws not concealing its beauty, nor its beauty concealing its flaws,

sense.def: reddish pattern in jade; flaw (in jade, occasonally also in the image of the sun etc)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.19; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 920; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.41b; tr. Legge 2.463;

tls:text.tls:line: bright as a brilliant rainbow,

sense.def: ZGC: white halo round sun or moon

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 48.01.20; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.61; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 920; Yi4 Shu1 47:76.41b; tr. Legge 2.463;

tls:text.tls:line: standing out in conspicious in the symbols of rank,

sense.def: especially; very; singularily; for the sole purpose

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.01; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.1b; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: are the embodiment of (the ideas suggested by) heaven and earth;

sense.def: be an embodiment of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.01; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.1b; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: take their laws from the (changes of the) four seasons;

sense.def: to be emulated; to be taken as a model

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.01; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.1b; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: imitate the (operations of the) contracting and developing movements in nature;

sense.def: follow as a guideline

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.01; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.1b; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: and are conformed to the feelings of men.

sense.def: accord with, act in accordance with (something stable and preexisting); adapt properly to; conform to the ways of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.01; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.1b; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: and are conformed to the feelings of men.

sense.def: human feelings (often definite: the human feelings); real ways of thinking (of a given person or persons); (sometimes general:) public opinion, (even:) public demand

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.01; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.1b; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: and when any one finds fault with them,

sense.def: find (often minor) faults with a person or thing, make petty insulting criticisms, insult openly with insinuating remarks

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.01; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.1b; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: he only shows his ignorance of their origin.

sense.def: coming forth from, from

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.03; Couvreur 2.697f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.63; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 933; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.3a; tr. Legge 2.465;

tls:text.tls:line: - all these are derived from the human feelings.

sense.def: human feelings (often definite: the human feelings); real ways of thinking (of a given person or persons); (sometimes general:) public opinion, (even:) public demand

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.07; Couvreur 2.701f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.5b; tr. Legge 2.466;

tls:text.tls:line: making no addition to the mound (raised at first) over the grave;

sense.def: tombs

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.07; Couvreur 2.701f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.5b; tr. Legge 2.466;

tls:text.tls:line: fixing the day for the sacrifice at the end of the second year;

sense.def: auspicious memorial sacrifice; auspiciousness sacrifice in which one seeks (but does not necessarily get) a favourable response for a project

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.07; Couvreur 2.701f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.64f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.5b; tr. Legge 2.466;

tls:text.tls:line: and the love is the same for both.

sense.def: loving care; love; feelings of love; sollicitousness; active affection

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.09; Couvreur 2.703f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.8b; tr. Legge 2.467;

tls:text.tls:line: 7. What is meant by the use of the staff?

sense.def: (be so old as to have to) use a stick; carry a stick

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.10; Couvreur 2.703f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.9a; tr. Legge 2.467;

tls:text.tls:line: Where (the mourner) has himself to take part in what is to be done,

sense.def: in person, personally and not as represented by anyone else

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.10; Couvreur 2.703f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.9a; tr. Legge 2.467;

tls:text.tls:line: he will have his face grimed (as if black with sorow).

sense.def: be dirty

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.11; Couvreur 2.703f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.9a; tr. Legge 2.467;

tls:text.tls:line: Women who are bald do not use the coiffure;

sense.def: bald

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.11; Couvreur 2.703f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.65; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 935; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.9a; tr. Legge 2.467;

tls:text.tls:line: hunchbacks do not unbare their arms;

sense.def: ZZ, LSCQ: hunchback

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.12; Couvreur 2.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 936; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.13a; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: the (wailing for) three days, which left no leisure for anything else;

sense.def: be remiss; be lazy in performance of one's duty; be listless in performance

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.12; Couvreur 2.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 936; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.13a; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: the grief and lamentation for a whole year;

sense.def: feel intense grief, be very saddened

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.12; Couvreur 2.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.66; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 936; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.13a; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: and the sorrow on to the three years:

sense.def: feel grief and deep concern (not as strong as 悲哀)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.13; Couvreur 2.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.66f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 936; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.13b; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: The worthiest were not permitted to go beyond this period,

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.13; Couvreur 2.704f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.66f; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 936; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.13b; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: what the (sage) kings always carried into practice.

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.14; Couvreur 2.705f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 937; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.14a; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: but the kings all observed this rule; [but kings in general all]

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.15; Couvreur 2.705f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 937; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.14a; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: it was recorded in the Shu, and he was styled Kao (The Exalted),

sense.def: record, make a record of

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.16; Couvreur 2.705f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.67; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 937; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.14a; tr. Legge 2.468;

tls:text.tls:line: the reference is to ministers and inferior (officers).

sense.def: one's (hypothetical) subordinates, ministers of all kinds

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.18; Couvreur 2.707; Su1n Xïda4n 14.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 938; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.16a; tr. Legge 2.469;

tls:text.tls:line: and when the three years were completed, he offered the auspicious sacrifice.

sense.def: conduct auspicious memorial sacrifice (at yearly intervals, which could be on a large scale (dà xiáng 大祥) or on a small scale (xiǎo xiáng 小祥).)

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.19; Couvreur 2.707f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 938; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.16a; tr. Legge 2.469;

tls:text.tls:line: the most animated with the sentiment of benevolence (or humanity) can perceive the affection (underlying the usages);

sense.def: those who are human-hearted

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.19; Couvreur 2.707f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 938; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.16a; tr. Legge 2.469;

tls:text.tls:line: he who has (most) knowledge can percieve the nice distinctions pervading them;

sense.def: the intelligent people

tls:line.title: 禮記(en)
tls:line.loc: LIJI 49.01.19; Couvreur 2.707f; Su1n Xïda4n 14.68; Jia1ng Yi4hua2 938; Yi4 Shu1 47:77.16a; tr. Legge 2.469;

tls:text.tls:line: by filial sons, deferential younger brothers, and pure-minded virgins.

sense.def: investigate
